4:22.en_khattab: Do not marry former wives of your fathers—

4:22.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا مَا قَدۡ سَلَفَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ
4:22.en_khattab: except what was done previously. It was indeed a shameful

4:23.qpc_hafs: حُرِّمَتۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أُمَّهَٰتُكُمۡ وَبَنَاتُكُمۡ وَأَخَوَٰتُكُمۡ وَعَمَّٰتُكُمۡ
4:23.en_khattab: ˹Also˺ forbidden to you for marriage are your mothers, your daughters, your sisters, your paternal and maternal aunts
your brother’s daughters, your sister’s daughters

4:23.qpc_hafs: وَأُمَّهَٰتُكُمُ ٱلَّٰتِيٓ أَرۡضَعۡنَكُمۡ وَأَخَوَٰتُكُم مِّنَ ٱلرَّضَٰعَةِ
وَأُمَّهَٰتُ نِسَآئِكُمۡ وَرَبَٰٓئِبُكُمُ ٱلَّٰتِي فِي حُجُورِكُم مِّن نِّسَآئِكُمُ ٱلَّٰتِي دَخَلۡتُم بِهِنَّ فَإِن لَّمۡ تَكُونُواْ دَخَلۡتُم بِهِنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ
4:23.en_khattab: your mothers-in-law, your stepdaughters under your guardianship if you have consummated marriage with their mothers— but if you have not, then you can marry them— nor the wives of your own sons

4:23.qpc_hafs: وَحَلَٰٓئِلُ أَبۡنَآئِكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِنۡ أَصۡلَٰبِكُمۡ وَأَن تَجۡمَعُواْ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡأُخۡتَيۡنِ إِلَّا مَا قَدۡ سَلَفَۗ
4:23.en_khattab: nor two sisters together at the same time— except what was done previously
Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

4:24.qpc_hafs: وَٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتُ مِنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِلَّا مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُكُمۡۖ
4:24.en_khattab: Also ˹forbidden are˺ married women— except ˹female˺ captives in your possession.
This is Allah’s commandment to you.
Lawful to you are all beyond these

4:24.qpc_hafs: أَن تَبۡتَغُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِكُم مُّحۡصِنِينَ غَيۡرَ مُسَٰفِحِينَۚ
4:24.en_khattab: as long as you seek them with your wealth in a legal marriage, not in fornication

4:24.qpc_hafs: فَمَا ٱسۡتَمۡتَعۡتُم بِهِۦ مِنۡهُنَّ فَـَٔاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةٗۚ
4:24.en_khattab: Give those you have consummated marriage with their due dowries.

4:24.qpc_hafs: وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِيمَا تَرَٰضَيۡتُم بِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلۡفَرِيضَةِۚ
4:24.en_khattab: It is permissible to be mutually gracious regarding the set dowry.

4:25.en_khattab: But if any of you cannot afford
to marry a free believing woman,

4:25.qpc_hafs: فَمِن مَّا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُكُم مِّن فَتَيَٰتِكُمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۚ
4:25.en_khattab: then ˹let him marry˺ a believing bondwoman possessed by one of you.
Allah knows best ˹the state of˺ your faith ˹and theirs˺.

4:25.qpc_hafs: فَٱنكِحُوهُنَّ بِإِذۡنِ أَهۡلِهِنَّ وَءَاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ
4:25.en_khattab: So marry them with the permission of their owners, giving them their dowry in fairness,

4:25.qpc_hafs: مُحۡصَنَٰتٍ غَيۡرَ مُسَٰفِحَٰتٖ وَلَا مُتَّخِذَٰتِ أَخۡدَانٖۚ
4:25.en_khattab: if they are chaste, neither promiscuous nor having secret affairs.

4:25.qpc_hafs: فَإِذَآ أُحۡصِنَّ فَإِنۡ أَتَيۡنَ بِفَٰحِشَةٖ فَعَلَيۡهِنَّ نِصۡفُ مَا عَلَى ٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتِ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِۚ
4:25.en_khattab: If they commit indecency after marriage, they receive half the punishment of free women.
This is for those of you who fear falling into sin.
But if you are patient, it is better for you.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

4:26.en_khattab: It is Allah’s Will to make things clear to you
guide you to the ˹noble˺ ways of those before you
and turn to you in mercy

4:27.en_khattab: And it is Allah’s Will to turn to you in grace,
but those who follow their desires
wish to see you deviate entirely ˹from Allah’s Way˺.

4:28.en_khattab: And it is Allah’s Will to lighten your burdens,

4:29.en_khattab: Do not devour one another’s wealth illegally,

4:29.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ تِجَٰرَةً عَن تَرَاضٖ مِّنكُمۡۚ
4:29.en_khattab: but rather trade by mutual consent.
And do not kill ˹each other or˺ yourselves.
Surely Allah is ever Merciful to you.

4:30.en_khattab: And whoever does this sinfully and unjustly
We will burn them in the Fire

4:31.en_khattab: If you avoid the major sins
We will absolve you of your ˹lesser˺ misdeeds

4:32.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَتَمَنَّوۡاْ مَا فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ بَعۡضَكُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۚ
4:32.en_khattab: And do not crave what Allah has given some of you over others.
Men will be rewarded according to their deeds.
Rather, ask Allah for His bounties.

4:32.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا
4:32.en_khattab: Surely Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

4:33.en_khattab: to what has been left by parents and next of kin.
As for those you have made a pledge to,

4:33.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدًا
4:33.en_khattab: Surely Allah is a Witness over all things.

4:34.qpc_hafs: بِمَا فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بَعۡضَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ
4:34.en_khattab: as men have been provisioned by Allah over women
and tasked with supporting them financially.
And righteous women are devoutly obedient and, when alone, protective
of what Allah has entrusted them with.
And if you sense ill-conduct from your women, advise them ˹first˺,
˹if they persist,˺ do not share their beds,
˹but if they still persist,˺ then discipline them
˹gently˺. But if they change their ways
do not be unjust to them.
Surely Allah is Most High, All-Great.

4:35.en_khattab: If you anticipate a split between them,

4:35.qpc_hafs: فَٱبۡعَثُواْ حَكَمٗا مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهِۦ وَحَكَمٗا مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَآ
4:35.en_khattab: appoint a mediator from his family and another from hers.
Allah will restore harmony between them.

4:36.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not like whoever is arrogant,

4:36.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ مُخۡتَالٗا فَخُورًا

4:37.qpc_hafs: وَيَكۡتُمُونَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦۗ

4:37.en_khattab: We have prepared for the disbelievers a humiliating punishment.

4:38.en_khattab: Likewise for those who spend their wealth
and do not believe in Allah
And whoever takes Satan as an associate
what an evil associate they have!

4:39.en_khattab: What harm could have come to them

4:39.qpc_hafs: لَوۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ
4:39.en_khattab: if they had believed in Allah and the Last Day and donated from what Allah has provided for them
And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of them

4:40.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖۖ
4:40.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah never wrongs ˹anyone˺—even by an atom’s weight.
And if it is a good deed, He will multiply it many times over
and will give a great reward out of His grace.

4:41.en_khattab: So how will it be when
We bring a witness from every faith-community
and bring you ˹O Prophet˺ as a witness against yours

4:42.en_khattab: those who denied ˹Allah˺ and disobeyed the Messenger
will wish they were reduced to dust.
And they will never be able to hide anything from Allah.

4:43.qpc_hafs: وَأَنتُمۡ سُكَٰرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ تَعۡلَمُواْ مَا تَقُولُونَ
4:43.en_khattab: while intoxicated until you are aware of what you say,

4:43.qpc_hafs: وَلَا جُنُبًا إِلَّا عَابِرِي سَبِيلٍ حَتَّىٰ تَغۡتَسِلُواْۚ
4:43.en_khattab: nor in a state of ˹full˺ impurity— unless you merely pass through ˹the mosque˺—until you have bathed.

4:43.qpc_hafs: وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرۡضَىٰٓ أَوۡ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوۡ جَآءَ أَحَدٞ مِّنكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡغَآئِطِ أَوۡ لَٰمَسۡتُمُ ٱلنِّسَآءَ
4:43.en_khattab: But if you are ill, on a journey, or have relieved yourselves, or been intimate with your wives
then purify yourselves with clean earth,

4:44.en_khattab: Have you ˹O Prophet˺ not seen those who
were given a portion of the Scriptures

4:44.qpc_hafs: يَشۡتَرُونَ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن تَضِلُّواْ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
4:44.en_khattab: yet trade it for misguidance and wish to see you deviate from the ˹Right˺ Path?

4:45.en_khattab: Allah knows best who your enemies are!
And Allah is sufficient as a Guardian,
and He is sufficient as a Helper.

4:46.qpc_hafs: مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ يُحَرِّفُونَ ٱلۡكَلِمَ عَن مَّوَاضِعِهِۦ
4:46.en_khattab: Some Jews take words out of context
and say, “We listen and we disobey,”
us!]—playing with words and discrediting the faith.

4:46.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَأَطَعۡنَا وَٱسۡمَعۡ وَٱنظُرۡنَا
4:46.en_khattab: Had they said ˹courteously˺, “We hear and obey,” “Listen to us,” and “Unẓurna,” [Tend to us!]
it would have been better for them and more proper.

4:46.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِن لَّعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِكُفۡرِهِمۡ فَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
4:46.en_khattab: Allah has condemned them for their disbelief, so they do not believe except for a few.

4:47.en_khattab: O you who were given the Book!

4:47.qpc_hafs: ءَامِنُواْ بِمَا نَزَّلۡنَا مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا مَعَكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ
4:47.en_khattab: Believe in what We have revealed— confirming your own Scriptures—

4:47.qpc_hafs: أَن نَّطۡمِسَ وُجُوهٗا فَنَرُدَّهَا عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَارِهَآ
4:47.en_khattab: before We wipe out ˹your˺ faces, turning them backwards,

4:47.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ نَلۡعَنَهُمۡ كَمَا لَعَنَّآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّبۡتِۚ
4:47.en_khattab: or We condemn the defiant as We did to the Sabbath-breakers.
And Allah’s command is always executed!

4:48.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَغۡفِرُ أَن يُشۡرَكَ بِهِۦ
4:48.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah does not forgive associating others with Him ˹in worship˺

4:48.qpc_hafs: وَيَغۡفِرُ مَا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن يَشَآءُۚ
4:48.en_khattab: but forgives anything else of whoever He wills

4:48.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُشۡرِكۡ بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰٓ إِثۡمًا عَظِيمًا
4:48.en_khattab: And whoever associates others with Allah has indeed committed a grave sin

4:49.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُزَكُّونَ أَنفُسَهُمۚ
4:49.en_khattab: Have you ˹O Prophet˺ not seen those who ˹falsely˺ elevate themselves?
It is Allah who elevates whoever He wills.
And none will be wronged ˹even by the width of˺ the thread of a date stone.

4:50.en_khattab: how they fabricate lies against Allah

4:51.en_khattab: Have you ˹O Prophet˺ not seen those who
were given a portion of the Scriptures
yet believe in idols and false gods

4:51.qpc_hafs: هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ سَبِيلًا
4:51.en_khattab: that they are better guided than the believers

4:52.en_khattab: And whoever is condemned by Allah

4:53.en_khattab: Do they have control over shares of the kingdom?
If so, they would not have given anyone so much as the speck on a date stone.

4:54.qpc_hafs: أَمۡ يَحۡسُدُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ عَلَىٰ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦۖ
4:54.en_khattab: Or do they envy the people for Allah’s bounties?

4:54.qpc_hafs: فَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ ءَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ
4:54.en_khattab: Indeed, We have given the descendants of Abraham the Book and wisdom,

4:55.en_khattab: while others turned away from him.
Hell is sufficient as a torment!

4:56.en_khattab: Surely those who reject Our signs,
We will cast them into the Fire.
Whenever their skin is burnt completely,
We will replace it so they will ˹constantly˺ taste the punishment.
so they will ˹constantly˺ taste the punishment

4:57.en_khattab: As for those who believe and do good,

4:57.qpc_hafs: سَنُدۡخِلُهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ
4:57.en_khattab: We will admit them into Gardens under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever.
There they will have pure spouses,
and We will place them under a vast shade.

4:58.en_khattab: to return trusts to their rightful owners
and when you judge between people
What a noble commandment from Allah to you!

4:59.qpc_hafs: أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَمۡرِ مِنكُمۡۖ
4:59.en_khattab: Obey Allah and obey the Messenger and those in authority among you.

4:59.qpc_hafs: فَإِن تَنَٰزَعۡتُمۡ فِي شَيۡءٖ فَرُدُّوهُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِ
4:59.en_khattab: Should you disagree on anything, then refer it to Allah and His Messenger,

4:59.qpc_hafs: إِن كُنتُمۡ تُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِۚ
4:59.en_khattab: if you ˹truly˺ believe in Allah and the Last Day.
This is the best and fairest resolution.

4:60.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ يَزۡعُمُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ
4:60.en_khattab: those who claim they believe in what has been revealed to you and what was revealed before you?
They seek the judgment of false judges
which they were commanded to reject

4:60.qpc_hafs: وَيُرِيدُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَن يُضِلَّهُمۡ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدٗا
4:60.en_khattab: And Satan ˹only˺ desires to lead them farther away

4:61.en_khattab: When it is said to them
you see the hypocrites turn away from you stubbornly

4:62.qpc_hafs: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَآ أَصَٰبَتۡهُم مُّصِيبَةُۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ
4:62.en_khattab: How ˹horrible˺ will it be if a disaster strikes them because of what their hands have done,

4:62.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ جَآءُوكَ يَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَدۡنَآ إِلَّآ إِحۡسَٰنٗا وَتَوۡفِيقًا
4:62.en_khattab: then they come to you swearing by Allah, “We intended nothing but goodwill and reconciliation.”

4:63.qpc_hafs: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡلَمُ ٱللَّهُ مَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡ
4:63.en_khattab: ˹Only˺ Allah knows what is in their hearts.

4:63.qpc_hafs: وَقُل لَّهُمۡ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ قَوۡلَۢا بَلِيغٗا
4:63.en_khattab: and give them advice that will shake their very souls.

4:64.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا لِيُطَاعَ بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ
4:64.en_khattab: We only sent messengers to be obeyed by Allah’s Will.

4:64.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ إِذ ظَّلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ جَآءُوكَ فَٱسۡتَغۡفَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ
4:64.en_khattab: If only those ˹hypocrites˺ came to you ˹O Prophet˺—after wronging themselves— seeking Allah’s forgiveness.
and the Messenger prayed for their forgiveness,
they would have certainly found Allah ever Accepting of Repentance, Most Merciful.

4:65.en_khattab: until they accept you ˹O Prophet˺ as the judge

4:65.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ حَرَجٗا مِّمَّا قَضَيۡتَ
4:65.en_khattab: and find no resistance within themselves against your decision

4:66.qpc_hafs: أَنِ ٱقۡتُلُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱخۡرُجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِكُم
4:66.en_khattab: to sacrifice themselves or abandon their homes
none would have obeyed except for a few

4:66.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ فَعَلُواْ مَا يُوعَظُونَ بِهِۦ
4:66.en_khattab: Had they done what they were advised to do
it would have certainly been far better for them and more reassuring

4:67.en_khattab: and We would have granted them
a great reward by Our grace

4:69.en_khattab: And whoever obeys Allah and the Messenger

4:69.qpc_hafs: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم
4:69.en_khattab: will be in the company of those blessed by Allah
the prophets, the people of truth, the martyrs, and the righteous

4:70.en_khattab: and Allah fully knows ˹who deserves it˺.

4:71.en_khattab: and go forth either in groups

4:72.en_khattab: There will be some among you who will lag behind
so that if you face a disaster
they will say, “Allah has blessed us
for not being there among them.

4:73.en_khattab: But if you return with Allah’s bounties,

4:73.qpc_hafs: لَيَقُولَنَّ كَأَن لَّمۡ تَكُنۢ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُۥ مَوَدَّةٞ
4:73.en_khattab: they will say— as if there had been no bond between
you—“We wish we had been there with them

4:74.qpc_hafs: فَلۡيُقَٰتِلۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَشۡرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ
4:74.en_khattab: Let those who would sacrifice this life for the Hereafter fight in the cause of Allah.

4:74.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُقَٰتِلۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَيُقۡتَلۡ أَوۡ يَغۡلِبۡ
4:74.en_khattab: And whoever fights in Allah’s cause— whether they achieve martyrdom or victory—
We will honour them with a great reward.

4:75.en_khattab: And what is it with you?
You do not fight in the cause of Allah
and for oppressed men, women, and children

4:75.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا مِنۡ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلظَّالِمِ أَهۡلُهَا
4:75.en_khattab: who cry out, “Our Lord! Deliver us from this land of oppressors!

4:75.qpc_hafs: وَٱجۡعَل لَّنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا وَٱجۡعَل لَّنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ نَصِيرًا
4:75.en_khattab: Appoint for us a saviour; appoint for us a helper— all by Your grace.

4:76.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ
4:76.en_khattab: Believers fight for the cause of Allah

4:76.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱلطَّٰغُوتِ
4:76.en_khattab: whereas disbelievers fight for the cause of the Devil
Indeed, Satan’s schemes are ever weak

4:77.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ كُفُّوٓاْ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ
4:77.en_khattab: Have you ˹O Prophet˺ not seen those who had been told, “Do not fight!
Rather, establish prayer and pay alms-tax.
Then once the order came to fight,

4:77.qpc_hafs: فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَخۡشَوۡنَ ٱلنَّاسَ كَخَشۡيَةِ ٱللَّهِ
4:77.en_khattab: a group of them feared those ˹hostile˺ people as Allah should be feared

4:77.qpc_hafs: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا لِمَ كَتَبۡتَ عَلَيۡنَا ٱلۡقِتَالَ
4:77.en_khattab: They said, “Our Lord! Why have You ordered us to fight?
If only You had delayed ˹the order for˺ us for a little while!

4:77.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ مَتَٰعُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا قَلِيلٞ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ
4:77.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “The enjoyment of this world is so little, whereas the Hereafter is far better
for those mindful ˹of Allah˺. And none of you will be wronged ˹even by the width of˺ the thread of a date stone.

4:78.en_khattab: even if you were in fortified towers.

4:78.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ حَسَنَةٞ يَقُولُواْ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۖ
4:78.en_khattab: When something good befalls them, they say, “This is from Allah,”

4:78.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَيِّئَةٞ يَقُولُواْ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنۡ عِندِكَۚ
4:78.en_khattab: but when something evil befalls them, they say, “This is from you.”
Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Both have been destined by Allah.”

4:78.qpc_hafs: فَمَالِ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ لَا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ حَدِيثٗا
4:78.en_khattab: So what is the matter with these people? They can hardly comprehend anything!

4:79.en_khattab: We have sent you ˹O Prophet˺ as a messenger to ˹all˺ people.
And Allah is sufficient as a Witness.

4:80.en_khattab: then ˹know that˺ We have not sent you ˹O Prophet˺ as a keeper over them.

4:81.qpc_hafs: فَإِذَا بَرَزُواْ مِنۡ عِندِكَ بَيَّتَ طَآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي تَقُولُۖ
4:81.en_khattab: but when they leave you, a group of them would spend the night contradicting what they said.
So turn away from them, and put your trust in Allah.
And Allah is sufficient as a Trustee of Affairs.

4:82.en_khattab: Do they not then reflect on the Quran?

4:82.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ غَيۡرِ ٱللَّهِ
4:82.en_khattab: Had it been from anyone other than Allah
they would have certainly found in it many inconsistencies.

4:83.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا جَآءَهُمۡ أَمۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡنِ أَوِ ٱلۡخَوۡفِ
4:83.en_khattab: And when they hear news of security or fear,

4:83.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ رَدُّوهُ إِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ وَإِلَىٰٓ أُوْلِي ٱلۡأَمۡرِ مِنۡهُمۡ
4:83.en_khattab: Had they referred it to the Messenger or their authorities,
those with sound judgment among them would have validated it.
Had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy,
you would have followed Satan— except for a few.

4:84.en_khattab: So fight in the cause of Allah ˹O Prophet˺.
You are accountable for none but yourself.

4:84.qpc_hafs: عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَكُفَّ بَأۡسَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ
4:84.en_khattab: so perhaps Allah will curb the disbelievers’ might.
And Allah is far superior in might and in punishment.

4:85.en_khattab: Whoever intercedes for a good cause
will have a share in the reward,
and whoever intercedes for an evil cause
will have a share in the burden.

4:85.qpc_hafs: وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّقِيتٗا
4:85.en_khattab: And Allah is Watchful over all things.

4:86.en_khattab: respond with a better greeting or at least similarly.

4:86.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ حَسِيبًا
4:86.en_khattab: Surely Allah is a ˹vigilant˺ Reckoner of all things.

4:87.en_khattab: Allah, there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him.
He will certainly gather ˹all of˺ you together on the Day of Judgment
about which there is no doubt.
And whose word is more truthful than Allah’s?

4:88.en_khattab: Why are you ˹believers˺ divided into two groups regarding the hypocrites
while Allah allowed them to regress ˹to disbelief˺ because of their misdeeds

4:88.qpc_hafs: أَتُرِيدُونَ أَن تَهۡدُواْ مَنۡ أَضَلَّ ٱللَّهُۖ
4:88.en_khattab: Do you wish to guide those left by Allah to stray

4:88.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ سَبِيلٗا
4:88.en_khattab: And whoever Allah leaves to stray, you will never find for them a way

4:89.en_khattab: as they have disbelieved, so you may all be alike.

4:89.qpc_hafs: فَلَا تَتَّخِذُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ
4:89.en_khattab: So do not take them as allies unless they emigrate in the cause of Allah.

4:89.qpc_hafs: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَخُذُوهُمۡ وَٱقۡتُلُوهُمۡ حَيۡثُ وَجَدتُّمُوهُمۡۖ
4:89.en_khattab: But if they turn away, then seize them and kill them wherever you find them,

4:89.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَتَّخِذُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
4:89.en_khattab: and do not take any of them as allies or helpers,

4:90.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ يَصِلُونَ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِۭ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُم مِّيثَٰقٌ
4:90.en_khattab: except those who are allies of a people you are bound with in a treaty

4:90.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ جَآءُوكُمۡ حَصِرَتۡ صُدُورُهُمۡ أَن يُقَٰتِلُوكُمۡ أَوۡ يُقَٰتِلُواْ قَوۡمَهُمۡۚ
4:90.en_khattab: or those wholeheartedly opposed to fighting either you or their own people
If Allah had willed, He would have empowered them to fight you

4:90.qpc_hafs: فَلَقَٰتَلُوكُمۡۚ فَإِنِ ٱعۡتَزَلُوكُمۡ فَلَمۡ يُقَٰتِلُوكُمۡ وَأَلۡقَوۡاْ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلسَّلَمَ
4:90.en_khattab: So if they refrain from fighting you and offer you peace

4:90.qpc_hafs: فَمَا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبِيلٗا
4:90.en_khattab: then Allah does not permit you to harm them

4:91.en_khattab: who wish to be safe from you and their own people
Yet they cannot resist the temptation ˹of disbelief or hostility˺
If they do not keep away

4:91.qpc_hafs: فَإِن لَّمۡ يَعۡتَزِلُوكُمۡ وَيُلۡقُوٓاْ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلسَّلَمَ

4:91.en_khattab: then seize them and kill them wherever you find them

4:91.qpc_hafs: وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ جَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٗا مُّبِينٗا
4:91.en_khattab: We have given you full permission over such people

4:92.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كَانَ لِمُؤۡمِنٍ أَن يَقۡتُلَ مُؤۡمِنًا
4:92.en_khattab: It is not lawful for a believer to kill another
And whoever kills a believer unintentionally

4:92.qpc_hafs: فَتَحۡرِيرُ رَقَبَةٖ مُّؤۡمِنَةٖ وَدِيَةٞ مُّسَلَّمَةٌ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يَصَّدَّقُواْۚ
4:92.en_khattab: must free a believing slave and pay blood-money to the victim’s family— unless they waive it charitably.

4:92.qpc_hafs: فَإِن كَانَ مِن قَوۡمٍ عَدُوّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ
4:92.en_khattab: But if the victim is a believer from a hostile people,
then a believing slave must be freed.

4:92.qpc_hafs: وَإِن كَانَ مِن قَوۡمِۭ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُم مِّيثَٰقٞ
4:92.en_khattab: And if the victim is from a people bound with you in a treaty,

4:92.qpc_hafs: فَدِيَةٞ مُّسَلَّمَةٌ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ وَتَحۡرِيرُ رَقَبَةٖ مُّؤۡمِنَةٖۖ
4:92.en_khattab: then blood-money must be paid to the family along with freeing a believing slave.
let them fast two consecutive months
as a means of repentance to Allah.

4:93.en_khattab: And whoever kills a believer intentionally,
their reward will be Hell— where they will stay indefinitely.
Allah will be displeased with them, condemn them,
and will prepare for them a tremendous punishment.

4:94.qpc_hafs: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا ضَرَبۡتُمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
4:94.en_khattab: O believers! When you struggle in the cause of Allah,
be sure of who you fight.

4:94.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَقُولُواْ لِمَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلسَّلَٰمَ لَسۡتَ مُؤۡمِنٗا
4:94.en_khattab: And do not say to those who offer you ˹greetings of˺ peace, “You are no
Instead, Allah has infinite bounties ˹in store˺.

4:94.qpc_hafs: كَذَٰلِكَ كُنتُم مِّن قَبۡلُ فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ
4:94.en_khattab: You were initially like them then Allah blessed you ˹with Islam˺.

4:94.qpc_hafs: فَتَبَيَّنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا
4:94.en_khattab: So be sure! Indeed, Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

4:95.qpc_hafs: وَٱلۡمُجَٰهِدُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡۚ
4:95.en_khattab: those who strive in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives.

4:95.qpc_hafs: فَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ دَرَجَةٗۚ
4:95.en_khattab: Allah has elevated in rank those who strive with their wealth and their lives above those who stay behind ˹with valid excuses˺.
Allah has promised each a fine reward,

4:95.qpc_hafs: وَفَضَّلَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
4:95.en_khattab: but those who strive will receive a far better reward than others—

4:96.en_khattab: And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

4:97.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ ظَالِمِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ
4:97.en_khattab: When the angels seize the souls of those who have wronged themselves
scolding them, “What do you think you were doing?”
they will reply, “We were oppressed in the land.”

4:97.qpc_hafs: قَالُوٓاْ أَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ أَرۡضُ ٱللَّهِ وَٰسِعَةٗ فَتُهَاجِرُواْ فِيهَاۚ
4:97.en_khattab: The angels will respond, “Was Allah’s earth not spacious enough for you to emigrate?”
It is they who will have Hell as their home

4:99.qpc_hafs: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعۡفُوَ عَنۡهُمۡۚ
4:99.en_khattab: it is right to hope that Allah will pardon them

4:100.en_khattab: Whoever emigrates in the cause of Allah

4:100.qpc_hafs: يَجِدۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُرَٰغَمٗا كَثِيرٗا وَسَعَةٗۚ
4:100.en_khattab: will find many safe havens and bountiful resources throughout the earth

4:100.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَخۡرُجۡ مِنۢ بَيۡتِهِۦ مُهَاجِرًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ
4:100.en_khattab: Those who leave their homes and die while emigrating to Allah and His Messenger

4:100.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ يُدۡرِكۡهُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ فَقَدۡ وَقَعَ أَجۡرُهُۥ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۗ
4:100.en_khattab: their reward has already been secured with Allah
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

4:101.en_khattab: When you travel through the land,

4:101.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ أَن يَفۡتِنَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْۚ
4:101.en_khattab: prayer—˹especially˺ if you fear an attack by the disbelievers.

4:101.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كَانُواْ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٗا مُّبِينٗا
4:101.en_khattab: Indeed, the disbelievers are your sworn enemies.

4:102.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا كُنتَ فِيهِمۡ فَأَقَمۡتَ لَهُمُ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ
4:102.en_khattab: When you ˹O Prophet˺ are ˹campaigning˺ with them and you lead them in prayer,

4:102.qpc_hafs: فَلۡتَقُمۡ طَآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡهُم مَّعَكَ وَلۡيَأۡخُذُوٓاْ أَسۡلِحَتَهُمۡۖ
4:102.en_khattab: let one group of them pray with you— while armed.
When they prostrate themselves, let the other group stand guard behind them.

4:102.qpc_hafs: وَلۡتَأۡتِ طَآئِفَةٌ أُخۡرَىٰ لَمۡ يُصَلُّواْ فَلۡيُصَلُّواْ مَعَكَ وَلۡيَأۡخُذُواْ حِذۡرَهُمۡ وَأَسۡلِحَتَهُمۡۗ
4:102.en_khattab: Then the group that has not yet prayed will then join you in prayer— and let them be vigilant and armed.

4:102.qpc_hafs: وَدَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ تَغۡفُلُونَ عَنۡ أَسۡلِحَتِكُمۡ وَأَمۡتِعَتِكُمۡ فَيَمِيلُونَ عَلَيۡكُم مَّيۡلَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۚ
4:102.en_khattab: The disbelievers would wish to see you neglect your weapons and belongings, so they could launch a sweeping assault on you.

4:102.qpc_hafs: وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِن كَانَ بِكُمۡ أَذٗى مِّن مَّطَرٍ أَوۡ كُنتُم مَّرۡضَىٰٓ أَن تَضَعُوٓاْ أَسۡلِحَتَكُمۡۖ وَخُذُواْ حِذۡرَكُمۡۗ
4:102.en_khattab: But there is no blame if you lay aside your weapons when overcome by heavy rain or illness— but take precaution.

4:102.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٗا مُّهِينٗا
4:102.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah has prepared a humiliating punishment for the disbelievers.

4:103.qpc_hafs: فَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ قِيَٰمٗا وَقُعُودٗا وَعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِكُمۡۚ
4:103.en_khattab: remember Allah— whether you are standing, sitting, or lying down
But when you are secure, establish regular prayers

4:103.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ كَانَتۡ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ كِتَٰبٗا مَّوۡقُوتٗا
4:103.en_khattab: Indeed, performing prayers is a duty on the believers at the appointed times

4:104.en_khattab: But you can hope to receive

4:104.qpc_hafs: وَتَرۡجُونَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَرۡجُونَۗ
4:104.en_khattab: from Allah what they can never hope for

4:105.en_khattab: Indeed, We have sent down the Book to you ˹O Prophet˺
by means of what Allah has shown you
So do not be an advocate for the deceitful.

4:106.en_khattab: indeed, Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

4:107.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تُجَٰدِلۡ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡتَانُونَ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ
4:107.en_khattab: Do not advocate for those who wrong themselves.

4:107.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمٗا
4:107.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not like those who are deceitful, sinful.

4:108.en_khattab: They try to hide ˹their deception˺ from people,
but they can never hide it from Allah—

4:108.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ مَعَهُمۡ إِذۡ يُبَيِّتُونَ مَا لَا يَرۡضَىٰ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِۚ
4:108.en_khattab: in Whose presence they plot by night what is displeasing to Him.
And Allah is Fully Aware of what they do.

4:109.en_khattab: You ˹believers˺ are advocating for them in this life,

4:109.qpc_hafs: فَمَن يُجَٰدِلُ ٱللَّهَ عَنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
4:109.en_khattab: But who will ˹dare to˺ advocate for them before Allah on the Day of Judgment?
Or who will come to their defence?

4:110.en_khattab: will certainly find Allah All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

4:111.en_khattab: it is only to their own loss

4:112.en_khattab: then blames it on an innocent person,
they will definitely bear the guilt of slander

4:113.en_khattab: Had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy

4:113.qpc_hafs: لَهَمَّت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُضِلُّوكَ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡۖ
4:113.en_khattab: a group of them would have sought to deceive you ˹O Prophet˺. Yet they would deceive none but themselves
nor can they harm you in the least

4:113.qpc_hafs: وَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَعَلَّمَكَ مَا لَمۡ تَكُن تَعۡلَمُۚ
4:113.en_khattab: Allah has revealed to you the Book and wisdom and taught you what you never knew
Great ˹indeed˺ is Allah’s favour upon you!

4:114.qpc_hafs: لَّا خَيۡرَ فِي كَثِيرٖ مِّن نَّجۡوَىٰهُمۡ
4:114.en_khattab: There is no good in most of their secret talks

4:114.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا مَنۡ أَمَرَ بِصَدَقَةٍ أَوۡ مَعۡرُوفٍ أَوۡ إِصۡلَٰحِۭ بَيۡنَ ٱلنَّاسِۚ
4:114.en_khattab: except those encouraging charity, kindness, or reconciliation between people

4:114.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ مَرۡضَاتِ ٱللَّهِ
4:114.en_khattab: And whoever does this seeking Allah’s pleasure
We will grant them a great reward

4:115.qpc_hafs: مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ
4:115.en_khattab: after guidance has become clear to them
and follows a path other than that of the believers
We will let them pursue what they have chosen

4:116.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَغۡفِرُ أَن يُشۡرَكَ بِهِۦ
4:116.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not forgive associating ˹others˺ with Him ˹in worship˺

4:116.qpc_hafs: وَيَغۡفِرُ مَا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن يَشَآءُۚ
4:116.en_khattab: but forgives anything else of whoever He wills

4:116.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُشۡرِكۡ بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدۡ ضَلَّ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدًا
4:116.en_khattab: Indeed, whoever associates ˹others˺ with Allah has clearly gone far astray

4:117.en_khattab: Instead of Allah, they only invoke
and they ˹actually˺ invoke none but a rebellious Satan—

4:118.qpc_hafs: وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبٗا مَّفۡرُوضٗا
4:118.en_khattab: who said, “I will surely take hold of a certain number of Your servants.

4:119.en_khattab: and delude them with empty hopes.
and they will slit the ears of cattle

4:119.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَتَّخِذِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ وَلِيّٗا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
4:119.en_khattab: And whoever takes Satan as a guardian instead of Allah
has certainly suffered a tremendous loss.

4:121.en_khattab: It is they who will have Hell as their home,
and they will find no escape from it!

4:122.en_khattab: And those who believe and do good
into Gardens under which rivers flow
to stay there for ever and ever
And whose word is more truthful than Allah’s?

4:123.en_khattab: ˹Divine grace is˺ neither by your wishes
nor those of the People of the Book!
Whoever commits evil will be rewarded accordingly,

4:123.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا
4:123.en_khattab: and they will find no protector or helper besides Allah.

4:124.qpc_hafs: مِن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ
4:124.en_khattab: —whether male or female— and have faith
and will never be wronged ˹even as much as˺ the speck on a date stone.

4:125.en_khattab: And who is better in faith

4:125.qpc_hafs: مِّمَّنۡ أَسۡلَمَ وَجۡهَهُۥ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ
4:125.en_khattab: than those who ˹fully˺ submit themselves to Allah, do good
and follow the Way of Abraham, the upright
Allah chose Abraham as a close friend

4:126.qpc_hafs: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ
4:126.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth.
And Allah is Fully Aware of everything.

4:127.en_khattab: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding women.
Say, “It is Allah Who instructs you regarding them.

4:127.qpc_hafs: وَمَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ فِي يَتَٰمَى ٱلنِّسَآءِ ٱلَّٰتِي لَا تُؤۡتُونَهُنَّ مَا كُتِبَ لَهُنَّ
4:127.en_khattab: Instruction has ˹already˺ been revealed in the Book concerning the orphan women you deprive of their due rights.
as well as standing up for orphans’ rights.

4:127.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تَفۡعَلُواْ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمٗا
4:127.en_khattab: And whatever good you do is certainly well known to Allah.

4:128.qpc_hafs: وَإِنِ ٱمۡرَأَةٌ خَافَتۡ مِنۢ بَعۡلِهَا نُشُوزًا
4:128.en_khattab: If a woman fears indifference or neglect from her husband,
there is no blame on either of them if they seek ˹fair˺ settlement,

4:128.qpc_hafs: أَن يُصۡلِحَا بَيۡنَهُمَا صُلۡحٗاۚ وَٱلصُّلۡحُ خَيۡرٞۗ
4:128.en_khattab: Humans are ever inclined to selfishness.

4:128.qpc_hafs: وَأُحۡضِرَتِ ٱلۡأَنفُسُ ٱلشُّحَّۚ وَإِن تُحۡسِنُواْ وَتَتَّقُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا
4:128.en_khattab: But if you are gracious and mindful ˹of Allah˺, surely Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

4:129.en_khattab: You will never be able to maintain ˹emotional˺
no matter how keen you are.
So do not totally incline towards one
And if you do what is right and are mindful ˹of Allah˺,
surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

4:130.en_khattab: But if they choose to separate
Allah will enrich both of them from His bounties

4:131.qpc_hafs: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ
4:131.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth.

4:131.qpc_hafs: وَلَقَدۡ وَصَّيۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ وَإِيَّاكُمۡ أَنِ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ
4:131.en_khattab: Indeed, We have commanded those given the Scripture before you, as well as you, to be mindful of Allah.

4:131.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تَكۡفُرُواْ فَإِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ
4:131.en_khattab: But if you disobey, then ˹know that˺ to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth.

4:132.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs whatever is in the heavens
and whatever is on the earth
And Allah is sufficient as a Trustee of Affairs.

4:133.en_khattab: If it is His Will, He can remove you altogether, O humanity,
And Allah is Most Capable to do so.

4:134.en_khattab: Whoever desires the reward of this world,
then ˹let them know that˺ with Allah are the rewards of this world and the Hereafter.

4:135.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡ أَوِ ٱلۡوَٰلِدَيۡنِ وَٱلۡأَقۡرَبِينَۚ
4:135.en_khattab: even if it is against yourselves, your parents, or close relatives.

4:135.qpc_hafs: إِن يَكُنۡ غَنِيًّا أَوۡ فَقِيرٗا فَٱللَّهُ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهِمَاۖ
4:135.en_khattab: Be they rich or poor, Allah is best to ensure their interests.
So do not let your desires cause you to deviate. ˹from justice˺.
If you distort the testimony or refuse to give it,

4:135.qpc_hafs: فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا
4:135.en_khattab: then ˹know that˺ Allah is certainly All-Aware of what you do.

4:136.qpc_hafs: ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ
4:136.en_khattab: Have faith in Allah, His Messenger, the Book He has revealed to His Messenger
and the Scriptures He revealed before.

4:136.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ
4:136.en_khattab: Indeed, whoever denies Allah, His angels, His Books, His messengers, and the Last Day

4:137.qpc_hafs: لَّمۡ يَكُنِ ٱللَّهُ لِيَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا لِيَهۡدِيَهُمۡ سَبِيلَۢا
4:137.en_khattab: Allah will neither forgive them nor guide them to the ˹Right˺ Way.

4:139.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّخِذُونَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۚ
4:139.en_khattab: who choose disbelievers as allies instead of the believers.
Do they seek honour and power through that company?
Surely all honour and power belongs to Allah.

4:140.en_khattab: He has already revealed to you in the Book

4:140.qpc_hafs: أَنۡ إِذَا سَمِعۡتُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يُكۡفَرُ بِهَا وَيُسۡتَهۡزَأُ بِهَا
4:140.en_khattab: that when you hear Allah’s revelations being denied or ridiculed

4:140.qpc_hafs: فَلَا تَقۡعُدُواْ مَعَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُواْ فِي حَدِيثٍ غَيۡرِهِۦٓ
4:140.en_khattab: then do not sit in that company unless they engage in a different topic
or else you will be like them.

4:140.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ جَامِعُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ جَمِيعًا
4:140.en_khattab: Surely Allah will gather the hypocrites and disbelievers all together in Hell.

4:141.en_khattab: ˹The hypocrites are˺ those who wait to see what happens to you.

4:141.qpc_hafs: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمۡ فَتۡحٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ قَالُوٓاْ
4:141.en_khattab: So if Allah grants you victory, they say ˹to you˺,
But if the disbelievers have a share ˹of victory˺, they say ˹to them˺,
“Did we not have the advantage over you,
yet we protected you from the believers?”
Allah will judge between ˹all of˺ you on the Day of Judgment.

4:141.qpc_hafs: وَلَن يَجۡعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ سَبِيلًا
4:141.en_khattab: And Allah will never grant the disbelievers a way over the believers.

4:142.en_khattab: When they stand up for prayer,
only to be seen by people—

4:143.qpc_hafs: لَآ إِلَىٰ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَلَآ إِلَىٰ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِۚ
4:143.en_khattab: belonging neither to these ˹believers˺ nor those ˹disbelievers˺

4:143.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ سَبِيلٗا
4:143.en_khattab: And whoever Allah leaves to stray, you will never find for them a way.

4:144.qpc_hafs: لَا تَتَّخِذُواْ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۚ
4:144.en_khattab: Do not take disbelievers as allies instead of the believers.

4:144.qpc_hafs: أَتُرِيدُونَ أَن تَجۡعَلُواْ لِلَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٗا مُّبِينًا
4:144.en_khattab: Would you like to give Allah solid proof against yourselves?

4:145.en_khattab: will be in the lowest depths of the Fire
and you will never find for them any helper

4:146.en_khattab: and are sincere in their devotion to Allah;
they will be with the believers.

4:146.qpc_hafs: وَسَوۡفَ يُؤۡتِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
4:146.en_khattab: And Allah will grant the believers a great reward.

4:147.en_khattab: if you are grateful and faithful?

4:148.en_khattab: Allah does not like negative thoughts to be voiced—
except by those who have been wronged.
except by those who have been wronged

4:149.en_khattab: Whether you reveal or conceal a good
surely Allah is Ever-Pardoning, Most Capable.

4:150.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡفُرُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن يُفَرِّقُواْ بَيۡنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَيَقُولُونَ
4:150.en_khattab: Surely those who deny Allah and His messengers and wish to make a distinction between Allah and His messengers, saying,
“We believe in some and disbelieve in others,”

4:151.en_khattab: they are indeed the true disbelievers.
And We have prepared for the disbelievers a humiliating punishment.

4:152.en_khattab: As for those who believe in Allah and His messengers—
He will surely give them their rewards.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

4:153.en_khattab: The People of the Book demand

4:153.qpc_hafs: أَن تُنَزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِۚ
4:153.en_khattab: that you ˹O Prophet˺ bring down for them a revelation in writing from heaven.

4:153.qpc_hafs: فَقَدۡ سَأَلُواْ مُوسَىٰٓ أَكۡبَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ
4:153.en_khattab: They demanded what is even greater than this from Moses,
So a thunderbolt struck them for their wrongdoing.

4:153.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذُواْ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُ
4:153.en_khattab: Then they took the calf for worship after receiving clear signs.
Still We forgave them for that ˹after their repentance˺

4:154.en_khattab: We raised the Mount over them ˹as a warning˺ for ˹breaking˺ their covenant
and said, “Enter the gate ˹of Jerusalem˺ with humility.”

4:154.qpc_hafs: وَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ لَا تَعۡدُواْ فِي ٱلسَّبۡتِ
4:154.en_khattab: We also warned them, “Do not break the Sabbath,”
and took from them a firm covenant.

4:155.en_khattab: ˹They were condemned˺ for breaking their covenant,

4:155.qpc_hafs: وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ قُلُوبُنَا غُلۡفُۢۚ بَلۡ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهَا بِكُفۡرِهِمۡ
4:155.en_khattab: and for saying, “Our hearts are unreceptive!”—it is Allah Who has sealed their hearts for their disbelief,
so they do not believe except for a few—

4:157.qpc_hafs: وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ إِنَّا قَتَلۡنَا ٱلۡمَسِيحَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ
4:157.en_khattab: and for boasting, “We killed the Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, the messenger of Allah.”

4:157.qpc_hafs: وَمَا قَتَلُوهُ وَمَا صَلَبُوهُ وَلَٰكِن شُبِّهَ لَهُمۡۚ
4:157.en_khattab: But they neither killed nor crucified him— it was only made to appear so.

4:157.qpc_hafs: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِيهِ لَفِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهُۚ
4:157.en_khattab: Even those who argue for this ˹crucifixion˺ are in doubt.

4:157.qpc_hafs: مَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِلَّا ٱتِّبَاعَ ٱلظَّنِّۚ
4:157.en_khattab: They have no knowledge whatsoever— only making assumptions.
They certainly did not kill him.

4:158.en_khattab: Rather, Allah raised him up to Himself.

4:159.en_khattab: Every one of the People of the Book
will definitely believe in him before his death.
And on the Day of Judgment
Jesus will be a witness against them.

4:160.en_khattab: We forbade the Jews certain foods
that had been lawful to them for their wrongdoing
and for hindering many from the Way of Allah

4:161.en_khattab: We have prepared for the disbelievers among them a painful punishment.

4:162.en_khattab: But those of them well-grounded in knowledge,

4:162.qpc_hafs: وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبۡلِكَۚ
4:162.en_khattab: the faithful ˹who˺ believe in what has been revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ and what was revealed before
and believe in Allah and the Last Day,
to these ˹people˺ We will grant a great reward.

4:163.en_khattab: Indeed, We have sent revelation to you ˹O Prophet˺

4:163.qpc_hafs: كَمَآ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ نُوحٖ وَٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦۚ
4:163.en_khattab: as We sent revelation to Noah and the prophets after him

4:163.qpc_hafs: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَٱلۡأَسۡبَاطِ
4:163.en_khattab: We also sent revelation to Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, and his descendants
as well as Jesus, Job, Jonah, Aaron, and Solomon
And to David We gave the Psalms

4:164.qpc_hafs: وَرُسُلٗا قَدۡ قَصَصۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُ
4:164.en_khattab: There are messengers whose stories We have told you already
And to Moses Allah spoke directly.

4:165.en_khattab: ˹All were˺ messengers delivering good news and warnings

4:165.qpc_hafs: لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ حُجَّةُۢ بَعۡدَ ٱلرُّسُلِۚ
4:165.en_khattab: so humanity should have no excuse before Allah after ˹the coming of˺ the messengers.

4:166.qpc_hafs: لَّٰكِنِ ٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ إِلَيۡكَۖ
4:166.en_khattab: Yet ˹if you are denied, O Prophet,˺ Allah bears witness to what He has sent down to you
He has sent it with His knowledge
And Allah ˹alone˺ is sufficient as a Witness

4:167.en_khattab: and hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah

4:168.en_khattab: Those who disbelieve and wrong themselves
surely Allah will neither forgive them
nor guide them to any path

4:169.en_khattab: to stay there for ever and ever.
And that is easy for Allah.

4:170.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡ
4:170.en_khattab: The Messenger has certainly come to you with the truth from your Lord,
so believe for your own good.

4:170.qpc_hafs: فَإِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ
4:170.en_khattab: then ˹know that˺ to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth.

4:171.qpc_hafs: لَا تَغۡلُواْ فِي دِينِكُمۡ وَلَا تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّۚ
4:171.en_khattab: Do not go to extremes regarding your faith; say nothing about Allah except the truth.

4:171.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمَسِيحُ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ وَكَلِمَتُهُۥٓ أَلۡقَىٰهَآ إِلَىٰ مَرۡيَمَ وَرُوحٞ مِّنۡهُۖ
4:171.en_khattab: The Messiah, Jesus, son of Mary, was no more than a messenger of Allah and the fulfilment of His Word through Mary and a spirit ˹created by a command˺ from Him.

4:171.qpc_hafs: فَـَٔامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦۖ وَلَا تَقُولُواْ ثَلَٰثَةٌۚ
4:171.en_khattab: So believe in Allah and His messengers and do not say, “Trinity.”
Allah is only One God. Glory be to Him!

4:171.qpc_hafs: أَن يَكُونَ لَهُۥ وَلَدٞۘ لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ
4:171.en_khattab: He is far above having a son! To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth.
And Allah is sufficient as a Trustee of Affairs.

4:172.en_khattab: The Messiah would never be too proud
to be a servant of Allah
nor would the angels nearest to Allah.
Those who are too proud and arrogant to worship Him
will be brought before Him all together.

4:173.en_khattab: As for those who believe and do good
He will reward them in full and increase them out of His grace
But those who are too proud and arrogant
He will subject them to a painful punishment

4:173.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
4:173.en_khattab: And besides Allah they will find no protector or helper

4:174.en_khattab: There has come to you conclusive evidence from your Lord.
And We have sent down to you a brilliant light.

4:175.en_khattab: As for those who believe in Allah
He will admit them into His mercy and grace
and guide them to Himself through the Straight Path.

4:176.en_khattab: a ruling, O Prophet˺. Say, “Allah gives you a ruling regarding those who die without children or parents.”

4:176.qpc_hafs: إِنِ ٱمۡرُؤٌاْ هَلَكَ لَيۡسَ لَهُۥ وَلَدٞ وَلَهُۥٓ أُخۡتٞ فَلَهَا نِصۡفُ مَا تَرَكَۚ
4:176.en_khattab: If a man dies childless and leaves behind a sister, she will inherit one-half of his estate,

4:176.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ يَرِثُهَآ إِن لَّمۡ يَكُن لَّهَا وَلَدٞۚ
4:176.en_khattab: whereas her brother will inherit all of her estate if she dies childless.

4:176.qpc_hafs: فَإِن كَانَتَا ٱثۡنَتَيۡنِ فَلَهُمَا ٱلثُّلُثَانِ مِمَّا تَرَكَۚ
4:176.en_khattab: If this person leaves behind two sisters, they together will inherit two-thirds of the estate.

4:176.qpc_hafs: وَإِن كَانُوٓاْ إِخۡوَةٗ رِّجَالٗا وَنِسَآءٗ فَلِلذَّكَرِ مِثۡلُ حَظِّ ٱلۡأُنثَيَيۡنِۗ
4:176.en_khattab: But if the deceased leaves male and female siblings, a male’s share will be equal to that of two females.
Allah makes ˹this˺ clear to you so you do not go astray.
And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

5:1.en_khattab: All grazing livestock has been made lawful to you—
except what is hereby announced to you

5:1.qpc_hafs: وَأَنتُمۡ حُرُمٌۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحۡكُمُ مَا يُرِيدُ
5:1.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah commands what He wills.

5:2.qpc_hafs: شَعَٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا ٱلشَّهۡرَ ٱلۡحَرَامَ وَلَا ٱلۡهَدۡيَ وَلَا ٱلۡقَلَٰٓئِدَ
5:2.en_khattab: Allah’s rituals ˹of pilgrimage˺, the sacred months, the sacrificial animals, the ˹offerings decorated with˺ garlands,

5:2.qpc_hafs: وَلَآ ءَآمِّينَ ٱلۡبَيۡتَ ٱلۡحَرَامَ يَبۡتَغُونَ فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَرِضۡوَٰنٗاۚ
5:2.en_khattab: nor those ˹pilgrims˺ on their way to the Sacred House seeking their Lord’s bounty and pleasure.
When pilgrimage has ended, you are allowed to hunt.

5:2.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَجۡرِمَنَّكُمۡ شَنَـَٔانُ قَوۡمٍ أَن صَدُّوكُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ أَن تَعۡتَدُواْۘ
5:2.en_khattab: Do not let the hatred of a people who once barred you from the Sacred Mosque provoke you to transgress.
Cooperate with one another in goodness and righteousness,
and do not cooperate in sin and transgression.

5:2.qpc_hafs: وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
5:2.en_khattab: And be mindful of Allah. Surely Allah is severe in punishment.

5:3.qpc_hafs: حُرِّمَتۡ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ وَٱلدَّمُ وَلَحۡمُ ٱلۡخِنزِيرِ وَمَآ أُهِلَّ لِغَيۡرِ ٱللَّهِ بِهِۦ
5:3.en_khattab: Forbidden to you are carrion, blood, and swine; what is slaughtered in the name of any other than Allah
what is killed by strangling, beating, a fall, or by being gored to death

5:3.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أَكَلَ ٱلسَّبُعُ إِلَّا مَا ذَكَّيۡتُمۡ
5:3.en_khattab: what is partly eaten by a predator unless you slaughter it
and what is sacrificed on altars
You are also forbidden to draw lots for decisions

5:3.qpc_hafs: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ يَئِسَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن دِينِكُمۡ
5:3.en_khattab: Today the disbelievers have given up all hope of undermining your faith
So do not fear them; fear Me

5:3.qpc_hafs: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ أَكۡمَلۡتُ لَكُمۡ دِينَكُمۡ وَأَتۡمَمۡتُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ نِعۡمَتِي وَرَضِيتُ لَكُمُ ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمَ دِينٗاۚ
5:3.en_khattab: Today I have perfected your faith for you, completed My favour upon you, and chosen Islam as your way

5:3.qpc_hafs: فَمَنِ ٱضۡطُرَّ فِي مَخۡمَصَةٍ غَيۡرَ مُتَجَانِفٖ لِّإِثۡمٖ
5:3.en_khattab: But whoever is compelled by extreme hunger— not intending to sin
then surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

5:4.en_khattab: what is permissible for them ˹to eat˺.

5:4.qpc_hafs: وَمَا عَلَّمۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡجَوَارِحِ مُكَلِّبِينَ تُعَلِّمُونَهُنَّ
5:4.en_khattab: Also what is caught by your hunting animals and birds of prey which you have trained
So eat what they catch for you
but mention the Name of Allah over it ˹first˺.
Surely Allah is swift in reckoning.

5:5.en_khattab: Today all good, pure foods have been made lawful for you.

5:5.qpc_hafs: وَطَعَامُ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ حِلّٞ لَّكُمۡ
5:5.en_khattab: Similarly, the food of the People of the Book is permissible for you.
And yours is permissible for them.

5:5.qpc_hafs: وَٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ
5:5.en_khattab: And permissible for you in marriage are chaste believing women as well as chaste women of those given the Scripture before you.

5:5.qpc_hafs: إِذَآ ءَاتَيۡتُمُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ مُحۡصِنِينَ غَيۡرَ مُسَٰفِحِينَ وَلَا مُتَّخِذِيٓ أَخۡدَانٖۗ
5:5.en_khattab: As long as you pay them their dowries in wedlock, neither fornicating nor taking them as mistresses.

5:5.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ فَقَدۡ حَبِطَ عَمَلُهُۥ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
5:5.en_khattab: And whoever rejects the faith, all their good deeds will be void in this life and in the Hereafter they will be among the losers.

5:6.en_khattab: When you rise up for prayer,
wash your faces and your hands up to the elbows,
and wash your feet to the ankles.
And if you are in a state of ˹full˺ impurity, then take a full bath.

5:6.qpc_hafs: وَإِن كُنتُم مَّرۡضَىٰٓ أَوۡ عَلَىٰ سَفَرٍ أَوۡ جَآءَ أَحَدٞ مِّنكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡغَآئِطِ
5:6.en_khattab: But if you are ill, on a journey, or have relieved yourselves,
or have been intimate with your wives
then purify yourselves with clean earth
by wiping your faces and hands.

5:6.qpc_hafs: مَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيَجۡعَلَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡ حَرَجٖ
5:6.en_khattab: It is not Allah’s Will to burden you,
and complete His favour upon you,
so perhaps you will be grateful.

5:7.en_khattab: and the covenant He made with you
when you said, “We hear and obey.”
Surely Allah knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

5:8.en_khattab: Stand firm for Allah and bear true testimony.

5:8.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَجۡرِمَنَّكُمۡ شَنَـَٔانُ قَوۡمٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَلَّا تَعۡدِلُواْۚ
5:8.en_khattab: Do not let the hatred of a people lead you to injustice.
Be just! That is closer to righteousness.
Surely Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

5:9.en_khattab: Allah has promised those who believe

5:10.en_khattab: they are the residents of the Hellfire.

5:11.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ هَمَّ قَوۡمٌ أَن يَبۡسُطُوٓاْ إِلَيۡكُمۡ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ
5:11.en_khattab: when a people sought to harm you,
but He held their hands back from you.
And in Allah let the believers put their trust.

5:12.qpc_hafs: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِيثَٰقَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
5:12.en_khattab: Allah made a covenant with the Children of Israel
and appointed twelve leaders from among them
and ˹then˺ said, “I am truly with you.

5:12.qpc_hafs: لَئِنۡ أَقَمۡتُمُ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَيۡتُمُ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَءَامَنتُم بِرُسُلِي وَعَزَّرۡتُمُوهُمۡ وَأَقۡرَضۡتُمُ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا
5:12.en_khattab: If you establish prayer, pay alms-tax, believe in My messengers, support them, and lend to Allah a good loan
I will certainly forgive your sins

5:12.qpc_hafs: وَلَأُدۡخِلَنَّكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ
5:12.en_khattab: and admit you into Gardens under which rivers flow

5:12.qpc_hafs: فَمَن كَفَرَ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ مِنكُمۡ فَقَدۡ ضَلَّ سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
5:12.en_khattab: And whoever among you disbelieves afterwards has truly strayed from the Right Way.

5:13.en_khattab: We condemned them and hardened their hearts.

5:13.qpc_hafs: يُحَرِّفُونَ ٱلۡكَلِمَ عَن مَّوَاضِعِهِۦ وَنَسُواْ حَظّٗا مِّمَّا ذُكِّرُواْ بِهِۦۚ
5:13.en_khattab: They distorted the words of the Scripture and neglected a portion of what they had been commanded to uphold.

5:13.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَزَالُ تَطَّلِعُ عَلَىٰ خَآئِنَةٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّنۡهُمۡۖ
5:13.en_khattab: You ˹O Prophet˺ will always find deceit on their part, except for a few.
But pardon them and bear with them.

5:14.en_khattab: And from those who say, “We are Christians,”
but they neglected a portion of what they had been commanded to uphold.

5:14.qpc_hafs: فَأَغۡرَيۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمُ ٱلۡعَدَاوَةَ وَٱلۡبَغۡضَآءَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ
5:14.en_khattab: So We let hostility and enmity arise between them until the Day of Judgment,

5:14.qpc_hafs: وَسَوۡفَ يُنَبِّئُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَصۡنَعُونَ
5:14.en_khattab: and soon Allah will inform them of all they have done.

5:15.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ جَآءَكُمۡ رَسُولُنَا يُبَيِّنُ لَكُمۡ كَثِيرٗا مِّمَّا كُنتُمۡ تُخۡفُونَ
5:15.en_khattab: Now Our Messenger has come to you, revealing much of what you have hidden
of the Scriptures and disregarding much.
There certainly has come to you from Allah a light

5:16.en_khattab: and into light by His Will
and guides them to the Straight Path

5:17.qpc_hafs: لَّقَدۡ كَفَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡمَسِيحُ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَۚ
5:17.en_khattab: Indeed, those who say, “Allah is the Messiah, son of Mary,” have fallen into disbelief.

5:17.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ فَمَن يَمۡلِكُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔا إِنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡمَسِيحَ ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗاۗ
5:17.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ 'Who has the power to prevent Allah if He chose to destroy the Messiah, son of Mary, his mother, and everyone in the world all together?'

5:17.qpc_hafs: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۚ
5:17.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between.

5:17.qpc_hafs: يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
5:17.en_khattab: He creates whatever He wills. And Allah is Most Capable of everything.

5:18.en_khattab: The Jews and the Christians each say,
We are the children of Allah and His most beloved!
Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Why then does He punish you for your sins?
No! You are only humans like others of His Own making.

5:18.qpc_hafs: يَغۡفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُۚ
5:18.en_khattab: He forgives whoever He wills and punishes whoever He wills.

5:18.qpc_hafs: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ
5:18.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between.
And to Him is the final return.

5:19.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ جَآءَكُمۡ رَسُولُنَا يُبَيِّنُ لَكُمۡ عَلَىٰ فَتۡرَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ
5:19.en_khattab: Our Messenger has indeed come to you, making things clear to you after an interval between the messengers

5:19.qpc_hafs: أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنۢ بَشِيرٖ وَلَا نَذِيرٖۖ
5:19.en_khattab: so you do not say, “There has never come to us a deliverer of good news or a warner.”
Now there has come to you a deliverer of good news and a warner.
And Allah is Most Capable of everything.

5:20.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when Moses said to his people,
“O my people! Remember Allah’s favours upon you

5:20.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ جَعَلَ فِيكُمۡ أَنۢبِيَآءَ وَجَعَلَكُم مُّلُوكٗا
5:20.en_khattab: when He raised prophets from among you, made you sovereign,

5:20.qpc_hafs: وَءَاتَىٰكُم مَّا لَمۡ يُؤۡتِ أَحَدٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
5:20.en_khattab: and gave you what He had never given anyone in the world.

5:21.en_khattab: O my people! Enter the Holy Land
which Allah has destined for you ˹to enter˺.
or else you will become losers

5:22.en_khattab: There is an enormously powerful people there

5:22.qpc_hafs: وَإِنَّا لَن نَّدۡخُلَهَا حَتَّىٰ يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنۡهَا
5:22.en_khattab: so we will never ˹be able to˺ enter it until they leave
If they do, then we will enter!

5:23.en_khattab: who had been blessed by Allah

5:24.qpc_hafs: إِنَّا لَن نَّدۡخُلَهَآ أَبَدٗا مَّا دَامُواْ فِيهَا
5:24.en_khattab: We will never enter as long as they remain there.
So go— both you and your Lord— and fight;

5:25.qpc_hafs: إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ إِلَّا نَفۡسِي وَأَخِيۖ
5:25.en_khattab: My Lord! I have no control over anyone except myself and my brother.
So set us apart from the rebellious people.

5:26.en_khattab: Allah replied, “Then this land is forbidden to them
during which they will wander through the land.
So do not grieve for the rebellious people.”

5:27.qpc_hafs: وَٱتۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ ٱبۡنَيۡ ءَادَمَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ
5:27.en_khattab: Relate to them in truth ˹O Prophet˺ the story of Adam’s two sons

5:27.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ قَرَّبَا قُرۡبَانٗا فَتُقُبِّلَ مِنۡ أَحَدِهِمَا وَلَمۡ يُتَقَبَّلۡ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓخَرِ
5:27.en_khattab: how each offered a sacrifice: Abel’s offering was accepted while Cain’s was not

5:27.qpc_hafs: قَالَ لَأَقۡتُلَنَّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَتَقَبَّلُ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
5:27.en_khattab: So Cain threatened, “I will kill you!” His brother replied, “Allah only accepts ˹the offering˺ of the sincerely devout

5:28.en_khattab: If you raise your hand to kill me,
I will not raise mine to kill you,

5:29.en_khattab: bear your sin against me along with your other sins
then you will be one of those destined to the Fire
And that is the reward of the wrongdoers.

5:31.en_khattab: digging ˹a grave˺ in the ground ˹for a dead crow˺,
in order to show him how to bury the corpse of his brother.
Have I ˹even˺ failed to be like
and bury the corpse of my brother?”

5:32.en_khattab: We ordained for the Children of Israel

5:32.qpc_hafs: أَنَّهُۥ مَن قَتَلَ نَفۡسَۢا بِغَيۡرِ نَفۡسٍ
5:32.en_khattab: that whoever takes a life— unless as a punishment for murder
it will be as if they killed all of humanity
it will be as if they saved all of humanity ˹Although˺
Our messengers already came to them with clear proofs

5:32.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ إِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنۡهُم بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَمُسۡرِفُونَ
5:32.en_khattab: many of them still transgressed afterwards through the land

5:33.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَارِبُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَسۡعَوۡنَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَسَادًا
5:33.en_khattab: Indeed, the penalty for those who wage war against Allah and His Messenger and spread mischief in the land

5:33.qpc_hafs: أَن يُقَتَّلُوٓاْ أَوۡ يُصَلَّبُوٓاْ أَوۡ تُقَطَّعَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَرۡجُلُهُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٍ
5:33.en_khattab: is death, crucifixion, cutting off their hands and feet on opposite sides

5:33.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ لَهُمۡ خِزۡيٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
5:33.en_khattab: This ˹penalty˺ is a disgrace for them in this world, and they will suffer a tremendous punishment in the Hereafter.

5:35.en_khattab: and seek what brings you closer to Him

5:36.qpc_hafs: لَوۡ أَنَّ لَهُم مَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا وَمِثۡلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ لِيَفۡتَدُواْ بِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
5:36.en_khattab: even if they were to possess everything in the world twice over ˹and offer it all˺ to ransom themselves from the punishment of the Day of Judgment,
it would never be accepted from them.
And they will suffer a painful punishment.

5:37.en_khattab: They will be desperate to get out of the Fire
but they will never be able to
And they will suffer an everlasting punishment

5:38.en_khattab: As for male and female thieves,
cut off their hands for what they have done

5:39.en_khattab: But whoever repents after their wrongdoing
Allah will surely turn to them in forgiveness.
Indeed, Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

5:40.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ
5:40.en_khattab: that the kingdom of the heavens and the earth belongs to Allah ˹alone˺
And Allah is Most Capable of everything

5:41.qpc_hafs: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرَّسُولُ لَا يَحۡزُنكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡكُفۡرِ
5:41.en_khattab: O Messenger! Do not grieve for those who race to disbelieve
those who say, “We believe” with their tongues
but their hearts are in disbelief
Nor those among the Jews who eagerly listen to lies
attentive to those who are too arrogant to come to you

5:41.qpc_hafs: لَمۡ يَأۡتُوكَۖ يُحَرِّفُونَ ٱلۡكَلِمَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوَاضِعِهِۦۖ
5:41.en_khattab: They distort the Scripture, taking rulings out of context
then say, “If this is the ruling you get ˹from Muḥammad˺, accept it

5:41.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ فِتۡنَتَهُۥ فَلَن تَمۡلِكَ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۚ
5:41.en_khattab: Whoever Allah allows to be deluded, you can never be of any help to them against Allah

5:41.qpc_hafs: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَمۡ يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُطَهِّرَ قُلُوبَهُمۡۚ
5:41.en_khattab: It is not Allah’s Will to purify their hearts
For them is disgrace in this world
and they will suffer a tremendous punishment in the Hereafter

5:42.qpc_hafs: فَإِن جَآءُوكَ فَٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ أَوۡ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡۖ
5:42.en_khattab: So if they come to you ˹O Prophet˺, either judge between them or turn away from them.

5:42.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تُعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ فَلَن يَضُرُّوكَ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ
5:42.en_khattab: If you turn away from them, they cannot harm you whatsoever.
But if you judge between them, then do so with justice.
Surely Allah loves those who are just.

5:43.en_khattab: But why do they come to you for judgment
when they ˹already˺ have the Torah containing Allah’s judgment,
then they turn away after all?

5:44.en_khattab: by which the prophets, who submitted themselves
made judgments for Jews. So too did the rabbis and scholars
judge according to Allah’s Book, with which they were entrusted
and of which they were made keepers.
So do not fear the people;
fear Me! Nor trade my revelations

5:44.qpc_hafs: وَمَن لَّمۡ يَحۡكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ
5:44.en_khattab: And those who do not judge by what Allah has revealed

5:45.en_khattab: We ordained for them in the Torah,

5:45.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ ٱلنَّفۡسَ بِٱلنَّفۡسِ وَٱلۡعَيۡنَ بِٱلۡعَيۡنِ وَٱلۡأَنفَ بِٱلۡأَنفِ وَٱلۡأُذُنَ بِٱلۡأُذُنِ وَٱلسِّنَّ بِٱلسِّنِّ وَٱلۡجُرُوحَ قِصَاصٞۚ
5:45.en_khattab: A life for a life, an eye for an eye, a nose for a nose, an ear for an ear, a tooth for a tooth— and for wounds equal retaliation.

5:45.qpc_hafs: فَمَن تَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦ فَهُوَ كَفَّارَةٞ لَّهُۥۚ
5:45.en_khattab: But whoever waives it charitably, it will be atonement for them.

5:45.qpc_hafs: وَمَن لَّمۡ يَحۡكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ
5:45.en_khattab: And those who do not judge by what Allah has revealed

5:46.en_khattab: Then in the footsteps of the prophets,

5:46.qpc_hafs: بِعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِۖ
5:46.en_khattab: We sent Jesus, son of Mary, confirming the Torah revealed before him.
And We gave him the Gospel containing guidance and light.

5:46.qpc_hafs: وَمُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ
5:46.en_khattab: And confirming what was revealed in the Torah.
A guide and a lesson to the God-fearing.

5:47.qpc_hafs: وَلۡيَحۡكُمۡ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلِ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِۚ
5:47.en_khattab: So let the people of the Gospel judge by what Allah has revealed in it.

5:47.qpc_hafs: وَمَن لَّمۡ يَحۡكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ
5:47.en_khattab: And those who do not judge by what Allah has revealed

5:48.en_khattab: We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ this Book with the truth,

5:48.qpc_hafs: مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَمُهَيۡمِنًا عَلَيۡهِۖ
5:48.en_khattab: as a confirmation of previous Scriptures and a supreme authority on them.
So judge between them by what Allah has revealed,

5:48.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ عَمَّا جَآءَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ
5:48.en_khattab: and do not follow their desires over the truth that has come to you.
To each of you We have ordained a code of law and a way of life.

5:48.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَجَعَلَكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ
5:48.en_khattab: If Allah had willed, He would have made you one community,
but His Will is to test you with what He has given ˹each of˺ you.
So compete with one another in doing good.
To Allah you will all return,
then He will inform you ˹of the truth˺ regarding your differences.

5:49.en_khattab: and do not follow their desires

5:49.qpc_hafs: وَٱحۡذَرۡهُمۡ أَن يَفۡتِنُوكَ عَنۢ بَعۡضِ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡكَۖ
5:49.en_khattab: And beware, so they do not lure you away from some of what Allah has revealed to you

5:49.qpc_hafs: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَٱعۡلَمۡ أَنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُصِيبَهُم بِبَعۡضِ ذُنُوبِهِمۡۗ
5:49.en_khattab: If they turn away ˹from Allah’s judgment˺, then know that it is Allah’s Will to repay them for some of their sins
and that many people are indeed rebellious

5:50.en_khattab: Is it the judgment of ˹pre-Islamic˺ ignorance they seek?
Who could be a better judge than Allah

5:51.en_khattab: Take neither Jews nor Christians as guardians—
they are guardians of each other.
will be counted as one of them.

5:51.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
5:51.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

5:52.en_khattab: You see those with sickness in their hearts
saying ˹in justification˺, “We fear a turn of fortune will strike us.

5:52.qpc_hafs: فَعَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَأۡتِيَ بِٱلۡفَتۡحِ أَوۡ أَمۡرٖ مِّنۡ عِندِهِۦ
5:52.en_khattab: But perhaps Allah will bring about ˹your˺ victory or another favour by His command

5:52.qpc_hafs: فَيُصۡبِحُواْ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَسَرُّواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ نَٰدِمِينَ
5:52.en_khattab: and they will regret what they have hidden in their hearts

5:53.qpc_hafs: أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقۡسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ
5:53.en_khattab: ˹one another˺, “Are these the ones who swore solemn oaths by Allah
that they were with you?” Their deeds have been in vain

5:54.en_khattab: Whoever among you abandons their faith
with others who love Him and are loved by Him

5:54.qpc_hafs: أَذِلَّةٍ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ أَعِزَّةٍ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
5:54.en_khattab: They will be humble with the believers but firm towards the disbelievers
struggling in the Way of Allah
This is the favour of Allah
He grants it to whoever He wills

5:56.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ
5:56.en_khattab: Whoever allies themselves with Allah, His Messenger, and fellow believers
then it is certainly Allah’s party

5:57.qpc_hafs: لَا تَتَّخِذُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ دِينَكُمۡ هُزُوٗا وَلَعِبٗا
5:57.en_khattab: Do not seek the guardianship of those who have made your faith a mockery and amusement.

5:57.qpc_hafs: مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ وَٱلۡكُفَّارَ
5:57.en_khattab: not seek the guardianship of those given the Scripture before you and the disbelievers
who have made your faith a mockery and amusement.

5:58.en_khattab: This is because they are a people without understanding

5:59.qpc_hafs: هَلۡ تَنقِمُونَ مِنَّآ إِلَّآ أَنۡ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡنَا وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبۡلُ
5:59.en_khattab: O People of the Book! Do you resent us only because we believe in Allah and what has been revealed to us and what was revealed before
while most of you are rebellious?

5:60.qpc_hafs: بِشَرّٖ مِّن ذَٰلِكَ مَثُوبَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ
5:60.en_khattab: “Shall I inform you of those who deserve a worse punishment from Allah ˹than the rebellious˺?
It is those who earned Allah’s condemnation and displeasure—
some being reduced to apes and pigs

5:60.qpc_hafs: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗا وَأَضَلُّ عَن سَوَآءِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
5:60.en_khattab: These are far worse in rank and farther astray from the Right Way.”

5:61.qpc_hafs: وَقَد دَّخَلُواْ بِٱلۡكُفۡرِ وَهُمۡ قَدۡ خَرَجُواْ بِهِۦۚ
5:61.en_khattab: But they are committed to disbelief when they enter and when they leave.
And Allah knows what they hide.

5:63.en_khattab: Why do their rabbis and scholars not forbid them

5:64.en_khattab: ˹Some among˺ the Jews said, “Allah is tight-fisted.”
May their fists be tied and they be condemned for what they said.

5:64.qpc_hafs: بَلۡ يَدَاهُ مَبۡسُوطَتَانِ يُنفِقُ كَيۡفَ يَشَآءُۚ
5:64.en_khattab: Rather, He is open-handed, giving freely as He pleases.

5:64.qpc_hafs: وَلَيَزِيدَنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنۡهُم مَّآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ طُغۡيَٰنٗا وَكُفۡرٗاۚ
5:64.en_khattab: That which has been revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ from your Lord will only cause many of them to increase in wickedness and disbelief.

5:64.qpc_hafs: وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمُ ٱلۡعَدَٰوَةَ وَٱلۡبَغۡضَآءَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ
5:64.en_khattab: We have stirred among them hostility and hatred until the Day of Judgment.

5:64.qpc_hafs: كُلَّمَآ أَوۡقَدُواْ نَارٗا لِّلۡحَرۡبِ أَطۡفَأَهَا ٱللَّهُۚ
5:64.en_khattab: Whenever they kindle the fire of war, Allah puts it out.
And they strive to spread corruption in the land.
And Allah does not like corruptors.

5:65.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ
5:65.en_khattab: Had the People of the Book only been faithful and mindful ˹of Allah˺,
We would have certainly absolved them of their sins
and admitted them into the Gardens of Bliss.

5:66.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ أَقَامُواْ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِم مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ
5:66.en_khattab: And had they observed the Torah, the Gospel, and what has been revealed to them from their Lord

5:66.qpc_hafs: لَأَكَلُواْ مِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَمِن تَحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِهِمۚ
5:66.en_khattab: they would have been overwhelmed with provisions from above and below

5:66.qpc_hafs: مِّنۡهُمۡ أُمَّةٞ مُّقۡتَصِدَةٞۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا يَعۡمَلُونَ
5:66.en_khattab: Some among them are upright, yet many do nothing but evil

5:67.en_khattab: does not guide the people who disbelieve.

5:68.qpc_hafs: لَسۡتُمۡ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٍ حَتَّىٰ تُقِيمُواْ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ
5:68.en_khattab: People of the Book! You have nothing to stand on unless you observe the Torah, the Gospel,
and what has been revealed to you from your Lord.”

5:68.qpc_hafs: وَلَيَزِيدَنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنۡهُم مَّآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ طُغۡيَٰنٗا وَكُفۡرٗاۖ
5:68.en_khattab: And your Lord’s revelation to you ˹O Prophet˺ will only cause many of them to increase in wickedness and disbelief.
So do not grieve for the people who disbelieve.

5:69.qpc_hafs: مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا
5:69.en_khattab: whoever ˹truly˺ believes in Allah and the Last Day and does good,
there will be no fear for them,

5:70.en_khattab: Indeed, We took a covenant from the Children of Israel

5:70.qpc_hafs: كُلَّمَا جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولُۢ بِمَا لَا تَهۡوَىٰٓ أَنفُسُهُمۡ
5:70.en_khattab: Whenever a messenger came to them with what they did not desire,
they denied some and killed others.

5:71.en_khattab: They thought there would be no consequences,
so they turned a blind eye and a deaf ear.
Yet Allah turned to them in forgiveness ˹after their repentance˺,
but again many became blind and deaf.
And Allah is All-Seeing of what they do.

5:72.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡمَسِيحُ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَۖ
5:72.en_khattab: “Allah is the Messiah, son of Mary,”

5:72.qpc_hafs: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَسِيحُ يَٰبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّي وَرَبَّكُمۡۖ
5:72.en_khattab: certainly fallen into disbelief. The Messiah ˹himself˺ said, “O Children of Israel! Worship Allah— my Lord and your Lord.”

5:72.qpc_hafs: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يُشۡرِكۡ بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدۡ حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ
5:72.en_khattab: Whoever associates others with Allah ˹in worship˺ will surely be forbidden Paradise by Allah.
Their home will be the Fire.
And the wrongdoers will have no helpers.

5:73.qpc_hafs: وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّآ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۚ
5:73.en_khattab: certainly fallen into disbelief. There is only One God.
If they do not stop saying this,

5:73.qpc_hafs: لَيَمَسَّنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
5:73.en_khattab: those who disbelieve among them will be afflicted with a painful punishment.

5:75.qpc_hafs: مَّا ٱلۡمَسِيحُ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ إِلَّا رَسُولٞ
5:75.en_khattab: The Messiah, son of Mary, was no more than a messenger.
˹Many˺ messengers had ˹come and˺ gone before him.
His mother was a woman of truth.
See how We make the signs clear to them.
Yet see how they are deluded ˹from the truth˺!

5:76.en_khattab: How can you worship besides Allah
And Allah ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

5:77.qpc_hafs: لَا تَغۡلُواْ فِي دِينِكُمۡ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡحَقِّ
5:77.en_khattab: Do not go to extremes in your faith beyond the truth,
of those who went astray before ˹you˺.
and strayed from the Right Way.

5:78.qpc_hafs: لُعِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۢ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
5:78.en_khattab: The disbelievers among the Children of Israel were condemned

5:78.qpc_hafs: عَلَىٰ لِسَانِ دَاوُۥدَ وَعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَۚ
5:78.en_khattab: in the revelations of David and Jesus, son of Mary
That was for their disobedience and violations

5:79.en_khattab: They did not forbid one another from doing evil.
Evil indeed was what they did!
Evil indeed was what they did!

5:80.en_khattab: which have earned them Allah’s wrath
And they will be in everlasting torment

5:81.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلنَّبِيِّ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِ
5:81.en_khattab: Had they believed in Allah, the Prophet, and what has been revealed to him
they would have never taken those ˹pagans˺ as allies
But most of them are rebellious

5:82.qpc_hafs: لَتَجِدَنَّ أَشَدَّ ٱلنَّاسِ عَدَٰوَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱلۡيَهُودَ وَٱلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُواْۖ
5:82.en_khattab: You will surely find the most bitter towards the believers to be the Jews and polytheists

5:82.qpc_hafs: وَلَتَجِدَنَّ أَقۡرَبَهُم مَّوَدَّةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا نَصَٰرَىٰۚ
5:82.en_khattab: and the most gracious to be those who call themselves Christian

5:82.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قِسِّيسِينَ وَرُهۡبَانٗا وَأَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ
5:82.en_khattab: That is because there are priests and monks among them and because they are not arrogant

5:83.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا سَمِعُواْ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ
5:83.en_khattab: When they listen to what has been revealed to the Messenger
you see their eyes overflowing with tears
so count us among the witnesses.

5:84.en_khattab: Why should we not believe in Allah?
And the truth that has come to us?
And we long for our Lord
to include us in the company of the righteous.

5:85.en_khattab: So Allah will reward them for what they said
with Gardens under which rivers flow
And that is the reward of the good-doers

5:86.en_khattab: they will be the residents of the Hellfire.

5:87.en_khattab: Do not forbid the good things
which Allah has made lawful for you,

5:88.qpc_hafs: وَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ
5:88.en_khattab: Eat of the good, lawful things provided to you by Allah.

5:89.qpc_hafs: لَا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِٱللَّغۡوِ فِيٓ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡ
5:89.en_khattab: Allah will not call you to account for your thoughtless oaths,
but He will hold you accountable for deliberate oaths.

5:89.qpc_hafs: فَكَفَّٰرَتُهُۥٓ إِطۡعَامُ عَشَرَةِ مَسَٰكِينَ مِنۡ أَوۡسَطِ مَا تُطۡعِمُونَ أَهۡلِيكُمۡ
5:89.en_khattab: The penalty for a broken oath is to feed ten poor people from what you normally feed your own family,

5:89.qpc_hafs: فَمَن لَّمۡ يَجِدۡ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَٰثَةِ أَيَّامٖۚ
5:89.en_khattab: But if none of this is affordable, then you must fast three days.
This is the penalty for breaking your oaths.
So be mindful of your oaths.
This is how Allah makes things clear to you,
so perhaps you will be grateful.

5:90.en_khattab: Intoxicants, gambling, idols, and drawing lots for decisions
are all evil of Satan’s handiwork.

5:91.en_khattab: is to stir up hostility and hatred between you
and to prevent you from remembering Allah

5:92.qpc_hafs: فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
5:92.en_khattab: then know that Our Messenger’s duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly

5:93.qpc_hafs: لَيۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ جُنَاحٞ
5:93.en_khattab: There is no blame on those who believe and do good

5:93.qpc_hafs: فِيمَا طَعِمُوٓاْ إِذَا مَا ٱتَّقَواْ وَّءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ
5:93.en_khattab: for what they had consumed before ˹the prohibition˺, as long as they fear Allah, have faith, and do what is good
then they believe and act virtuously, then become fully mindful ˹of Allah˺
and do righteous deeds. For Allah loves the good-doers.

5:94.en_khattab: Allah will surely test you with game
within the reach of your hands and spears
to distinguish those who fear Him in secret.

5:95.en_khattab: Do not kill game while on pilgrimage.

5:95.qpc_hafs: فَجَزَآءٞ مِّثۡلُ مَا قَتَلَ مِنَ ٱلنَّعَمِ
5:95.en_khattab: must compensate by offering its equivalence—
as judged by two just men among you—
to be offered at the Sacred House, or by feeding the needy,
or by fasting so that they may taste the consequences of their violations.
by fasting so that they may taste the consequences of their violations
Allah has forgiven what has been done.
But those who persist will be punished by Allah.
And Allah is Almighty, capable of punishment.

5:96.qpc_hafs: أُحِلَّ لَكُمۡ صَيۡدُ ٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَطَعَامُهُۥ مَتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِلسَّيَّارَةِۖ
5:96.en_khattab: It is lawful for you to hunt and eat seafood, as a provision for you and for travellers.

5:96.qpc_hafs: وَحُرِّمَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ صَيۡدُ ٱلۡبَرِّ مَا دُمۡتُمۡ حُرُمٗاۗ
5:96.en_khattab: But hunting on land is forbidden to you while on pilgrimage.
Be mindful of Allah to Whom you all will be gathered.

5:97.qpc_hafs: جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡكَعۡبَةَ ٱلۡبَيۡتَ ٱلۡحَرَامَ قِيَٰمٗا لِّلنَّاسِ
5:97.en_khattab: Allah has made the Ka’bah— the Sacred House— a sanctuary of well-being for all people
along with the sacred months, the sacrificial animals, and the ˹offerings decorated with˺ garlands

5:97.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ لِتَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ
