5:97.en_khattab: All this so you may know that Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and that He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of everything

5:98.en_khattab: Know that Allah is severe in punishment
and that He is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

5:99.en_khattab: The Messenger’s duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺.
And Allah ˹fully˺ knows what you reveal.

5:100.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Good and evil are not equal,
though you may be dazzled by the abundance of evil.
So be mindful of Allah, O  people of reason,

5:101.en_khattab: Do not ask about any matter
which, if made clear to you, may disturb you.

5:101.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تَسۡـَٔلُواْ عَنۡهَا حِينَ يُنَزَّلُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ
5:101.en_khattab: But if you inquire about what is being revealed in the Quran,
it will be made clear to you. Allah has forgiven what was done ˹in the past˺.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Forbearing.

5:102.en_khattab: Some people before you asked such questions

5:103.en_khattab: Allah has never ordained the ˹so-called˺ baḥîrah

5:103.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۖ
5:103.en_khattab: But the disbelievers just fabricate lies about Allah
and most of them lack understanding

5:104.en_khattab: When it is said to them, “Come to

5:104.qpc_hafs: إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ
5:104.en_khattab: Allah’s revelations and to the Messenger,”

5:104.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ حَسۡبُنَا مَا وَجَدۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَآۚ
5:104.en_khattab: they reply, “What we found our forefathers practicing

5:104.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَوۡ كَانَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَهۡتَدُونَ
5:104.en_khattab: good enough for us.” ˹Would they still do so,˺ even if their forefathers had absolutely no knowledge or guidance?

5:105.en_khattab: You are accountable only for yourselves.

5:105.qpc_hafs: لَا يَضُرُّكُم مَّن ضَلَّ إِذَا ٱهۡتَدَيۡتُمۡۚ
5:105.en_khattab: It will not harm you if someone chooses to deviate— as long as you are ˹rightly˺ guided.
To Allah you will all return.
and He will inform you of what you used to do.

5:106.qpc_hafs: شَهَٰدَةُ بَيۡنِكُمۡ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ حِينَ ٱلۡوَصِيَّةِ
5:106.en_khattab: When death approaches any of you, call upon two just Muslim men to witness as you make a bequest;

5:106.qpc_hafs: ٱثۡنَانِ ذَوَا عَدۡلٖ مِّنكُمۡ أَوۡ ءَاخَرَانِ مِنۡ غَيۡرِكُمۡ
5:106.en_khattab: otherwise, two non-Muslims if you are afflicted with death while on a journey.

5:106.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ ضَرَبۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَصَٰبَتۡكُم مُّصِيبَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۚ
5:106.en_khattab: If you doubt ˹their testimony˺, keep them after prayer and let them testify under oath ˹saying˺,

5:106.qpc_hafs: تَحۡبِسُونَهُمَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ فَيُقۡسِمَانِ بِٱللَّهِ
5:106.en_khattab: “By Allah! We would never sell our testimony for any price,

5:106.qpc_hafs: إِنِ ٱرۡتَبۡتُمۡ لَا نَشۡتَرِي بِهِۦ ثَمَنٗا
5:106.en_khattab: even in favour of a close relative,

5:106.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰ وَلَا نَكۡتُمُ شَهَٰدَةَ ٱللَّهِ
5:106.en_khattab: nor withhold the testimony of Allah.
Otherwise, we would surely be sinful.

5:107.qpc_hafs: فَإِنۡ عُثِرَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنَّهُمَا ٱسۡتَحَقَّآ إِثۡمٗا
5:107.en_khattab: If they are found guilty ˹of false testimony˺

5:107.qpc_hafs: فَـَٔاخَرَانِ يَقُومَانِ مَقَامَهُمَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَحَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَوۡلَيَٰنِ
5:107.en_khattab: let the deceased’s two closest heirs affected by the bequest replace the witnesses

5:107.qpc_hafs: فَيُقۡسِمَانِ بِٱللَّهِ لَشَهَٰدَتُنَآ أَحَقُّ مِن شَهَٰدَتِهِمَا
5:107.en_khattab: and testify under oath ˹saying˺, “By Allah! Our testimony is truer than theirs.

5:107.qpc_hafs: وَمَا ٱعۡتَدَيۡنَآ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
5:107.en_khattab: We have not transgressed. Otherwise, we would surely be wrongdoers.

5:108.en_khattab: it is more likely that witnesses will give true testimony

5:108.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ يَخَافُوٓاْ أَن تُرَدَّ أَيۡمَٰنُۢ بَعۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡۗ
5:108.en_khattab: or else fear that their oaths could be refuted by those of the heirs
Be mindful of Allah and obey
For Allah does not guide the rebellious people

5:109.en_khattab: ˹Consider˺ the Day Allah will gather the messengers
and say, “What response did you receive?”
They will reply, “We have no knowledge
˹compared to You˺! You ˹alone˺ are indeed the Knower of all unseen.

5:110.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ يَٰعِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ
5:110.en_khattab: And ˹on Judgment Day˺ Allah will say, “O Jesus, son of Mary!
Remember My favour upon you and your mother:
how I supported you with the holy spirit
so you spoke to people in ˹your˺ infancy and adulthood.

5:110.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ عَلَّمۡتُكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَۖ
5:110.en_khattab: How I taught you writing, wisdom, the Torah, and the Gospel.

5:110.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ تَخۡلُقُ مِنَ ٱلطِّينِ كَهَيۡـَٔةِ ٱلطَّيۡرِ بِإِذۡنِي
5:110.en_khattab: How you moulded a bird from clay— by My Will— and
breathed into it and it became a ˹real˺ bird— by My Will.
How you healed the blind and the lepers— by My Will.
How you brought the dead to life— by My Will.

5:110.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ كَفَفۡتُ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ عَنكَ إِذۡ جِئۡتَهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ
5:110.en_khattab: How I prevented the Children of Israel from harming you when you came to them with clear proofs

5:110.qpc_hafs: فَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
5:110.en_khattab: and the disbelievers among them said, “This is nothing but pure magic.”

5:111.en_khattab: And how I inspired the disciples,
Believe in Me and My messenger!
They declared, “We believe and bear witness that we fully submit ˹to Allah˺.”

5:112.qpc_hafs: هَلۡ يَسۡتَطِيعُ رَبُّكَ أَن يُنَزِّلَ عَلَيۡنَا مَآئِدَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِۖ
5:112.en_khattab: Would your Lord be willing to send down to us a table spread with food from heaven?”

5:112.qpc_hafs: قَالَ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
5:112.en_khattab: Jesus answered, “Fear Allah if you are ˹truly˺ believers.”

5:113.en_khattab: They said, “We ˹only˺ wish to eat from it
to verify you are indeed truthful to us

5:114.en_khattab: “O Allah, our Lord! Send us from heaven a table spread with food

5:114.qpc_hafs: مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ تَكُونُ لَنَا عِيدٗا لِّأَوَّلِنَا وَءَاخِرِنَا
5:114.en_khattab: as a feast for us— the first and last of us—
and as a sign from You.
Provide for us! You are indeed the Best Provider.”

5:115.en_khattab: Allah answered, “I am sending it down to you.

5:115.qpc_hafs: فَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بَعۡدُ مِنكُمۡ فَإِنِّيٓ أُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابٗا
5:115.en_khattab: But whoever among you denies afterwards will be subjected to a torment
I have never inflicted on anyone of My creation.

5:116.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ يَٰعِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ
5:116.en_khattab: And ˹on Judgment Day˺ Allah will say, “O Jesus, son of Mary!

5:116.qpc_hafs: ءَأَنتَ قُلۡتَ لِلنَّاسِ ٱتَّخِذُونِي وَأُمِّيَ إِلَٰهَيۡنِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ
5:116.en_khattab: Did you ever ask the people to worship you and your mother as gods besides Allah?”

5:116.qpc_hafs: قَالَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ مَا يَكُونُ لِيٓ أَنۡ أَقُولَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِحَقٍّۚ
5:116.en_khattab: He will answer, “Glory be to You! How could I ever say what I had no right to say?
If I had said such a thing, you would have certainly known it.

5:116.qpc_hafs: تَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي نَفۡسِي وَلَآ أَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي نَفۡسِكَۚ
5:116.en_khattab: You know what is ˹hidden˺ within me, but I do not know what is within You.
Indeed, You ˹alone˺ are the Knower of all unseen.

5:117.en_khattab: anything except what You ordered me
to say: “Worship Allah— my Lord and your Lord!”

5:117.qpc_hafs: وَكُنتُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ شَهِيدٗا مَّا دُمۡتُ فِيهِمۡۖ
5:117.en_khattab: And I was witness over them as long as I remained among them
You were the Witness over them
and You are a Witness over all things

5:118.en_khattab: they belong to You after all.
You are surely the Almighty, All-Wise.

5:119.en_khattab: ˹only˺ the faithful will benefit from their faithfulness.
to stay there for ever and ever.
Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him.

5:120.qpc_hafs: لِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا فِيهِنَّۚ
5:120.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything within.
And He is Most Capable of everything.

6:1.en_khattab: Who created the heavens and the earth
Yet the disbelievers set up equals to their Lord ˹in worship˺.

6:2.en_khattab: He is the One Who created you from clay,
then appointed a term ˹for your death˺
and another known only to Him ˹for your

6:3.en_khattab: He is the Only True God
in the heavens and the earth
He knows whatever you conceal and whatever you reveal

6:4.en_khattab: Whenever a sign comes to them

6:5.en_khattab: They have indeed rejected the truth
so they will soon face the consequences

6:6.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ
6:6.en_khattab: Have they not seen how many ˹disbelieving˺ peoples We destroyed before them?

6:6.qpc_hafs: مَّكَّنَّٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَمۡ نُمَكِّن لَّكُمۡ
6:6.en_khattab: We had made them more established in the land than you.
We sent down abundant rain for them.
And made rivers flow at their feet.

6:6.qpc_hafs: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ وَأَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
6:6.en_khattab: Then We destroyed them for their sins and replaced them with other peoples.

6:7.en_khattab: Had We sent down to you ˹O Prophet˺ a revelation in writing
and they were to touch it with their own hands
the disbelievers would still have said

6:7.qpc_hafs: لَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

6:8.en_khattab: They say, “Why has no ˹visible˺ angel come with him?”
Had We sent down an angel, the matter would have certainly been settled ˹at once˺,
and they would have never been given more time ˹to repent˺.

6:9.en_khattab: And if We had sent an angel
We would have certainly made it ˹assume the form of˺ a man
leaving them more confused than they already are.

6:10.en_khattab: Other messengers had already been ridiculed before you ˹O Prophet˺,
but those who mocked them were overtaken
by what they used to ridicule.

6:12.qpc_hafs: قُل لِّمَن مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ
6:12.en_khattab: Ask ˹them, O Prophet˺, “To whom belongs everything in the heavens and the earth?”
He has taken upon Himself to be Merciful.

6:12.qpc_hafs: لَيَجۡمَعَنَّكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ
6:12.en_khattab: He will certainly gather ˹all of˺ you together for the Day of Judgment— about which there is no doubt.

6:12.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
6:12.en_khattab: But those who have ruined themselves will never believe.

6:13.qpc_hafs: وَلَهُۥ مَا سَكَنَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِۚ
6:13.en_khattab: To Him belongs whatever exists in the day and night.
And He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

6:14.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Will I take any guardian other than Allah

6:14.qpc_hafs: فَاطِرِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُوَ يُطۡعِمُ وَلَا يُطۡعَمُۗ
6:14.en_khattab: the Originator of the heavens and the earth, Who provides for all and is not in need of provision?

6:14.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَسۡلَمَۖ
6:14.en_khattab: Say, “I have been commanded to be the first to submit
and not be one of the polytheists.”

6:15.en_khattab: if I were to disobey my Lord
the torment of a tremendous Day.

6:16.en_khattab: Whoever is spared the torment of that Day
will have certainly been shown Allah’s mercy
And that is the absolute triumph

6:17.en_khattab: If Allah touches you with harm,
none can undo it except Him.
And if He touches you with a blessing,
He is Most Capable of everything.

6:18.en_khattab: He reigns supreme over His creation.
And He is the All-Wise, All-Aware.

6:19.en_khattab: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Who is the best witness?”
Say, “Allah is! He is a Witness between me and you.

6:19.qpc_hafs: وَأُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لِأُنذِرَكُم بِهِۦ وَمَنۢ بَلَغَۚ
6:19.en_khattab: And this Quran has been revealed to me so that, with it, I may warn you and whoever it reaches.

6:19.qpc_hafs: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَشۡهَدُونَ أَنَّ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً أُخۡرَىٰۚ
6:19.en_khattab: Do you ˹pagans˺ testify that there are other gods besides Allah?

6:19.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞ وَإِنَّنِي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ
6:19.en_khattab: ˹And˺ say, “There is only One God. And I totally reject whatever ˹idols˺ you associate with Him.

6:20.en_khattab: Those to whom We gave the Scripture
recognize him ˹to be a true prophet˺ as they recognize their own children

6:21.en_khattab: those who fabricate lies against Allah
Indeed, the wrongdoers will never succeed.

6:22.en_khattab: ˹Consider˺ the Day We will gather them all together
“Where are those gods you used to claim?”

6:24.en_khattab: See how they will lie about themselves
and how those ˹gods˺ they fabricated will fail them!

6:25.en_khattab: There are some of them who ˹pretend to˺ listen to your recitation ˹of the Quran˺,

6:25.qpc_hafs: وَجَعَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفۡقَهُوهُ وَفِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَقۡرٗاۚ
6:25.en_khattab: but We have cast veils over their hearts— leaving them unable to comprehend it— and deafness in their ears.

6:25.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كُلَّ ءَايَةٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَاۖ
6:25.en_khattab: Even if they were to see every sign, they still would not believe in them.
The disbelievers would ˹even˺ come to argue with you,

6:25.qpc_hafs: يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
6:25.en_khattab: saying, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but ancient fables!”

6:26.en_khattab: They turn others away from the Prophet

6:26.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يُهۡلِكُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
6:26.en_khattab: They ruin none but themselves, yet they fail to perceive it

6:27.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ وُقِفُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ
6:27.en_khattab: If only you could see when they will be detained before the Fire!
They will cry, “Oh! If only we could be sent back
we would never deny the signs of our Lord
and we would ˹surely˺ be of the believers.

6:28.qpc_hafs: بَلۡ بَدَا لَهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُخۡفُونَ مِن قَبۡلُۖ
وَلَوۡ رُدُّواْ لَعَادُواْ لِمَا نُهُواْ عَنۡهُ
6:28.en_khattab: ˹They only say this˺ because the truth they used to hide will become all too clear to them.
Even if they were to be sent back, they would certainly revert to what they were forbidden. Indeed they are liars!

6:29.en_khattab: “There is nothing beyond this worldly life
and we will never be resurrected.

6:30.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ وُقِفُواْ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡۚ
6:30.en_khattab: But if only you could see when they will be detained before their Lord!
He will ask ˹them˺, “Is this ˹Hereafter˺ not the truth?”
They will cry, “Absolutely, by our Lord!”

6:30.qpc_hafs: قَالَ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ
6:30.en_khattab: He will say, “Then taste the punishment for your disbelief.”

6:31.en_khattab: who deny the meeting with Allah
until the Hour takes them by surprise

6:31.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ يَٰحَسۡرَتَنَا عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطۡنَا فِيهَا
6:31.en_khattab: then they will cry, 'Woe to us for having ignored this!'
They will bear ˹the burden of˺ their sins on their backs

6:32.en_khattab: is no more than play and amusement,
but far better is the ˹eternal˺ Home of the Hereafter for those mindful ˹of Allah˺.

6:33.en_khattab: We certainly know that what they say grieves you
It is not your honesty they question—
is Allah’s signs that the wrongdoers

6:34.en_khattab: Indeed, messengers before you were rejected
but patiently endured rejection and persecution
until Our help came to them.
And Allah’s promise ˹to help˺ is never broken.
And you have already received some of the narratives of these messengers.

6:35.en_khattab: If you find their denial unbearable

6:35.qpc_hafs: أَن تَبۡتَغِيَ نَفَقٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَوۡ سُلَّمٗا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ
6:35.en_khattab: a tunnel through the earth or stairs to the sky
to bring them a ˹more compelling˺ sign

6:35.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَجَمَعَهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰۚ
6:35.en_khattab: Had Allah so willed, He could have guided them all
So do not be one of those ignorant ˹of this fact˺

6:36.en_khattab: Only the attentive will respond ˹to your call˺.
As for the dead, Allah will raise them up,
then to Him they will ˹all˺ be returned.

6:37.qpc_hafs: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ
6:37.en_khattab: They ask, “Why has no ˹other˺ sign been sent down to him from his Lord?”

6:37.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَادِرٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُنَزِّلَ ءَايَةٗ
6:37.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Allah certainly has the power to send down a
sign”—though most of them do not know.

6:38.qpc_hafs: وَمَا مِن دَآبَّةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا طَٰٓئِرٖ يَطِيرُ بِجَنَاحَيۡهِ
6:38.en_khattab: All living beings roaming the earth and winged birds soaring in the sky

6:38.qpc_hafs: مَّا فَرَّطۡنَا فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ
6:38.en_khattab: We have left nothing out of the Record
Then to their Lord they will be gathered all together

6:39.en_khattab: are ˹wilfully˺ deaf and dumb— lost in darkness
Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray

6:39.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَشَأۡ يَجۡعَلۡهُ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
6:39.en_khattab: and guides whoever He wills to the Straight Way.

6:40.en_khattab: Imagine if you were overwhelmed by Allah’s torment
would you call upon any other than Allah ˹for help˺
˹Answer me˺ if your claims are true!

6:41.en_khattab: No! He is the only One you would call.

6:41.qpc_hafs: فَيَكۡشِفُ مَا تَدۡعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ إِن شَآءَ
6:41.en_khattab: And if He willed, He could remove the affliction that made you invoke Him.
Only then will you forget whatever you associate with Him ˹in worship˺.

6:42.en_khattab: Indeed, We have sent messengers before you ˹O Prophet˺ to other people
who We put through suffering and adversity ˹for their denial˺
so perhaps they would be humbled.

6:43.en_khattab: Why did they not humble themselves when We made them suffer?

6:43.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِن قَسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
6:43.en_khattab: Instead, their hearts were hardened, and Satan made their misdeeds appealing to them.

6:44.en_khattab: When they became oblivious to warnings,
We showered them with everything they desired.
But just as they became prideful of what they were given,
then they instantly fell into despair!

6:45.en_khattab: So the wrongdoers were utterly uprooted.
And all praise is for Allah

6:46.qpc_hafs: أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَخَذَ ٱللَّهُ سَمۡعَكُمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرَكُمۡ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُم
6:46.en_khattab: ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Imagine if Allah were to take away your hearing or sight, or seal your hearts

6:46.qpc_hafs: مَّنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِۗ
6:46.en_khattab: who else other than Allah could restore it?”

6:46.qpc_hafs: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ ثُمَّ هُمۡ يَصۡدِفُونَ
6:46.en_khattab: See ˹O Prophet˺ how We vary the signs, yet they still turn away.

6:47.qpc_hafs: أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ جَهۡرَةً
6:47.en_khattab: Imagine if Allah’s punishment were to overwhelm you with or without warning
who would be destroyed other than the wrongdoers?

6:48.en_khattab: only as deliverers of good news and as warners.

6:48.qpc_hafs: فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
6:48.en_khattab: there will be no fear for them, nor will they grieve.

6:49.en_khattab: But those who deny Our signs

6:50.qpc_hafs: عِندِي خَزَآئِنُ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ وَلَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡ إِنِّي مَلَكٌۖ
6:50.en_khattab: I do not say to you that I possess Allah’s treasuries or know the unseen, nor do I claim to be an angel.

6:50.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّۚ
6:50.en_khattab: I only follow what is revealed to me.
Say, “Are those blind ˹to the truth˺ equal to those who can see?

6:51.en_khattab: by the prospect of being gathered before their Lord

6:51.qpc_hafs: لَيۡسَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ وَلِيّٞ وَلَا شَفِيعٞ
6:51.en_khattab: when they will have no protector or intercessor besides Him
so perhaps they will be mindful ˹of Him˺.

6:52.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَطۡرُدِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلۡعَشِيِّ
6:52.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet!˺ Do not dismiss those ˹poor believers˺ who invoke their Lord morning and evening,

6:52.qpc_hafs: مَا عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ
6:52.en_khattab: You are not accountable for them whatsoever,

6:52.qpc_hafs: وَمَا مِنۡ حِسَابِكَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ
6:52.en_khattab: nor are they accountable for you.
or you will be one of the wrongdoers.

6:53.en_khattab: In this way We have tested some by means of others,

6:53.qpc_hafs: لِّيَقُولُوٓاْ أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۢ بَيۡنِنَآۗ
6:53.en_khattab: so those ˹disbelievers˺ may say, “Has Allah favoured these ˹poor believers˺ out of all of us?”
Does Allah not best recognize the grateful?

6:54.en_khattab: When the believers in Our revelations come to you,
Your Lord has taken upon Himself to be Merciful.

6:54.qpc_hafs: أَنَّهُۥ مَنۡ عَمِلَ مِنكُمۡ سُوٓءَۢا بِجَهَٰلَةٖ ثُمَّ تَابَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَأَنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
6:54.en_khattab: Whoever among you commits evil ignorantly ˹or recklessly˺ then repents afterwards and mends their ways, then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

6:55.en_khattab: This is how We make Our signs clear
so the way of the wicked may become distinct

6:56.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنِّي نُهِيتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ
6:56.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I have been forbidden to worship those you invoke besides Allah.”

6:56.qpc_hafs: قُل لَّآ أَتَّبِعُ أَهۡوَآءَكُمۡ قَدۡ ضَلَلۡتُ إِذٗا وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
6:56.en_khattab: Say, “I will not follow your desires, for I then would certainly be astray and not one of those ˹rightly˺ guided.”

6:57.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنِّي عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّي
6:57.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Indeed, I stand on a clear proof from my Lord—
That ˹torment˺ you seek to hasten is not within my power.
It is only Allah Who decides ˹its time˺.
And He is the Best of Judges.

6:58.qpc_hafs: قُل لَّوۡ أَنَّ عِندِي مَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِهِۦ
6:58.en_khattab: Say ˹also˺, “If what you seek to hasten were within my power
the matter between us would have already been settled.
But Allah knows the wrongdoers best.

6:59.qpc_hafs: وَعِندَهُۥ مَفَاتِحُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ لَا يَعۡلَمُهَآ إِلَّا هُوَۚ
6:59.en_khattab: With Him are the keys of the unseen— no one knows them except Him.
And He knows what is in the land and sea.

6:59.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تَسۡقُطُ مِن وَرَقَةٍ إِلَّا يَعۡلَمُهَا
6:59.en_khattab: Not even a leaf falls without His knowledge,

6:59.qpc_hafs: وَلَا حَبَّةٖ فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا رَطۡبٖ
6:59.en_khattab: nor a grain in the darkness of the earth or anything— green or dry

6:59.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَابِسٍ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٖ
6:59.en_khattab: but is ˹written˺ in a perfect Record.

6:60.en_khattab: He is the One Who calls back your souls by night
and knows what you do by day

6:60.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ يَبۡعَثُكُمۡ فِيهِ لِيُقۡضَىٰٓ أَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗىۖ
6:60.en_khattab: then revives you daily to complete your appointed term
then He will inform you of what you used to do

6:61.en_khattab: He reigns supreme over all of His creation,
and sends recording-angels, watching over you.

6:61.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ تَوَفَّتۡهُ رُسُلُنَا
6:61.en_khattab: When death comes to any of you, Our angels take their soul,

6:62.en_khattab: Then they are ˹all˺ returned to Allah
And He is the Swiftest Reckoner

6:63.qpc_hafs: مَن يُنَجِّيكُم مِّن ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ
6:63.en_khattab: Who rescues you from the darkest times on land and at sea?
He ˹alone˺ you call upon with humility, openly and secretly:

6:63.qpc_hafs: لَّئِنۡ أَنجَىٰنَا مِنۡ هَٰذِهِۦ لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
6:63.en_khattab: If You rescue us from this, we will be ever grateful.

6:64.en_khattab: Say, “˹Only˺ Allah rescues you from this
yet you associate others with Him ˹in worship˺.

6:65.qpc_hafs: أَن يَبۡعَثَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابٗا مِّن فَوۡقِكُمۡ
6:65.en_khattab: to unleash upon you a torment from above
and make you taste the violence of one another.
See how We vary the signs,

6:66.en_khattab: Still your people ˹O Prophet˺ have rejected this ˹Quran˺,
Say, “I am not a keeper over you.”

6:67.en_khattab: Every ˹destined˺ matter has a ˹set˺ time to transpire.
And you will soon come to know.

6:68.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخُوضُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا
6:68.en_khattab: And when you come across those who ridicule Our revelations,

6:68.qpc_hafs: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُواْ فِي حَدِيثٍ غَيۡرِهِۦۚ
6:68.en_khattab: do not sit with them unless they engage in a different topic.

6:68.qpc_hafs: وَإِمَّا يُنسِيَنَّكَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فَلَا تَقۡعُدۡ بَعۡدَ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
6:68.en_khattab: Should Satan make you forget, then once you remember,
do not ˹continue to˺ sit with the wrongdoing people.

6:69.qpc_hafs: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ مِنۡ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ
6:69.en_khattab: Those mindful ˹of Allah˺ will not be accountable for those ˹who ridicule it˺ whatsoever
so perhaps the ridiculers will abstain

6:70.qpc_hafs: وَذَرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ دِينَهُمۡ لَعِبٗا وَلَهۡوٗا وَغَرَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ
6:70.en_khattab: And leave those who take this faith (of Islam) as mere play and amusement and are deluded by their worldly life.

6:70.qpc_hafs: وَذَكِّرۡ بِهِۦٓ أَن تُبۡسَلَ نَفۡسُۢ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٞ وَلَا شَفِيعٞ
6:70.en_khattab: Yet remind them by this Quran, so no one should be ruined for their misdeeds. They will have no protector or intercessor other than Allah.

6:70.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تَعۡدِلۡ كُلَّ عَدۡلٖ لَّا يُؤۡخَذۡ مِنۡهَآۗ
6:70.en_khattab: Even if they were to offer every possible ransom, none will be accepted from them.
Those are the ones who will be ruined for their misdeeds.

6:70.qpc_hafs: لَهُمۡ شَرَابٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ
6:70.en_khattab: They will have a boiling drink and painful punishment for their disbelief.

6:71.en_khattab: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Should we invoke, other than Allah,
those ˹idols˺ which cannot benefit or harm us,

6:71.qpc_hafs: وَنُرَدُّ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡقَابِنَا بَعۡدَ إِذۡ هَدَىٰنَا ٱللَّهُ
6:71.en_khattab: and turn back to disbelief after Allah has guided us?

6:71.qpc_hafs: كَٱلَّذِي ٱسۡتَهۡوَتۡهُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ حَيۡرَانَ لَهُۥٓ
6:71.en_khattab: ˹If we do so, we will be˺ like those disoriented by devils in the wilderness,
while their companions call them to guidance, ˹saying˺, ‘Come to us!’

6:71.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنَّ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ هُوَ ٱلۡهُدَىٰۖ
6:71.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Allah’s guidance is the ˹only˺ true guidance.
And we are commanded to submit to the Lord of all worlds,

6:72.en_khattab: you will all be gathered together.

6:73.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ
6:73.en_khattab: He is the One Who created the heavens and the earth in truth.
On the Day ˹of Judgment˺ He will say, ‘Be!’ And there will be!

6:73.qpc_hafs: وَلَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ
6:73.en_khattab: All authority is His ˹alone˺ on the Day the Trumpet will be blown.
He is the Knower of all— seen or unseen.
And He is the All-Wise, All-Aware.

6:74.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when Abraham said to his father, Ȃzar,
Do you take idols as gods?

6:74.qpc_hafs: إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكَ وَقَوۡمَكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
6:74.en_khattab: It is clear to me that you and your people are entirely misguided.

6:75.en_khattab: the wonders of the heavens and the earth,
so he would be sure in faith.

6:76.en_khattab: When the night grew dark upon him
he said, “I do not love things that set.”

6:77.en_khattab: Then when he saw the moon rising,
he said, “This one is my Lord!”
he said, “If my Lord does not guide me,
I will certainly be one of the misguided people.

6:78.en_khattab: Then when he saw the sun shining,
he said, “This must be my Lord— it is the greatest!”

6:78.qpc_hafs: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ
6:78.en_khattab: he declared, “O my people! I totally reject whatever you associate ˹with Allah in worship˺.

6:79.qpc_hafs: إِنِّي وَجَّهۡتُ وَجۡهِيَ لِلَّذِي فَطَرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَنِيفٗاۖ
6:79.en_khattab: I have turned my face towards the One Who has originated the heavens and the earth— being upright
and I am not one of the polytheists.

6:80.en_khattab: And his people argued with him.

6:80.qpc_hafs: قَالَ أَتُحَٰٓجُّوٓنِّي فِي ٱللَّهِ وَقَدۡ هَدَىٰنِۚ
6:80.en_khattab: He responded, Are you arguing with me about Allah, while He has guided me?

6:80.qpc_hafs: وَلَآ أَخَافُ مَا تُشۡرِكُونَ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ رَبِّي شَيۡـٔٗاۚ
6:80.en_khattab: I am not afraid of whatever ˹idols˺ you associate with Him—˹none can harm me,˺ unless my Lord so wills.
My Lord encompasses everything in ˹His˺ knowledge.

6:81.en_khattab: And how should I fear your associate-gods,
while you have no fear in associating ˹others˺ with Allah

6:81.qpc_hafs: مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِهِۦ عَلَيۡكُمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٗاۚ

6:81.en_khattab: Which side has more right to security?

6:82.en_khattab: It is ˹only˺ those who are faithful
and do not tarnish their faith with falsehood
who are guaranteed security and are ˹rightly˺ guided

6:83.en_khattab: This was the argument We gave
We elevate in rank whoever We please.
Surely your Lord is All-Wise, All-Knowing.

6:84.qpc_hafs: وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِۦ دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُوسُفَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَۚ
6:84.en_khattab: and those among his descendants: David, Solomon, Job, Joseph, Moses, and Aaron.
This is how We reward the good-doers.

6:85.en_khattab: and Elias, who were all of the righteous.

6:86.en_khattab: ˹We also guided˺ Ishmael, Elisha, Jonah, and Lot,

6:87.en_khattab: And ˹We favoured˺ some of their forefathers

6:88.qpc_hafs: يَهۡدِي بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۚ
6:88.en_khattab: with which He guides whoever He wills of His servants
others with Him ˹in worship˺, their ˹good˺ deeds would have been wasted

6:89.qpc_hafs: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحُكۡمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَۚ
6:89.en_khattab: Those were the ones to whom We gave the Scripture, wisdom, and prophethood.
But if these ˹pagans˺ disbelieve in this ˹message˺,
then We have already entrusted it to a people
who will never disbelieve in it.

6:90.en_khattab: Say, “I ask no reward of you for this
˹Quran˺—it is a reminder to the whole world.”

6:91.en_khattab: And they have not shown Allah His proper reverence

6:91.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ قَالُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ بَشَرٖ مِّن شَيۡءٖۗ
6:91.en_khattab: when they said, “Allah has revealed nothing to any human being.”

6:91.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ مَنۡ أَنزَلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ ٱلَّذِي جَآءَ بِهِۦ مُوسَىٰ نُورٗا وَهُدٗى لِّلنَّاسِۖ
6:91.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Who then revealed the Book brought forth by Moses as a light and guidance for people,
which you split into separate sheets— revealing some and hiding much?

6:91.qpc_hafs: وَعُلِّمۡتُم مَّا لَمۡ تَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنتُمۡ وَلَآ ءَابَآؤُكُمۡۖ
6:91.en_khattab: You have been taught ˹through this Quran˺ what neither you nor your forefathers knew.
Then leave them to amuse themselves with falsehood.

6:92.qpc_hafs: أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مُبَارَكٞ مُّصَدِّقُ ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ
6:92.en_khattab: which We have revealed— confirming what came before it—
so you may warn the Mother of Cities and everyone around it.
Those who believe in the Hereafter ˹truly˺ believe in it

6:93.qpc_hafs: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
6:93.en_khattab: Who does more wrong than the one who fabricates lies against Allah

6:93.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ قَالَ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ وَلَمۡ يُوحَ إِلَيۡهِ شَيۡءٞ
6:93.en_khattab: or claims, “I have received revelations!”—although nothing was revealed to them

6:93.qpc_hafs: وَمَن قَالَ سَأُنزِلُ مِثۡلَ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُۗ
6:93.en_khattab: or the one who says, “I can reveal the like of Allah’s revelations!”

6:93.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِي غَمَرَٰتِ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ
6:93.en_khattab: If you ˹O Prophet˺ could only see the wrongdoers in the throes of death
while the angels are stretching out their hands

6:93.qpc_hafs: أَخۡرِجُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمُۖ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡهُونِ
6:93.en_khattab: saying˺, “Give up your souls! Today you will be rewarded with the torment of disgrace

6:93.qpc_hafs: بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡحَقِّ

6:93.en_khattab: and for being arrogant towards His revelations!

6:94.en_khattab: ˹Today˺ you have come back to Us all alone
as We created you the first time
leaving behind everything We have provided you with

6:94.qpc_hafs: وَمَا نَرَىٰ مَعَكُمۡ شُفَعَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّهُمۡ فِيكُمۡ شُرَكَٰٓؤُاْۚ
6:94.en_khattab: We do not see your intercessors with you— those you claimed were Allah’s partners ˹in worship˺

6:94.qpc_hafs: لَقَد تَّقَطَّعَ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَضَلَّ عَنكُم مَّا كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ
6:94.en_khattab: All your ties have been broken and all your claims have let you down

6:95.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah is the One Who causes seeds and fruit stones to sprout.
He brings forth the living from the dead
and the dead from the living.
How can you then be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

6:96.en_khattab: He causes the dawn to break,
and has made the night for rest
and ˹made˺ the sun and the moon ˹to travel˺ with precision.
That is the design of the Almighty, All-Knowing.

6:97.en_khattab: And He is the One Who
has made the stars as your guide
through the darkness of land and sea.
We have already made the signs clear

6:98.en_khattab: And He is the One Who originated you all from a single soul,
then assigned you a place to live
and another to ˹be laid to˺ rest.
We have already made the signs clear

6:99.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ
6:99.en_khattab: And He is the One Who sends down rain from the sky
causing all kinds of plants to grow

6:99.qpc_hafs: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهُ خَضِرٗا نُّخۡرِجُ مِنۡهُ حَبّٗا مُّتَرَاكِبٗا
6:99.en_khattab: producing green stalks from which We bring forth clustered grain

6:99.qpc_hafs: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّخۡلِ مِن طَلۡعِهَا قِنۡوَانٞ دَانِيَةٞ
6:99.en_khattab: And from palm trees come clusters of dates hanging within reach

6:99.qpc_hafs: وَجَنَّٰتٖ مِّنۡ أَعۡنَابٖ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونَ وَٱلرُّمَّانَ مُشۡتَبِهٗا وَغَيۡرَ مُتَشَٰبِهٍۗ
6:99.en_khattab: There are also gardens of grapevines, olives, and pomegranates, similar in shape but dissimilar in taste

6:99.qpc_hafs: ٱنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ثَمَرِهِۦٓ إِذَآ أَثۡمَرَ وَيَنۡعِهِۦٓۚ
6:99.en_khattab: Look at their fruit as it yields and ripens

6:99.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكُمۡ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
6:99.en_khattab: Indeed, in these are signs for people who believe

6:100.en_khattab: Yet they associate the jinn with Allah ˹in worship˺,

6:100.qpc_hafs: وَخَرَقُواْ لَهُۥ بَنِينَ وَبَنَٰتِۭ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖۚ
6:100.en_khattab: and they falsely attribute to Him sons and daughters out of ignorance.
Glorified and Exalted is He above what they claim!

6:101.en_khattab: ˹He is˺ the Originator of the heavens and earth.

6:102.en_khattab: There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him.
˹He is˺ the Creator of all things,
And He is the Maintainer of everything.

6:103.en_khattab: For He is the Most Subtle, All-Aware.

6:104.en_khattab: Indeed, there have come to you insights from your Lord.
So whoever chooses to see, it is for their own good.
But whoever chooses to be blind, it is to their own loss.
And I am not a keeper over you.

6:105.en_khattab: And so We vary our signs
to the extent that they will say, “You have studied ˹previous scriptures˺,”
and We make this ˹Quran˺ clear for people who know.

6:106.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet!˺ Follow what is revealed to you
there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him—
and turn away from the polytheists.

6:107.en_khattab: Had Allah willed, they would not have been polytheists.
We have not appointed you as their keeper,

6:108.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَسُبُّواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
6:108.en_khattab: ˹O believers!˺ Do not insult what they invoke besides Allah
or they will insult Allah spitefully out of ignorance.
This is how We have made each people’s deeds appealing to them.
Then to their Lord is their return,
and He will inform them of what they used to do.

6:109.en_khattab: They swear by Allah their most solemn oaths
that if a sign were to come to them, they would certainly believe in it
Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Signs are only with Allah.”

6:109.qpc_hafs: وَمَا يُشۡعِرُكُمۡ أَنَّهَآ إِذَا جَآءَتۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
6:109.en_khattab: What will make you ˹believers˺ realize that even if a sign were to come to them, they still would not believe?

6:110.en_khattab: We turn their hearts and eyes away ˹from the truth˺

6:110.qpc_hafs: كَمَا لَمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهِۦٓ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖ
6:110.en_khattab: as they refused to believe at first,
leaving them to wander blindly in their defiance.

6:111.en_khattab: Even if We had sent them the angels,
made the dead speak to them,
and assembled before their own eyes every sign ˹they demanded˺,

6:111.qpc_hafs: مَّا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ
6:111.en_khattab: they still would not have believed— unless Allah so willed.
But most of them are ignorant ˹of this˺.

6:112.qpc_hafs: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا شَيَٰطِينَ ٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلۡجِنِّ
6:112.en_khattab: And so We have made for every prophet enemies— devilish humans and jinn—

6:112.qpc_hafs: يُوحِي بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ زُخۡرُفَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ غُرُورٗاۚ
6:112.en_khattab: whispering to one another with elegant words of deception.
Had it been your Lord’s Will, they would not have done such a thing.
So leave them and their deceit,

6:113.en_khattab: of those who disbelieve in the Hereafter
may be receptive to it, be pleased with it
and be persistent in their evil pursuits.

6:114.en_khattab: ˹Say, O Prophet,˺ “Should I seek a judge other than Allah

6:114.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مُفَصَّلٗاۚ
6:114.en_khattab: while He is the One Who has revealed for you the Book ˹with the truth˺ perfectly explained?”

6:114.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّهُۥ مُنَزَّلٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ
6:114.en_khattab: Those who were given the Scripture know that it has been revealed ˹to you˺ from your Lord in truth.
So do not be one of those who doubt.

6:115.en_khattab: The Word of your Lord has been perfected in truth

6:116.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تُطِعۡ أَكۡثَرَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
6:116.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet!˺ If you were to obey most of those on earth,
they would lead you away from Allah’s Way.

6:118.qpc_hafs: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسۡمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ
6:118.en_khattab: So eat only of what is slaughtered in Allah’s Name
if you truly believe in His revelations.

6:119.qpc_hafs: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تَأۡكُلُواْ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسۡمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ
6:119.en_khattab: Why should you not eat of what is slaughtered in Allah’s Name

6:119.qpc_hafs: وَقَدۡ فَصَّلَ لَكُم مَّا حَرَّمَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ
6:119.en_khattab: when He has already explained to you what He has forbidden to you

6:119.qpc_hafs: وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا لَّيُضِلُّونَ بِأَهۡوَآئِهِم بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٍۚ
6:119.en_khattab: Many ˹deviants˺ certainly mislead others by their whims out of ignorance
Surely your Lord knows the transgressors best

6:120.en_khattab: will be punished for what they earn.

6:121.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَأۡكُلُواْ مِمَّا لَمۡ يُذۡكَرِ ٱسۡمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ
6:121.en_khattab: Do not eat of what is not slaughtered in Allah’s Name.
For that would certainly be ˹an act of˺ disobedience.

6:121.qpc_hafs: وَإِنَّ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ لَيُوحُونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَوۡلِيَآئِهِمۡ لِيُجَٰدِلُوكُمۡۖ
6:121.en_khattab: Surely the devils whisper to their ˹human˺ associates to argue with you.
If you were to obey them, then you ˹too˺ would be polytheists.

6:122.en_khattab: Can those who had been dead,

6:122.qpc_hafs: فَأَحۡيَيۡنَٰهُ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُۥ نُورٗا يَمۡشِي بِهِۦ فِي ٱلنَّاسِ
6:122.en_khattab: to whom We gave life and a light with which they can walk among people,

6:122.qpc_hafs: كَمَن مَّثَلُهُۥ فِي ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ لَيۡسَ بِخَارِجٖ مِّنۡهَاۚ
6:122.en_khattab: be compared to those in complete darkness from which they can never emerge?

6:122.qpc_hafs: كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
6:122.en_khattab: That is how the misdeeds of the disbelievers have been made appealing to them.

6:123.en_khattab: And so We have placed in every society
the most wicked to conspire in it.
Yet they plot only against themselves,
but they fail to perceive it.

6:124.en_khattab: Whenever a sign comes to them, they say,

6:124.qpc_hafs: لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ حَتَّىٰ نُؤۡتَىٰ مِثۡلَ مَآ أُوتِيَ رُسُلُ ٱللَّهِۘ
6:124.en_khattab: “We will never believe until we receive what Allah’s messengers received.
Allah knows best where to place His message.

6:124.qpc_hafs: سَيُصِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ صَغَارٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعَذَابٞ شَدِيدُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَمۡكُرُونَ
6:124.en_khattab: The wicked will soon be overwhelmed by humiliation from Allah and a severe punishment for their evil plots.

6:125.en_khattab: He opens their heart to Islam
But whoever He wills to leave astray
He makes their chest tight and constricted
as if they were climbing up into the sky

6:125.qpc_hafs: كَذَٰلِكَ يَجۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
6:125.en_khattab: This is how Allah dooms those who disbelieve.

6:126.en_khattab: That is your Lord’s Path— perfectly straight.
We have already made the signs clear

6:127.en_khattab: They will have the Home of Peace
Who will be their Guardian because of what they used to do.

6:128.en_khattab: ˹Consider˺ the Day He will gather them ˹all˺ together

6:128.qpc_hafs: يَٰمَعۡشَرَ ٱلۡجِنِّ قَدِ ٱسۡتَكۡثَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِۖ
6:128.en_khattab: and say, “O assembly of jinn! You misled humans in great numbers.”

6:128.qpc_hafs: وَقَالَ أَوۡلِيَآؤُهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ رَبَّنَا ٱسۡتَمۡتَعَ بَعۡضُنَا بِبَعۡضٖ وَبَلَغۡنَآ أَجَلَنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَجَّلۡتَ لَنَاۚ
6:128.en_khattab: And their human associates will say, “Our Lord! We benefited from each other’s company, but now we have reached the term which You appointed for us.” ˹Then˺

6:128.qpc_hafs: قَالَ ٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوَىٰكُمۡ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ
6:128.en_khattab: He will say, “The Fire is your home, yours to stay in forever, except whoever Allah wills to spare.”
Surely your Lord is All-Wise, All-Knowing.

6:129.en_khattab: We make the wrongdoers ˹destructive˺ allies of one another

6:130.en_khattab: ˹Allah will ask,˺ “O assembly of jinn and humans!
Did messengers not come from among you, proclaiming
of the coming of this Day of yours?”
They will say, “We confess against ourselves!”
For they have been deluded by ˹their˺ worldly life.
And they will testify against themselves

6:131.qpc_hafs: أَن لَّمۡ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ
6:131.en_khattab: ˹sending of the messengers˺ is because your Lord would never destroy a society
while its people are unaware ˹of the truth˺.

6:132.en_khattab: They will each be assigned ranks according to their deeds.
And your Lord is not unaware of what they do.

6:133.en_khattab: Your Lord is the Self-Sufficient, Full of Mercy.

6:133.qpc_hafs: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفۡ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكُم مَّا يَشَآءُ
6:133.en_khattab: If He wills, He can do away with you and replace you with whoever He wills,

6:133.qpc_hafs: كَمَآ أَنشَأَكُم مِّن ذُرِّيَّةِ قَوۡمٍ ءَاخَرِينَ
6:133.en_khattab: just as He produced you from the offspring of other people.

6:134.en_khattab: Indeed, what you have been promised
And you will have no escape

6:135.en_khattab: O my people! Persist in your ways,
for I ˹too˺ will persist in mine.
who will fare best in the end.
Indeed, the wrongdoers will never succeed.

6:136.qpc_hafs: وَجَعَلُواْ لِلَّهِ مِمَّا ذَرَأَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَرۡثِ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ نَصِيبٗا
6:136.en_khattab: The pagans set aside for Allah a share of the crops and cattle He created

6:136.qpc_hafs: فَقَالُواْ هَٰذَا لِلَّهِ بِزَعۡمِهِمۡ وَهَٰذَا لِشُرَكَآئِنَاۖ
6:136.en_khattab: saying, “This ˹portion˺ is for Allah,” so they claim, “and this ˹one˺ for our associate-gods.”

6:136.qpc_hafs: فَمَا كَانَ لِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ فَلَا يَصِلُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ
6:136.en_khattab: Yet the portion of their associate-gods is not shared with Allah

6:136.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ فَهُوَ يَصِلُ إِلَىٰ شُرَكَآئِهِمۡۗ
6:136.en_khattab: while Allah’s portion is shared with their associate-gods.

6:137.en_khattab: have made it appealing to them to kill their own children
only leading to their destruction as well as confusion in their faith
Had it been Allah’s Will, they would not have done such a thing
So leave them and their falsehood

6:138.qpc_hafs: لَّا يَطۡعَمُهَآ إِلَّا مَن نَّشَآءُ بِزَعۡمِهِمۡ
6:138.en_khattab: are reserved— none may eat them except those we permit
so they claim. Some other cattle are exempted from labour

6:138.qpc_hafs: وَأَنۡعَٰمٞ لَّا يَذۡكُرُونَ ٱسۡمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهَا
6:138.en_khattab: and others are not slaughtered in Allah’s Name

6:138.qpc_hafs: ٱفۡتِرَآءً عَلَيۡهِۚ سَيَجۡزِيهِم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
6:138.en_khattab: —falsely attributing lies to Him. He will repay them for their lies.

6:139.en_khattab: is reserved for our males and forbidden to our females;
He will repay them for their falsehood.

6:140.en_khattab: who have murdered their own children foolishly
and have forbidden what Allah has provided for them
They have certainly strayed and are not ˹rightly˺ guided

6:141.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَ جَنَّٰتٖ مَّعۡرُوشَٰتٖ وَغَيۡرَ مَعۡرُوشَٰتٖ
6:141.en_khattab: He is the One Who produces gardens— both cultivated and wild
and palm trees, crops of different flavours

6:141.qpc_hafs: أُكُلُهُۥ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونَ وَٱلرُّمَّانَ مُتَشَٰبِهٗا وَغَيۡرَ مُتَشَٰبِهٖۚ
6:141.en_khattab: olives, and pomegranates— similar ˹in shape˺, but dissimilar ˹in taste˺

6:141.qpc_hafs: كُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦٓ إِذَآ أَثۡمَرَ وَءَاتُواْ حَقَّهُۥ يَوۡمَ حَصَادِهِۦۖ
6:141.en_khattab: Eat of the fruit they bear and pay the dues at harvest

6:141.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تُسۡرِفُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
6:141.en_khattab: but do not waste. Surely He does not like the wasteful.

6:142.en_khattab: Some cattle are fit for labour, others are too small.
Eat of what Allah has provided for you
and do not follow Satan’s footsteps.
Certainly, he is your sworn enemy.

6:143.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ ءَآلذَّكَرَيۡنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ ٱلۡأُنثَيَيۡنِ أَمَّا ٱشۡتَمَلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَرۡحَامُ ٱلۡأُنثَيَيۡنِۖ نَبِّـُٔونِي بِعِلۡمٍ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
6:143.en_khattab: ask ˹them, O Prophet˺, “Has He forbidden ˹to you˺ the two males or the two females or what is in the wombs of the two females? Tell me with knowledge, if what you say is true.”—

6:144.en_khattab: Ask ˹them˺, “Has He forbidden ˹to you˺ the two males or the two females
or what is in the wombs of the two females?

6:144.qpc_hafs: أَمۡ كُنتُمۡ شُهَدَآءَ إِذۡ وَصَّىٰكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَاۚ
6:144.en_khattab: Or were you present when Allah gave you this commandment?”

6:144.qpc_hafs: فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا
6:144.en_khattab: Who does more wrong than those who fabricate lies against Allah

6:144.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
6:144.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

6:145.qpc_hafs: لَّآ أَجِدُ فِي مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ مُحَرَّمًا
6:145.en_khattab: I do not find in what has been revealed to me anything forbidden to eat

6:145.qpc_hafs: عَلَىٰ طَاعِمٖ يَطۡعَمُهُۥٓ إِلَّآ أَن يَكُونَ مَيۡتَةً أَوۡ دَمٗا مَّسۡفُوحًا أَوۡ لَحۡمَ خِنزِيرٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ رِجۡسٌ أَوۡ فِسۡقًا أُهِلَّ لِغَيۡرِ ٱللَّهِ بِهِۦۚ
6:145.en_khattab: except carrion, running blood, swine— which is impure— or a sinful offering in the name of any other than Allah.

6:145.qpc_hafs: فَمَنِ ٱضۡطُرَّ غَيۡرَ بَاغٖ وَلَا عَادٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
6:145.en_khattab: But if someone is compelled by necessity— neither driven by desire nor exceeding immediate need— then surely your Lord is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

6:146.qpc_hafs: وَعَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ حَرَّمۡنَا كُلَّ ذِي ظُفُرٖۖ
6:146.en_khattab: For those who are Jewish, We forbade every animal with undivided hoofs

6:146.qpc_hafs: وَمِنَ ٱلۡبَقَرِ وَٱلۡغَنَمِ حَرَّمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ شُحُومَهُمَآ
6:146.en_khattab: and the fat of oxen and sheep

6:146.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا مَا حَمَلَتۡ ظُهُورُهُمَآ أَوِ ٱلۡحَوَايَآ أَوۡ مَا ٱخۡتَلَطَ بِعَظۡمٖۚ
6:146.en_khattab: except what is joined to their backs or intestines or mixed with bone
In this way We rewarded them for their violations

6:147.en_khattab: But if they deny you ˹O Prophet˺,
say, “Your Lord is infinite in mercy

6:147.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأۡسُهُۥ عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
6:147.en_khattab: yet His punishment will not be averted from the wicked people.

6:148.qpc_hafs: لَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَآ أَشۡرَكۡنَا وَلَآ ءَابَآؤُنَا وَلَا حَرَّمۡنَا مِن شَيۡءٖۚ
6:148.en_khattab: Had it been Allah’s Will, neither we nor our forefathers would have associated others with Him ˹in worship˺ or made anything unlawful.

6:148.qpc_hafs: كَذَٰلِكَ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ ذَاقُواْ بَأۡسَنَاۗ
6:148.en_khattab: Likewise, those before them rejected the truth until they tasted Our punishment.

6:148.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ هَلۡ عِندَكُم مِّنۡ عِلۡمٖ فَتُخۡرِجُوهُ لَنَآۖ
6:148.en_khattab: Ask ˹them, O Prophet˺, “Do you have any knowledge that you can produce for us?

6:148.qpc_hafs: إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَإِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا تَخۡرُصُونَ
6:148.en_khattab: Surely you follow nothing but ˹false˺ assumptions and you do nothing but lie.

6:149.en_khattab: imposed guidance upon all of you.”

6:150.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ يَشۡهَدُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَرَّمَ هَٰذَاۖ
6:150.en_khattab: Bring your witnesses who can testify that Allah has forbidden this.
If they ˹falsely˺ testify, do not testify with them.

6:150.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا
6:150.en_khattab: And do not follow the desires of those who deny Our proofs,
and set up equals with their Lord.

6:151.en_khattab: “Come! Let me recite to you what your Lord has forbidden to you:
do not associate others with Him ˹in worship˺. ˹Do not fail to˺

6:151.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَقۡتُلُوٓاْ أَوۡلَٰدَكُم مِّنۡ إِمۡلَٰقٖ نَّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُكُمۡ وَإِيَّاهُمۡۖ
6:151.en_khattab: Do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for you and for them.

6:151.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلۡفَوَٰحِشَ مَا ظَهَرَ مِنۡهَا وَمَا بَطَنَۖ
6:151.en_khattab: Do not come near indecencies, openly or secretly.

6:151.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَقۡتُلُواْ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ
6:151.en_khattab: Do not take a ˹human˺ life— made sacred by Allah— except with ˹legal˺ right.
This is what He has commanded you, so perhaps you will understand.

6:152.en_khattab: And do not come near the wealth of the orphan—

6:152.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡلُغَ أَشُدَّهُۥۚ
6:152.en_khattab: unless intending to enhance it— until they attain maturity.
Give full measure and weigh with justice.
We never require of any soul more than what it can afford.

6:152.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا قُلۡتُمۡ فَٱعۡدِلُواْ وَلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰۖ
6:152.en_khattab: Whenever you speak, maintain justice— even regarding a close relative.
And fulfil your covenant with Allah.
This is what He has commanded you, so perhaps you will be mindful.

6:153.en_khattab: Indeed, that is My Path— perfectly straight.
and do not follow other ways
for they will lead you away from His Way.
This is what He has commanded you
so perhaps you will be conscious ˹of Allah˺.

6:154.en_khattab: Additionally, We gave Moses the Scripture,
completing the favour upon those who do good,
and as a guide and a mercy,
so perhaps they would be certain of the meeting with their Lord.

6:155.en_khattab: This is a blessed Book We have revealed.
and be mindful ˹of Allah˺, so you may be shown mercy.

6:156.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ عَلَىٰ طَآئِفَتَيۡنِ مِن قَبۡلِنَا
6:156.en_khattab: ‘Scriptures were only revealed to two groups before us
and we were unaware of their teachings.’

6:157.qpc_hafs: لَوۡ أَنَّآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡنَا ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَكُنَّآ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡهُمۡۚ
6:157.en_khattab: If only the Scriptures had been revealed to us, we would have been better guided than they.

6:157.qpc_hafs: فَقَدۡ جَآءَكُم بَيِّنَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞۚ
6:157.en_khattab: Now there has come to you from your Lord a clear proof— a guide and mercy.

6:157.qpc_hafs: فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَصَدَفَ عَنۡهَاۗ
6:157.en_khattab: Who then does more wrong than those who deny Allah’s revelations and turn away from them?

6:157.qpc_hafs: سَنَجۡزِي ٱلَّذِينَ يَصۡدِفُونَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَصۡدِفُونَ
6:157.en_khattab: We will reward those who turn away from Our revelations with a dreadful punishment for turning away.

6:158.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَ رَبُّكَ أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَ بَعۡضُ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكَۗ
6:158.en_khattab: the coming of the angels, or your Lord ˹Himself˺, or some of your Lord’s ˹major˺ signs?

6:158.qpc_hafs: يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِي بَعۡضُ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكَ لَا يَنفَعُ نَفۡسًا إِيمَٰنُهَا لَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَامَنَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُ أَوۡ كَسَبَتۡ فِيٓ إِيمَٰنِهَا خَيۡرٗاۗ
6:158.en_khattab: On the Day your Lord’s signs arrive, belief will not benefit those who did not believe earlier or those who did no good through their faith.
Say, “Keep waiting! We too are waiting.”

6:159.en_khattab: Indeed, you ˹O Prophet˺ are not responsible whatsoever for those who have divided their faith

6:159.qpc_hafs: وَكَانُواْ شِيَعٗا لَّسۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ فِي شَيۡءٍۚ
6:159.en_khattab: and split into sects. Their judgment rests only with Allah.

6:159.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُمۡ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
6:159.en_khattab: And He will inform them of what they used to do.

6:160.en_khattab: Whoever comes with a good deed
But whoever comes with a bad deed
will be punished for only one

6:161.en_khattab: Surely my Lord has guided me
the faith of Abraham, the upright,
who was not one of the polytheists.

6:162.en_khattab: Surely my prayer, my worship, my life, and my death
are all for Allah— Lord of all worlds.

6:163.en_khattab: and so I am the first to submit.

6:164.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Should I seek a lord other than Allah
while He is the Lord of everything?

6:164.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَكۡسِبُ كُلُّ نَفۡسٍ إِلَّا عَلَيۡهَاۚ
6:164.en_khattab: No one will reap except what they sow.
No soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another.
Then to your Lord is your return,
and He will inform you of your differences.

6:165.en_khattab: has placed you as successors on earth
and elevated some of you in rank over others
so He may test you with what He has given you
Surely your Lord is swift in punishment
but He is certainly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

7:2.en_khattab: ˹This is˺ a Book sent down to you

7:2.qpc_hafs: فَلَا يَكُن فِي صَدۡرِكَ حَرَجٞ مِّنۡهُ
7:2.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet˺—do not let anxiety into your heart regarding it—
so with it you may warn ˹the disbelievers˺,
and as a reminder to the believers.

7:3.en_khattab: Follow what has been sent down to you
and do not take others as guardians besides Him.

7:4.en_khattab: by surprise ˹while sleeping˺ at night or midday.

7:6.en_khattab: We will surely question those who received messengers
and We will question the messengers ˹themselves˺

7:7.en_khattab: Then We will give them a full account with sure knowledge

7:8.en_khattab: The weighing on that Day will be just.
As for those whose scale will be heavy ˹with good deeds˺, ˹only˺

7:9.en_khattab: But those whose scale is light

7:10.en_khattab: We have indeed established you on earth
and provided you with a means of livelihood

7:11.en_khattab: then said to the angels, “Prostrate before Adam,”

7:11.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ لَمۡ يَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
7:11.en_khattab: but not Iblîs, who refused to prostrate with the others.

7:12.en_khattab: What prevented you from prostrating when I commanded you?
He replied, “I am better than he is:

7:13.en_khattab: Allah said, “Then get down from Paradise!

7:13.qpc_hafs: فَمَا يَكُونُ لَكَ أَن تَتَكَبَّرَ فِيهَا
7:13.en_khattab: It is not for you to be arrogant here.
You are truly one of the disgraced.

7:16.en_khattab: He said, “For leaving me to stray
I will lie in ambush for them

7:17.en_khattab: I will approach them from their front
and then You will find most of them ungrateful.

7:18.en_khattab: I will certainly fill up Hell with you and your followers

7:19.en_khattab: and eat from wherever you please,
but do not approach this tree,
or else you will be wrongdoers.”

7:20.qpc_hafs: ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِيُبۡدِيَ لَهُمَا مَا وُۥرِيَ عَنۡهُمَا مِن سَوۡءَٰتِهِمَا
7:20.en_khattab: in order to expose what was hidden of their nakedness
has forbidden this tree to you

7:20.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَا مَلَكَيۡنِ أَوۡ تَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰلِدِينَ
7:20.en_khattab: only to prevent you from becoming angels or immortals

7:22.en_khattab: So he brought about their fall through deception.

7:22.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا ذَاقَا ٱلشَّجَرَةَ بَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡءَٰتُهُمَا
7:22.en_khattab: And when they tasted of the tree, their nakedness was exposed to them,

7:22.qpc_hafs: وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ
7:22.en_khattab: prompting them to cover themselves with leaves from Paradise.

7:22.qpc_hafs: وَنَادَىٰهُمَا رَبُّهُمَآ أَلَمۡ أَنۡهَكُمَا عَن تِلۡكُمَا ٱلشَّجَرَةِ
7:22.en_khattab: Then their Lord called out to them, “Did I not forbid you from that tree

7:22.qpc_hafs: وَأَقُل لَّكُمَآ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ لَكُمَا عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
7:22.en_khattab: and ˹did I not˺ tell you that Satan is your sworn enemy?”

7:23.en_khattab: Our Lord! We have wronged ourselves.
If You do not forgive us and have mercy on us

7:24.en_khattab: Allah said, “Descend as enemies to each other.
You will find in the earth a residence
and provision for your appointed stay.

7:25.en_khattab: and from there you will be resurrected.

7:26.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمۡ لِبَاسٗا يُوَٰرِي سَوۡءَٰتِكُمۡ وَرِيشٗاۖ
7:26.en_khattab: We have provided for you clothing to cover your nakedness and as an adornment.
However, the best clothing is righteousness.
This is one of Allah’s bounties.
So perhaps you will be mindful.

7:27.en_khattab: Do not let Satan deceive you
as he tempted your parents out of Paradise
and caused their cover to be removed
in order to expose their nakedness
Surely he and his soldiers watch you
from where you cannot see them

7:27.qpc_hafs: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ أَوۡلِيَآءَ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
7:27.en_khattab: We have made the devils allies of those who disbelieve.

7:28.en_khattab: Whenever they commit a shameful deed,

7:28.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ وَجَدۡنَا عَلَيۡهَآ ءَابَآءَنَا وَٱللَّهُ أَمَرَنَا بِهَاۗ
7:28.en_khattab: they say, “We found our forefathers doing it and Allah has commanded us to do it.”

7:28.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَأۡمُرُ بِٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِۖ
7:28.en_khattab: Say, “No! Allah never commands what is shameful.

7:28.qpc_hafs: أَتَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
7:28.en_khattab: How can you attribute to Allah what you do not know?”

7:29.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “My Lord has commanded uprightness
and dedication ˹to Him alone˺ in worship,
calling upon Him with sincere devotion.
Just as He first brought you into being, you will be brought to life again.”

7:30.en_khattab: while others are destined to stray

7:30.qpc_hafs: إِنَّهُمُ ٱتَّخَذُواْ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
7:30.en_khattab: They have taken devils as their masters instead of Allah

7:31.en_khattab: Dress properly whenever you are at worship.
Eat and drink, but do not waste.
Surely He does not like the wasteful.

7:32.en_khattab: Ask, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Who has forbidden the adornments

7:32.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّتِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِۦ وَٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ مِنَ ٱلرِّزۡقِۚ
7:32.en_khattab: he has produced for His servants, and the good things of provision?”

7:32.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ هِيَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا خَالِصَةٗ
7:32.en_khattab: Say, “They are for those who believe during the worldly life, purely
This is how We explain the signs

7:33.en_khattab: Say, “My Lord has only forbidden open and secret indecencies,
sinfulness, whether committed openly or in secret,

7:33.qpc_hafs: وَأَن تُشۡرِكُواْ بِٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِهِۦ سُلۡطَٰنٗا
7:33.en_khattab: sinfulness, unjust aggression, associating ˹others˺ with Allah ˹in worship˺—a practice He has never authorized—

7:33.qpc_hafs: وَأَن تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
7:33.en_khattab: and attributing to Allah what you do not know.”

7:34.en_khattab: For each community there is an appointed term.
they can neither delay it for a moment,

7:35.qpc_hafs: إِمَّا يَأۡتِيَنَّكُمۡ رُسُلٞ مِّنكُمۡ يَقُصُّونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِي
7:35.en_khattab: When messengers from among yourselves come to you reciting My revelations

7:35.qpc_hafs: فَمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ
7:35.en_khattab: whoever shuns evil and mends their ways, there will be no fear for them

7:36.en_khattab: But those who receive Our revelations with denial
will be the residents of the Fire

7:37.en_khattab: those who fabricate lies against Allah
They will receive what is destined for them,
until Our messenger-angels arrive to take their souls,

7:37.qpc_hafs: قَالُوٓاْ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ
7:37.en_khattab: asking them, “Where are those ˹false gods˺ you used to invoke besides Allah?”
They will cry, “They have failed us,”

7:37.qpc_hafs: وَشَهِدُواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ أَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ كَٰفِرِينَ
7:37.en_khattab: and they will confess against themselves that they were indeed disbelievers.

7:38.qpc_hafs: فِيٓ أُمَمٖ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ
7:38.en_khattab: the Fire along with the ˹evil˺ groups of jinn and humans that preceded you.
it will curse the preceding one
until they are all gathered inside,
the followers will say about their leaders,

7:38.qpc_hafs: رَبَّنَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ أَضَلُّونَا فَـَٔاتِهِمۡ عَذَابٗا ضِعۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِۖ
7:38.en_khattab: “Our Lord! They have misled us, so multiply their torment in the Fire.”

7:38.qpc_hafs: قَالَ لِكُلّٖ ضِعۡفٞ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تَعۡلَمُونَ
7:38.en_khattab: He will answer, “It has already been multiplied for all, but you do not know.”

7:39.en_khattab: Then the leaders will say to their followers,

7:39.qpc_hafs: فَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡنَا مِن فَضۡلٖ
7:39.en_khattab: “You were no better than us! So
for what you used to commit.

7:40.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ عَنۡهَا
7:40.en_khattab: Surely those who receive our revelations with denial and arrogance

7:40.qpc_hafs: لَا تُفَتَّحُ لَهُمۡ أَبۡوَٰبُ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَلَا يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ
7:40.en_khattab: the gates of heaven will not be opened for them, nor will they enter Paradise

7:40.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰ يَلِجَ ٱلۡجَمَلُ فِي سَمِّ ٱلۡخِيَاطِۚ
7:40.en_khattab: until a camel passes through the eye of a needle
This is how We reward the wicked

7:41.en_khattab: This is how We reward the wrongdoers.

7:42.en_khattab: As for those who believe and do good—
We never require of any soul more than what it can afford
it is they who will be the residents of Paradise

7:43.qpc_hafs: وَنَزَعۡنَا مَا فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنۡ غِلّٖ
7:43.en_khattab: We will remove whatever bitterness they had in their hearts.
Rivers will flow under their feet.

7:43.qpc_hafs: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي هَدَىٰنَا لِهَٰذَا
7:43.en_khattab: And they will say, “Praise be to Allah for guiding us to this.

7:43.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهۡتَدِيَ لَوۡلَآ أَنۡ هَدَىٰنَا ٱللَّهُۖ
7:43.en_khattab: We would have never been guided if Allah had not guided us.
The messengers of our Lord had certainly come with the truth.

7:43.qpc_hafs: وَنُودُوٓاْ أَن تِلۡكُمُ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
7:43.en_khattab: It will be announced to them, “This is Paradise awarded to you for what you used to do.”

7:44.en_khattab: The residents of Paradise will call out to

7:44.qpc_hafs: أَن قَدۡ وَجَدۡنَا مَا وَعَدَنَا رَبُّنَا حَقّٗا
7:44.en_khattab: “We have certainly found our Lord’s promise to be true.

7:44.qpc_hafs: فَهَلۡ وَجَدتُّم مَّا وَعَدَ رَبُّكُمۡ حَقّٗاۖ
7:44.en_khattab: Have you too found your Lord’s promise to be true?”
Then a caller will announce to both,
“May Allah’s condemnation be upon the wrongdoers,

7:45.en_khattab: those who hindered ˹others˺ from Allah’s Way

7:46.en_khattab: There will be a barrier between Paradise and Hell.

7:46.qpc_hafs: وَعَلَى ٱلۡأَعۡرَافِ رِجَالٞ يَعۡرِفُونَ كُلَّۢا بِسِيمَىٰهُمۡۚ
7:46.en_khattab: And on the heights ˹of that barrier˺ will be people who will recognize ˹the residents of˺ both by their appearance.

7:46.qpc_hafs: وَنَادَوۡاْ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ أَن سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۚ
7:46.en_khattab: They will call out to the residents of Paradise, “Peace be upon you!”
They will have not yet entered Paradise, but eagerly hope to.

7:47.en_khattab: Do not join us with the wrongdoing people.

7:48.en_khattab: Those on the heights will call out to some
˹tyrants in the Fire˺, who they will recognize by their appearance
and arrogance are of no use ˹today˺!

7:49.en_khattab: the ones you swore would never be shown Allah’s mercy?” ˹Finally,

7:49.qpc_hafs: لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ
7:49.en_khattab: There will be no fear for you, nor will you grieve.”

7:50.en_khattab: The residents of the Fire will then cry out

7:50.qpc_hafs: أَنۡ أَفِيضُواْ عَلَيۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ أَوۡ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ
7:50.en_khattab: "Aid us with some water or any provision Allah has granted you."

7:50.qpc_hafs: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَرَّمَهُمَا عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
7:50.en_khattab: They will reply, "Allah has forbidden both to the disbelievers,

7:51.en_khattab: those who took this faith ˹of Islam˺ as mere amusement and play
and were deluded by ˹their˺ worldly life

7:51.qpc_hafs: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَنسَىٰهُمۡ كَمَا نَسُواْ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِهِمۡ هَٰذَا
7:51.en_khattab: ˹Allah will say,˺ “Today We will ignore them just as they ignored the coming of this Day of theirs

7:52.en_khattab: We have certainly brought them a Book

7:53.en_khattab: Do they only await the fulfilment ˹of its warning˺?
The Day it will be fulfilled
those who ignored it before will say
The messengers of our Lord certainly came with the truth

7:53.qpc_hafs: فَهَل لَّنَا مِن شُفَعَآءَ فَيَشۡفَعُواْ لَنَآ
7:53.en_khattab: Are there any intercessors who can plead on our behalf?

7:53.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ نُرَدُّ فَنَعۡمَلَ غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي كُنَّا نَعۡمَلُۚ
7:53.en_khattab: Or can we be sent back so we may do ˹good˺ unlike what we used to do?”
They will have certainly ruined themselves
and whatever ˹gods˺ they fabricated will fail them

7:54.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ
7:54.en_khattab: Who created the heavens and the earth in six Days,
then established Himself on the Throne.
He makes the day and night overlap in rapid succession.
He created the sun, the moon, and the stars— all subjected by His command.
The creation and the command belong to Him ˹alone˺.
Blessed is Allah— Lord of all worlds!

7:55.en_khattab: Surely He does not like the transgressors.

7:56.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بَعۡدَ إِصۡلَٰحِهَا
7:56.en_khattab: Do not spread corruption in the land after it has been set in order.
And call upon Him with hope and fear.

7:56.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ رَحۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
7:56.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah’s mercy is always close to the good-doers.

7:57.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۖ
7:57.en_khattab: He is the One Who sends the winds ushering in His mercy.

7:57.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَقَلَّتۡ سَحَابٗا ثِقَالٗا سُقۡنَٰهُ لِبَلَدٖ مَّيِّتٖ
7:57.en_khattab: When they bear heavy clouds, We drive them to a lifeless land

7:57.qpc_hafs: فَأَنزَلۡنَا بِهِ ٱلۡمَآءَ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦ مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۚ
7:57.en_khattab: and then cause rain to fall, producing every type of fruit.
Similarly, We will bring the dead to life, so perhaps you will be mindful.

7:58.en_khattab: produces abundantly by the Will of its Lord

7:58.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِي خَبُثَ لَا يَخۡرُجُ إِلَّا نَكِدٗاۚ
7:58.en_khattab: whereas the infertile land hardly produces anything
This is how We vary ˹Our˺ lessons to those who are thankful

7:59.en_khattab: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people.
He said, “O my people! Worship Allah
you have no other god except Him.

7:59.qpc_hafs: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
7:59.en_khattab: I truly fear for you the torment of a tremendous Day.

7:60.en_khattab: But the chiefs of his people said,

7:61.en_khattab: “O my people! I am not misguided!
from the Lord of all worlds,

7:62.en_khattab: conveying to you my Lord’s messages

7:63.en_khattab: that a reminder should come to you from your Lord

7:64.en_khattab: so We saved him and those with him in the Ark,
and drowned those who rejected Our signs.
They were certainly a blind people.

7:65.en_khattab: And to the people of ’Âd We sent their brother Hûd.

7:65.qpc_hafs: ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ
7:65.en_khattab: Worship Allah— you have no other god except Him.
Will you not then fear Him?

7:66.qpc_hafs: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ
7:66.en_khattab: The disbelieving chiefs of his people
responded, “We surely see you as a fool,
and we certainly think you are a liar.”

7:67.en_khattab: “O my people! I am no fool!
from the Lord of all worlds,

7:68.en_khattab: conveying to you my Lord’s messages.
And I am your sincere advisor.

7:69.qpc_hafs: أَن جَآءَكُمۡ ذِكۡرٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنكُمۡ لِيُنذِرَكُمۡۚ
7:69.en_khattab: that a reminder should come to you from your Lord through one of your own so he may warn you?

7:69.qpc_hafs: وَٱذۡكُرُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَعَلَكُمۡ خُلَفَآءَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ قَوۡمِ نُوحٖ
7:69.en_khattab: Remember that He made you successors after the people of Noah
and increased you greatly in stature.
So remember Allah’s favours, so you may be successful.

7:70.qpc_hafs: لِنَعۡبُدَ ٱللَّهَ وَحۡدَهُۥ وَنَذَرَ مَا كَانَ يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا
7:70.en_khattab: Have you come to us so that we would worship Allah alone and abandon what our forefathers used to worship?
Then bring us what you threaten us with,
if what you say is true!

7:71.qpc_hafs: قَالَ قَدۡ وَقَعَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ رِجۡسٞ وَغَضَبٌۖ
7:71.en_khattab: He said, “You will certainly be subjected to your Lord’s torment and wrath.
Do you dispute with me regarding the so-called gods which you and your forefathers have made up

7:71.qpc_hafs: أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلۡطَٰنٖۚ
7:71.en_khattab: a practice Allah has never authorized
Then wait! I too am waiting with you.

7:72.en_khattab: So We saved him and those with him by Our mercy
and uprooted those who denied Our signs

7:73.en_khattab: And to the people of Thamûd We sent their brother Ṣâliḥ.

7:73.qpc_hafs: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥۖ
7:73.en_khattab: He said, “O my people! Worship Allah— you have no other god except Him.
A clear proof has come to you from your Lord:
this is Allah’s she-camel as a sign to you.
So leave her to graze ˹freely˺ on Allah’s land
or else you will be overcome by a painful punishment.

7:74.qpc_hafs: وَٱذۡكُرُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَعَلَكُمۡ خُلَفَآءَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ عَادٖ
7:74.en_khattab: Remember when He made you successors after ’Âd

7:74.qpc_hafs: وَبَوَّأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِن سُهُولِهَا قُصُورٗا
7:74.en_khattab: and established you in the land—˹and˺ you built palaces on its plains
and do not go about spreading corruption in the land.

7:75.qpc_hafs: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ
7:75.en_khattab: The arrogant chiefs of his people
asked the lowly who believed among them

7:75.qpc_hafs: أَتَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ صَٰلِحٗا مُّرۡسَلٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ
7:75.en_khattab: "Are you certain that Ṣâliḥ has been sent by his Lord?"
"We certainly believe in what he has been sent with."

7:76.en_khattab: We surely reject what you believe in.

7:77.en_khattab: Bring us what you threaten us with
if you are ˹truly˺ one of the messengers.

7:78.en_khattab: and they fell lifeless in their homes.

7:79.en_khattab: So he turned away from them, saying
“O my people! Surely I conveyed to you my Lord’s message

7:79.qpc_hafs: وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُحِبُّونَ ٱلنَّٰصِحِينَ
7:79.en_khattab: and gave you ˹sincere˺ advice, but you do not like ˹sincere˺ advisors.”

7:80.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when Lot scolded ˹the men of˺ his people, ˹saying,˺

7:80.qpc_hafs: مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
7:80.en_khattab: that no man has ever done before?

7:82.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَخۡرِجُوهُم مِّن قَرۡيَتِكُمۡۖ
7:82.en_khattab: was to say, “Expel them from your land!
They are a people who wish to remain chaste!”

7:83.en_khattab: So We saved him and his family
who was one of the doomed.

7:84.en_khattab: We poured upon them a rain ˹of brimstone˺.
See what was the end of the wicked!

7:85.en_khattab: And to the people of Midian We sent their brother Shu’aib.

7:85.qpc_hafs: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥۖ
7:85.en_khattab: He said, “O my people! Worship Allah— you have no other god except Him.
A clear proof has already come to you from your Lord.
So give just measure and weight,
do not defraud people of their property,

7:85.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بَعۡدَ إِصۡلَٰحِهَاۚ
7:85.en_khattab: nor spread corruption in the land after it has been set in order.

7:85.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
7:85.en_khattab: This is for your own good, if you are ˹truly˺ believers.

7:86.en_khattab: And do not lie in ambush on every road— threatening

7:86.qpc_hafs: وَتَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ
7:86.en_khattab: and hindering those who believe in Allah from His Path
and striving to make it ˹appear˺ crooked
Remember when you were few, then He increased you in number
And consider the fate of the corruptors!

7:87.qpc_hafs: وَإِن كَانَ طَآئِفَةٞ مِّنكُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦ
7:87.en_khattab: If some of you do believe in what I have been sent with
then be patient until Allah judges between us.
He is the Best of Judges.

7:88.qpc_hafs: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ
7:88.en_khattab: The arrogant chiefs of his people threatened,

7:88.qpc_hafs: لَنُخۡرِجَنَّكَ يَٰشُعَيۡبُ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَكَ مِن قَرۡيَتِنَآ
7:88.en_khattab: O Shu’aib! We will certainly expel you and your fellow believers from our land,
unless you return to our faith.
He replied, “Even if we hate it?

7:89.en_khattab: We would surely be fabricating a lie against Allah

7:89.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ عُدۡنَا فِي مِلَّتِكُم بَعۡدَ إِذۡ نَجَّىٰنَا ٱللَّهُ مِنۡهَاۚ
7:89.en_khattab: if we were to return to your faith after Allah has saved us from it

7:89.qpc_hafs: وَمَا يَكُونُ لَنَآ أَن نَّعُودَ فِيهَآ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّنَاۚ
7:89.en_khattab: It does not befit us to return to it unless it is the Will of Allah, our Lord.
Our Lord has encompassed everything in ˹His˺ knowledge.

7:89.qpc_hafs: رَبَّنَا ٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَ قَوۡمِنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ
7:89.en_khattab: Our Lord! Judge between us and our people with truth.
You are the best of those who judge.

7:90.qpc_hafs: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ
7:90.en_khattab: The disbelieving chiefs of his people

7:91.en_khattab: and they fell lifeless in their homes

7:92.en_khattab: were ˹wiped out˺ as if they had never lived there.

7:93.qpc_hafs: لَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡۖ
7:93.en_khattab: Indeed, I have delivered to you the messages of my Lord and gave you ˹sincere˺ advice.
How can I then grieve for those who chose to disbelieve?

7:94.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّبِيٍّ
7:94.en_khattab: Whenever We sent a prophet to a society
We afflicted its ˹disbelieving˺ people with suffering and adversity
so perhaps they would be humbled

7:95.en_khattab: Then We changed their adversity to prosperity

7:95.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰ عَفَواْ وَّقَالُواْ قَدۡ مَسَّ ءَابَآءَنَا ٱلضَّرَّآءُ وَٱلسَّرَّآءُ
7:95.en_khattab: until they flourished and argued ˹falsely˺, “Our forefathers ˹too˺ had been visited by adversity and prosperity.”
So We seized them by surprise, while they were unaware.

7:96.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ
7:96.en_khattab: Had the people of those societies been faithful and mindful ˹of Allah˺,

7:96.qpc_hafs: لَفَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم بَرَكَٰتٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ
7:96.en_khattab: We would have overwhelmed them with blessings from heaven and earth

7:96.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبُواْ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
7:96.en_khattab: But they disbelieved, so We seized them for what they used to commit

7:97.en_khattab: Did the people of those societies
feel secure that Our punishment would not come upon them by night

7:98.en_khattab: that Our punishment would not come upon them by day

7:99.en_khattab: Did they feel secure against Allah’s planning?
None would feel secure from Allah’s planning

7:100.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لِلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَهۡلِهَآ
7:100.en_khattab: Is it not clear to those who take over the land after ˹the destruction of˺ its former residents
that— if We will— We can punish them ˹too˺ for their sins

7:100.qpc_hafs: وَنَطۡبَعُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
7:100.en_khattab: and seal their hearts so they will not hear ˹the truth˺

7:101.qpc_hafs: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآئِهَاۚ
7:101.en_khattab: We have narrated to you ˹O Prophet˺ some of the stories of those societies.
Surely, their messengers came to them with clear proofs,

7:101.qpc_hafs: فَمَا كَانُواْ لِيُؤۡمِنُواْ بِمَا كَذَّبُواْ مِن قَبۡلُۚ
7:101.en_khattab: but still they would not believe in what they had already denied.

7:101.qpc_hafs: كَذَٰلِكَ يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
7:101.en_khattab: This is how Allah seals the hearts of the disbelievers.

7:102.en_khattab: most of them true to their covenant
Rather, We found most of them

7:103.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ
7:103.en_khattab: Then after them We sent Moses with Our signs
was the end of the corruptors

7:104.en_khattab: from the Lord of all worlds,

7:105.qpc_hafs: أَن لَّآ أَقُولَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّۚ
7:105.en_khattab: say nothing about Allah except the truth.
Indeed, I have come to you with clear proof from your Lord,
so let the children of Israel go with me.

7:106.en_khattab: Pharaoh said, “If you have come with a sign,
if what you say is true.”

7:107.en_khattab: So Moses threw down his staff
and— behold!—it became a real snake.

7:108.en_khattab: Then he drew his hand ˹out of his collar˺

7:109.en_khattab: The chiefs of Pharaoh’s people said,

7:110.en_khattab: who seeks to drive you from your land.
So Pharaoh asked, 'What do you propose?'

7:111.en_khattab: They replied, 'Let him and his brother wait
and send mobilizers to all cities.'

7:114.en_khattab: and you will certainly be among those closest to me.

7:115.en_khattab: or shall we be the first to cast?

7:116.en_khattab: they deceived the eyes of the people,
and made a great display of magic.

7:117.en_khattab: and— behold!—it devoured the objects of their illusion!

7:119.en_khattab: So Pharaoh and his people were defeated right there

7:121.en_khattab: “We ˹now˺ believe in the Lord of all worlds—

7:123.en_khattab: Pharaoh threatened, “How dare you believe in him
This must be a conspiracy you devised
