7:124.en_khattab: I will certainly cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides,

7:126.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ أَنۡ ءَامَنَّا بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّنَا لَمَّا جَآءَتۡنَاۚ
7:126.en_khattab: is only because we believed in the signs of our Lord when they came to us

7:126.qpc_hafs: رَبَّنَآ أَفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡنَا صَبۡرٗا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسۡلِمِينَ
7:126.en_khattab: Our Lord! Shower us with perseverance, and let us die while submitting ˹to You˺.

7:127.en_khattab: The chiefs of Pharaoh’s people protested,

7:127.qpc_hafs: أَتَذَرُ مُوسَىٰ وَقَوۡمَهُۥ لِيُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَيَذَرَكَ وَءَالِهَتَكَۚ
7:127.en_khattab: Are you going to leave Moses and his people free to spread corruption in the land and abandon you and your gods?
He responded, 'We will kill their sons and keep their women.'

7:128.en_khattab: Seek Allah’s help and be patient.

7:128.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۖ
7:128.en_khattab: Indeed, the earth belongs to Allah ˹alone˺. He grants it to whoever He chooses of His servants.
The ultimate outcome belongs ˹only˺ to the righteous.

7:129.qpc_hafs: قَالُوٓاْ أُوذِينَا مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَأۡتِيَنَا
7:129.en_khattab: They complained, “We have always been oppressed— before and after you came to us
and after you came to us ˹with the message˺. ˹with

7:129.qpc_hafs: قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُهۡلِكَ عَدُوَّكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
7:129.en_khattab: ˹with the message˺.” He replied, “Perhaps your Lord will destroy your enemy and make you successors in the land
to see what you will do.”

7:130.en_khattab: Indeed, We afflicted Pharaoh’s people with famine
so they might come back ˹to their senses˺.

7:131.en_khattab: they said, “This is what we deserve,”
they blamed it on Moses and those with him.

7:131.qpc_hafs: أَلَآ إِنَّمَا طَٰٓئِرُهُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
7:131.en_khattab: Surely all is destined by Allah. Yet most of them did not know.

7:132.qpc_hafs: وَقَالُواْ مَهۡمَا تَأۡتِنَا بِهِۦ مِنۡ ءَايَةٖ
7:132.en_khattab: They said, 'No matter what sign you may bring
we will never believe in you.'

7:133.en_khattab: So We plagued them with floods
but they persisted in arrogance and were a wicked people

7:134.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَى ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَۖ
7:134.en_khattab: they pleaded, “O Moses! Pray to your Lord on our behalf, by virtue of the covenant He made with you.

7:134.qpc_hafs: لَئِن كَشَفۡتَ عَنَّا ٱلرِّجۡزَ لَنُؤۡمِنَنَّ لَكَ وَلَنُرۡسِلَنَّ مَعَكَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
7:134.en_khattab: If you help remove this torment from us, we will certainly believe in you and let the Children of Israel go with you.

7:135.en_khattab: But as soon as We removed the torment from them—
until they met their inevitable fate

7:136.en_khattab: So We inflicted punishment upon them

7:137.en_khattab: And ˹so˺ We made the oppressed people

7:137.qpc_hafs: مَشَٰرِقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَغَٰرِبَهَا ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَاۖ
7:137.en_khattab: successors of the eastern and western lands, which We had showered with blessings.
˹In this way˺ the noble Word of your Lord
was fulfilled for the Children of Israel for what they had endured.

7:137.qpc_hafs: وَدَمَّرۡنَا مَا كَانَ يَصۡنَعُ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَقَوۡمُهُۥ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡرِشُونَ
7:137.en_khattab: And We destroyed what Pharaoh and his people constructed and what they established.

7:138.en_khattab: We brought the Children of Israel across the sea

7:138.qpc_hafs: فَأَتَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ يَعۡكُفُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَصۡنَامٖ لَّهُمۡۚ
7:138.en_khattab: and they came upon a people devoted to idols.

7:138.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَى ٱجۡعَل لَّنَآ إِلَٰهٗا كَمَا لَهُمۡ ءَالِهَةٞۚ
7:138.en_khattab: They demanded, “O Moses! Make for us a god like their gods.”
He replied, “Indeed, you are a people acting ignorantly!

7:139.en_khattab: What they follow is certainly doomed to destruction
and their deeds are in vain.”

7:140.en_khattab: Shall I seek for you a god
other than Allah, while He has honoured you above the others?

7:141.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when We rescued you from the people of Pharaoh
who afflicted you with dreadful torment
killing your sons and keeping your women

7:141.qpc_hafs: وَفِي ذَٰلِكُم بَلَآءٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ عَظِيمٞ
7:141.en_khattab: That was a severe test from your Lord

7:142.en_khattab: We appointed for Moses thirty nights
completing his Lord’s term of forty nights
Take my place among my people, do what is right
and do not follow the way of the corruptors.

7:143.en_khattab: When Moses came at the appointed time
and his Lord spoke to him, he asked,
"My Lord! Reveal Yourself to me so I may see You."

7:143.qpc_hafs: قَالَ لَن تَرَىٰنِي وَلَٰكِنِ ٱنظُرۡ إِلَى ٱلۡجَبَلِ
7:143.en_khattab: Allah answered, "You cannot see Me! But look at the mountain.
If it remains firm in its place, only then will you see Me."

7:143.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا تَجَلَّىٰ رَبُّهُۥ لِلۡجَبَلِ جَعَلَهُۥ دَكّٗا
7:143.en_khattab: When his Lord appeared to the mountain, He levelled it to dust

7:143.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّآ أَفَاقَ قَالَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ
7:143.en_khattab: When he recovered, he cried, "Glory be to You! I turn to You in repentance
and I am the first of the believers."

7:144.qpc_hafs: إِنِّي ٱصۡطَفَيۡتُكَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِرِسَٰلَٰتِي وَبِكَلَٰمِي
7:144.en_khattab: I have ˹already˺ elevated you above all others by My messages and speech.

7:144.qpc_hafs: فَخُذۡ مَآ ءَاتَيۡتُكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
7:144.en_khattab: So hold firmly to what I have given you and be grateful.

7:145.en_khattab: We wrote for him on the Tablets

7:145.qpc_hafs: مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مَّوۡعِظَةٗ وَتَفۡصِيلٗا لِّكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ
7:145.en_khattab: ˹the fundamentals˺ of everything; commandments and explanations of all things. ˹We commanded,˺

7:145.qpc_hafs: فَخُذۡهَا بِقُوَّةٖ وَأۡمُرۡ قَوۡمَكَ يَأۡخُذُواْ بِأَحۡسَنِهَاۚ
7:145.en_khattab: “Hold to this firmly and ask your people to take the best of it.
I will soon show ˹all of˺ you the home of the rebellious.

7:146.qpc_hafs: سَأَصۡرِفُ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَكَبَّرُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ
7:146.en_khattab: I will turn away from My signs those who act unjustly with arrogance in the land.

7:146.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كُلَّ ءَايَةٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَا
7:146.en_khattab: And even if they were to see every sign, they still would not believe in them.

7:146.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ سَبِيلَ ٱلرُّشۡدِ لَا يَتَّخِذُوهُ سَبِيلٗا
7:146.en_khattab: If they see the Right Path, they will not take it.

7:146.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ سَبِيلَ ٱلۡغَيِّ يَتَّخِذُوهُ سَبِيلٗاۚ
7:146.en_khattab: But if they see a crooked path, they will follow it.

7:146.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا غَٰفِلِينَ
7:146.en_khattab: This is because they denied Our signs and were heedless of them.

7:147.en_khattab: The deeds of those who deny Our signs
and the meeting ˹with Allah˺ in the Hereafter will be in vain.

7:147.qpc_hafs: هَلۡ يُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
7:147.en_khattab: Will they be rewarded except for what they have done?”

7:148.qpc_hafs: وَٱتَّخَذَ قَوۡمُ مُوسَىٰ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِنۡ حُلِيِّهِمۡ عِجۡلٗا جَسَدٗا
7:148.en_khattab: In the absence of Moses, his people made from their ˹golden˺ jewellery an idol of a calf

7:148.qpc_hafs: لَّهُۥ خُوَارٌۚ أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّهُۥ لَا يُكَلِّمُهُمۡ وَلَا يَهۡدِيهِمۡ سَبِيلًاۘ
7:148.en_khattab: that made a lowing sound. Did they not see that it could neither speak to them nor guide them to the ˹Right˺ Path?
Still they took it as a god and were wrongdoers.

7:149.qpc_hafs: وَلَمَّا سُقِطَ فِيٓ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَرَأَوۡاْ أَنَّهُمۡ قَدۡ ضَلُّواْ
7:149.en_khattab: Later, when they were filled with remorse and realized they had gone astray,

7:149.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ يَرۡحَمۡنَا رَبُّنَا وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا
7:149.en_khattab: they cried, 'If our Lord does not have mercy on us and forgive us,

7:150.qpc_hafs: وَلَمَّا رَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ غَضۡبَٰنَ أَسِفٗا
7:150.en_khattab: Upon Moses’ return to his people, ˹totally˺ furious and sorrowful

7:150.qpc_hafs: قَالَ بِئۡسَمَا خَلَفۡتُمُونِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِيٓۖ أَعَجِلۡتُمۡ أَمۡرَ رَبِّكُمۡۖ
7:150.en_khattab: he said, “What an evil thing you committed in my absence! Did you want to hasten your Lord’s torment?”

7:150.qpc_hafs: وَأَلۡقَى ٱلۡأَلۡوَاحَ وَأَخَذَ بِرَأۡسِ أَخِيهِ يَجُرُّهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِۚ
7:150.en_khattab: Then he threw down the Tablets and grabbed his brother by the hair, dragging him closer.

7:150.qpc_hafs: قَالَ ٱبۡنَ أُمَّ إِنَّ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱسۡتَضۡعَفُونِي وَكَادُواْ يَقۡتُلُونَنِي فَلَا تُشۡمِتۡ بِيَ ٱلۡأَعۡدَآءَ
7:150.en_khattab: Aaron pleaded, “O son of my mother! The people overpowered me and were about to kill me. So do not ˹humiliate me and˺ make my enemies rejoice
nor count me among the wrongdoing people.

7:151.en_khattab: And admit us into Your mercy.
You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.

7:152.en_khattab: will certainly be afflicted with Allah’s wrath
as well as disgrace in the life of this world
This is how We reward those who invent falsehood.

7:153.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
7:153.en_khattab: your Lord will certainly be All-Forgiving, Most-Merciful.

7:154.en_khattab: whose text contained guidance and mercy for those who
stand in awe of their Lord.

7:155.qpc_hafs: وَٱخۡتَارَ مُوسَىٰ قَوۡمَهُۥ سَبۡعِينَ رَجُلٗا لِّمِيقَٰتِنَاۖ
7:155.en_khattab: Moses chose seventy men from among his people for Our appointment
and, when they were seized by an earthquake,

7:155.qpc_hafs: قَالَ رَبِّ لَوۡ شِئۡتَ أَهۡلَكۡتَهُم مِّن قَبۡلُ وَإِيَّٰيَۖ
7:155.en_khattab: he cried, 'My Lord! Had You willed, You could have destroyed them long ago, and me as well.
Will You destroy us for what the foolish among us have done?

7:155.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا فِتۡنَتُكَ تُضِلُّ بِهَا مَن تَشَآءُ وَتَهۡدِي مَن تَشَآءُۖ
7:155.en_khattab: This is only a test from You— by which You allow whoever you will to stray and guide whoever You will.

7:155.qpc_hafs: أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَٱرۡحَمۡنَاۖ وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡغَٰفِرِينَ
7:155.en_khattab: You are our Guardian. So forgive us and have mercy on us. You are the best forgiver.

7:156.qpc_hafs: وَٱكۡتُبۡ لَنَا فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗ
7:156.en_khattab: Ordain for us what is good in this life
and the next. Indeed, we have turned to You ˹in repentance˺.

7:156.qpc_hafs: قَالَ عَذَابِيٓ أُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَشَآءُۖ
7:156.en_khattab: Allah replied, “I will inflict My torment on whoever I will.

7:156.qpc_hafs: فَسَأَكۡتُبُهَا لِلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
7:156.en_khattab: I will ordain mercy for those who shun evil, pay alms-tax, and believe in Our revelations.

7:157.en_khattab: “˹They are˺ the ones who follow the Messenger, the unlettered Prophet,
whose description they find in their Torah
He commands them to do good and forbids them from evil,

7:157.qpc_hafs: وَيُحِلُّ لَهُمُ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَيُحَرِّمُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡخَبَٰٓئِثَ
7:157.en_khattab: permits for them what is lawful and forbids to them what is impure,

7:157.qpc_hafs: وَيَضَعُ عَنۡهُمۡ إِصۡرَهُمۡ وَٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلَ ٱلَّتِي كَانَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ
7:157.en_khattab: and relieves them from their burdens and the shackles that bound them.
˹Only˺ those who believe in him, honour and support him,
and follow the light sent down to him

7:158.en_khattab: I am Allah’s Messenger to you all.
To Him ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him.
He gives life and causes death.
So believe in Allah and His Messenger,
who believes in Allah and His revelations.

7:159.en_khattab: There are some among the people of Moses

7:160.en_khattab: We divided them into twelve tribes— each as a community.

7:160.qpc_hafs: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱسۡتَسۡقَىٰهُ قَوۡمُهُۥٓ
7:160.en_khattab: And We revealed to Moses, when his people asked for water

7:160.qpc_hafs: أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡحَجَرَۖ فَٱنۢبَجَسَتۡ مِنۡهُ ٱثۡنَتَا عَشۡرَةَ عَيۡنٗاۖ
7:160.en_khattab: "Strike the rock with your staff." Then twelve springs gushed out.
Each tribe knew its drinking place.

7:160.qpc_hafs: وَظَلَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡغَمَٰمَ وَأَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلۡوَىٰۖ
7:160.en_khattab: We shaded them with clouds and sent down to them manna and quails ˹saying˺,
"Eat from the good things We have provided for you."

7:160.qpc_hafs: وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
7:160.en_khattab: They ˹certainly˺ did not wrong Us, but wronged themselves.

7:161.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسۡكُنُواْ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةَ
7:161.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when it was said to them, “Enter this city ˹of Jerusalem˺
and eat from wherever you please.
and enter the gate with humility.
We will multiply the reward for the good-doers.

7:162.en_khattab: But the wrongdoers among them changed the words they were commanded to say.
So We sent down a punishment from the heavens upon them

7:163.qpc_hafs: وَسۡـَٔلۡهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِي كَانَتۡ حَاضِرَةَ ٱلۡبَحۡرِ
7:163.en_khattab: Ask them ˹O Prophet˺ about ˹the people of˺ the town which was by the sea,

7:163.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ تَأۡتِيهِمۡ حِيتَانُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ سَبۡتِهِمۡ شُرَّعٗا
7:163.en_khattab: During the Sabbath, ˹abundant˺ fish would come to them clearly visible,
but on other days the fish were never seen.
In this way We tested them for their rebelliousness.

7:164.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ قَالَتۡ أُمَّةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ لِمَ تَعِظُونَ قَوۡمًا
7:164.en_khattab: When some of ˹the righteous among˺ them questioned ˹their fellow Sabbath-keepers˺,

7:164.qpc_hafs: ٱللَّهُ مُهۡلِكُهُمۡ أَوۡ مُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗاۖ
7:164.en_khattab: “Why do you ˹bother to˺ warn those ˹Sabbath-breakers˺ who will either be destroyed or severely punished by Allah?”

7:164.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ مَعۡذِرَةً إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
7:164.en_khattab: They replied, “Just to be free from your Lord’s blame, and so perhaps they may abstain.”

7:165.en_khattab: When they ignored the warning they were given,
We rescued those who used to warn against evil
and overtook the wrongdoers with a dreadful punishment

7:166.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا عَتَوۡاْ عَن مَّا نُهُواْ عَنۡهُ
7:166.en_khattab: But when they stubbornly persisted in violation

7:167.en_khattab: And ˹remember, O Prophet,˺ when your Lord declared
that He would send against them others who would make them suffer terribly until the Day of Judgment.
who would make them suffer terribly until the Day of Judgment
Indeed, your Lord is swift in punishment,
but He is certainly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

7:168.en_khattab: We dispersed them through the land

7:168.qpc_hafs: أُمَمٗاۖ مِّنۡهُمُ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنۡهُمۡ دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ
7:168.en_khattab: in groups— some were righteous, others were less so.
We tested them with prosperity and adversity,
so perhaps they would return ˹to the Right Path˺.

7:169.qpc_hafs: فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٞ وَرِثُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ
7:169.en_khattab: Then they were succeeded by other generations who inherited the Scripture.

7:169.qpc_hafs: يَأۡخُذُونَ عَرَضَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ وَيَقُولُونَ سَيُغۡفَرُ لَنَا
7:169.en_khattab: They indulged in unlawful gains, claiming, “We will be forgiven ˹after all˺.”
And if similar gain came their way, they would seize it.
Was a covenant not taken from them in the Scripture

7:169.qpc_hafs: أَن لَّا يَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّ وَدَرَسُواْ مَا فِيهِۗ
7:169.en_khattab: that they would not say anything about Allah except the truth? And they were already well-versed in its teachings.
But the ˹eternal˺ Home of the Hereafter is far better for those mindful ˹of Allah˺.

7:170.en_khattab: As for those who firmly abide by the Scripture
surely We never discount the reward of those acting righteously.

7:171.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ نَتَقۡنَا ٱلۡجَبَلَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٞ
7:171.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when We raised the mountain over them as if it were a cloud
and they thought it would fall on them. ˹We said,˺

7:171.qpc_hafs: خُذُواْ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكُم بِقُوَّةٖ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ مَا فِيهِ
7:171.en_khattab: “Hold firmly to that ˹Scripture˺ which We have given you and observe its teachings
so perhaps you will become mindful ˹of Allah˺.”

7:172.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ مِن ظُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ
7:172.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when your Lord brought forth from the loins of the children of Adam their descendants
and had them testify regarding themselves.
Allah asked,˺ “Am I not your Lord?” They replied, “Yes, You are! We testify.”

7:172.qpc_hafs: أَن تَقُولُواْ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ إِنَّا كُنَّا عَنۡ هَٰذَا غَٰفِلِينَ
7:172.en_khattab: ˹He cautioned,˺ “Now you have no right to say on Judgment Day, ‘We were not aware of this.’

7:173.en_khattab: It was our forefathers who had associated
Allah in worship˺ and we, as their descendants,
followed in their footsteps. Will you then destroy us for the falsehood they invented?’”

7:174.en_khattab: so perhaps they will return ˹to the Right Path˺.

7:175.en_khattab: the story of the one to whom We gave Our signs
so Satan took hold of him

7:176.en_khattab: If We had willed, We would have elevated him with Our signs,

7:176.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِنَّهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُۚ
7:176.en_khattab: but he clung to this life— following his evil desires.

7:176.qpc_hafs: فَمَثَلُهُۥ كَمَثَلِ ٱلۡكَلۡبِ إِن تَحۡمِلۡ عَلَيۡهِ يَلۡهَثۡ أَوۡ تَتۡرُكۡهُ يَلۡهَثۚ
7:176.en_khattab: His example is that of a dog: if you chase it away, it pants, and if you leave it, it ˹still˺ pants.

7:176.qpc_hafs: ذَّٰلِكَ مَثَلُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَاۚ
7:176.en_khattab: This is the example of the people who deny Our signs.
So narrate ˹to them˺ stories ˹of the past˺, so perhaps they will reflect.

7:177.en_khattab: of those who denied Our signs

7:178.en_khattab: And whoever He leaves to stray

7:179.en_khattab: many jinn and humans for Hell
They have hearts they do not understand with
eyes they do not see with
and ears they do not hear with
In fact, they are even less guided

7:180.en_khattab: Allah has the Most Beautiful Names.
So call upon Him by them,
and keep away from those who abuse His Names.
They will be punished for what they used to do.

7:181.en_khattab: is a group that guides with the truth

7:182.en_khattab: As for those who deny Our signs
to destruction in ways they cannot comprehend

7:183.en_khattab: for a while, but My planning is flawless.

7:184.en_khattab: Have they not ever given it a thought?
Their fellow man is not insane.
He is only sent with a clear warning.

7:185.en_khattab: Have they ever reflected on the wonders of the heavens

7:185.qpc_hafs: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٖ
7:185.en_khattab: and the earth, and everything Allah has created

7:185.qpc_hafs: وَأَنۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ قَدِ ٱقۡتَرَبَ
7:185.en_khattab: and that perhaps their end is near
So what message after this ˹Quran˺ would they believe in

7:186.en_khattab: leaving them to wander blindly in their defiance.

7:187.en_khattab: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding the Hour, “When will it be?”
Say, “That knowledge is only with my Lord.
He alone will reveal it when the time comes.
It is too tremendous for the heavens and the earth
and will only take you by surprise.”
They ask you as if you had full knowledge of it.
Say, “That knowledge is only with Allah,
but most people do not know.”

7:188.qpc_hafs: قُل لَّآ أَمۡلِكُ لِنَفۡسِي نَفۡعٗا وَلَا ضَرًّا
7:188.en_khattab: Say, “I have no power to benefit or protect myself,
except by the Will of Allah.

7:188.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ كُنتُ أَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ لَٱسۡتَكۡثَرۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ
7:188.en_khattab: If I had known the unknown, I would have benefited myself enormously,
and no harm would have ever touched me.

7:188.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
7:188.en_khattab: I am only a warner and deliverer of good news for those who believe.

7:189.en_khattab: He is the One Who created you from a single soul,

7:189.qpc_hafs: وَٰحِدَةٖ وَجَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا لِيَسۡكُنَ إِلَيۡهَاۖ
7:189.en_khattab: then from it made its spouse so he may find comfort in her.
After he had been united with her, she carried a light burden
When it grew heavy, they prayed to Allah, their Lord,

7:190.en_khattab: But when He granted their descendants good offspring
they associated false gods in what He has given them
Exalted is Allah above what they associate ˹with Him˺!

7:191.en_khattab: with Allah those ˹idols˺ which cannot create anything,

7:193.en_khattab: And if you ˹idolaters˺ call upon them for guidance,
It is all the same whether you

7:194.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ

7:194.en_khattab: and see if they will answer you,

7:195.en_khattab: Do they have feet to walk with?

7:195.qpc_hafs: قُلِ ٱدۡعُواْ شُرَكَآءَكُمۡ ثُمَّ كِيدُونِ فَلَا تُنظِرُونِ
7:195.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Call upon your associate-gods and conspire against me without delay!

7:197.en_khattab: But those ˹false gods˺ you call besides Him

7:198.en_khattab: If you ˹idolaters˺ call them to guidance
And you ˹O Prophet˺ may see them facing towards you

7:199.en_khattab: and turn away from those who act ignorantly.

7:201.en_khattab: Indeed, when Satan whispers to those mindful
then they start to see ˹things˺ clearly.

7:203.en_khattab: If you ˹O Prophet˺ do not bring them a sign ˹which they demanded˺
they ask, “Why do you not make it yourself?”

7:203.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَتَّبِعُ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ مِن رَّبِّيۚ
7:203.en_khattab: Say, “I only follow what is revealed to me from my Lord.

7:203.qpc_hafs: هَٰذَا بَصَآئِرُ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
7:203.en_khattab: This ˹Quran˺ is an insight from your Lord— a guide and a mercy for those who believe.

7:204.en_khattab: so you may be shown mercy.

7:205.en_khattab: Remember your Lord inwardly with humility
and in a moderate tone of voice
And do not be one of the heedless

7:206.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِهِۦ
7:206.en_khattab: Surely those ˹angels˺ nearest to your Lord are not too proud to worship Him.

8:1.en_khattab: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding the spoils of war.
Say, “Their distribution is decided by Allah and His Messenger.
So be mindful of Allah, settle your affairs,

8:1.qpc_hafs: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
8:1.en_khattab: and obey Allah and His Messenger if you are ˹true˺ believers.

8:2.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ
8:2.en_khattab: those whose hearts tremble at the remembrance of Allah

8:2.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا تُلِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ زَادَتۡهُمۡ إِيمَٰنٗا
8:2.en_khattab: whose faith increases when His revelations are recited to them
and who put their trust in their Lord.

8:3.en_khattab: and donate from what We have provided for them

8:4.en_khattab: It is they who are the true believers.

8:5.en_khattab: Similarly, when your Lord brought you
˹O Prophet˺ out of your home for a just cause

8:6.en_khattab: They disputed with you about the truth
after it had been made clear
as if they were being driven to death

8:7.en_khattab: ˹Remember, O  believers,˺ when Allah promised ˹to give˺ you the upper hand over either target
you wished to capture the unarmed party

8:7.qpc_hafs: وَتَوَدُّونَ أَنَّ غَيۡرَ ذَاتِ ٱلشَّوۡكَةِ تَكُونُ لَكُمۡ
8:7.en_khattab: But it was Allah’s Will to establish the truth by His Words

8:7.qpc_hafs: وَيُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَيَقۡطَعَ دَابِرَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

8:8.en_khattab: even to the dismay of the wicked

8:9.en_khattab: I will reinforce you with a thousand

8:10.en_khattab: And Allah made this a sign of victory

8:10.qpc_hafs: وَمَا ٱلنَّصۡرُ إِلَّا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۚ

8:11.en_khattab: ˹Remember˺ when He caused drowsiness to overcome you
And He sent down rain from the sky

8:12.en_khattab: [Remember, O Prophet], when your Lord revealed
So make the believers stand firm.

8:12.qpc_hafs: سَأُلۡقِي فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلرُّعۡبَ
8:12.en_khattab: I will cast horror into the hearts of the disbelievers.

8:13.en_khattab: And whoever defies Allah and His Messenger,
then ˹know that˺ Allah is surely severe in punishment.

8:14.en_khattab: That ˹worldly punishment˺ is yours, so taste it!
Then the disbelievers will suffer the torment of the Fire.

8:15.en_khattab: When you face the disbelievers in battle,
never turn your backs to them.

8:16.en_khattab: And whoever does so on such an occasion

8:16.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا مُتَحَرِّفٗا لِّقِتَالٍ أَوۡ مُتَحَيِّزًا إِلَىٰ فِئَةٖ
8:16.en_khattab: unless it is a manoeuvre or to join their own troops

8:16.qpc_hafs: فَقَدۡ بَآءَ بِغَضَبٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
8:16.en_khattab: will earn the displeasure of Allah, and their home will be Hell. What an evil destination!

8:17.en_khattab: It was not you ˹believers˺ who killed them, but it was Allah Who did so.

8:17.qpc_hafs: وَمَا رَمَيۡتَ إِذۡ رَمَيۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَمَىٰ
8:17.en_khattab: Nor was it you ˹O Prophet˺ who threw ˹a handful of sand at the disbelievers˺, but it was Allah Who did so.
rendering the believers a great favour.

8:18.en_khattab: Allah frustrates the evil plans of the disbelievers.

8:19.en_khattab: If you ˹Meccans˺ sought judgment, now it has come to you.
And if you cease, it will be for your own good.
But if you persist, We will persist.

8:19.qpc_hafs: وَلَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنكُمۡ فِئَتُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَوۡ كَثُرَتۡ
8:19.en_khattab: And your forces— no matter how numerous they might be— will not benefit you whatsoever.
For Allah is certainly with the believers.

8:20.en_khattab: and do not turn away from him

8:21.en_khattab: but in fact they are not listening.

8:22.en_khattab: Indeed, the worst of all beings

8:23.en_khattab: Had Allah known any goodness in them
He would have certainly made them hear ˹But˺
even if He had made them hear
they would have surely turned away heedlessly

8:24.qpc_hafs: ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ لِمَا يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ
8:24.en_khattab: Respond to Allah and His Messenger when he calls you to that which gives you life.

8:24.qpc_hafs: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَرۡءِ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ
8:24.en_khattab: And know that Allah stands between a person and their heart.
And that to Him you will all be gathered.

8:25.qpc_hafs: لَّا تُصِيبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنكُمۡ خَآصَّةٗۖ
8:25.en_khattab: that will not only affect the wrongdoers among you.
And know that Allah is severe in punishment.

8:26.en_khattab: Remember when you had been vastly outnumbered and oppressed

8:26.qpc_hafs: فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تَخَافُونَ أَن يَتَخَطَّفَكُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ
8:26.en_khattab: in the land, constantly in fear of attacks by your enemy
then He sheltered you, strengthened you with His help
and provided you with good things so perhaps you would be thankful

8:27.en_khattab: Do not betray Allah and the Messenger,

8:28.en_khattab: that your wealth and your children are only a test
and that with Allah is a great reward.

8:29.en_khattab: If you are mindful of Allah
He will grant you a standard ˹to distinguish between right and wrong˺
And Allah is the Lord of infinite bounty.

8:30.en_khattab: And ˹remember, O  Prophet,˺ when the disbelievers
conspired to capture, kill, or exile you.
They planned, but Allah also planned.
And Allah is the best of planners.

8:31.en_khattab: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them
they challenge ˹you˺, “We have already heard ˹the recitation˺
If we wanted, we could have easily produced something similar
This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but ancient fables!

8:32.qpc_hafs: إِن كَانَ هَٰذَا هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ مِنۡ عِندِكَ
8:32.en_khattab: “O Allah! If this is indeed the truth from You,
then rain down stones upon us from the sky
or overcome us with a painful punishment.

8:33.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ
8:33.en_khattab: But Allah would never punish them while you ˹O Prophet˺ were in their midst.

8:33.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
8:33.en_khattab: Nor would He ever punish them if they prayed for forgiveness.

8:34.en_khattab: And why should Allah not punish them
while they hinder pilgrims from the Sacred Mosque
claiming to be its rightful guardians?
None has the right to guardianship except those mindful ˹of Allah˺
but most pagans do not know.

8:35.en_khattab: Their prayer at the Sacred House
was nothing but whistling and clapping

8:36.en_khattab: to hinder others from the Path of Allah
and the disbelievers will be driven into Hell

8:37.en_khattab: so Allah may separate the evil from the good.
He will pile up the evil ones
all together and then cast them
into Hell. They are the ˹true˺ losers.

8:38.qpc_hafs: إِن يَنتَهُواْ يُغۡفَرۡ لَهُم مَّا قَدۡ سَلَفَ
8:38.en_khattab: that if they desist, their past will be forgiven.

8:38.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَعُودُواْ فَقَدۡ مَضَتۡ سُنَّتُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
8:38.en_khattab: But if they persist, then they have an example in those destroyed before them.

8:39.en_khattab: until there is no more persecution
And ˹your˺ devotion will be entirely to Allah
then surely Allah is All-Seeing of what they do

8:40.en_khattab: And if they do not comply,

8:41.en_khattab: Know that whatever spoils you take,

8:41.qpc_hafs: وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
8:41.en_khattab: and the Messenger, his close relatives, orphans, the poor, and ˹needy˺ travellers

8:41.qpc_hafs: إِن كُنتُمۡ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانِ
8:41.en_khattab: if you ˹truly˺ believe in Allah and what We revealed to Our servant on that decisive day
when the two armies met ˹at Badr˺.
And Allah is Most Capable of everything.

8:42.en_khattab: ˹Remember˺ when you were on the near side of the valley,
your enemy on the far side,
and the caravan was below you.
Even if the two armies had made an appointment ˹to meet˺,

8:42.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِن لِّيَقۡضِيَ ٱللَّهُ أَمۡرٗا كَانَ مَفۡعُولٗا
8:42.en_khattab: would have certainly missed it. Still it transpired so Allah may establish what He had destined—

8:42.qpc_hafs: لِّيَهۡلِكَ مَنۡ هَلَكَ عَنۢ بَيِّنَةٖ وَيَحۡيَىٰ مَنۡ حَيَّ عَنۢ بَيِّنَةٖۗ
8:42.en_khattab: that those who were to perish and those who were to survive might do so after the truth had been made clear to both.

8:43.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ يُرِيكَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي مَنَامِكَ قَلِيلٗاۖ
8:43.en_khattab: ˹Remember, O  Prophet,˺ when Allah showed them in your dream as few in number.

8:43.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَرَىٰكَهُمۡ كَثِيرٗا لَّفَشِلۡتُمۡ وَلَتَنَٰزَعۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡرِ
8:43.en_khattab: Had He shown them to you as many, you ˹believers˺ would have certainly faltered and disputed in the matter.

8:43.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَلَّمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
8:43.en_khattab: But Allah spared you ˹from that˺. Surely He knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

8:44.en_khattab: Allah made them appear as few in your eyes
and made you appear as few in theirs
so Allah may establish what He had destined
And to Allah ˹all˺ matters will be returned ˹for judgment˺

8:46.en_khattab: and do not dispute with one another, or you would be discouraged and weakened
Surely Allah is with those who persevere

8:47.qpc_hafs: كَٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِم بَطَرٗا وَرِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ
8:47.en_khattab: like those ˹pagans˺ who left their homes arrogantly, only to be seen by people
and to hinder others from Allah’s Path
And Allah is Fully Aware of what they do

8:48.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when Satan made their ˹evil˺ deeds appealing to them,

8:48.qpc_hafs: وَقَالَ لَا غَالِبَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ
8:48.en_khattab: and said, “No one can overcome you today.
I am surely by your side.”
But when the two forces faced off,
and said, “I have absolutely nothing to do with you.
I certainly see what you do not see.
for Allah is severe in punishment.”

8:49.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ غَرَّ
8:49.en_khattab: ˹Remember˺ when the hypocrites and those with sickness in their hearts said,
But whoever puts their trust in Allah,

8:50.en_khattab: when the angels take the souls of the disbelievers

8:51.en_khattab: This is ˹the reward˺ for what your hands have done.

8:52.qpc_hafs: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ
8:52.en_khattab: Their fate is that of the people of Pharaoh and those before them
they all disbelieved in Allah’s signs
so Allah seized them for their sins
Indeed, Allah is All-Powerful, severe in punishment

8:53.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمۡ يَكُ مُغَيِّرٗا نِّعۡمَةً
8:53.en_khattab: This is because Allah would never discontinue His favour

8:53.qpc_hafs: أَنۡعَمَهَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُواْ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ
8:53.en_khattab: to a people until they discontinue their faith

8:54.qpc_hafs: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ
8:54.en_khattab: That was the case with Pharaoh’s people and those before them
they all rejected the signs of their Lord
so We destroyed them for their sins

8:55.en_khattab: Indeed, the worst of all beings in the sight of Allah
are those who persist in disbelief,

8:56.en_khattab: ˹namely˺ those with whom you ˹O Prophet˺ have entered into treaties,

8:56.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ مَرَّةٖ
8:56.en_khattab: but they violate them every time,

8:57.en_khattab: make a fearsome example of them,
so perhaps those who would follow them

8:58.en_khattab: And if you ˹O Prophet˺ see signs of betrayal by a people,
respond by openly terminating your treaty with them.
Surely Allah does not like those who betray.

8:59.en_khattab: Do not let those disbelievers think they are not within reach.

8:60.qpc_hafs: وَأَعِدُّواْ لَهُم مَّا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن قُوَّةٖ
8:60.en_khattab: Prepare against them what you ˹believers˺ can of ˹military˺ power

8:60.qpc_hafs: وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلۡخَيۡلِ تُرۡهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمۡ وَءَاخَرِينَ مِن دُونِهِمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُهُمۡۚ
8:60.en_khattab: and cavalry to deter Allah’s enemies and your enemies as well as other enemies unknown to you but known to Allah

8:60.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيۡكُمۡ
8:60.en_khattab: Whatever you spend in the cause of Allah will be paid to you in full
and you will not be wronged

8:61.en_khattab: If the enemy is inclined towards peace,
And put your trust in Allah.
Indeed, He ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

8:62.en_khattab: But if their intention is only to deceive you,
then Allah is certainly sufficient for you.
He is the One Who has supported you with His help

8:63.qpc_hafs: لَوۡ أَنفَقۡتَ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مَّآ أَلَّفۡتَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡ
8:63.en_khattab: Had you spent all the riches in the earth, you could not have united their hearts.

8:64.en_khattab: and for the believers who follow you

8:65.qpc_hafs: إِن يَكُن مِّنكُمۡ عِشۡرُونَ صَٰبِرُونَ يَغۡلِبُواْ مِاْئَتَيۡنِۚ
8:65.en_khattab: If there are twenty steadfast among you, they will overcome two hundred.

8:65.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّاْئَةٞ يَغۡلِبُوٓاْ أَلۡفٗا
8:65.en_khattab: And if there are one hundred of you, they will overcome one thousand.

8:65.qpc_hafs: مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ
8:65.en_khattab: of the disbelievers, for they are a people who do not comprehend.

8:66.en_khattab: Now Allah has lightened your burden,
for He knows that there is weakness in you.

8:66.qpc_hafs: فَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّاْئَةٞ صَابِرَةٞ يَغۡلِبُواْ مِاْئَتَيۡنِۚ
8:66.en_khattab: So if there are a hundred steadfast among you, they will overcome two hundred.

8:66.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُمۡ أَلۡفٞ يَغۡلِبُوٓاْ أَلۡفَيۡنِ بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۗ
8:66.en_khattab: And if there be one thousand, they will overcome two thousand, by Allah’s Will.
And Allah is with the steadfast.

8:67.qpc_hafs: مَا كَانَ لِنَبِيٍّ أَن يَكُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَسۡرَىٰ
8:67.en_khattab: It is not fit for a prophet that he should take captives
until he has thoroughly subdued the land.
You ˹believers˺ settled with the fleeting gains of this world,
while Allah’s aim ˹for you˺ is the Hereafter.

8:68.en_khattab: Had it not been for a prior decree from Allah,
you would have certainly been disciplined with a tremendous punishment for whatever ransom you have taken.

8:69.en_khattab: Now enjoy what you have taken,
for it is lawful and good.
Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

8:70.qpc_hafs: قُل لِّمَن فِيٓ أَيۡدِيكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَسۡرَىٰٓ
8:70.en_khattab: Tell the captives in your custody,

8:70.qpc_hafs: إِن يَعۡلَمِ ٱللَّهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡ خَيۡرٗا
8:70.en_khattab: If Allah finds goodness in your hearts,
He will give you better than what has been taken from you
and forgive you. For Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

8:71.en_khattab: But if their intention is only to betray you ˹O Prophet˺,
they sought to betray Allah before.
But He gave you power over them.

8:72.qpc_hafs: وَجَٰهَدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
8:72.en_khattab: and strived with their wealth and lives in the cause of Allah,
as well as those who gave them shelter and help
they are truly guardians of one another.
As for those who believed but did not emigrate,

8:72.qpc_hafs: مَا لَكُم مِّن وَلَٰيَتِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٍ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُواْۚ
8:72.en_khattab: you have no obligations to them until they emigrate.
But if they seek your help ˹against persecution˺ in faith,

8:72.qpc_hafs: فَعَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلنَّصۡرُ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِۭ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُم مِّيثَٰقٞۗ
8:72.en_khattab: it is your obligation to help them, except against people bound with you in a treaty.
Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

8:73.en_khattab: they are guardians of one another.
there will be great oppression and corruption in the land.

8:74.en_khattab: and struggled in the cause of Allah,
and those who gave ˹them˺ shelter and help,
They will have forgiveness and an honourable provision.

8:75.en_khattab: But only blood relatives are now entitled to inherit from one another,
Surely Allah has ˹full˺ knowledge of everything.

9:1.en_khattab: ˹This is˺ a discharge from all obligations, by Allah and His Messenger,
to the polytheists you ˹believers˺ have entered into treaties with:

9:2.en_khattab: You ˹polytheists˺ may travel freely through the land for four months,
but know that you will have no escape from Allah,
and that Allah will disgrace the disbelievers.

9:3.qpc_hafs: وَأَذَٰنٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَجِّ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ
9:3.en_khattab: A declaration from Allah and His Messenger ˹is made˺ to all people on the day of the greater pilgrimage

9:3.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَرَسُولُهُۥۚ
9:3.en_khattab: that Allah and His Messenger are free of the polytheists
So if you ˹pagans˺ repent, it will be better for you

9:3.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِي ٱللَّهِۗ
9:3.en_khattab: But if you turn away, then know that you will have no escape from Allah
And give good news ˹O Prophet˺ to the disbelievers of a painful punishment

9:4.en_khattab: As for the polytheists who have honoured

9:4.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَنقُصُوكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَمۡ يُظَٰهِرُواْ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَحَدٗا
9:4.en_khattab: every term of their treaty with you and have not supported an enemy against you,
honour your treaty with them until the end of its term.
Surely Allah loves those who are mindful ˹of Him˺.

9:5.en_khattab: But once the Sacred Months have passed
kill the polytheists ˹who violated their treaties˺ wherever you find them
and lie in wait for them on every way

9:5.qpc_hafs: فَإِن تَابُواْ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَخَلُّواْ سَبِيلَهُمۡۚ
9:5.en_khattab: But if they repent, perform prayers, and pay alms-tax, then set them free
Indeed, Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

9:6.en_khattab: And if anyone from the polytheists asks for your protection ˹O Prophet˺,
grant it to them so they may hear the Word of Allah
then escort them to a place of safety
for they are a people who have no knowledge

9:7.qpc_hafs: كَيۡفَ يَكُونُ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ عَهۡدٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَعِندَ رَسُولِهِۦٓ
9:7.en_khattab: How can such polytheists have a treaty with Allah and His Messenger,

9:7.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّمۡ عِندَ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِۖ
9:7.en_khattab: except those you have made a treaty with at the Sacred Mosque?
So, as long as they are true to you, be true to them.
Indeed Allah loves those who are mindful ˹of Him˺.

9:8.qpc_hafs: لَا يَرۡقُبُواْ فِيكُمۡ إِلّٗا وَلَا ذِمَّةٗۚ
9:8.en_khattab: If they were to have the upper hand over you, they would have no respect for kinship or treaty.
They only flatter you with their tongues,
but their hearts are in denial, and most of them are rebellious.

9:9.en_khattab: They chose a fleeting gain over Allah’s revelations
Evil indeed is what they have done!

9:10.en_khattab: They do not honour the bonds of kinship
It is they who are the transgressors

9:11.en_khattab: then they are your brothers in faith.
This is how We make the revelations clear

9:12.qpc_hafs: وَإِن نَّكَثُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ عَهۡدِهِمۡ
9:12.en_khattab: But if they break their oaths after making a pledge
then fight the champions of disbelief—

9:13.en_khattab: Will you not fight those who have broken their oaths?
Conspired to expel the Messenger ˹from Mecca˺

9:13.qpc_hafs: فَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخۡشَوۡهُ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
9:13.en_khattab: Allah is more deserving of your fear, if you are ˹true˺ believers

9:14.en_khattab: and Allah will punish them at your hands
and soothe the hearts of the believers—

9:15.en_khattab: And Allah pardons whoever He wills.

9:16.en_khattab: and never takes trusted allies other than Allah
And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

9:17.qpc_hafs: مَا كَانَ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ أَن يَعۡمُرُواْ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ
9:17.en_khattab: It is not for the polytheists to maintain the mosques of Allah
and they will be in the Fire forever

9:18.en_khattab: The mosques of Allah should only be maintained

9:18.qpc_hafs: مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَأَقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَى ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ
9:18.en_khattab: by those who believe in Allah and the Last Day, establish prayer, pay alms-tax,

9:18.qpc_hafs: فَعَسَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَن يَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
9:18.en_khattab: It is right to hope that they will be among the ˹truly˺ guided.

9:19.qpc_hafs: أَجَعَلۡتُمۡ سِقَايَةَ ٱلۡحَآجِّ وَعِمَارَةَ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ
9:19.en_khattab: Do you ˹pagans˺ consider providing the pilgrims with water and maintaining the Sacred Mosque
as equal to believing in Allah and the Last Day
and struggling in the cause of Allah?
They are not equal in Allah’s sight.
And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

9:20.qpc_hafs: وَجَٰهَدُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ
9:20.en_khattab: and strived in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives
are greater in rank in the sight of Allah.
It is they who will triumph.

9:21.en_khattab: Their Lord gives them good news

9:22.en_khattab: to stay there for ever and ever.
Surely with Allah is a great reward.

9:23.en_khattab: Do not take your parents and siblings as trusted allies
if they choose disbelief over belief.
And whoever of you does so

9:24.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِن كَانَ ءَابَآؤُكُمۡ وَأَبۡنَآؤُكُمۡ وَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُكُمۡ
9:24.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “If your parents and children and siblings and spouses

9:24.qpc_hafs: وَعَشِيرَتُكُمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلٌ ٱقۡتَرَفۡتُمُوهَا وَتِجَٰرَةٞ تَخۡشَوۡنَ كَسَادَهَا
9:24.en_khattab: and extended family and the wealth you have acquired and the trade you fear will decline

9:24.qpc_hafs: أَحَبَّ إِلَيۡكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَجِهَادٖ فِي سَبِيلِهِۦ
9:24.en_khattab: cherish—˹if all these˺ are more beloved to you than Allah and His Messenger and struggling in His Way,
then wait until Allah brings about His Will.
Allah does not guide the rebellious people.”

9:25.en_khattab: Indeed Allah has given you ˹believers˺ victory
even at the Battle of Ḥunain
when you took pride in your great numbers,
but they proved of no advantage to you.
The earth, despite its vastness, seemed to close in on you,
then you turned back in retreat.

9:26.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ
9:26.en_khattab: Then Allah sent down His reassurance upon His Messenger
and sent down forces you could not see
Such was the reward of the disbelievers

9:27.qpc_hafs: مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ
9:27.en_khattab: will turn in grace to whoever He wills.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

9:28.qpc_hafs: فَلَا يَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدَ ٱلۡحَرَامَ بَعۡدَ عَامِهِمۡ هَٰذَاۚ
9:28.en_khattab: so they should not approach the Sacred Mosque after this year.

9:28.qpc_hafs: فَسَوۡفَ يُغۡنِيكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓ إِن شَآءَۚ
9:28.en_khattab: Allah will enrich you out of His bounty, if He wills.

9:29.qpc_hafs: قَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَلَا بِٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَلَا يُحَرِّمُونَ مَا حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَلَا يَدِينُونَ دِينَ ٱلۡحَقِّ
9:29.en_khattab: Fight those who do not believe in Allah and the Last Day, nor comply with what Allah and His Messenger have forbidden, nor embrace the religion of truth
from among those who were given the Scripture,

9:29.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰ يُعۡطُواْ ٱلۡجِزۡيَةَ عَن يَدٖ وَهُمۡ صَٰغِرُونَ
9:29.en_khattab: until they pay the tax, willingly submitting, fully humbled.

9:30.en_khattab: The Jews say, “Ezra is the son of Allah,”
while the Christians say, “The Messiah is the son of Allah.”
Such are their baseless assertions, only parroting the words

9:30.qpc_hafs: يُضَٰهِـُٔونَ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَبۡلُۚ

9:30.en_khattab: May Allah condemn them! How can they be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

9:31.en_khattab: They have taken their rabbis and monks as well as

9:31.qpc_hafs: مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَسِيحَ ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ
9:31.en_khattab: the Messiah, son of Mary, as lords besides Allah,

9:31.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدٗاۖ
9:31.en_khattab: even though they were commanded to worship none but One God.
There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. Glorified is He

9:32.qpc_hafs: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ
9:32.en_khattab: They wish to extinguish Allah’s light with their mouths

9:32.qpc_hafs: وَيَأۡبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّآ أَن يُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ
9:32.en_khattab: but Allah will only allow His light to be perfected
even to the dismay of the disbelievers

9:33.en_khattab: has sent His Messenger with ˹true˺ guidance and the religion of truth
making it prevail over all others
even to the dismay of the polytheists.

9:34.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡبَارِ وَٱلرُّهۡبَانِ لَيَأۡكُلُونَ أَمۡوَٰلَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۗ
9:34.en_khattab: Indeed, many rabbis and monks consume people’s wealth wrongfully and hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah.

9:34.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡنِزُونَ ٱلذَّهَبَ وَٱلۡفِضَّةَ وَلَا يُنفِقُونَهَا فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
9:34.en_khattab: a painful torment to those who hoard gold and silver and do not spend it in Allah’s cause.
Give good news of a painful torment to them.

9:35.en_khattab: be heated up in the Fire of Hell,
and their foreheads, sides, and backs branded with it. ˹It
be said to them,˺ “This is the treasure you hoarded for yourselves.

9:36.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ عِدَّةَ ٱلشُّهُورِ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱثۡنَا عَشَرَ شَهۡرٗا
9:36.en_khattab: Indeed, the number of months ordained by Allah is twelve

9:36.qpc_hafs: فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ يَوۡمَ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ
9:36.en_khattab: in Allah’s Record since the day He created the heavens and the earth
So do not wrong one another during these months

9:36.qpc_hafs: وَقَٰتِلُواْ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ كَآفَّةٗ كَمَا يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ كَآفَّةٗۚ
9:36.en_khattab: And together fight the polytheists as they fight against you together
And know that Allah is with those mindful ˹of Him˺

9:37.en_khattab: Reallocating the sanctity of ˹these˺ months is an increase in disbelief,
by which the disbelievers are led ˹far˺ astray.
They adjust the sanctity one year
only to maintain the number of months sanctified by Allah,
violating the very months Allah has made sacred.
Their evil deeds have been made appealing to them.
And Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.

9:38.qpc_hafs: مَا لَكُمۡ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمُ ٱنفِرُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
9:38.en_khattab: What is the matter with you that when you are asked to march forth in the cause of Allah
Do you prefer the life of this world over the Hereafter?

9:38.qpc_hafs: فَمَا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ
9:38.en_khattab: The enjoyment of this worldly life is insignificant compared to that of the Hereafter.

9:39.en_khattab: If you do not march forth,
He will afflict you with a painful torment
and replace you with other people
You are not harming Him in the least.
And Allah is Most Capable of everything.

9:40.en_khattab: ˹It does not matter˺ if you ˹believers˺ do not support him,
for Allah did in fact support him
when the disbelievers drove him out ˹of Mecca˺
and he was only one of two.
While they both were in the cave
he reassured his companion, 'Do not worry;
So Allah sent down His serenity upon the Prophet,
supported him with forces you ˹believers˺ did not see,
and made the word of the disbelievers lowest,
while the Word of Allah is supreme.

9:41.en_khattab: ˹O believers!˺ March forth whether it is easy
with your wealth and your lives

9:42.en_khattab: Had the gain been within reach
they would have followed you, but the distance seemed too long for them

9:42.qpc_hafs: وَسَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ لَوِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡنَا لَخَرَجۡنَا مَعَكُمۡ
9:42.en_khattab: And they will swear by Allah, 'Had we been able, we would have certainly joined you.'
And Allah knows that they are surely lying

9:43.en_khattab: Why did you give them permission ˹to stay behind˺

9:43.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَتَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
9:43.en_khattab: before those who told the truth were distinguished from those who were lying?

9:44.qpc_hafs: لَا يَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ
9:44.en_khattab: Those who believe in Allah and the Last Day
do not ask for exemption from striving with their wealth and their lives
And Allah has perfect knowledge of those who are mindful ˹of Him˺

9:45.en_khattab: No one would ask for exemption except

9:45.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ
9:45.en_khattab: those who have no faith in Allah or the Last Day,
and whose hearts are in doubt,
so they are torn by their doubts.

9:46.en_khattab: Had they ˹really˺ intended to march forth
they would have made preparations for it
But Allah disliked that they should go
so He let them lag behind
and it was said ˹to them˺, “Stay with those ˹helpless˺ who remain behind.”

9:47.en_khattab: Had they gone forth with you ˹believers˺

9:47.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا خَبَالٗا وَلَأَوۡضَعُواْ خِلَٰلَكُمۡ يَبۡغُونَكُمُ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ
9:47.en_khattab: they would have been nothing but trouble for you, and would have scrambled around, seeking to spread discord in your midst
And some of you would have eagerly listened to them
And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of the wrongdoers

9:48.en_khattab: They had already sought to spread discord before

9:48.qpc_hafs: وَقَلَّبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ
9:48.en_khattab: and devised every ˹possible˺ plot against you ˹O Prophet˺, until the truth came and Allah’s Will prevailed

9:49.en_khattab: There are some of them who say, “Exempt me
and do not expose me to temptation.
They have already fallen into temptation.
And Hell will surely engulf the disbelievers.

9:50.en_khattab: If a blessing befalls you ˹O Prophet˺,
but if a disaster befalls you

9:50.qpc_hafs: يَقُولُواْ قَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ أَمۡرَنَا مِن قَبۡلُ
9:50.en_khattab: they say, “We took our precaution in advance”

9:51.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰنَاۚ
9:51.en_khattab: Nothing will ever befall us except what Allah has destined for us. He is our Protector.
So in Allah let the believers put their trust.

9:52.en_khattab: Say, “Are you awaiting anything to befall us
except one of the two best things: ˹victory
or martyrdom˺? But We are awaiting

9:52.qpc_hafs: أَن يُصِيبَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابٖ مِّنۡ عِندِهِۦٓ أَوۡ بِأَيۡدِينَاۖ
9:52.en_khattab: Allah to afflict you with torment either from Him or at our hands.
We too are waiting with you.”

9:53.en_khattab: it will never be accepted from you,

9:54.en_khattab: their donations from being accepted is that
they have lost faith in Allah and His Messenger,

9:54.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ إِلَّا وَهُمۡ كُسَالَىٰ
9:54.en_khattab: they never come to prayer except half-heartedly,
and they never donate except resentfully.

9:55.en_khattab: So let neither their wealth nor children impress you ˹O Prophet˺.

9:55.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
9:55.en_khattab: Allah only intends to torment them through these things in this worldly life
then their souls will depart while they are disbelievers

9:56.en_khattab: that they are part of you, but they are not
They only say so out of fear.

9:57.en_khattab: If only they could find a refuge,
they would rush headlong towards it.

9:58.en_khattab: There are some of them who are critical of your distribution of alms ˹O Prophet˺.
If they are given some of it they are pleased,

9:58.qpc_hafs: وَإِن لَّمۡ يُعۡطَوۡاْ مِنۡهَآ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡخَطُونَ
9:58.en_khattab: but if not they are enraged.

9:59.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ رَضُواْ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ
9:59.en_khattab: If only they had been content with what Allah and His Messenger had given them
and said, “Allah is sufficient for us!
Allah will grant us out of His bounty, and so will His Messenger.
To Allah ˹alone˺ we turn with hope.

9:60.en_khattab: Alms-tax is only for the poor
for those employed to administer it,
for those whose hearts are attracted ˹to the faith˺,

9:61.en_khattab: And there are others who hurt the Prophet by saying,
Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He listens to what is best for you.
He believes in Allah, has faith in the believers,
and is a mercy for those who believe among you.

9:61.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
9:61.en_khattab: Those who hurt Allah’s Messenger will suffer a painful punishment.

9:62.en_khattab: while it is the pleasure of Allah and His Messenger they should seek

9:63.en_khattab: that whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger

9:63.qpc_hafs: فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَاۚ
9:63.en_khattab: will be in the Fire of Hell forever

9:64.qpc_hafs: أَن تُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُورَةٞ تُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ
9:64.en_khattab: that a sûrah should be revealed about them, exposing what is in their hearts.
Allah will definitely bring to light what you fear.

9:65.en_khattab: If you question them, they will certainly say,
We were only talking idly and joking around.
Say, 'Was it Allah, His revelations, and His Messenger

9:66.qpc_hafs: لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ قَدۡ كَفَرۡتُم بَعۡدَ إِيمَٰنِكُمۡۚ
9:66.en_khattab: Make no excuses! You have lost faith after your belief.
If We pardon a group of you,
We will punish others for their wickedness.

9:67.en_khattab: The hypocrites, both men and women, are all alike

9:67.qpc_hafs: يَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَقۡبِضُونَ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡۚ
9:67.en_khattab: they encourage what is evil, forbid what is good, and withhold ˹what is in˺ their hands
They neglected Allah, so He neglected them
Surely the hypocrites are the rebellious

9:68.qpc_hafs: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ
9:68.en_khattab: Allah has promised the hypocrites, both men and women, and the disbelievers an everlasting stay in the Fire of Hell
and they will suffer a never-ending punishment.

9:69.qpc_hafs: كَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ كَانُوٓاْ أَشَدَّ مِنكُمۡ قُوَّةٗ وَأَكۡثَرَ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا
9:69.en_khattab: ˹You hypocrites are˺ like those ˹disbelievers˺ before you. They were far superior to you in might and more abundant in wealth and children.
They enjoyed their share in this life.

9:69.qpc_hafs: فَٱسۡتَمۡتَعۡتُم بِخَلَٰقِكُمۡ كَمَا ٱسۡتَمۡتَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكُم بِخَلَٰقِهِمۡ
9:69.en_khattab: You have enjoyed your share, just as they did.
And you have engaged in idle talk, just as they did.

9:69.qpc_hafs: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ
9:69.en_khattab: Their deeds have become void in this world and the Hereafter.
And it is they who are the ˹true˺ losers.

9:70.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِهِمۡ نَبَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ
9:70.en_khattab: Have they not received the stories of those ˹destroyed˺ before them:

9:70.qpc_hafs: قَوۡمِ نُوحٖ وَعَادٖ وَثَمُودَ وَقَوۡمِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَأَصۡحَٰبِ مَدۡيَنَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتِۚ
9:70.en_khattab: the people of Noah, ’Âd, and Thamûd, the people of Abraham, the residents of Midian, and the overturned cities ˹of Lot˺?
Their messengers came to them with clear proofs.

9:70.qpc_hafs: فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
9:70.en_khattab: Allah would have never wronged them, but it was they who wronged themselves.

9:71.en_khattab: The believers, both men and women
They encourage good and forbid evil
and obey Allah and His Messenger
It is they who will be shown Allah’s mercy

9:72.en_khattab: Allah has promised the believers, both men and women,

9:72.qpc_hafs: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةٗ فِي جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٖۚ
9:72.en_khattab: to stay there forever, and splendid homes in the Gardens of Eternity,
and, above all, the pleasure of Allah.

9:73.en_khattab: Struggle against the disbelievers and the hypocrites

9:74.en_khattab: They swear by Allah that they never said anything ˹blasphemous˺,
while they did in fact utter a blasphemy,
and plotted what they could not carry out.

9:74.qpc_hafs: وَمَا نَقَمُوٓاْ إِلَّآ أَنۡ أَغۡنَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦۚ
9:74.en_khattab: It is only through resentment that they pay Allah and His Messenger back for enriching them out of His bounty!
If they repent, it will be better for them.

9:74.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَتَوَلَّوۡاْ يُعَذِّبۡهُمُ ٱللَّهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ
9:74.en_khattab: But if they turn away, Allah will torment them with a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter,

9:74.qpc_hafs: وَمَا لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ
9:74.en_khattab: and they will have no one on earth to protect or help them.

9:75.en_khattab: And there are some who had made a vow to Allah:
If He gives us from His bounty,
we will surely spend in charity and be of the righteous.

9:76.en_khattab: But when He gave them out of His bounty

9:77.en_khattab: until the Day they will meet Him,
for breaking their promise to Allah

9:78.en_khattab: that Allah ˹fully˺ knows their ˹evil˺ thoughts and secret talks,
and that Allah is the Knower of all unseen?

9:79.en_khattab: There are those who slander ˹some of˺ the believers
and mock others for giving only the little they can afford
Allah will throw their mockery back at them

9:79.qpc_hafs: سَخِرَ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
9:79.en_khattab: and they will suffer a painful punishment

9:80.en_khattab: ˹It does not matter˺ whether you ˹O Prophet˺ pray for them
Even if you pray for their forgiveness seventy times,
That is because they have lost faith in Allah and His Messenger.
And Allah does not guide the rebellious people.

9:81.en_khattab: Those ˹hypocrites˺ who remained behind rejoiced for doing so

9:81.qpc_hafs: خِلَٰفَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَرِهُوٓاْ أَن يُجَٰهِدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
9:81.en_khattab: in defiance of the Messenger of Allah and hated ˹the prospect of˺ striving with their wealth and their lives in the cause of Allah
They said ˹to one another˺, “Do not march forth in the heat.”
Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “The Fire of Hell is far hotter!”

9:82.en_khattab: So let them laugh a little
as a reward for what they have committed.

9:83.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet˺ to a group of them
and they ask to go forth with you,
say, “You will not ever go forth
or fight an enemy along with me.
so stay with those ˹helpless˺ who remain behind.”

9:84.en_khattab: And do not ever offer ˹funeral˺ prayers for any of
nor stand by their grave ˹at burial˺,
for they have lost faith in Allah and His Messenger

9:85.en_khattab: And let neither their wealth nor children impress you ˹O Prophet˺.

9:85.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا
9:85.en_khattab: Allah only intends to torment them through these things in this world
and ˹then˺ their souls will depart while they are disbelievers

9:86.qpc_hafs: أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَٰهِدُواْ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ
9:86.en_khattab: stating, “Believe in Allah and struggle along with His Messenger,”
the rich among them would ask to be exempt

9:87.en_khattab: They preferred to stay behind with the helpless
and their hearts have been sealed

9:88.en_khattab: But the Messenger and the believers with him
strived with their wealth and their lives
They will have all the best
and it is they who will be successful

9:89.en_khattab: Allah has prepared for them Gardens

9:90.en_khattab: Some nomadic Arabs ˹also˺ came with excuses
And those who were untrue to Allah and His Messenger

9:90.qpc_hafs: سَيُصِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
9:90.en_khattab: The unfaithful among them will be afflicted with a painful punishment.

9:91.qpc_hafs: لَّيۡسَ عَلَى ٱلضُّعَفَآءِ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلۡمَرۡضَىٰ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ مَا يُنفِقُونَ حَرَجٌ
9:91.en_khattab: There is no blame on the weak, the sick, or those lacking the means
˹if they stay behind˺, as long as they are true to Allah and His Messenger.
There is no blame on the good-doers.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

9:92.qpc_hafs: وَلَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا مَآ أَتَوۡكَ لِتَحۡمِلَهُمۡ
9:92.en_khattab: Nor ˹is there any blame on˺ those who came to you ˹O Prophet˺ for mounts

9:92.qpc_hafs: قُلۡتَ لَآ أَجِدُ مَآ أَحۡمِلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ
9:92.en_khattab: then when you said, “I can find no mounts for you,”

9:92.qpc_hafs: تَوَلَّواْ وَّأَعۡيُنُهُمۡ تَفِيضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمۡعِ حَزَنًا
9:92.en_khattab: they left with eyes overflowing with tears out of grief
that they had nothing to contribute.

9:93.en_khattab: Blame is only on those who seek exemption from you
They preferred to stay behind with the helpless
and Allah has sealed their hearts
so they do not realize ˹the consequences˺

9:94.en_khattab: They will make excuses to you ˹believers˺
Allah has already informed us about your ˹true˺ state ˹of faith˺.
Your ˹future˺ deeds will be observed by Allah and His Messenger

9:94.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ
9:94.en_khattab: as well. And you will be returned to the Knower of the seen and unseen,
then He will inform you of what you used to do.”

9:95.en_khattab: When you return, they will swear to you by Allah
may leave them alone. So leave them alone—
as a reward for what they have committed.

9:96.en_khattab: in order to please you. And even if you are pleased with them

9:97.en_khattab: The nomadic Arabs ˹around Medina˺ are far worse in disbelief

9:97.qpc_hafs: وَأَجۡدَرُ أَلَّا يَعۡلَمُواْ حُدُودَ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦۗ
9:97.en_khattab: and less likely to know the laws revealed by Allah to His Messenger.

9:98.en_khattab: are those who consider what they donate to be a loss

9:99.en_khattab: are those who believe in Allah and the Last Day,

9:99.qpc_hafs: وَيَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ قُرُبَٰتٍ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ
9:99.en_khattab: and consider what they donate as a means of coming closer to Allah
and ˹receiving˺ the prayers of the Messenger.
It will certainly bring them closer.
Allah will admit them into His mercy.
Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

9:100.qpc_hafs: وَٱلسَّٰبِقُونَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ وَٱلۡأَنصَارِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُم بِإِحۡسَٰنٖ
9:100.en_khattab: As for the foremost— the first of the Emigrants and the Helpers— and those who follow them in goodness
Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him

9:100.qpc_hafs: وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي تَحۡتَهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۚ
9:100.en_khattab: And He has prepared for them Gardens under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever

9:101.en_khattab: Some of the nomads around you ˹believers˺ are hypocrites,

9:101.qpc_hafs: وَمِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ مَرَدُواْ عَلَى ٱلنِّفَاقِ
9:101.en_khattab: as are some of the people of Medina. They have mastered hypocrisy.
They are not known to you ˹O Prophet˺; they are known to Us.

9:101.qpc_hafs: سَنُعَذِّبُهُم مَّرَّتَيۡنِ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ عَظِيمٖ
9:101.en_khattab: We will punish them twice ˹in this world˺, then they will be brought back ˹to their Lord˺ for a tremendous punishment.

9:102.en_khattab: Some others have confessed their wrongdoing:
they have mixed goodness with evil.

9:102.qpc_hafs: وَءَاخَرَ سَيِّئًا عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ
9:102.en_khattab: It is right to hope that Allah will turn to them in mercy.
Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

9:103.en_khattab: Take from their wealth ˹O Prophet˺ charity

9:103.qpc_hafs: وَصَلِّ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنٞ لَّهُمۡۗ
9:103.en_khattab: and pray for them— surely your prayer is a source of comfort for them.

9:104.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ يَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ
9:104.en_khattab: that Allah alone accepts the repentance of His servants
and that Allah alone is the Accepter of Repentance, Most Merciful

9:105.en_khattab: as you will. Your deeds will be observed by Allah, His Messenger, and the believers.
And you will be returned to the Knower of the seen and unseen,
then He will inform you of what you used to do.”

9:106.en_khattab: And some others are left for Allah’s decision
either to punish them or turn to them in mercy.

9:107.en_khattab: There are also those ˹hypocrites˺ who set up a mosque ˹only˺ to cause harm

9:107.qpc_hafs: وَإِرۡصَادٗا لِّمَنۡ حَارَبَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُۚ
9:107.en_khattab: and as a base for those who had previously fought against Allah and His Messenger.

9:107.qpc_hafs: وَلَيَحۡلِفُنَّ إِنۡ أَرَدۡنَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
9:107.en_khattab: They will definitely swear, “We intended nothing but good,” but Allah bears witness that they are surely liars.

9:108.en_khattab: Do not ˹O Prophet˺ ever pray in it.

9:108.qpc_hafs: لَّمَسۡجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ مِنۡ أَوَّلِ يَوۡمٍ
9:108.en_khattab: Certainly, a mosque founded on righteousness from the first day
is more worthy of your prayers.
In it are men who love to be purified.
And Allah loves those who purify themselves.

9:109.qpc_hafs: أَفَمَنۡ أَسَّسَ بُنۡيَٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ تَقۡوَىٰ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٍ خَيۡرٌ
9:109.en_khattab: Which is better: those who laid the foundation of their building on the fear and pleasure of Allah,

9:109.qpc_hafs: أَم مَّنۡ أَسَّسَ بُنۡيَٰنَهُۥ عَلَىٰ شَفَا جُرُفٍ هَارٖ
9:109.en_khattab: or those who did so on the edge of a crumbling cliff
that tumbled down with them into the Fire of Hell?
And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

9:110.en_khattab: will never cease to fuel hypocrisy in their hearts
until their hearts are torn apart

9:111.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱشۡتَرَىٰ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلَهُم بِأَنَّ لَهُمُ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۚ
9:111.en_khattab: Allah has indeed purchased from the believers their lives and wealth in exchange for Paradise.

9:111.qpc_hafs: يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَيَقۡتُلُونَ وَيُقۡتَلُونَۖ
9:111.en_khattab: They fight in the cause of Allah and kill or are killed.

9:111.qpc_hafs: وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡهِ حَقّٗا فِي ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلِ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ
9:111.en_khattab: This is a true promise binding on Him in the Torah, the Gospel, and the Quran.

9:111.qpc_hafs: وَمَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَٱسۡتَبۡشِرُواْ بِبَيۡعِكُمُ ٱلَّذِي بَايَعۡتُم بِهِۦۚ
9:111.en_khattab: And whose promise is truer than Allah’s? So rejoice in the exchange you have made with Him.

9:112.en_khattab: and who observe the limits set by Allah
And give good news to the believers

9:113.en_khattab: It is not ˹proper˺ for the Prophet and the believers
to seek forgiveness for the polytheists

9:113.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ كَانُوٓاْ أُوْلِي قُرۡبَىٰ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمۡ
9:113.en_khattab: even if they were close relatives, after it has become clear to the believers
that they are bound for the Hellfire.

9:114.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كَانَ ٱسۡتِغۡفَارُ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ إِلَّا عَن مَّوۡعِدَةٖ وَعَدَهَآ إِيَّاهُ
9:114.en_khattab: As for Abraham’s prayer for his father’s forgiveness, it was only in fulfilment of a promise he had made to him.

9:114.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥٓ أَنَّهُۥ عَدُوّٞ لِّلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنۡهُۚ
9:114.en_khattab: But when it became clear to Abraham that his father was an enemy of Allah, he broke ties with him.

9:115.en_khattab: Allah would never consider a people deviant
until He makes clear to them what they must avoid
Surely Allah has ˹full˺ knowledge of everything

9:116.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ
9:116.en_khattab: Indeed, to Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
He gives life and causes death.

9:116.qpc_hafs: وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ
9:116.en_khattab: And besides Allah you have no guardian or helper.

9:117.en_khattab: Allah has certainly turned in mercy to
the Prophet as well as the Emigrants and the Helpers

9:117.qpc_hafs: مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا كَادَ يَزِيغُ قُلُوبُ فَرِيقٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ
9:117.en_khattab: after the hearts of a group of them had almost faltered
Surely He is Ever Gracious and Most Merciful to them.

9:118.en_khattab: And ˹Allah has also turned in mercy to˺ the three who had remained behind,

9:118.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ضَاقَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتۡ وَضَاقَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ
9:118.en_khattab: ˹whose guilt distressed them˺ until the earth, despite its vastness, seemed to close in on them, and their souls were torn in anguish.

9:118.qpc_hafs: وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَن لَّا مَلۡجَأَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّآ إِلَيۡهِ
9:118.en_khattab: They knew there was no refuge from Allah except in Him.
Then He turned to them in mercy so that they might repent.
Surely Allah ˹alone˺ is the Accepter of Repentance, Most Merciful.

9:120.qpc_hafs: مَا كَانَ لِأَهۡلِ ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ
9:120.en_khattab: It was not ˹proper˺ for the people of Medina and the nomadic Arabs around them
to avoid marching with the Messenger of Allah
or to prefer their own lives above his

9:120.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ لَا يُصِيبُهُمۡ ظَمَأٞ وَلَا نَصَبٞ وَلَا مَخۡمَصَةٞ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
9:120.en_khattab: That is because whenever they suffer from thirst, fatigue, or hunger in the cause of Allah
or tread on a territory, unnerving the disbelievers
or inflict any loss on an enemy

9:120.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عَمَلٞ صَٰلِحٌۚ
9:120.en_khattab: it is written to their credit as a good deed

9:120.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
9:120.en_khattab: Surely Allah never discounts the reward of the good-doers

9:121.en_khattab: And whenever they make a donation, small
cause˺—it is written to their credit,

9:121.qpc_hafs: لِيَجۡزِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَحۡسَنَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
9:121.en_khattab: so that Allah may grant them the best reward for what they used to do.

9:122.en_khattab: ˹However,˺ it is not necessary for the believers to march forth all at once.

9:122.qpc_hafs: فَلَوۡلَا نَفَرَ مِن كُلِّ فِرۡقَةٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ طَآئِفَةٞ لِّيَتَفَقَّهُواْ فِي ٱلدِّينِ
9:122.en_khattab: Only a party from each group should march forth, leaving the rest to gain religious knowledge
then enlighten their people when they return to them
so that they ˹too˺ may beware ˹of evil˺.

9:123.en_khattab: and let them find firmness in you
And know that Allah is with those mindful ˹of Him˺

9:124.qpc_hafs: فَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَقُولُ أَيُّكُمۡ زَادَتۡهُ هَٰذِهِۦٓ إِيمَٰنٗاۚ
9:124.en_khattab: some of them ask ˹mockingly˺, “Which of you has this increased in faith?”
As for the believers, it has increased them in faith

9:125.en_khattab: But as for those with sickness in their hearts,
it has increased them only in wickedness upon their wickedness,

9:126.en_khattab: Do they not see that they are tried

9:126.qpc_hafs: فِي كُلِّ عَامٖ مَّرَّةً أَوۡ مَرَّتَيۡنِ
ثُمَّ لَا يَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
9:126.en_khattab: Yet they neither repent nor do they learn a lesson.

9:127.qpc_hafs: صَرَفَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ
9:127.en_khattab: Allah ˹Who˺ has turned their hearts away because they are a people who do not comprehend.

9:128.en_khattab: There certainly has come to you a messenger from among yourselves.
He is concerned by your suffering,
and gracious and merciful to the believers.

9:129.en_khattab: then say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Allah is sufficient for me.
There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him.
In Him I put my trust.
And He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.

10:1.en_khattab: These are the verses of the Book,

10:2.en_khattab: that We have sent revelation to a man from among themselves

10:2.qpc_hafs: أَنۡ أَنذِرِ ٱلنَّاسَ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ
10:2.en_khattab: instructing him, 'Warn humanity and give good news to the believers

10:2.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ لَهُمۡ قَدَمَ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۗ
10:2.en_khattab: that they will have an honourable status with their Lord.'

10:3.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ
10:3.en_khattab: Who created the heavens and the earth in six Days
then established Himself on the Throne

10:3.qpc_hafs: مَا مِن شَفِيعٍ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ إِذۡنِهِۦۚ
10:3.en_khattab: None can intercede except by His permission
That is Allah— your Lord, so worship Him ˹alone˺
Will you not then be mindful?

10:4.en_khattab: To Him is your return all together.

10:4.qpc_hafs: إِنَّهُۥ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۚ
10:4.en_khattab: Indeed, He originates the creation then resurrects it so that He may justly reward those who believe and do good.

10:4.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ شَرَابٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ
10:4.en_khattab: But those who disbelieve will have a boiling drink and a painful punishment for their disbelief.

10:5.qpc_hafs: جَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ ضِيَآءٗ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ نُورٗا وَقَدَّرَهُۥ مَنَازِلَ
10:5.en_khattab: made the sun a radiant source and the moon a reflected light, with precisely ordained phases
so that you may know the number of years and calculation ˹of time˺

10:5.qpc_hafs: مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ذَٰلِكَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ
10:5.en_khattab: Allah did not create all this except for a purpose
He makes the signs clear for people of knowledge

10:6.en_khattab: Surely in the alternation of the day and the night,

10:6.qpc_hafs: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ
10:6.en_khattab: and in all that Allah has created in the heavens and the earth,

10:7.en_khattab: Indeed, those who do not expect to meet Us,
being pleased and content with this worldly life,
and who are heedless of Our signs,

10:8.en_khattab: will have the Fire as a home
because of what they have committed

10:9.en_khattab: Surely those who believe and do good,
their Lord will guide them to Paradise through their faith,
rivers will flow under their feet

10:10.en_khattab: in which their prayer will be, “Glory be to You, O  Allah!”

10:10.qpc_hafs: وَءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ أَنِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
10:10.en_khattab: and their closing prayer will be, “All praise is for Allah— Lord of all worlds!”

10:11.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ يُعَجِّلُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ ٱلشَّرَّ ٱسۡتِعۡجَالَهُم بِٱلۡخَيۡرِ
10:11.en_khattab: If Allah were to hasten evil for people as they wish to hasten good
they would have certainly been doomed

10:11.qpc_hafs: فَنَذَرُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
10:11.en_khattab: But We leave those who do not expect to meet Us to wander blindly in their defiance

10:12.en_khattab: Whenever someone is touched by hardship,

10:12.qpc_hafs: دَعَانَا لِجَنۢبِهِۦٓ أَوۡ قَاعِدًا أَوۡ قَآئِمٗا
10:12.en_khattab: they cry out to Us, whether lying on their side, sitting, or standing.
But when We relieve their hardship,

10:12.qpc_hafs: مَرَّ كَأَن لَّمۡ يَدۡعُنَآ إِلَىٰ ضُرّٖ
10:12.en_khattab: they return to their old ways as if they had never cried to Us to remove any hardship!

10:12.qpc_hafs: كَذَٰلِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
10:12.en_khattab: This is how the misdeeds of the transgressors have been made appealing to them.

10:13.en_khattab: We surely destroyed ˹other˺ peoples before you
and their messengers came to them with clear proofs
This is how We reward the wicked people.

10:14.en_khattab: Then We made you their successors

10:15.en_khattab: When Our clear revelations are recited to them
those who do not expect to meet Us say

10:15.qpc_hafs: ٱئۡتِ بِقُرۡءَانٍ غَيۡرِ هَٰذَآ أَوۡ بَدِّلۡهُۚ
10:15.en_khattab: ˹to the Prophet˺, “Bring us a different Quran or make some changes in it.”

10:15.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ مَا يَكُونُ لِيٓ أَنۡ أُبَدِّلَهُۥ مِن تِلۡقَآيِٕ نَفۡسِيٓۖ
10:15.en_khattab: Say ˹to them˺, “It is not for me to change it on my own.

10:15.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّۖ
10:15.en_khattab: I only follow what is revealed to me.

10:15.qpc_hafs: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
10:15.en_khattab: I fear, if I were to disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day.

10:16.qpc_hafs: لَّوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَلَوۡتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَدۡرَىٰكُم بِهِۦۖ
10:16.en_khattab: Had Allah willed, I would not have recited it to you, nor would He have made it known to you.

10:16.qpc_hafs: فَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُ فِيكُمۡ عُمُرٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦٓۚ
10:16.en_khattab: I had lived my whole life among you before this ˹revelation˺.

10:17.en_khattab: those who fabricate lies against Allah
Indeed, the wicked will never succeed.

10:18.en_khattab: others who can neither harm nor benefit them,
and say, “These are our intercessors with Allah.”

10:18.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ أَتُنَبِّـُٔونَ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا لَا يَعۡلَمُ
10:18.en_khattab: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Are you informing Allah of something He does not know
in the heavens or the earth?
Glorified and Exalted is He above what they associate ˹with Him˺!

10:19.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ
10:19.en_khattab: Humanity was once nothing but a single community ˹of believers˺,
Had it not been for a prior decree from your Lord,
their differences would have been settled ˹at once˺.

10:20.qpc_hafs: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۖ
10:20.en_khattab: They ask, “Why has no ˹other˺ sign been sent down to him from his Lord?”
Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “˹The knowledge of˺ the unseen is with Allah alone.
So wait! I too am waiting with you.”

10:21.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَآ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلنَّاسَ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ضَرَّآءَ
10:21.en_khattab: When We give people a taste of mercy after being afflicted with a hardship

10:21.qpc_hafs: مَسَّتۡهُمۡ إِذَا لَهُم مَّكۡرٞ فِيٓ ءَايَاتِنَاۚ
10:21.en_khattab: they swiftly devise plots against Our revelations!
Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Allah is swifter in devising ˹punishment˺
Surely Our messenger-angels record whatever you devise.

10:22.en_khattab: He is the One Who enables you

10:22.qpc_hafs: فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا كُنتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ
