21:81.qpc_hafs: ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةٗ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَاۚ
21:81.en_khattab: We subjected the raging winds, blowing by his command to the land We had showered with blessings.
It is We Who know everything.

21:82.qpc_hafs: مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ
21:82.en_khattab: that dived for him, and performed other duties
It is We Who kept them in check.

21:83.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when Job cried out to his Lord,
and You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.”

21:84.en_khattab: and gave him back his family
and a lesson for the ˹devoted˺ worshippers.

21:86.en_khattab: We admitted them into Our mercy,
for they were truly of the righteous.

21:87.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when the Man of the Whale
stormed off ˹from his city˺ in a rage
thinking We would not restrain him

21:87.qpc_hafs: أَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ
21:87.en_khattab: he cried out, “There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except You. Glory be to You

21:88.en_khattab: And so do We save the true believers.

21:89.en_khattab: My Lord! Do not leave me childless,
though You are the Best of Successors.

21:90.en_khattab: Indeed, they used to race in doing good,
and call upon Us with hope and fear,

21:91.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ the one who guarded her chastity
so We breathed into her through Our angel ˹Gabriel,˺
making her and her son a sign for all peoples

21:92.en_khattab: ˹O prophets!˺ Indeed, this religion of yours

21:93.en_khattab: Yet the people have divided it into sects.
But to Us they will all return.

21:94.en_khattab: will never be denied ˹the reward for˺ their striving
for We are recording it all

21:95.en_khattab: It is impossible for a society

21:96.en_khattab: ˹after˺ Gog and Magog have broken loose ˹from the barrier˺,

21:97.qpc_hafs: فَإِذَا هِيَ شَٰخِصَةٌ أَبۡصَٰرُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ
21:97.en_khattab: Then— behold!—the disbelievers will stare ˹in horror, crying,˺

21:97.qpc_hafs: يَٰوَيۡلَنَا قَدۡ كُنَّا فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا
21:97.en_khattab: “Oh, woe to us! We have truly been heedless of this.
In fact, we have been wrongdoers.”

21:98.en_khattab: will be the fuel of Hell

21:99.en_khattab: they would not have entered it.
And they will be there forever.

21:100.en_khattab: and will not be able to hear.

21:101.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ
21:101.en_khattab: Surely those for whom We have destined the finest reward
will be kept far away from Hell

21:102.en_khattab: not even hearing the slightest hissing from it.
And they will delight forever in what their souls desire.

21:103.en_khattab: Horror ˹of that Day˺ will not disturb them,
and the angels will greet them, ˹saying,˺
“This is your Day, which you have been promised.”

21:104.en_khattab: On that Day We will roll up the heavens
Just as We produced the first creation,
That is a promise binding on Us.

21:105.qpc_hafs: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ

21:105.en_khattab: We decreed in the Scriptures: “My righteous servants shall inherit the land.”

21:108.en_khattab: What has been revealed to me is this:
Your God is only One God.

21:109.en_khattab: then say, “I have warned you all equally.
I do not know if what you are threatened with is near or far.

21:110.en_khattab: Allah surely knows what you say openly

21:111.en_khattab: if this ˹delay˺ is possibly a test for you

21:112.en_khattab: ˹In the end,˺ the Prophet said, “My Lord! Judge ˹between us˺ in truth.
And our Lord is the Most Compassionate,
Whose help is sought against what you claim.”

22:1.en_khattab: for the ˹violent˺ quaking at the Hour

22:2.en_khattab: every nursing mother will abandon what she is nursing,
and every pregnant woman will deliver her burden ˹prematurely˺.

22:2.qpc_hafs: وَتَرَى ٱلنَّاسَ سُكَٰرَىٰ وَمَا هُم بِسُكَٰرَىٰ
22:2.en_khattab: And you will see people ˹as if they were˺ drunk, though they will not be drunk;
but the torment of Allah is ˹terribly˺ severe.

22:3.qpc_hafs: مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ
22:3.en_khattab: who dispute about Allah without knowledge,

22:4.en_khattab: such devils that whoever takes them
as a guide will be misguided and led by them
into the torment of the Blaze.

22:5.qpc_hafs: إِن كُنتُمۡ فِي رَيۡبٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡبَعۡثِ
22:5.en_khattab: If you are in doubt about the Resurrection,
then ˹know that˺ We did create you from dust,
then ˹developed you into˺ a clinging clot ˹of blood˺,

22:5.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ مِن مُّضۡغَةٖ مُّخَلَّقَةٖ وَغَيۡرِ مُخَلَّقَةٖ
22:5.en_khattab: then a lump of flesh— fully formed or unformed—

22:5.qpc_hafs: لِّنُبَيِّنَ لَكُمۡۚ وَنُقِرُّ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ مَا نَشَآءُ
22:5.en_khattab: in order to demonstrate ˹Our power˺ to you. ˹Then˺ We settle whatever ˹embryo˺ We will in the womb
then bring you forth as infants,
so that you may reach your prime.

22:5.qpc_hafs: وَمِنكُم مَّن يُتَوَفَّىٰ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَرۡذَلِ ٱلۡعُمُرِ
22:5.en_khattab: Some of you ˹may˺ die ˹young˺, while others are left to reach the most feeble stage of life

22:5.qpc_hafs: لِكَيۡلَا يَعۡلَمَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ عِلۡمٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ
22:5.en_khattab: so that they may know nothing after having known much.
And you see the earth lifeless,
but as soon as We send down rain upon it,

22:5.qpc_hafs: ٱهۡتَزَّتۡ وَرَبَتۡ وَأَنۢبَتَتۡ مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجِۭ بَهِيجٖ
22:5.en_khattab: it begins to stir ˹to life˺ and swell, producing every type of pleasant plant.

22:6.en_khattab: That is because Allah ˹alone˺ is the Truth,
He ˹alone˺ gives life to the dead,
and He ˹alone˺ is Most Capable of everything.

22:7.en_khattab: And certainly the Hour is coming
there is no doubt about it

22:7.qpc_hafs: وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡعَثُ مَن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ
22:7.en_khattab: And Allah will surely resurrect those in the graves

22:8.en_khattab: ˹Still˺ there are some who dispute about Allah

22:9.en_khattab: to lead ˹others˺ astray from Allah’s Way.
They will suffer disgrace in this world
and on the Day of Judgment We will make them taste the torment of burning.

22:10.en_khattab: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is ˹the reward˺ for what your hands have done.
And Allah is never unjust to ˹His˺ creation.

22:11.qpc_hafs: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَعۡبُدُ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ حَرۡفٖۖ
22:11.en_khattab: And there are some who worship Allah on the verge ˹of faith˺:
if they are blessed with something good, they are content with it;

22:11.qpc_hafs: وَإِنۡ أَصَابَتۡهُ فِتۡنَةٌ ٱنقَلَبَ عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهِۦ خَسِرَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۚ
22:11.en_khattab: but if they are afflicted with a trial, they relapse ˹into disbelief˺, losing this world and the Hereafter.

22:12.qpc_hafs: مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥۚ
22:12.en_khattab: what can neither harm nor benefit them.
That is ˹truly˺ the farthest one can stray.

22:13.en_khattab: They invoke those whose worship leads to harm,

22:14.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدۡخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ
22:14.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do good
into Gardens, under which rivers flow.
Surely Allah does what He wills.

22:15.qpc_hafs: مَن كَانَ يَظُنُّ أَن لَّن يَنصُرَهُ ٱللَّهُ
22:15.en_khattab: Whoever thinks that Allah will not help His Prophet
in this world and the Hereafter
let them stretch out a rope to the ceiling
and strangle themselves, then let them see
if this plan will do away with [the cause of] their rage.

22:16.en_khattab: And so We revealed this ˹Quran˺ as clear verses.
And Allah certainly guides whoever He wills.

22:17.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ
22:17.en_khattab: Allah will judge between them ˹all˺ on Judgment Day.

22:17.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
22:17.en_khattab: Surely Allah is a Witness over all things.

22:18.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَسۡجُدُۤ لَهُۥۤ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
22:18.en_khattab: Do you not see that to Allah bow down ˹in submission˺ all those in the heavens and all those on the earth,

22:18.qpc_hafs: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ وَٱلنُّجُومُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ وَٱلدَّوَآبُّ
22:18.en_khattab: as well as the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, and ˹all˺ living beings,

22:18.qpc_hafs: وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِۖ وَكَثِيرٌ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡعَذَابُۗ
22:18.en_khattab: as well as many humans, while many are deserving of punishment.

22:18.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُهِنِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّكۡرِمٍۚ
22:18.en_khattab: And whoever Allah disgraces, none can honour.
Surely Allah does what He wills.

22:19.en_khattab: These are two opposing groups that disagree about their Lord:

22:19.qpc_hafs: فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ قُطِّعَتۡ لَهُمۡ ثِيَابٞ مِّن نَّارٖ
22:19.en_khattab: as for the disbelievers, garments of Fire will be cut out for them
and boiling water will be poured over their heads,

22:20.en_khattab: melting whatever is in their bellies,

22:22.en_khattab: to escape from Hell— out of anguish
they will be forced back into it
and will be told, 'Taste the torment of burning!'

22:23.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدۡخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ
22:23.en_khattab: ˹But˺ Allah will surely admit those who believe and do good
into Gardens, under which rivers flow

22:23.qpc_hafs: يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٖ وَلُؤۡلُؤٗاۖ
22:23.en_khattab: where they will be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls
and their clothing will be silk,

22:24.en_khattab: for they have been guided to the best of speech,
and they have been guided to the Commendable Path.

22:25.en_khattab: Indeed, those who persist in disbelief
and hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah

22:25.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلۡنَٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ سَوَآءً ٱلۡعَٰكِفُ فِيهِ وَٱلۡبَادِۚ وَمَن يُرِدۡ فِيهِ بِإِلۡحَادِۭ بِظُلۡمٖ
22:25.en_khattab: which We have appointed for all people, residents and visitors alike, along with whoever intends to deviate by doing wrong in it
We will cause them to taste a painful punishment

22:26.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when We assigned to Abraham the site of the House,
˹saying,˺ “Do not associate anything with Me ˹in worship˺

22:26.qpc_hafs: وَطَهِّرۡ بَيۡتِيَ لِلطَّآئِفِينَ وَٱلۡقَآئِمِينَ وَٱلرُّكَّعِ ٱلسُّجُودِ
22:26.en_khattab: and purify My House for those who circle ˹the Ka’bah˺, stand ˹in prayer˺, and bow and prostrate themselves.

22:27.en_khattab: They will come to you on foot and on every lean camel

22:28.en_khattab: so they may obtain the benefits ˹in store˺ for them,

22:28.qpc_hafs: وَيَذۡكُرُواْ ٱسۡمَ ٱللَّهِ فِيٓ أَيَّامٖ مَّعۡلُومَٰتٍ
22:28.en_khattab: and pronounce the Name of Allah on appointed days

22:28.qpc_hafs: عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم مِّنۢ بَهِيمَةِ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِۖ
22:28.en_khattab: over the sacrificial animals He has provided for them.

22:30.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ حُرُمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦۗ
22:30.en_khattab: And whoever honours the rituals of Allah, it is best for them in the sight of their Lord.

22:30.qpc_hafs: وَأُحِلَّتۡ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ إِلَّا مَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ
22:30.en_khattab: The ˹meat of˺ cattle has been made lawful for you, except what has ˹already˺ been recited to you.
So shun the impurity of idolatry,

22:31.en_khattab: is like someone who has fallen from the sky
and is either snatched away by birds

22:31.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ تَهۡوِي بِهِ ٱلرِّيحُ فِي مَكَانٖ سَحِيقٖ
22:31.en_khattab: or swept by the wind to a remote place

22:32.en_khattab: And whoever honours the symbols of Allah,
it is certainly out of the piety of the heart.

22:33.en_khattab: You may benefit from sacrificial animals for an appointed term,
then their place of sacrifice is

22:34.en_khattab: For every community We appointed a rite of sacrifice

22:34.qpc_hafs: لِّيَذۡكُرُواْ ٱسۡمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم مِّنۢ بَهِيمَةِ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِۗ
22:34.en_khattab: so that they may pronounce the Name of Allah over the sacrificial animals He has provided for them
For your God is only One God
so submit yourselves to Him ˹alone˺. And give good news ˹O Prophet˺ to the humble:

22:35.en_khattab: whose hearts tremble at the remembrance of Allah,
who patiently endure whatever may befall them,
and donate from what We have provided for them.

22:36.qpc_hafs: وَٱلۡبُدۡنَ جَعَلۡنَٰهَا لَكُم مِّن شَعَٰٓئِرِ ٱللَّهِ
22:36.en_khattab: We have made sacrificial camels ˹and cattle˺ among the symbols of Allah
in which there is ˹much˺ good for you
So pronounce the Name of Allah over them when they are lined up ˹for sacrifice˺
Once they have fallen ˹lifeless˺ on their sides
you may eat from their meat, and feed the needy— those who do not beg, and those who do
In this way We have subjected these ˹animals˺ to you so that you may be grateful

22:37.qpc_hafs: لَن يَنَالَ ٱللَّهَ لُحُومُهَا وَلَا دِمَآؤُهَا
22:37.en_khattab: Neither their meat nor blood reaches Allah.
Rather, it is your piety that reaches Him.
This is how He has subjected them to you
so that you may proclaim the greatness of Allah for what He has guided you to
and give good news to the good-doers.

22:38.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدَٰفِعُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْۗ
22:38.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah defends those who believe.

22:38.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٖ كَفُورٍ
22:38.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not like whoever is deceitful, ungrateful.

22:39.en_khattab: Permission ˹to fight back˺ is ˹hereby˺ granted to those being fought,
And Allah is truly Most Capable of helping them ˹prevail˺.

22:40.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ أُخۡرِجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِم بِغَيۡرِ حَقٍّ
22:40.en_khattab: ˹They are˺ those who have been expelled from their homes for no reason
other than proclaiming: “Our Lord is Allah”

22:40.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡلَا دَفۡعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعۡضَهُم بِبَعۡضٖ
22:40.en_khattab: Had Allah not repelled ˹the aggression of˺ some people by means of others
destruction would have surely claimed monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques
in which Allah’s Name is often mentioned
Allah will certainly help those who stand up for Him

22:41.en_khattab: if established in the land by Us,
And with Allah rests the outcome of all affairs.

22:42.qpc_hafs: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَثَمُودُ
22:42.en_khattab: so did the people of Noah before them, as well as ˹the tribes of˺ ’Ȃd and Thamûd,

22:44.en_khattab: But I delayed ˹the fate of˺ the disbelievers ˹until their appointed time˺
And how severe was My response!

22:45.en_khattab: Many are the societies We have destroyed
Many are also the abandoned wells

22:46.en_khattab: Have they not travelled throughout the land
Indeed, it is not the eyes that are blind

22:46.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِن تَعۡمَى ٱلۡقُلُوبُ ٱلَّتِي فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ
22:46.en_khattab: but it is the hearts in the chests that grow blind

22:47.en_khattab: They challenge you ˹O Prophet˺ to hasten the torment.
And Allah will never fail in His promise.

22:47.qpc_hafs: وَإِنَّ يَوۡمًا عِندَ رَبِّكَ كَأَلۡفِ سَنَةٖ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
22:47.en_khattab: But a day with your Lord is indeed like a thousand years by your counting.

22:48.en_khattab: Many are the societies whose end We delayed
And to Me is the final return.

22:49.en_khattab: “O humanity! I am only sent to you with

22:50.en_khattab: So those who believe and do good

22:51.en_khattab: But those who strive to discredit Our revelations,
they will be the residents of the Hellfire.

22:52.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٖ وَلَا نَبِيٍّ
22:52.en_khattab: Whenever We sent a messenger or a prophet before you ˹O Prophet˺

22:52.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ إِذَا تَمَنَّىٰٓ أَلۡقَى ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فِيٓ أُمۡنِيَّتِهِۦ
22:52.en_khattab: and he recited ˹Our revelations˺, Satan would influence ˹people’s understanding of˺ his recitation.
But ˹eventually˺ Allah would eliminate Satan’s influence.
Then Allah would ˹firmly˺ establish His revelations.

22:53.en_khattab: All that so He may make Satan’s influence a trial

22:53.qpc_hafs: لِّلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡقَاسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡۗ

if he is telling the truth

24:10.en_khattab: ˹You would have suffered,˺ had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy upon you,
had Allah not been Accepting of Repentance,

24:11.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو بِٱلۡإِفۡكِ عُصۡبَةٞ مِّنكُمۡۚ
24:11.en_khattab: Indeed, those who came up with that ˹outrageous˺ slander are a group of you.

24:11.qpc_hafs: لَا تَحۡسَبُوهُ شَرّٗا لَّكُمۖ بَلۡ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡۚ
24:11.en_khattab: Do not think this is bad for you. Rather, it is good for you.

24:11.qpc_hafs: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُم مَّا ٱكۡتَسَبَ مِنَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِۚ
24:11.en_khattab: They will be punished, each according to their share of the sin.

24:11.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ كِبۡرَهُۥ مِنۡهُمۡ لَهُۥ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
24:11.en_khattab: As for their mastermind, he will suffer a tremendous punishment.

24:12.en_khattab: If only when you heard this
If only the believing men and women had thought well of one another,
you heard this ˹rumour˺, and said, “This is clearly ˹an outrageous˺ slander!”

24:13.en_khattab: Why did they not produce four witnesses?
Now, since they have failed to produce witnesses,
they are ˹truly˺ liars in the sight of Allah.

24:14.en_khattab: Had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy upon you
in this world and the Hereafter,

24:14.qpc_hafs: لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِي مَآ أَفَضۡتُمۡ فِيهِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
24:14.en_khattab: you would have certainly been touched with a tremendous punishment for what you plunged into—

24:15.en_khattab: when you passed it from one tongue to the other

24:15.qpc_hafs: وَتَقُولُونَ بِأَفۡوَاهِكُم مَّا لَيۡسَ لَكُم بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ
24:15.en_khattab: and said with your mouths what you had no knowledge of
while it is ˹extremely˺ serious in the sight of Allah.

24:16.en_khattab: If only you had said upon hearing it,

24:16.qpc_hafs: قُلۡتُم مَّا يَكُونُ لَنَآ أَن نَّتَكَلَّمَ بِهَٰذَا
24:16.en_khattab: “How can we speak about such a thing!

24:17.en_khattab: from ever doing something like this again

24:18.en_khattab: And Allah makes ˹His˺ commandments clear to you

24:19.qpc_hafs: أَن تَشِيعَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةُ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ
24:19.en_khattab: to see indecency spread among the believers
in this life and the Hereafter
Allah knows and you do not know.

24:20.en_khattab: ˹You would have suffered,˺ had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy upon you,
and had Allah not been Ever Gracious, Most Merciful.

24:21.en_khattab: Do not follow the footsteps of Satan.

24:21.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَتَّبِعۡ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَأۡمُرُ بِٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَٱلۡمُنكَرِۚ
24:21.en_khattab: Whoever follows Satan’s footsteps, then ˹let them know that˺ he surely bids ˹all to˺ immorality and wickedness.

24:21.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ مَا زَكَىٰ مِنكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ أَبَدٗا
24:21.en_khattab: Had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy upon you, none of you would have ever been purified.
But Allah purifies whoever He wills.

24:22.en_khattab: Do not let the people of virtue and affluence among you swear

24:22.qpc_hafs: وَٱلسَّعَةِ أَن يُؤۡتُوٓاْ أُوْلِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينَ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ
24:22.en_khattab: to suspend donations to their relatives, the needy, and the emigrants in the cause of Allah.

24:22.qpc_hafs: أَلَا تُحِبُّونَ أَن يَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۚ
24:22.en_khattab: Do you not love to be forgiven by Allah?
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

24:23.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَرۡمُونَ ٱلۡمُحۡصَنَٰتِ ٱلۡغَٰفِلَٰتِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ
24:23.en_khattab: Surely those who accuse chaste, unsuspecting, believing women
are cursed in this life and the Hereafter
And they will suffer a tremendous punishment

24:24.en_khattab: hands, and feet will testify against them
for what they used to do.

24:25.en_khattab: Allah will give them their just penalty in full,
that Allah ˹alone˺ is the Ultimate Truth.

24:26.en_khattab: Wicked women are for wicked men,
and wicked men are for wicked women.
And virtuous women are for virtuous men,
and virtuous men are for virtuous women.
The virtuous are innocent of what the wicked say.
They will have forgiveness and an honourable provision.

24:27.en_khattab: Do not enter any house other than your own
until you have asked for permission and greeted its occupants.
so perhaps you will be mindful.

24:28.en_khattab: If you find no one at home
do not enter it until you have been given permission
And if you are asked to leave, then leave
And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of what you do

24:29.en_khattab: There is no blame on you
where there is something of benefit for you.
And Allah knows what you reveal

24:30.en_khattab: to lower their gaze and guard their chastity.
Surely Allah is All-Aware of what they do.

24:31.en_khattab: to lower their gaze and guard their chastity

24:31.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يُبۡدِينَ زِينَتَهُنَّ إِلَّا مَا ظَهَرَ مِنۡهَاۖ
24:31.en_khattab: and not to reveal their adornments except what normally appears
Let them draw their veils over their chests

24:31.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يُبۡدِينَ زِينَتَهُنَّ إِلَّا لِبُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوۡ ءَابَآئِهِنَّ
24:31.en_khattab: and not reveal their ˹hidden˺ adornments except to their husbands, their fathers

24:31.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُنَّ أَوِ ٱلتَّٰبِعِينَ غَيۡرِ أُوْلِي ٱلۡإِرۡبَةِ مِنَ ٱلرِّجَالِ أَوِ ٱلطِّفۡلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَمۡ يَظۡهَرُواْ عَلَىٰ عَوۡرَٰتِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۖ
24:31.en_khattab: those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession, male attendants with no desire, or children who are still unaware of women’s nakedness

24:31.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَضۡرِبۡنَ بِأَرۡجُلِهِنَّ لِيُعۡلَمَ مَا يُخۡفِينَ مِن زِينَتِهِنَّۚ
24:31.en_khattab: Let them not stomp their feet, drawing attention to their hidden adornments

24:31.qpc_hafs: وَتُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ جَمِيعًا أَيُّهَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
24:31.en_khattab: Turn to Allah in repentance all together, O believers, so that you may be successful

24:32.en_khattab: Marry off the ˹free˺ singles among you
as well as the righteous of your bondmen and bondwomen

24:32.qpc_hafs: إِن يَكُونُواْ فُقَرَآءَ يُغۡنِهِمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦۗ
24:32.en_khattab: If they are poor, Allah will enrich them out of His bounty

24:33.en_khattab: And let those who do not have the means to marry keep themselves chaste
until Allah enriches them out of His bounty.

24:33.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَبۡتَغُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِمَّا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُكُمۡ
24:33.en_khattab: And if any of those ˹bondspeople˺ in your possession desires a deed of emancipation,
make it possible for them, if you find goodness in them.

24:33.qpc_hafs: وَءَاتُوهُم مِّن مَّالِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَاتَىٰكُمۡۚ
24:33.en_khattab: And give them some of Allah’s wealth which He has granted you.
Do not force your ˹slave˺ girls into prostitution

24:33.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَرَدۡنَ تَحَصُّنٗا لِّتَبۡتَغُواْ عَرَضَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ
24:33.en_khattab: your own worldly gains while they wish to remain chaste.

24:33.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُكۡرِههُّنَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ إِكۡرَٰهِهِنَّ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
24:33.en_khattab: And if someone coerces them, then after such a coercion Allah is certainly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful ˹to them˺.

24:34.en_khattab: Indeed, We have sent down to you clear revelations,

24:34.qpc_hafs: وَمَثَلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ
24:34.en_khattab: along with examples of those who had gone before you,
and a lesson to the God-fearing.

24:35.en_khattab: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.
His light is like a niche in which there is a lamp,
the lamp is in a crystal,
the crystal is like a shining star,
lit from ˹the oil of˺ a blessed olive tree,
˹located˺ neither to the east nor the west,

24:35.qpc_hafs: يَكَادُ زَيۡتُهَا يُضِيٓءُ وَلَوۡ لَمۡ تَمۡسَسۡهُ نَارٞۚ
24:35.en_khattab: whose oil would almost glow, even without being touched by fire.
Allah guides whoever He wills to His light.
And Allah sets forth parables for humanity.
For Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

24:36.en_khattab: which Allah has ordered to be raised,
and where His Name is mentioned.
He is glorified there morning and evening

24:37.qpc_hafs: لَّا تُلۡهِيهِمۡ تِجَٰرَةٞ وَلَا بَيۡعٌ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ
24:37.en_khattab: who are not distracted— either by buying or selling— from Allah’s remembrance
or performing prayer, or paying alms-tax

24:37.qpc_hafs: يَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا تَتَقَلَّبُ فِيهِ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ
24:37.en_khattab: They fear a Day when hearts and eyes will tremble

24:38.en_khattab: ˹hoping˺ that Allah may reward them according to the best of their deeds,
and increase them out of His grace.

24:38.qpc_hafs: وَٱللَّهُ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ
24:38.en_khattab: And Allah provides for whoever He wills without limit.

24:39.en_khattab: their deeds are like a mirage in a desert,
which the thirsty perceive as water,
they find it to be nothing.

24:39.qpc_hafs: وَوَجَدَ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥ فَوَفَّىٰهُ حِسَابَهُۥۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
24:39.en_khattab: Instead, they find Allah there ˹in the Hereafter, ready˺ to settle their account. And Allah is swift in reckoning.

24:40.en_khattab: Or their deeds are like the darkness in a deep sea,

24:40.qpc_hafs: يَغۡشَىٰهُ مَوۡجٞ مِّن فَوۡقِهِۦ مَوۡجٞ مِّن فَوۡقِهِۦ سَحَابٞۚ
24:40.en_khattab: covered by waves upon waves, topped by dark clouds.

24:40.qpc_hafs: إِذَآ أَخۡرَجَ يَدَهُۥ لَمۡ يَكَدۡ يَرَىٰهَاۗ
24:40.en_khattab: If one stretches out their hand, they can hardly see it.

24:40.qpc_hafs: وَمَن لَّمۡ يَجۡعَلِ ٱللَّهُ لَهُۥ نُورٗا فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن نُّورٍ
24:40.en_khattab: And whoever Allah does not bless with light will have no light!

24:41.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلطَّيۡرُ صَٰٓفَّٰتٖۖ
24:41.en_khattab: Do you not see that Allah is glorified by all those in the heavens and the earth, even the birds as they soar?
Each ˹instinctively˺ knows their manner of prayer and glorification.
And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all they do.

24:42.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
And to Allah is the final return.

24:43.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُزۡجِي سَحَابٗا
24:43.en_khattab: Do you not see that Allah gently drives the clouds
from which you see raindrops come forth

24:43.qpc_hafs: وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مِن جِبَالٖ فِيهَا مِنۢ بَرَدٖ
24:43.en_khattab: And He sends down from the sky mountains ˹of clouds˺ loaded with hail

24:43.qpc_hafs: فَيُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَصۡرِفُهُۥ عَن مَّن يَشَآءُۖ
24:43.en_khattab: pouring it on whoever He wills and averting it from whoever He wills
The flash of the clouds’ lightning nearly takes away eyesight

24:44.en_khattab: Allah alternates the day and night.
Surely in this is a lesson

24:45.qpc_hafs: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَ كُلَّ دَآبَّةٖ مِّن مَّآءٖۖ
24:45.en_khattab: And Allah has created from water every living creature.

24:45.qpc_hafs: فَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَمۡشِي عَلَىٰ بَطۡنِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَمۡشِي عَلَىٰ رِجۡلَيۡنِ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَمۡشِي عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعٖۚ
24:45.en_khattab: Some of them crawl on their bellies, some walk on two legs, and some walk on four.

24:45.qpc_hafs: يَخۡلُقُ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
24:45.en_khattab: Allah creates whatever He wills. Surely Allah is Most Capable of everything.

24:46.en_khattab: We have indeed sent down revelations clarifying ˹the truth˺.
But Allah ˹only˺ guides whoever He wills

24:47.en_khattab: And the hypocrites say, “We believe in Allah and the Messenger, and we obey.”

24:47.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّىٰ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۚ
24:47.en_khattab: Then a group of them turns away soon after that.

24:48.en_khattab: And as soon as they are called to Allah and His Messenger
so he may judge between them
a group of them turns away

24:49.en_khattab: But if the truth is in their favour

24:50.en_khattab: Is there a sickness in their hearts?

24:50.qpc_hafs: أَمۡ يَخَافُونَ أَن يَحِيفَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَرَسُولُهُۥۚ
24:50.en_khattab: Or do they fear that Allah and His Messenger will be unjust to them?
In fact, it is they who are the ˹true˺ wrongdoers.

24:51.en_khattab: The only response of the ˹true˺ believers
when they are called to Allah and His Messenger
so he may judge between them
is to say, “We hear and obey.”
It is they who will ˹truly˺ succeed.

24:52.en_khattab: For whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger,
and fears Allah and is mindful of Him,
then it is they who will ˹truly˺ triumph.

24:53.en_khattab: They swear by Allah their most solemn oaths
that if you ˹O Prophet˺ were to command them, they would certainly march forth ˹in Allah’s cause˺
Say, “˹You˺ do not ˹have to˺ swear; your obedience is well known!”
Surely Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

24:54.en_khattab: then he is only responsible for his duty
and you are responsible for yours.
And if you obey him, you will be ˹rightly˺ guided.

24:54.qpc_hafs: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
24:54.en_khattab: The Messenger’s duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly.

24:55.qpc_hafs: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ
24:55.en_khattab: Allah has promised those of you who believe and do good

24:55.qpc_hafs: لَيَسۡتَخۡلِفَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمَا ٱسۡتَخۡلَفَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ
24:55.en_khattab: that He will certainly make them successors in the land, as He did with those before them;

24:55.qpc_hafs: وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ دِينَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي ٱرۡتَضَىٰ لَهُمۡ
24:55.en_khattab: and will surely establish for them their faith which He has chosen for them;
and will indeed change their fear into
security—˹provided that˺ they worship Me, associating nothing with Me.

24:55.qpc_hafs: وَمَن كَفَرَ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
24:55.en_khattab: But whoever disbelieves after this ˹promise˺, it is they who will be the rebellious.

24:56.en_khattab: so you may be shown mercy.

24:57.qpc_hafs: لَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ
24:57.en_khattab: Do not think ˹O Prophet˺ that the disbelievers can escape in the land.
The Fire will be their home.

24:58.qpc_hafs: لِيَسۡتَـٔۡذِنكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُكُمۡ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَمۡ يَبۡلُغُواْ ٱلۡحُلُمَ مِنكُمۡ
24:58.en_khattab: Let those ˹bondspeople˺ in your possession and those of you who are still under age ask for your permission ˹to
when you take off your ˹outer˺ clothes at noon,
and after the late evening prayer.

24:58.qpc_hafs: لَّكُمۡۚ لَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ جُنَاحُۢ بَعۡدَهُنَّۚ
24:58.en_khattab: for you. Other than these times, there is no blame on you or them to move freely,
This is how Allah makes the revelations clear to you,

24:59.en_khattab: And when your children reach the age of puberty,

24:59.qpc_hafs: فَلۡيَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُواْ كَمَا ٱسۡتَـٔۡذَنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ
24:59.en_khattab: let them seek permission ˹to come in˺, as their seniors do.
This is how Allah makes His revelations clear to you,

24:60.en_khattab: there is no blame on them

24:60.qpc_hafs: أَن يَضَعۡنَ ثِيَابَهُنَّ غَيۡرَ مُتَبَرِّجَٰتِۭ بِزِينَةٖۖ
