27:86.en_khattab: Do they not see that We made the night

27:87.en_khattab: And ˹beware of˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown,

27:87.qpc_hafs: فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
27:87.en_khattab: and all those in the heavens and all those on the earth will be horrified ˹to the point of death˺,
And all will come before Him, fully humbled.

27:88.en_khattab: but they are travelling ˹just˺ like clouds.
Surely He is All-Aware of what you do.

27:89.en_khattab: Whoever comes with a good deed
will be rewarded with what is better
and they will be secure from the horror on that Day

27:90.en_khattab: And whoever comes with an evil deed
will be hurled face-first into the Fire.

27:90.qpc_hafs: هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
27:90.en_khattab: Are you rewarded except for what you used to do?

27:91.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I have only been commanded to worship the Lord

27:91.qpc_hafs: هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡبَلۡدَةِ ٱلَّذِي حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَيۡءٖۖ
27:91.en_khattab: of this city ˹of Mecca˺, Who has made it sacred, and to Him belongs everything.
And I am commanded to be one of those who ˹fully˺ submit ˹to Him˺.

27:92.en_khattab: Then whoever chooses to be guided, it is only for their own good.

27:92.qpc_hafs: وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنذِرِينَ
27:92.en_khattab: But whoever chooses to stray, say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I am only a warner.”

27:93.en_khattab: And say, “All praise is for Allah!
He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them.
And your Lord is never unaware

28:3.en_khattab: part of the story of Moses and Pharaoh

28:4.en_khattab: Indeed, Pharaoh ˹arrogantly˺ elevated himself in the land
and divided its people into ˹subservient˺ groups
slaughtering their sons and keeping their women
He was truly one of the corruptors.

28:5.en_khattab: But it was Our Will to favour
those who were oppressed in the land

28:6.en_khattab: and to establish them in the land;
and through them show Pharaoh, Hamân,
and their soldiers ˹the fulfilment of˺ what they feared.

28:7.en_khattab: We inspired the mother of Moses:
Nurse him, but when you fear for him,

28:7.qpc_hafs: فَأَلۡقِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَلَا تَخَافِي وَلَا تَحۡزَنِيٓۖ
28:7.en_khattab: put him then into the river, and do not fear or grieve.

28:7.qpc_hafs: إِنَّا رَآدُّوهُ إِلَيۡكِ وَجَاعِلُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
28:7.en_khattab: We will certainly return him to you, and make him one of the messengers.

28:8.en_khattab: ˹it so happened that˺ Pharaoh’s people picked him up,
only to become their enemy and source of grief.

28:8.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا كَانُواْ خَٰطِـِٔينَ
28:8.en_khattab: Surely Pharaoh, Hamân, and their soldiers were sinful.

28:9.en_khattab: ˹This baby is˺ a source of joy for me and you.
Do not kill him. Perhaps he may be useful to us.
Or we may adopt him as a son.
They were unaware ˹of what was to come˺.

28:10.en_khattab: And the heart of Moses’ mother ached so much
that she almost gave away his identity,
had We not reassured her heart
in order for her to have faith ˹in Allah’s promise˺.

28:11.en_khattab: And she said to his sister,
So she watched him from a distance,

28:12.en_khattab: And We had caused him to refuse all wet-nurses at first,

28:12.qpc_hafs: فَقَالَتۡ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ بَيۡتٖ
28:12.en_khattab: so his sister suggested, “Shall I direct you to a family
who will bring him up for you and take good care of him?”

28:13.en_khattab: This is how We returned him to his mother
so that her heart would be put at ease, and not grieve
and that she would know that Allah’s promise is ˹always˺ true
But most people do not know

28:14.en_khattab: And when he reached full strength
We gave him wisdom and knowledge
This is how We reward the good-doers.

28:15.en_khattab: There he found two men fighting:
and the other of his enemies.

28:15.qpc_hafs: فَٱسۡتَغَٰثَهُ ٱلَّذِي مِن شِيعَتِهِۦ عَلَى ٱلَّذِي مِنۡ عَدُوِّهِۦ
28:15.en_khattab: The man from his people called to him for help against his foe.
Moses cried, “This is from Satan’s handiwork.
He is certainly a sworn, misleading enemy.

28:16.en_khattab: “My Lord! I have definitely wronged my soul,
˹for˺ He is indeed the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

28:17.en_khattab: My Lord! For all Your favours upon me,

28:18.en_khattab: when suddenly the one who sought his help the day before
cried out to him again for help.

28:19.qpc_hafs: أَن يَبۡطِشَ بِٱلَّذِي هُوَ عَدُوّٞ لَّهُمَا
28:19.en_khattab: Moses was about to lay his hands on their foe
Do you intend to kill me as you killed

28:19.qpc_hafs: إِن تُرِيدُ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ جَبَّارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
28:19.en_khattab: You only want to be a tyrant in the land

28:19.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تُرِيدُ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصۡلِحِينَ
28:19.en_khattab: You do not intend to make peace!

28:20.qpc_hafs: وَجَآءَ رَجُلٞ مِّنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ يَسۡعَىٰ
28:20.en_khattab: And there came a man, rushing from the farthest end of the city.

28:20.qpc_hafs: قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّ ٱلۡمَلَأَ يَأۡتَمِرُونَ بِكَ لِيَقۡتُلُوكَ
28:20.en_khattab: He said, “O Moses! The chiefs are actually conspiring against you to put you to death.
so leave ˹the city˺. I really advise you ˹to do so˺.

28:21.en_khattab: in a state of fear and caution

28:22.en_khattab: And as he made his way towards Midian,

28:22.qpc_hafs: قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
28:22.en_khattab: he said, “I trust my Lord will guide me to the right way.”

28:23.en_khattab: When he arrived at the well of Midian,

28:23.qpc_hafs: وَجَدَ عَلَيۡهِ أُمَّةٗ مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡقُونَ
28:23.en_khattab: he found a group of people watering ˹their herds˺.
Apart from them, he noticed two women holding back ˹their herd˺.

28:23.qpc_hafs: قَالَتَا لَا نَسۡقِي حَتَّىٰ يُصۡدِرَ ٱلرِّعَآءُۖ
28:23.en_khattab: They replied, “We cannot water ˹our animals˺ until the ˹other˺ shepherds are done,
for our father is a very old man.

28:24.en_khattab: So he watered ˹their herd˺ for them,

28:24.qpc_hafs: فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ إِلَيَّ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ
28:24.en_khattab: and prayed, “My Lord! I am truly in ˹desperate˺ need of whatever provision
You may have in store for me.”

28:25.en_khattab: Then one of the two women came to him

28:25.qpc_hafs: قَالَتۡ إِنَّ أَبِي يَدۡعُوكَ لِيَجۡزِيَكَ أَجۡرَ مَا سَقَيۡتَ لَنَاۚ
28:25.en_khattab: She said, “My father is inviting you so he may reward you for watering ˹our animals˺ for us.”
When Moses came to him and told him his whole story

28:25.qpc_hafs: قَالَ لَا تَخَفۡۖ نَجَوۡتَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
28:25.en_khattab: the old man said, “Have no fear! You are ˹now˺ safe from the wrongdoing people.”

28:26.en_khattab: One of the two daughters suggested

28:26.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
28:26.en_khattab: The best man for employment is definitely the strong and trustworthy ˹one˺.

28:27.qpc_hafs: أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُنكِحَكَ إِحۡدَى ٱبۡنَتَيَّ هَٰتَيۡنِ
28:27.en_khattab: “I wish to marry one of these two daughters of mine to you,
provided that you stay in my service for eight years.
If you complete ten, it will be ˹a favour˺ from you,
but I do not wish to make it difficult for you.

28:27.qpc_hafs: سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
28:27.en_khattab: Allah willing, you will find me an agreeable man.

28:28.en_khattab: Moses responded, “˹Then˺ it is ˹settled˺ between you and I.

28:28.qpc_hafs: أَيَّمَا ٱلۡأَجَلَيۡنِ قَضَيۡتُ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ عَلَيَّۖ
28:28.en_khattab: Whichever term I fulfill, there will be no ˹further˺ obligation on me.
And Allah is a Witness to what we say.

28:29.en_khattab: When Moses had completed the term
and was travelling with his family
he spotted a fire on the side of Mount Ṭûr

28:29.qpc_hafs: قَالَ لِأَهۡلِهِ ٱمۡكُثُوٓاْ إِنِّيٓ ءَانَسۡتُ نَارٗا
28:29.en_khattab: He said to his family, “Stay here, ˹for˺ I have spotted a fire

28:29.qpc_hafs: لَّعَلِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنۡهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوۡ جَذۡوَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَصۡطَلُونَ
28:29.en_khattab: Perhaps from there I can bring you some directions or a torch from the fire so you may warm yourselves.

28:30.en_khattab: But when he came to it,
he was called from the bush in the sacred ground to the right side of the valley:
“O Moses! It is truly I. I am Allah— the Lord of all worlds.

28:31.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنّٞ وَلَّىٰ مُدۡبِرٗا
28:31.en_khattab: But when he saw it slithering like a snake, he ran away without looking back.

28:31.qpc_hafs: أَقۡبِلۡ وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ إِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓمِنِينَ
28:31.en_khattab: Draw near, and have no fear. You are perfectly secure.

28:32.en_khattab: Now put your hand through ˹the opening of˺ your collar,
it will come out ˹shining˺ white, unblemished.
And cross your arms tightly to calm your fears.

28:32.qpc_hafs: فَذَٰنِكَ بُرۡهَٰنَانِ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦٓۚ
28:32.en_khattab: These are two proofs from your Lord to Pharaoh and his chiefs.
They have truly been a rebellious people.

28:33.en_khattab: My Lord! I have indeed killed a man from them,
so I fear they may kill me.

28:34.en_khattab: as a helper to support what I say
for I truly fear they may reject me.

28:35.en_khattab: Allah responded, “We will assist you with your brother
so they cannot harm you. With Our signs,
you and those who follow you will ˹certainly˺ prevail.

28:36.en_khattab: But when Moses came to them with Our clear signs

28:36.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّفۡتَرٗى
28:36.en_khattab: they said ˹arrogantly˺, “This is nothing but conjured magic ˹tricks˺

28:36.qpc_hafs: وَمَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِيٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
28:36.en_khattab: We have never heard of this in ˹the history of˺ our forefathers.

28:37.qpc_hafs: رَبِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ مِنۡ عِندِهِۦ
28:37.en_khattab: My Lord knows best who has come with ˹true˺ guidance from Him
and will fare best in the end.
Indeed, the wrongdoers will never succeed.

28:38.qpc_hafs: مَا عَلِمۡتُ لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرِي
28:38.en_khattab: I know of no other god for you but myself.
So bake bricks out of clay for me, O  Hamân,

28:38.qpc_hafs: فَٱجۡعَل لِّي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَطَّلِعُ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِ مُوسَىٰ
28:38.en_khattab: and build a high tower so I may look at the God of Moses,
although I am sure he is a liar.

28:39.qpc_hafs: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ
28:39.en_khattab: And so he and his soldiers behaved arrogantly in the land with no right
thinking they would never be returned to Us

28:40.en_khattab: So We seized him and his soldiers,
See then what was the end of the wrongdoers!

28:41.en_khattab: And on the Day of Judgment

28:42.en_khattab: We caused a curse to follow them in this world.
And on the Day of Judgment
they will be among the outcasts.

28:43.en_khattab: Indeed, We gave Moses the Scripture

28:43.qpc_hafs: مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

28:43.en_khattab: as an insight for the people
so perhaps they would be mindful

28:44.en_khattab: on the western side of the mountain when We entrusted the Commandments to Moses
nor were you present in his time

28:45.en_khattab: and the ages took their toll on them.

28:45.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كُنتَ ثَاوِيٗا فِيٓ أَهۡلِ مَدۡيَنَ تَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا
28:45.en_khattab: Nor were you living among the people of Midian, rehearsing Our revelations with them.
But it is We Who have sent ˹this revelation to you˺.

28:46.en_khattab: And you were not at the side of Mount Ṭûr
But ˹you have been sent˺ as a mercy from your Lord

28:46.qpc_hafs: مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ
28:46.en_khattab: to whom no warner has come before you
so perhaps they may be mindful

28:47.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن تُصِيبَهُم مُّصِيبَةُۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ
28:47.en_khattab: Also so they would not say, if struck by an affliction for what their hands have done

28:47.qpc_hafs: فَيَقُولُواْ رَبَّنَا لَوۡلَآ أَرۡسَلۡتَ إِلَيۡنَا رَسُولٗا
28:47.en_khattab: Our Lord! If only You had sent us a messenger
we would have followed Your revelations and become believers.

28:48.en_khattab: But when the truth came to them from Us,

28:48.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُوتِيَ مِثۡلَ مَآ أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰٓۚ
28:48.en_khattab: they said, “If only he was given the like of what Moses had been given.”

28:48.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۖ
28:48.en_khattab: Did they not deny what had been given to Moses earlier?

28:48.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ سِحۡرَانِ تَظَٰهَرَا وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِكُلّٖ كَٰفِرُونَ
28:48.en_khattab: They claimed, “Both ˹Scriptures˺ are works of magic, supporting each other!” Adding, “We truly deny both.”

28:49.en_khattab: which is a better guide than these two

28:50.en_khattab: So if they fail to respond to you,
then know that they only follow their desires.

28:50.qpc_hafs: وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ بِغَيۡرِ هُدٗى مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ
28:50.en_khattab: And who could be more astray than those who follow their desires with no guidance from Allah?

28:50.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
28:50.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

28:51.en_khattab: We have steadily delivered the Word ˹of Allah˺
to the people so they may be mindful.

28:52.en_khattab: ˹As for˺ those ˹faithful˺ to whom We had given the Scripture before this ˹Quran˺,

28:53.en_khattab: When it is recited to them
This is definitely the truth from our Lord.
We had already submitted ˹even˺ before this.

28:54.en_khattab: These ˹believers˺ will be given a double reward
and for donating from what We have provided for them.

28:55.en_khattab: saying, “We are accountable for our deeds and you for yours.
Peace ˹is our only response˺ to you!
We want nothing to do with those who act ignorantly.

28:56.en_khattab: You surely cannot guide whoever you like ˹O Prophet˺,
but it is Allah Who guides whoever He wills
and He knows best who are ˹fit to be˺ guided

28:57.en_khattab: They say ˹to the Prophet˺, If we were to follow ˹true˺ guidance with you
we would certainly be snatched away from our land.

28:57.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ نُمَكِّن لَّهُمۡ حَرَمًا ءَامِنٗا يُجۡبَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِ
28:57.en_khattab: Have We not established for them a safe haven ˹in Mecca˺ to which

28:57.qpc_hafs: ثَمَرَٰتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ رِّزۡقٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا
28:57.en_khattab: fruits of all kinds are brought as a provision from Us?
But most of them do not know ˹this favour˺.

28:58.qpc_hafs: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةِۭ بَطِرَتۡ مَعِيشَتَهَاۖ
28:58.en_khattab: ˹Imagine˺ how many societies We have destroyed that had been spoiled by their ˹comfortable˺ living!

28:58.qpc_hafs: فَتِلۡكَ مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡ لَمۡ تُسۡكَن مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ
28:58.en_khattab: Those are their residences, never inhabited after them except passingly.

28:59.en_khattab: Your Lord would never destroy a society

28:59.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰ يَبۡعَثَ فِيٓ أُمِّهَا رَسُولٗا يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَاۚ
28:59.en_khattab: until He had sent to its capital a messenger, reciting Our revelations to them.

28:59.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كُنَّا مُهۡلِكِي ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا وَأَهۡلُهَا ظَٰلِمُونَ
28:59.en_khattab: Nor would We ever destroy a society unless its people persisted in wrongdoing.

28:60.en_khattab: is no more than ˹a fleeting˺ enjoyment and adornment of this worldly life.
But what is with Allah is far better and more lasting.

28:61.en_khattab: Can those to whom We have made a fine promise
be like those who We have allowed to enjoy the pleasures of this worldly life
but on the Day of Judgment

28:62.en_khattab: ˹Watch for˺ the Day He will call to them,

28:63.en_khattab: Those ˹misleaders˺ against whom the decree ˹of torment˺ is justified will cry,

28:63.qpc_hafs: رَبَّنَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَغۡوَيۡنَآ أَغۡوَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا غَوَيۡنَاۖ
28:63.en_khattab: “Our Lord! These ˹followers˺ are the ones we caused to deviate. We led them into deviance, for we ourselves were deviant.
We disassociate ourselves ˹from them˺ before You.
It was not us that they used to worship.

28:64.en_khattab: It will be said ˹to the disbelievers˺, “Call upon your associate-gods ˹for help˺.”
So they will call them, but will receive no response.
And they will face the punishment,

28:65.en_khattab: And ˹watch for˺ the Day He will call to them

28:66.en_khattab: They will be too dumbstruck on that Day

28:67.en_khattab: it is right to hope that they will be among the successful.

28:68.en_khattab: Your Lord creates and chooses whatever He wills—

28:70.en_khattab: There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him.
All praise belongs to Him in this life and the next.
And to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.

28:71.qpc_hafs: أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ سَرۡمَدًا
28:71.en_khattab: “Imagine if Allah were to make the night perpetual for you

28:71.qpc_hafs: إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِضِيَآءٍۚ
28:71.en_khattab: until the Day of Judgment, which god other than Allah could bring you sunlight?

28:72.qpc_hafs: أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلنَّهَارَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
28:72.en_khattab: Imagine if Allah were to make the day perpetual for you until the Day of Judgment

28:72.qpc_hafs: مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِلَيۡلٖ تَسۡكُنُونَ فِيهِۚ
28:72.en_khattab: which god other than Allah could bring you night to rest in?

28:73.en_khattab: It is out of His mercy
that He has made for you the day and night
so that you may rest ˹in the latter˺
and seek His bounty ˹in the former˺
and perhaps you will be grateful.

28:74.en_khattab: And ˹watch for˺ the Day He will call to them,

28:75.en_khattab: And We will bring forth a witness from every faith-community
Then they will ˹come to˺ know that the truth is with Allah ˹alone˺.
And whatever ˹gods˺ they fabricated will fail them.

28:76.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ قَٰرُونَ كَانَ مِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰ
28:76.en_khattab: Indeed, Korah was from the people of Moses,
but he behaved arrogantly towards them.
We had granted him such treasures

28:76.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ مَفَاتِحَهُۥ لَتَنُوٓأُ بِٱلۡعُصۡبَةِ أُوْلِي ٱلۡقُوَّةِ
28:76.en_khattab: that even their keys would burden a group of strong men.
Some of his people advised him,
Surely Allah does not like the prideful.

28:77.qpc_hafs: وَٱبۡتَغِ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۖ
28:77.en_khattab: Rather, seek the ˹reward˺ of the Hereafter by means of what Allah has granted you
without forgetting your share of this world
And be good ˹to others˺ as Allah has been good to you
Do not seek to spread corruption in the land
for Allah certainly does not like the corruptors

28:78.qpc_hafs: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أُوتِيتُهُۥ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عِندِيٓۚ
28:78.en_khattab: He replied, “I have been granted all this because of some knowledge I have.”

28:78.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ أَهۡلَكَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مَنۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُ قُوَّةٗ وَأَكۡثَرُ جَمۡعٗاۚ
28:78.en_khattab: Did he not know that Allah had already destroyed some from the generations before him who were far superior to him in power and greater in accumulating ˹wealth˺?
There will be no need for the wicked to be asked about their sins.

28:79.en_khattab: Then he came out before his people in all his glamour.
Those who desired the life of this world wished,

28:79.qpc_hafs: يَٰلَيۡتَ لَنَا مِثۡلَ مَآ أُوتِيَ قَٰرُونُ
28:79.en_khattab: If only we could have something like what Korah has been given.
He is truly a man of great fortune!

28:80.en_khattab: But those gifted with knowledge said,

28:80.qpc_hafs: وَيۡلَكُمۡ ثَوَابُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لِّمَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗاۚ
28:80.en_khattab: “Shame on you! Allah’s reward is far better for those who believe and do good.
But none will attain this except the steadfast.

28:81.en_khattab: Then We caused the earth to swallow him up, along with his home.

28:81.qpc_hafs: فَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ مِن فِئَةٖ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
28:81.en_khattab: There was no one to help him against Allah.
Nor could he even help himself.

28:82.en_khattab: And those who had craved his position the previous day

28:82.qpc_hafs: يَقُولُونَ وَيۡكَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُۖ
28:82.en_khattab: began to say, “Ah! It is certainly Allah Who gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills of His servants.

28:82.qpc_hafs: لَوۡلَآ أَن مَّنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا لَخَسَفَ بِنَاۖ
28:82.en_khattab: Had it not been for the grace of Allah, He could have surely caused the earth to swallow us up!
Oh, indeed! The disbelievers will never succeed.

28:83.qpc_hafs: نَجۡعَلُهَا لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُرِيدُونَ عُلُوّٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فَسَادٗاۚ
28:83.en_khattab: We reserve ˹only˺ for those who seek neither tyranny nor corruption on the earth
The ultimate outcome belongs ˹only˺ to the righteous

28:84.en_khattab: Whoever comes with a good deed
will be rewarded with what is better
And whoever comes with an evil deed
then the evildoers will only be rewarded
for what they used to do

28:85.en_khattab: Most certainly, the One Who has ordained the Quran for you

28:86.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ
28:86.en_khattab: You never expected this Book to be revealed to you, but ˹it came˺ only ˹as˺ a mercy from your Lord.
So never side with the disbelievers ˹in their disbelief˺.

28:87.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُنزِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَۖ
28:87.en_khattab: Do not let them turn you away from the revelations of Allah after they have been sent down to you.
Rather, invite ˹all˺ to ˹the Way of˺ your Lord,
and never be one of the polytheists.

28:88.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ
28:88.en_khattab: And do not invoke any other god with Allah.
There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him.
Everything is bound to perish except He Himself.
And to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.

29:2.en_khattab: that they will be left without being put to the test?

29:3.en_khattab: We certainly tested those before them.
And ˹in this way˺ Allah will clearly distinguish between those who are truthful.

29:4.en_khattab: ˹simply˺ think that they will escape Us?

29:5.en_khattab: Whoever hopes for the meeting with Allah,
˹let them know that˺ Allah’s appointed time is sure to come.

29:6.en_khattab: only does so for their own good.
Surely Allah is not in need of ˹any of˺ His creation.

29:7.en_khattab: As for those who believe and do good
We will certainly absolve them of their sins
and reward them according to the best of what they used to do

29:8.en_khattab: We have commanded people to honour their parents.

29:8.qpc_hafs: وَإِن جَٰهَدَاكَ لِتُشۡرِكَ بِي مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ
29:8.en_khattab: But if they urge you to associate with Me what you have no knowledge of,
and then I will inform you of what you used to do.

29:9.en_khattab: will surely be admitted by Us

29:10.qpc_hafs: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ
29:10.en_khattab: There are some who say, “We believe in Allah,”

29:10.qpc_hafs: فَإِذَآ أُوذِيَ فِي ٱللَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتۡنَةَ ٱلنَّاسِ كَعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِۖ
29:10.en_khattab: but when they suffer in the cause of Allah, they mistake ˹this˺ persecution at the hands of people for the punishment of Allah.

29:10.qpc_hafs: وَلَئِن جَآءَ نَصۡرٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّا كُنَّا مَعَكُمۡۚ
29:10.en_khattab: But when victory comes from your Lord, they surely say ˹to the believers˺, “We have always been with you.”

29:10.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِمَا فِي صُدُورِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
29:10.en_khattab: Does Allah not know best what is in the hearts of all beings?

29:11.en_khattab: Allah will certainly distinguish between those who have ˹sure˺ faith

29:12.en_khattab: The disbelievers say to the believers
just follow our way, and we will bear ˹the burden of˺ your sins

29:12.qpc_hafs: وَمَا هُم بِحَٰمِلِينَ مِنۡ خَطَٰيَٰهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍۖ
29:12.en_khattab: But they would never ˹want to˺ bear any of the believers’ sins

29:13.en_khattab: Yet they will certainly ˹be made to˺ carry their own burdens
as well as other burdens along with their own
And they will surely be questioned on Judgment Day
about what they used to fabricate

29:14.en_khattab: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people,

29:14.qpc_hafs: فَلَبِثَ فِيهِمۡ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٍ إِلَّا خَمۡسِينَ عَامٗا
29:14.en_khattab: and he remained among them for a thousand years, less fifty.

29:16.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when Abraham said to his people,

29:16.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
29:16.en_khattab: This is better for you, if only you knew.

29:17.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡثَٰنٗا
29:17.en_khattab: You worship besides Allah nothing but idols

29:17.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ لَكُمۡ رِزۡقٗا
29:17.en_khattab: Those you worship besides Allah certainly cannot give you any provision

29:17.qpc_hafs: فَٱبۡتَغُواْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرِّزۡقَ وَٱعۡبُدُوهُ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لَهُۥٓۖ
29:17.en_khattab: So seek provision from Allah ˹alone˺, worship Him, and be grateful to Him
To Him you will ˹all˺ be returned

29:18.qpc_hafs: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
29:18.en_khattab: The Messenger’s duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly.

29:19.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ
29:19.en_khattab: Have they not seen how Allah originates the creation
That is certainly easy for Allah.

29:20.en_khattab: and see how He originated the creation,
then Allah will bring it into being one more time.

29:20.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
29:20.en_khattab: Surely Allah is Most Capable of everything.

29:21.en_khattab: and shows mercy to whoever He wills.
And you will ˹all˺ be returned to Him.

29:22.en_khattab: And you cannot escape Him on earth

29:22.qpc_hafs: وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٖ
29:22.en_khattab: Nor have you any protector or helper besides Allah.”

29:23.en_khattab: As for those who disbelieve in Allah’s signs and the meeting with Him,
it is they who will have no hope in His mercy.
And it is they who will suffer a painful punishment.

29:24.en_khattab: But the only response of Abraham’s people was

29:24.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ ٱقۡتُلُوهُ أَوۡ حَرِّقُوهُ
29:24.en_khattab: to say: “Kill him or burn him!”
But Allah saved him from the fire.

29:24.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
29:24.en_khattab: Surely in this are signs for people who believe.

29:25.qpc_hafs: وَقَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱتَّخَذۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
29:25.en_khattab: He said ˹to his people˺, “You have taken idols ˹for worship˺ instead of Allah

29:25.qpc_hafs: أَوۡثَٰنٗا مَّوَدَّةَ بَيۡنِكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ
29:25.en_khattab: only to keep ˹the bond of˺ harmony among yourselves in this worldly life

29:25.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكۡفُرُ بَعۡضُكُم بِبَعۡضٖ وَيَلۡعَنُ بَعۡضُكُم بَعۡضٗا
29:25.en_khattab: But on the Day of Judgment you will disown and curse one another

29:25.qpc_hafs: وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ
29:25.en_khattab: Your home will be the Fire, and you will have no helper!

29:26.en_khattab: And Abraham said, 'I am emigrating' ˹in obedience˺
He ˹alone˺ is indeed the Almighty, All-Wise.

29:27.en_khattab: We blessed him with Isaac and ˹later˺ Jacob,
and reserved prophethood and revelation for his descendants.
We gave him his reward in this life,
and in the Hereafter he will certainly be among the righteous.

29:28.qpc_hafs: مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
29:28.en_khattab: that no man has ever done before you.

29:29.en_khattab: Do you really lust after ˹other˺ men
and practice immorality ˹openly˺ in your gatherings?

29:29.qpc_hafs: إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ ٱئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ
29:29.en_khattab: to say ˹mockingly˺: “Bring Allah’s punishment upon us
if what you say is true.

29:31.en_khattab: When Our messenger-angels came to Abraham with the good news ˹of

29:31.qpc_hafs: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا مُهۡلِكُوٓاْ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِۖ
29:31.en_khattab: the birth of Isaac˺, they said, “We are going to destroy the people of this city ˹of Sodom˺,
for its people have persisted in wrongdoing.”

29:32.en_khattab: They responded, “We know best who is there.
We will certainly save him and his family—
except his wife, who is one of the doomed.

29:33.en_khattab: And when Our messenger-angels came to Lot,
he was distressed and worried by their arrival.
They reassured ˹him˺, “Do not fear, nor grieve.

29:33.qpc_hafs: إِنَّا مُنَجُّوكَ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَكَ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
29:33.en_khattab: We will surely deliver you and your family— except your wife, who is one of the doomed.

29:34.en_khattab: a punishment from heaven upon the people of this city

29:35.en_khattab: [some of] its ruins as a clear

29:36.en_khattab: And to the people of Midian ˹We sent˺
He said, “O my people! Worship Allah,
and hope for ˹the reward of˺ the Last Day.
And do not go about spreading corruption in the land.

29:37.en_khattab: and they fell lifeless in their homes.

29:38.en_khattab: And the people of ’Ȃd and Thamûd ˹met a similar fate˺,
which must be clear to you ˹Meccans˺ from their ruins.
Satan made their ˹evil˺ deeds appealing to them,
although they were capable of reasoning.

29:39.en_khattab: Indeed, Moses had come to them with clear proofs,

29:39.qpc_hafs: فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانُواْ سَٰبِقِينَ
29:39.en_khattab: but they behaved arrogantly in the land. Yet they could not escape ˹Us˺.

29:40.en_khattab: So We seized each ˹people˺ for their sin:
against some of them We sent a storm of stones
some were overtaken by a ˹mighty˺ blast
some We caused the earth to swallow
Allah would not have wronged them
but it was they who wronged themselves

29:41.qpc_hafs: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَ
29:41.en_khattab: The parable of those who take protectors other than Allah
is that of a spider spinning a shelter
And the flimsiest of all shelters is certainly that of a spider

29:42.en_khattab: Allah surely knows that whatever ˹gods˺ they invoke
For He is the Almighty, All-Wise

29:43.en_khattab: but none will understand them except

29:44.en_khattab: Allah created the heavens and the earth for a purpose.
Surely in this is a sign for the people of faith.

29:45.qpc_hafs: ٱتۡلُ مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
29:45.en_khattab: Recite what has been revealed to you of the Book

29:45.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ تَنۡهَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَٱلۡمُنكَرِۗ
29:45.en_khattab: Indeed, ˹genuine˺ prayer should deter ˹one˺ from indecency and wickedness
The remembrance of Allah is ˹an˺ even greater ˹deterrent˺
And Allah ˹fully˺ knows what you ˹all˺ do

29:46.en_khattab: Do not argue with the People of the Book
except with those of them who act wrongfully.
And say, 'We believe in what has been revealed to us
and what was revealed to you.
Our God and your God is ˹only˺ One.

29:47.en_khattab: Similarly ˹to earlier messengers˺, We have revealed to you a Book ˹O Prophet˺.
˹The faithful of˺ those to whom We gave the Scriptures believe in it
as do some of these ˹pagan Arabs˺
And none denies Our revelations except the ˹stubborn˺ disbelievers.

29:48.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كُنتَ تَتۡلُواْ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مِن كِتَٰبٖ
29:48.en_khattab: You ˹O Prophet˺ could not read any writing ˹even˺ before this ˹revelation˺
nor could you write at all
Otherwise, the people of falsehood would have been suspicious

29:49.en_khattab: But this ˹Quran˺ is ˹a set of˺ clear revelations.
Preserved in the hearts of those gifted with knowledge.

29:50.qpc_hafs: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ
29:50.en_khattab: They say, “If only ˹some˺ signs had been sent down to him from his Lord!”
Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Signs are only with Allah.
And I am only sent with a clear warning.

29:51.en_khattab: Is it not enough for them
that We have sent down to you the Book
Surely in this ˹Quran˺ is a mercy
and reminder for people who believe.

29:52.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ شَهِيدٗاۖ
29:52.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Sufficient is Allah as a Witness between me and you.
He ˹fully˺ knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth.

29:52.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَكَفَرُواْ بِٱللَّهِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
29:52.en_khattab: And those who believe in falsehood and disbelieve in Allah, it is they who are the ˹true˺ losers.

29:53.en_khattab: They challenge you ˹O Prophet˺ to hasten the punishment.
Had it not been for a time already set, the punishment would have certainly come to them ˹at once˺.
But it will definitely take them by surprise when they least expect it.

29:54.en_khattab: They urge you to hasten the punishment.

29:55.en_khattab: on the Day the punishment will overwhelm them from above them
And it will be said, “Reap what you sowed.”

29:58.en_khattab: ˹As for˺ those who believe and do good,
We will certainly house them in ˹elevated˺ mansions in Paradise,
How excellent is the reward for those who work ˹righteousness!˺—

29:59.en_khattab: and put their trust in their Lord!

29:60.en_khattab: that cannot secure their provisions! ˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺
He is indeed the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

29:61.qpc_hafs: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ
29:61.en_khattab: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created the heavens and the earth and subjected the sun and the moon ˹for your benefit˺
they will certainly say, “Allah!” How can they then be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

29:62.en_khattab: Allah gives abundant or limited provisions
to whoever He wills of His servants

29:63.qpc_hafs: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّن نَّزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ
29:63.en_khattab: And if you ask them who sends down rain from the sky

29:63.qpc_hafs: فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِهَا
29:63.en_khattab: giving life to the earth after its death
In fact, most of them do not understand.

29:64.en_khattab: no more than play and amusement.
But the Hereafter is indeed the real life,

29:65.en_khattab: If they happen to be aboard a ship ˹caught in a storm˺,
they cry out to Allah ˹alone˺ in sincere devotion.
But as soon as He delivers them ˹safely˺ to shore,
they associate ˹others with Him once again˺.

29:66.en_khattab: So let them be ungrateful for all We have given them

29:67.en_khattab: how We have made ˹Mecca˺ a safe haven
whereas people ˹all˺ around them are snatched away?
How can they then believe in falsehood

29:68.qpc_hafs: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
29:68.en_khattab: And who does more wrong than those who fabricate lies against Allah
or reject the truth after it has reached them
Is Hell not a ˹fitting˺ home for the disbelievers?

29:69.en_khattab: As for those who struggle in Our cause
We will surely guide them along Our Way.
And Allah is certainly with the good-doers.

30:4.qpc_hafs: لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَمِنۢ بَعۡدُۚ
30:4.en_khattab: The ˹whole˺ matter rests with Allah before and after ˹victory˺.
And on that day the believers will rejoice.

30:5.en_khattab: at the victory willed by Allah.
He gives victory to whoever He wills.
For He is the Almighty, Most Merciful.

30:6.en_khattab: Allah never fails in His promise.
But most people do not know.

30:7.en_khattab: the worldly affairs of this life,
but are ˹totally˺ oblivious to the Hereafter.

30:8.en_khattab: Have they not reflected upon their own being?

30:8.qpc_hafs: مَّا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۗ
30:8.en_khattab: Allah only created the heavens and the earth and everything in between for a purpose and an appointed term.

30:8.qpc_hafs: وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِلِقَآيِٕ رَبِّهِمۡ لَكَٰفِرُونَ
30:8.en_khattab: Yet most people are truly in denial of the meeting with their Lord!

30:9.en_khattab: Have they not travelled throughout the land

30:9.qpc_hafs: فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ
30:9.en_khattab: to see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before them?
They were far superior in might

30:9.qpc_hafs: وَأَثَارُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَعَمَرُوهَآ أَكۡثَرَ مِمَّا عَمَرُوهَا
30:9.en_khattab: they cultivated the land and developed it more than these ˹Meccans˺ ever have
Their messengers came to them with clear proofs

30:9.qpc_hafs: فَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
30:9.en_khattab: Allah would have never wronged them, but it was they who wronged themselves

30:10.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔواْ ٱلسُّوٓأَىٰٓ
30:10.en_khattab: Then most evil was the end of the evildoers
for denying and mocking the signs of Allah.

30:11.en_khattab: It is Allah Who originates the creation,
And then to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.

30:12.en_khattab: On the Day the Hour will arrive

30:13.qpc_hafs: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُم مِّن شُرَكَآئِهِمۡ شُفَعَٰٓؤُاْ
30:13.en_khattab: There will be no intercessors for them from among their associate-gods
and they will totally deny their associate-gods

30:14.en_khattab: And on the Day the Hour will arrive
the people will then be split ˹into two groups˺

30:15.en_khattab: they will be rejoicing in a Garden.

30:16.en_khattab: And as for those who disbelieved,
and denied Our signs and the meeting ˹with Allah˺ in the Hereafter,
they will be confined in punishment.

30:18.en_khattab: in the heavens and the earth
as well as in the afternoon

30:19.en_khattab: And He gives life to the earth
And so will you be brought forth ˹from the grave˺.

30:20.en_khattab: that He created you from dust,

30:21.qpc_hafs: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَ لَكُم مِّنۡ أَنفُسِكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا لِّتَسۡكُنُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا
30:21.en_khattab: And one of His signs is that He created for you spouses from among yourselves so that you may find comfort in them.
And He has placed between you compassion and mercy.

30:21.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
30:21.en_khattab: Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

30:22.en_khattab: And one of His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth,
and the diversity of your languages and colours.
Surely in this are signs for those of ˹sound˺ knowledge.

30:23.en_khattab: is your sleep by night and by day ˹for rest˺
as well as your seeking His bounty ˹in both˺

30:24.en_khattab: And one of His signs is that He shows you lightning
And He sends down rain from the sky
reviving the earth after its death

30:24.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ
30:24.en_khattab: Surely in this are signs for people who understand

30:25.en_khattab: And one of His signs is
that the heavens and the earth persist by His command.

30:25.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ دَعۡوَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
30:25.en_khattab: Then when He calls you out of the earth just once,

30:26.en_khattab: And to Him belong all those in the heavens and the earth
all are subject to His Will

30:27.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ
30:27.en_khattab: And He is the One Who originates the creation then will resurrect it
which is even easier for Him.

30:27.qpc_hafs: وَلَهُ ٱلۡمَثَلُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ
30:27.en_khattab: To Him belong the finest attributes in the heavens and the earth.
And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

30:28.en_khattab: He sets forth for you an example ˹drawn˺ from your own lives:

30:28.qpc_hafs: هَل لَّكُم مِّن مَّا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُكُم مِّن شُرَكَآءَ فِي مَا رَزَقۡنَٰكُمۡ
30:28.en_khattab: would you allow some of those ˹bondspeople˺ in your possession to be your equal partners in whatever ˹wealth˺ We have provided you

30:28.qpc_hafs: فَأَنتُمۡ فِيهِ سَوَآءٞ تَخَافُونَهُمۡ كَخِيفَتِكُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡۚ
30:28.en_khattab: keeping them in mind as you are mindful of your peers?
This is how We make the signs clear for people who understand.

30:29.en_khattab: merely follow their desires with no knowledge.
Who then can guide those Allah has left to stray?

30:30.en_khattab: So be steadfast in faith in all uprightness ˹O

30:30.qpc_hafs: فِطۡرَتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي فَطَرَ ٱلنَّاسَ عَلَيۡهَاۚ
30:30.en_khattab: Prophet˺—the natural Way of Allah which He has instilled in ˹all˺ people.
Let there be no change in this creation of Allah.
but most people do not know.

30:31.en_khattab: ˹O believers!˺ Always turn to Him ˹in repentance˺,

30:32.en_khattab: ˹like˺ those who have divided their faith
each rejoicing in what they have.

30:33.en_khattab: When people are touched with hardship,
they cry out to their Lord, turning to Him ˹alone˺.
But as soon as He gives them a taste of His mercy,
a group of them associates ˹others˺ with their Lord ˹in worship˺,

30:34.en_khattab: becoming ungrateful for whatever ˹favours˺ We have given them.

30:35.en_khattab: Or have We sent down to them an authority

30:35.qpc_hafs: فَهُوَ يَتَكَلَّمُ بِمَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يُشۡرِكُونَ
30:35.en_khattab: which attests to what they associate ˹with Him˺?

30:36.en_khattab: If We give people a taste of mercy

30:36.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَيِّئَةُۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ
30:36.en_khattab: But if they are afflicted with an evil for what their hands have done

30:37.en_khattab: or limited provisions to whoever He wills?
are signs for people who believe.

30:38.en_khattab: So give your close relatives their due
as well as the poor and the ˹needy˺ traveller

30:38.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِۖ
30:38.en_khattab: That is best for those who seek the pleasure of Allah
and it is they who will be successful

30:39.qpc_hafs: لِّيَرۡبُوَاْ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَلَا يَرۡبُواْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ
30:39.en_khattab: only seeking interest at the expense of people’s wealth will not increase with Allah.
only seeking the pleasure of Allah— it is they

30:40.en_khattab: It is Allah Who created you,
then will cause you to die,
and then will bring you back to life.

30:40.qpc_hafs: هَلۡ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَفۡعَلُ مِن ذَٰلِكُم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ
30:40.en_khattab: Can any of your associate-gods do any of this?
Glorified and Exalted is He above what they associate with Him ˹in worship˺!

30:41.en_khattab: Corruption has spread on land and sea
as a result of what people’s hands have done
so that Allah may cause them to taste ˹the consequences of˺ some of their deeds
and perhaps they might return ˹to the Right Path˺.

30:42.qpc_hafs: فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلُۚ
30:42.en_khattab: and see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before

30:43.en_khattab: So be steadfast in the Upright Faith ˹O Prophet˺,

30:43.qpc_hafs: مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَ يَوۡمٞ لَّا مَرَدَّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۖ
30:43.en_khattab: before the coming of a Day from Allah that cannot be averted
On that Day the people will be divided

30:44.en_khattab: will bear ˹the burden of˺ their own disbelief;
will have prepared for themselves ˹eternal homes˺,

30:45.en_khattab: so that He may ˹generously˺ reward those who believe and do good
He truly does not like the disbelievers

30:46.en_khattab: And one of His signs is
that He sends the winds, ushering in good news ˹of rain˺
so that He may give you a taste of His mercy
and that ships may sail by His command
and that you may seek His bounty
and perhaps you will be grateful

30:47.en_khattab: Indeed, We sent before you ˹O Prophet˺ messengers
and they came to them with clear proofs
Then We inflicted punishment upon those who persisted in wickedness
For it is Our duty to help the believers

30:48.en_khattab: It is Allah Who sends the winds,
which then stir up ˹vapour, forming˺ clouds,
which He then spreads out in the sky or piles up into masses as He wills,
from which you see rain come forth.
Then as soon as He causes it to fall on whoever He wills of His servants,

30:48.qpc_hafs: فَإِذَآ أَصَابَ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦٓ إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ

30:49.en_khattab: it was sent down to them.

30:50.en_khattab: See then the impact of Allah’s mercy:
how He gives life to the earth after its death!
Surely That ˹same God˺ can raise the dead.
For He is Most Capable of everything.

30:51.en_khattab: Then if We send a ˹harsh˺ wind
they will definitely deny ˹old favours˺ right after.
they will definitely deny ˹old favours˺ right after

30:52.en_khattab: So you ˹O Prophet˺ certainly cannot make the dead hear ˹the truth˺.
Nor can you make the deaf hear the call
when they turn their backs and walk away.

30:53.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَٰدِ ٱلۡعُمۡيِ عَن ضَلَٰلَتِهِمۡۖ
30:53.en_khattab: Nor can you lead the blind out of their misguidance.

30:53.qpc_hafs: إِن تُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا
30:53.en_khattab: You can make none hear ˹the truth˺ except those who believe in Our revelations,

30:54.en_khattab: It is Allah Who created you in a state of weakness,

30:54.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ضَعۡفٖ قُوَّةٗ
ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ قُوَّةٖ ضَعۡفٗا وَشَيۡبَةٗۚ
30:54.en_khattab: then developed ˹your˺ strength into weakness and old age.
For He is the All-Knowing, Most Capable.

30:55.en_khattab: And on the Day the Hour will arrive

30:55.qpc_hafs: يُقۡسِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ مَا لَبِثُواْ غَيۡرَ سَاعَةٖۚ
30:55.en_khattab: the wicked will swear that they did not stay ˹in this world˺ more than an hour
In this way they were always deluded ˹in the world˺

30:56.en_khattab: But those gifted with knowledge and faith will say ˹to them˺,

30:56.qpc_hafs: لَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡبَعۡثِۖ
30:56.en_khattab: You did actually stay— as destined by Allah— until the Day of Resurrection.

30:56.qpc_hafs: فَهَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡبَعۡثِ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
30:56.en_khattab: So here is the Day of Resurrection (which you denied)! But you did not know (it was true).

30:57.en_khattab: the wrongdoers’ excuses will not benefit them
nor will they be allowed to appease

30:58.qpc_hafs: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖۚ
30:58.en_khattab: We have certainly set forth every ˹kind of˺ lesson for people in this Quran.
And no matter what sign you bring to them ˹O Prophet˺
˹to the believers˺, “You are only a people of falsehood.”

30:59.qpc_hafs: يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
30:59.en_khattab: Allah seals the hearts of those unwilling to know ˹the truth˺.

30:60.en_khattab: for the promise of Allah certainly is true.
And do not be disturbed by those who have no sure faith.

31:2.en_khattab: These are the verses of the Book,

31:4.en_khattab: and have sure faith in the Hereafter.

31:5.en_khattab: It is they who are ˹truly˺ guided by their Lord
and it is they who will be successful

31:6.en_khattab: only to lead others away from Allah’s Way
and to make a mockery of it
They will suffer a humiliating punishment.

31:7.en_khattab: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them
as if they did not hear them
as if there is deafness in their ears
So give them good news ˹O Prophet˺ of a painful punishment

31:8.en_khattab: will have the Gardens of Bliss

31:9.en_khattab: And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

31:10.en_khattab: He created the heavens without pillars

31:10.qpc_hafs: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ
31:10.en_khattab: and placed firm mountains upon the earth so it does not shake with you
and scattered throughout it all types of creatures
And We send down rain from the sky

31:10.qpc_hafs: فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ
31:10.en_khattab: causing every type of fine plant to grow on earth

31:11.qpc_hafs: فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ
31:11.en_khattab: Now show Me what those ˹gods˺ other than Him have created.
In fact, the wrongdoers are clearly astray.

31:12.en_khattab: Indeed, We blessed Luqmân with wisdom,
for whoever is grateful, it is only for their own good.

31:12.qpc_hafs: وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٞ
31:12.en_khattab: And whoever is ungrateful, then surely Allah is Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

31:13.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ قَالَ لُقۡمَٰنُ لِٱبۡنِهِۦ وَهُوَ يَعِظُهُۥ
31:13.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when Luqmân said to his son, while advising him
“O my dear son! Never associate ˹anything˺ with Allah ˹in worship˺
for associating ˹others with Him˺ is truly the worst of all wrongs.

31:14.en_khattab: And We have commanded people to ˹honour˺ their parents.
Their mothers bore them through hardship upon hardship,
and their weaning takes two years.
So be grateful to Me and your parents.
To Me is the final return.

31:15.qpc_hafs: أَن تُشۡرِكَ بِي مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ
31:15.en_khattab: to associate with Me what you have no knowledge of
Still keep their company in this world courteously
and follow the way of those who turn to Me ˹in devotion˺
Then to Me you will ˹all˺ return
and then I will inform you of what you used to do

31:16.qpc_hafs: إِنَّهَآ إِن تَكُ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّةٖ مِّنۡ خَرۡدَلٖ
31:16.en_khattab: ˹Even˺ if a deed were the weight of a mustard seed—

31:16.qpc_hafs: فَتَكُن فِي صَخۡرَةٍ أَوۡ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ أَوۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
31:16.en_khattab: be it ˹hidden˺ in a rock or in the heavens or the earth—
Surely Allah is Most Subtle, All-Aware.

31:17.en_khattab: and endure patiently whatever befalls you.
Surely this is a resolve to aspire to.

31:18.en_khattab: And do not turn your nose up to people,
nor walk pridefully upon the earth.

31:18.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٖ
31:18.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not like whoever is arrogant, boastful.

31:19.en_khattab: for the ugliest of all voices is certainly the braying of donkeys.

31:20.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
31:20.en_khattab: that Allah has subjected for you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth
and has lavished His favours upon you, both seen and unseen

31:20.qpc_hafs: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا هُدٗى وَلَا كِتَٰبٖ مُّنِيرٖ
31:20.en_khattab: Still there are some who dispute about Allah without knowledge, or guidance, or an enlightening scripture

31:21.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ
31:21.en_khattab: When it is said to them, “Follow what Allah has revealed,”

31:21.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ بَلۡ نَتَّبِعُ مَا وَجَدۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَآۚ
31:21.en_khattab: they reply, “No! We ˹only˺ follow what we found our forefathers practicing.”

31:21.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَوۡ كَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ يَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
31:21.en_khattab: ˹Would they still do so˺ even if Satan is inviting them to the torment of the Blaze?

31:22.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُسۡلِمۡ وَجۡهَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ
31:22.en_khattab: Whoever fully submits themselves to Allah and is a good-doer,
they have certainly grasped the firmest hand-hold.
And with Allah rests the outcome of ˹all˺ affairs.

31:23.en_khattab: do not let their disbelief grieve you ˹O Prophet˺.
and We will inform them of all they did.
Surely Allah knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

31:25.qpc_hafs: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ
31:25.en_khattab: And if you ask them who created the heavens and the earth,
In fact, most of them do not know.

31:26.en_khattab: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth.
Allah is truly the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

31:27.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ أَنَّمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن شَجَرَةٍ أَقۡلَٰمٞ
31:27.en_khattab: If all the trees on earth were pens

31:27.qpc_hafs: وَٱلۡبَحۡرُ يَمُدُّهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡحُرٖ
31:27.en_khattab: and the ocean ˹were ink˺, refilled by seven other oceans,
the Words of Allah would not be exhausted.

31:28.en_khattab: The creation and resurrection of you ˹all˺
is as simple ˹for Him˺ as that of a single soul.

31:29.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ
31:29.en_khattab: that Allah causes the night to merge into the day
and the day into the night
and has subjected the sun and the moon
each orbiting for an appointed term
and that Allah is All-Aware of what you do

31:30.en_khattab: That is because Allah ˹alone˺ is the Truth

31:30.qpc_hafs: وَأَنَّ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ
31:30.en_khattab: and what they invoke besides Him is falsehood
and ˹because˺ Allah ˹alone˺ is the Most High, All-Great

31:31.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ تَجۡرِي فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ
31:31.en_khattab: Do you not see that the ships sail ˹smoothly˺ through the sea
by the grace of Allah so that He may show you some of His signs

31:31.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٖ
31:31.en_khattab: Surely in this are signs for whoever is steadfast, grateful

31:32.en_khattab: And as soon as they are overwhelmed by waves like mountains,
they cry out to Allah ˹alone˺ in sincere devotion.
But when He delivers them ˹safely˺ to shore,

31:33.qpc_hafs: وَٱخۡشَوۡاْ يَوۡمٗا لَّا يَجۡزِي وَالِدٌ عَن وَلَدِهِۦ وَلَا مَوۡلُودٌ هُوَ جَازٍ عَن وَالِدِهِۦ شَيۡـًٔاۚ
31:33.en_khattab: and beware of a Day when no parent will be of any benefit to their child, nor will a child be of any benefit to their parent.
So do not let the life of this world deceive you,
nor let the Chief Deceiver deceive you about Allah.

31:34.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ has the knowledge of the Hour.
and knows what is in the wombs.

31:34.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تَدۡرِي نَفۡسٞ مَّاذَا تَكۡسِبُ غَدٗاۖ
31:34.en_khattab: No soul knows what it will earn for tomorrow,

31:34.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تَدۡرِي نَفۡسُۢ بِأَيِّ أَرۡضٖ تَمُوتُۚ
31:34.en_khattab: and no soul knows in what land it will die.

32:3.en_khattab: Or do they say, “He has fabricated it!”?
No! It is the truth from your Lord
in order for you to warn a people

32:3.qpc_hafs: مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ
32:3.en_khattab: to whom no warner has come before you

32:4.qpc_hafs: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا
32:4.en_khattab: It is Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth and everything in between
then established Himself on the Throne.

32:4.qpc_hafs: مَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا شَفِيعٍۚ
32:4.en_khattab: You have no protector or intercessor besides Him.
Will you not then be mindful?

32:5.qpc_hafs: يُدَبِّرُ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ
32:5.en_khattab: He conducts every affair from the heavens to the earth,
then it all ascends to Him on a Day

32:5.qpc_hafs: كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥٓ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
32:5.en_khattab: whose length is a thousand years by your counting.

32:6.en_khattab: That is the Knower of the seen and unseen

32:7.en_khattab: Who has perfected everything He created.
And He originated the creation of humankind from clay.

32:8.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسۡلَهُۥ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ
32:8.en_khattab: Then He made his descendants from an extract of a humble fluid.

32:9.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦۖ
32:9.en_khattab: Then He fashioned them and had a spirit of His Own ˹creation˺ breathed into them.
And He gave you hearing, sight, and intellect.

32:10.qpc_hafs: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا ضَلَلۡنَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَءِنَّا لَفِي خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدِۭۚ
32:10.en_khattab: ˹Still˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “When we are disintegrated into the earth, will we really be raised as a new creation?”
In fact, they are in denial of the meeting with their Lord.

32:11.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ
32:11.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Your soul will be taken by the Angel of Death, who is in charge of you.
Then to your Lord you will ˹all˺ be returned.

32:12.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ نَاكِسُواْ رُءُوسِهِمۡ
32:12.en_khattab: If only you could see the wicked hanging their heads ˹in shame˺
˹crying:˺ “Our Lord! We have now seen and heard
so send us back and we will do good

32:13.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأٓتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَىٰهَا
32:13.en_khattab: Had We willed, We could have easily imposed guidance on every soul
But My Word will come to pass

32:13.qpc_hafs: لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
32:13.en_khattab: I will surely fill up Hell with jinn and humans all together

32:14.qpc_hafs: فَذُوقُواْ بِمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَآ
32:14.en_khattab: So taste ˹the punishment˺ for neglecting the meeting of this Day of yours

32:14.qpc_hafs: وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
32:14.en_khattab: And taste the torment of eternity for what you used to do!

32:15.en_khattab: The only ˹true˺ believers in Our revelation

32:15.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُواْ بِهَا خَرُّواْۤ سُجَّدٗاۤ
32:15.en_khattab: are those who— when it is recited to them— fall into prostration
and glorify the praises of their Lord

32:16.en_khattab: invoking their Lord with hope and fear
and donate from what We have provided for them

32:17.qpc_hafs: مَّآ أُخۡفِيَ لَهُم مِّن قُرَّةِ أَعۡيُنٖ
32:17.en_khattab: what delights are kept in store for them
as a reward for what they used to do

32:18.en_khattab: Is the one who is a believer
equal ˹before Allah˺ to the one who is rebellious?

32:19.en_khattab: As for those who believe and do good
they will have the Gardens of ˹Eternal˺ Residence
as an accommodation for what they used to do

32:20.en_khattab: But as for those who are rebellious
the Fire will be their home
Whenever they try to escape from it
they will be forced back into it

32:20.qpc_hafs: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
32:20.en_khattab: and will be told, “Taste the Fire’s torment, which you used to deny.”

32:21.en_khattab: We will certainly make them taste some of the minor torment ˹in this life˺
before the major torment ˹of the Hereafter˺,
so perhaps they will return ˹to the Right Path˺.

32:22.qpc_hafs: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ
32:22.en_khattab: And who does more wrong than the one who is reminded of Allah’s revelations
We will surely inflict punishment upon the wicked

32:23.en_khattab: Indeed, We gave the Scripture to Moses

32:23.qpc_hafs: فَلَا تَكُن فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦۖ
32:23.en_khattab: so let there be no doubt ˹O Prophet˺ that you ˹too˺ are receiving revelations
and We made it a guide for the Children of Israel

32:24.en_khattab: We raised from among them leaders, guiding by Our command
when they patiently endured and firmly believed in Our signs

32:25.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
32:25.en_khattab: Indeed, your Lord will decide between them on the Day of Judgment

32:26.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ
32:26.en_khattab: Is it not yet clear to them how many peoples We destroyed before them
whose ruins they still pass by

32:27.qpc_hafs: أَنَّا نَسُوقُ ٱلۡمَآءَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡجُرُزِ
32:27.en_khattab: how We drive rain to parched land

32:27.qpc_hafs: فَنُخۡرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرۡعٗا تَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهُ أَنۡعَٰمُهُمۡ وَأَنفُسُهُمۡۚ
32:27.en_khattab: producing ˹various˺ crops from which they and their cattle eat

32:28.en_khattab: if what you say is true

32:29.en_khattab: it will not benefit the disbelievers to believe then
nor will they be delayed ˹from punishment˺

33:1.en_khattab: and do not yield to the disbelievers and the hypocrites.

33:2.en_khattab: what is revealed to you from your Lord.
is All-Aware of what you ˹all˺ do.

33:3.en_khattab: And put your trust in Allah
for Allah is sufficient as a Trustee of Affairs.

33:4.qpc_hafs: مَّا جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِرَجُلٖ مِّن قَلۡبَيۡنِ فِي جَوۡفِهِۦۚ
33:4.en_khattab: Allah does not place two hearts in any person’s chest.

33:4.qpc_hafs: وَمَا جَعَلَ أَزۡوَٰجَكُمُ ٱلَّٰٓـِٔي تُظَٰهِرُونَ مِنۡهُنَّ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡۚ
33:4.en_khattab: Nor does He regard your wives as ˹unlawful for you like˺ your real mothers, ˹even˺ if you say they are.
Nor does He regard your adopted children as your real children.

33:4.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكُمۡ قَوۡلُكُم بِأَفۡوَٰهِكُمۡۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَقُولُ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَهُوَ يَهۡدِي ٱلسَّبِيلَ
33:4.en_khattab: These are only your baseless assertions. But Allah declares the truth, and He ˹alone˺ guides to the ˹Right˺ Way.

33:5.en_khattab: Let your adopted children keep their family names.
That is more just in the sight of Allah.
But if you do not know their fathers,
then they are ˹simply˺ your fellow believers and close associates.

33:5.qpc_hafs: وَلَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٞ فِيمَآ أَخۡطَأۡتُم بِهِۦ
33:5.en_khattab: There is no blame on you for what you do by mistake,
but ˹only˺ for what you do intentionally.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

33:6.en_khattab: The Prophet has a stronger affinity to the believers
And his wives are their mothers
As ordained by Allah, blood relatives are more entitled ˹to inheritance˺

33:6.qpc_hafs: فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ

33:6.en_khattab: unless you ˹want to˺ show kindness to your ˹close˺ associates
This is decreed in the Record

33:7.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when We took a covenant from the prophets,
as well as from you ˹O Prophet˺, and from Noah, Abraham,
Moses, and Jesus, son of Mary.
We did take a solemn covenant from ˹all of˺ them.

33:8.en_khattab: so that He may question these men of truth about their ˹delivery of the˺ truth.
And He has prepared a painful punishment for the disbelievers.

33:9.qpc_hafs: ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَتۡكُمۡ جُنُودٞ
33:9.en_khattab: Remember Allah’s favour upon you when ˹enemy˺ forces came to ˹besiege˺ you ˹in Medina˺,

33:9.qpc_hafs: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا وَجُنُودٗا لَّمۡ تَرَوۡهَاۚ
33:9.en_khattab: so We sent against them a ˹bitter˺ wind and forces you could not see.
And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

33:10.en_khattab: ˹Remember˺ when they came at you from east
when your eyes grew wild ˹in horror˺
and your hearts jumped into your throats,
and you entertained ˹conflicting˺ thoughts about Allah.

33:11.en_khattab: the believers were put to the test

33:12.en_khattab: and those with sickness in their hearts
said, “Allah and His Messenger have promised us

33:13.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ قَالَت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ يَثۡرِبَ
33:13.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when a group of them said, “O people of Yathrib!
There is no point in you staying ˹here˺, so retreat!
Another group of them asked the Prophet’s permission ˹to leave˺

33:13.qpc_hafs: يَقُولُونَ إِنَّ بُيُوتَنَا عَوۡرَةٞ وَمَا هِيَ بِعَوۡرَةٍۖ
33:13.en_khattab: saying, “Our homes are vulnerable,” while ˹in fact˺ they were not vulnerable.

33:14.en_khattab: Had their city been sacked from all sides
and they had been asked to abandon faith
they would have done so with little hesitation.

33:15.qpc_hafs: وَلَقَدۡ كَانُواْ عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ
33:15.en_khattab: They had already pledged to Allah earlier
never to turn their backs ˹in retreat˺
And a pledge to Allah must be answered for.

33:16.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Fleeing will not benefit you

33:16.qpc_hafs: إِن فَرَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ ٱلۡقَتۡلِ
33:16.en_khattab: if you ˹try to˺ escape a natural or violent death.
˹If it is not your time,˺ you will only be allowed enjoyment

33:17.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَعۡصِمُكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ
33:17.en_khattab: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Who can put you out of Allah’s reach

33:17.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ سُوٓءًا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗۚ
33:17.en_khattab: if He intends to harm you or show you mercy?”

33:17.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
33:17.en_khattab: They can never find any protector or helper besides Allah.

33:18.en_khattab: Allah knows well those among you who discourage ˹others from fighting˺,
saying ˹secretly˺ to their brothers, “Stay with us,”
and who themselves hardly take part in fighting.

33:19.en_khattab: ˹They are˺ totally unwilling to assist you.
you see them staring at you with their eyes rolling
like someone in the throes of death.
But once the danger is over,
they slash you with razor-sharp tongues,
so Allah has rendered their deeds void.
And that is easy for Allah.

33:20.en_khattab: They ˹still˺ think that the enemy alliance has not ˹yet˺ withdrawn.

33:20.qpc_hafs: وَإِن يَأۡتِ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ يَوَدُّواْ لَوۡ أَنَّهُم بَادُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ يَسۡـَٔلُونَ عَنۡ أَنۢبَآئِكُمۡۖ
33:20.en_khattab: And if the allies were to come ˹again˺, the hypocrites would wish to be away in the desert among nomadic Arabs, ˹only˺ asking for news about you ˹believers˺.

33:20.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ فِيكُم مَّا قَٰتَلُوٓاْ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
33:20.en_khattab: And if the hypocrites were in your midst, they would hardly take part in the fight.

33:21.qpc_hafs: لَّقَدۡ كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِي رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ
33:21.en_khattab: Indeed, in the Messenger of Allah

33:21.qpc_hafs: أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَةٞ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ
33:21.en_khattab: you have an excellent example for whoever has hope in Allah and the Last Day

33:22.en_khattab: When the believers saw the enemy alliance,

33:22.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَنَا ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ
33:22.en_khattab: they said, “This is what Allah and His Messenger had promised us.
The promise of Allah and His Messenger has come true.”
And this only increased them in faith and submission.

33:23.qpc_hafs: رِجَالٞ صَدَقُواْ مَا عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ عَلَيۡهِۖ
33:23.en_khattab: who have proven true to what they pledged to Allah.
Some of them have fulfilled their pledge ˹with their lives˺
They have never changed ˹their commitment˺ in the least.

33:24.en_khattab: ˹It all happened˺ so Allah may reward the faithful for their faithfulness,
and punish the hypocrites if He wills
Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

33:25.qpc_hafs: وَرَدَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِغَيۡظِهِمۡ لَمۡ يَنَالُواْ خَيۡرٗاۚ
33:25.en_khattab: And Allah drove back the disbelievers in their rage, totally empty-handed.
And Allah spared the believers from fighting.

33:26.qpc_hafs: وَأَنزَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَٰهَرُوهُم مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
33:26.en_khattab: And He brought down those from the People of the Book
who supported the enemy alliance from their own strongholds
and cast horror into their hearts

33:27.en_khattab: He has also caused you to take over their lands, homes, and wealth,
as well as lands you have not yet set foot on.

33:27.qpc_hafs: وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا
33:27.en_khattab: And Allah is Most Capable of everything.

33:28.qpc_hafs: إِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتَهَا
33:28.en_khattab: If you desire the life of this world and its luxury,
I will give you a ˹suitable˺ compensation ˹for divorce˺ and let you go graciously.

33:29.qpc_hafs: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ
33:29.en_khattab: But if you desire Allah and His Messenger and the ˹everlasting˺ Home of the Hereafter

33:29.qpc_hafs: فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
33:29.en_khattab: then Surely Allah has prepared a great reward for those of you who do good.

33:30.en_khattab: If any of you were to commit a blatant misconduct
the punishment would be doubled for her
And that is easy for Allah.

33:31.en_khattab: And whoever of you devoutly obeys Allah and His Messenger
We will grant her double the reward
and We have prepared for her an honourable provision

33:32.en_khattab: You are not like any other women
if you are mindful ˹of Allah˺, then do not be overly effeminate in speech ˹with men˺
or those with sickness in their hearts may be tempted
but speak in a moderate tone

33:33.en_khattab: and do not display yourselves as women did in the days of ˹pre-Islamic˺ ignorance.
and obey Allah and His Messenger.

33:33.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُذۡهِبَ عَنكُمُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ
33:33.en_khattab: Allah only intends to keep ˹the causes of˺ evil away from you

33:34.en_khattab: Surely Allah is Most Subtle, All-Aware

33:35.en_khattab: men and women who guard their chastity,
and men and women who remember Allah often

33:35.qpc_hafs: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ وَأَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
33:35.en_khattab: for ˹all of˺ them Allah has prepared forgiveness and a great reward.

33:36.en_khattab: It is not for a believing man or woman
when Allah and His Messenger decree a matter

33:36.qpc_hafs: أَن يَكُونَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡخِيَرَةُ مِنۡ أَمۡرِهِمۡۗ
33:36.en_khattab: to have any other choice in that matter
Indeed, whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger

33:37.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ تَقُولُ لِلَّذِيٓ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ وَأَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ
33:37.en_khattab: And ˹remember, O  Prophet,˺ when you said to the one  for whom Allah has done a favour and you ˹too˺ have done a favour,

33:37.qpc_hafs: وَتُخۡفِي فِي نَفۡسِكَ مَا ٱللَّهُ مُبۡدِيهِ وَتَخۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَ وَٱللَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَن تَخۡشَىٰهُۖ
33:37.en_khattab: while concealing within yourself what Allah was going to reveal. And ˹so˺ you were considering the people, whereas Allah was more worthy of your consideration.

33:37.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ زَيۡدٞ مِّنۡهَا وَطَرٗا زَوَّجۡنَٰكَهَا
33:37.en_khattab: So when Zaid totally lost interest in ˹keeping˺ his wife, We gave her to you in marriage,

33:37.qpc_hafs: لِكَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ حَرَجٞ
33:37.en_khattab: so that there would be no blame on the believers

33:37.qpc_hafs: فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِ أَدۡعِيَآئِهِمۡ إِذَا قَضَوۡاْ مِنۡهُنَّ وَطَرٗاۚ
33:37.en_khattab: for marrying the ex-wives of their adopted sons after their divorce.
And Allah’s command is totally binding.

33:38.qpc_hafs: مَّا كَانَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّ مِنۡ حَرَجٖ
33:38.en_khattab: There is no blame on the Prophet
for doing what Allah has ordained for him.

33:38.qpc_hafs: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۚ
33:38.en_khattab: That has been the way of Allah with those ˹prophets˺ who had gone before.
And Allah’s command has been firmly decreed.

33:39.en_khattab: is His way with˺ those ˹prophets˺ who deliver the messages of Allah,

33:39.qpc_hafs: وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ
33:39.en_khattab: and consider Him, and none but Allah.
And sufficient is Allah as a ˹vigilant˺ Reckoner.

33:40.en_khattab: but is the Messenger of Allah and the seal of the prophets.
And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

33:43.en_khattab: He is the One Who showers His blessings upon you

33:43.qpc_hafs: وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ لِيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ
33:43.en_khattab: and His angels pray for you so that He may bring you out of darkness and into light
For He is ever Merciful to the believers

33:44.en_khattab: Their greeting on the Day they meet Him will be, “Peace!”
And He has prepared for them an honourable reward.

33:45.en_khattab: and a deliverer of good news,

33:46.en_khattab: and a caller to ˹the Way of˺ Allah by His command

33:47.en_khattab: Give good news to the believers

33:47.qpc_hafs: بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضۡلٗا كَبِيرٗا
33:47.en_khattab: that they will have a great bounty from Allah.

33:48.en_khattab: Do not yield to the disbelievers and the hypocrites.
and put your trust in Allah.
For Allah is sufficient as a Trustee of Affairs.

33:49.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ طَلَّقۡتُمُوهُنَّ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَمَسُّوهُنَّ
33:49.en_khattab: and then divorce them before you touch them

33:49.qpc_hafs: فَمَا لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِنَّ مِنۡ عِدَّةٖ تَعۡتَدُّونَهَاۖ
33:49.en_khattab: they will have no waiting period for you to count
so give them a ˹suitable˺ compensation, and let them go graciously.

33:50.qpc_hafs: إِنَّآ أَحۡلَلۡنَا لَكَ أَزۡوَٰجَكَ ٱلَّٰتِيٓ ءَاتَيۡتَ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ يَمِينُكَ مِمَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ
33:50.en_khattab: We have made lawful for you your wives to whom you have paid their ˹full˺ dowries as well as those ˹bondwomen˺ in your possession, whom Allah has granted you.

33:50.qpc_hafs: وَبَنَاتِ عَمِّكَ وَبَنَاتِ عَمَّٰتِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَالِكَ وَبَنَاتِ خَٰلَٰتِكَ ٱلَّٰتِي هَاجَرۡنَ مَعَكَ وَٱمۡرَأَةٗ مُّؤۡمِنَةً
33:50.en_khattab: And ˹you are allowed to marry˺ the daughters of your paternal uncles and aunts, and the daughters of your maternal uncles and aunts, who have emigrated like you. Also ˹allowed for marriage is˺ a believing woman

33:50.qpc_hafs: إِن وَهَبَتۡ نَفۡسَهَا لِلنَّبِيِّ إِنۡ أَرَادَ ٱلنَّبِيُّ أَن يَسۡتَنكِحَهَا خَالِصَةٗ لَّكَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۗ
33:50.en_khattab: who offers herself to the Prophet ˹without dowry˺ if he is interested in marrying her—˹this is˺ exclusively for you, not for the rest of the believers.

33:50.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا فَرَضۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ فِيٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ لِكَيۡلَا يَكُونَ عَلَيۡكَ حَرَجٞۗ
33:50.en_khattab: We know well what ˹rulings˺ We have ordained for the believers in relation to their wives and those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession. As such, there would be no blame on you.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

33:51.en_khattab: It is up to you ˹O Prophet˺ to delay or receive whoever you please of your wives.
There is no blame on you if you call back any of those you have set aside.

33:51.qpc_hafs: وَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَيۡتَ مِمَّنۡ عَزَلۡتَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكَۚ
33:51.en_khattab: That is more likely that they will be content, not grieved, and satisfied with what you offer them all.

33:51.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن تَقَرَّ أَعۡيُنُهُنَّ وَلَا يَحۡزَنَّ وَيَرۡضَيۡنَ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡتَهُنَّ كُلُّهُنَّۚ
33:51.en_khattab: Allah ˹fully˺ knows what is in your hearts.

33:51.qpc_hafs: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَلِيمٗا
33:51.en_khattab: And Allah is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.

33:52.qpc_hafs: لَّا يَحِلُّ لَكَ ٱلنِّسَآءُ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ
33:52.en_khattab: It is not lawful for you ˹O Prophet˺ to marry more women after this,

33:52.qpc_hafs: وَلَآ أَن تَبَدَّلَ بِهِنَّ مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجٖ
33:52.en_khattab: nor can you replace any of your present wives with another,
even if her beauty may attract you—

33:52.qpc_hafs: وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ رَّقِيبٗا
33:52.en_khattab: And Allah is ever Watchful over all things.

33:53.qpc_hafs: لَا تَدۡخُلُواْ بُيُوتَ ٱلنَّبِيِّ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡ
33:53.en_khattab: Do not enter the homes of the Prophet without permission
˹and if invited˺ for a meal, do not ˹come too early and˺ linger until the meal is ready
But if you are invited, then enter ˹on time˺
Once you have eaten, then go on your way
and do not stay for casual talk

33:53.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ يُؤۡذِي ٱلنَّبِيَّ فَيَسۡتَحۡيِۦ مِنكُمۡۖ
33:53.en_khattab: Such behaviour is truly annoying to the Prophet, yet he is too shy to ask you to leave
But Allah is never shy of the truth

33:53.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ
33:53.en_khattab: And when you ˹believers˺ ask his wives for something, ask them from behind a barrier
This is purer for your hearts and theirs

33:53.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَن تُؤۡذُواْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ
33:53.en_khattab: And it is not right for you to annoy the Messenger of Allah

33:53.qpc_hafs: وَلَآ أَن تَنكِحُوٓاْ أَزۡوَٰجَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓ أَبَدًاۚ
33:53.en_khattab: nor ever marry his wives after him

33:53.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكُمۡ كَانَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ عَظِيمًا
33:53.en_khattab: This would certainly be a major offence in the sight of Allah

33:54.qpc_hafs: فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا
33:54.en_khattab: surely Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

33:55.en_khattab: There is no blame on the Prophet’s wives

33:55.qpc_hafs: فِيٓ ءَابَآئِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبۡنَآئِهِنَّ وَلَآ إِخۡوَٰنِهِنَّ
33:55.en_khattab: if they appear unveiled before their fathers, their sons, their brothers

33:55.qpc_hafs: وَلَآ أَبۡنَآءِ إِخۡوَٰنِهِنَّ وَلَآ أَبۡنَآءِ أَخَوَٰتِهِنَّ
33:55.en_khattab: their brothers’ sons, their sisters’ sons

33:55.qpc_hafs: وَلَا نِسَآئِهِنَّ وَلَا مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُنَّۗ
33:55.en_khattab: their fellow ˹Muslim˺ women, and those ˹bondspeople˺ in their possession

33:55.qpc_hafs: وَٱتَّقِينَ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدًا
33:55.en_khattab: And be mindful of Allah ˹O wives of the Prophet!˺ Surely Allah is a Witness over all things

33:56.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتَهُۥ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّۚ
33:56.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah showers His blessings upon the Prophet, and His angels pray for him.
O believers! Invoke Allah’s blessings upon him,
and salute him with worthy greetings of peace.

33:57.en_khattab: Surely those who offend Allah and His Messenger
are condemned by Allah in this world and the Hereafter
And He has prepared for them a humiliating punishment

33:58.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ بِغَيۡرِ مَا ٱكۡتَسَبُواْ
33:58.en_khattab: As for those who abuse believing men and women unjustifiably,
they will definitely bear the guilt of slander and blatant sin.

33:59.en_khattab: Ask your wives, daughters, and believing women
to draw their cloaks over their bodies.

33:59.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن يُعۡرَفۡنَ فَلَا يُؤۡذَيۡنَۗ
33:59.en_khattab: In this way it is more likely that they will be recognized ˹as virtuous˺ and not be harassed.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

33:60.en_khattab: and those with sickness in their hearts,
do not desist, We will certainly incite you ˹O Prophet˺ against them,

33:60.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ لَا يُجَاوِرُونَكَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
33:60.en_khattab: and then they will not be your neighbours there any longer.

33:61.en_khattab: they would get themselves seized and killed relentlessly wherever they are found!

33:62.en_khattab: with those ˹hypocrites˺ who have gone before.
And you will find no change in Allah’s way.

33:63.en_khattab: People ask you ˹O Prophet˺ about the Hour.
Say, “That knowledge is only with Allah.

33:63.qpc_hafs: وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا
33:63.en_khattab: You never know, perhaps the Hour is near.

33:64.en_khattab: and has prepared for them a blazing Fire,

33:65.en_khattab: and ever— never will they find any protector

33:66.en_khattab: On the Day their faces are ˹constantly˺ flipped in the Fire,

33:72.qpc_hafs: وَحَمَلَهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ ظَلُومٗا جَهُولٗا

by my Lord, the Knower of the unseen—
certainly come to you!” Not ˹even˺ an atom’s weight is hidden from Him
in the heavens or the earth;

34:6.en_khattab: see that what has been revealed to you from your Lord ˹O Prophet˺
and that it guides to the Path of

34:9.en_khattab: If We willed, We could cause the earth to swallow them up, or cause ˹deadly˺ pieces of the sky to fall upon them

34:9.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّكُلِّ عَبۡدٖ مُّنِيبٖ
34:9.en_khattab: Surely in this is a sign for every servant who turns ˹to Allah˺

34:10.en_khattab: Indeed, We granted David a ˹great˺ privilege from Us,

34:12.en_khattab: And whoever of them deviated from Our command, We made them taste the torment of the blaze

34:22.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Call upon those you claim ˹to be divine˺ besides Allah.

34:22.en_khattab: They do not possess ˹even˺ an atom’s weight either in the heavens or the earth,

34:28.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet˺ only as a deliverer of good news
a deliverer of good news and a warner

can benefit or protect each other

34:43.en_khattab: they say, “This is only a man who wishes to hinder you from what your forefathers used to worship.

34:43.en_khattab: And the disbelievers say of the truth when it has come to them,

34:47.qpc_hafs: مَا سَأَلۡتُكُم مِّنۡ أَجۡرٖ فَهُوَ لَكُمۡۖ

35:1.en_khattab: the Originator of the heavens and the earth,

to become inmates of the Blaze.
