35:11.en_khattab: And ˹it is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ created you from dust,

35:11.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تَحۡمِلُ مِنۡ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلۡمِهِۦۚ
35:11.en_khattab: No female ever conceives or delivers without His knowledge.

35:11.qpc_hafs: وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِن مُّعَمَّرٖ وَلَا يُنقَصُ مِنۡ عُمُرِهِۦٓ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٍۚ
35:11.en_khattab: And no one’s life is made long or cut short but is ˹written˺ in a Record.
That is certainly easy for Allah.

35:12.en_khattab: The two bodies of water are not alike:
one is fresh, palatable, and pleasant to drink
and the other is salty and bitter.
Yet from them both you eat tender seafood

35:12.qpc_hafs: وَتَرَى ٱلۡفُلۡكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ
35:12.en_khattab: And you see the ships ploughing their way through both, so you may seek His bounty

35:13.en_khattab: He merges the night into the day
and the day into the night
and has subjected the sun and the moon
each orbiting for an appointed term

35:13.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِن قِطۡمِيرٍ
35:13.en_khattab: But those ˹idols˺ you invoke besides Him do not possess even the skin of a date stone

35:14.en_khattab: And if they were to hear, they could not respond to you.
On the Day of Judgment they will disown your worship ˹of them˺.
And no one can inform you ˹O Prophet˺ like the All-Knowledgeable.

35:15.en_khattab: It is you who stand in need of Allah
but Allah ˹alone˺ is the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

35:16.en_khattab: He could eliminate you and produce a new creation.

35:18.en_khattab: No soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another.

35:18.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تَدۡعُ مُثۡقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمۡلِهَا لَا يُحۡمَلۡ مِنۡهُ شَيۡءٞ وَلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰٓۗ
35:18.en_khattab: And if a sin-burdened soul cries for help with its burden, none of it will be carried— even by a close relative.

35:18.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۚ
35:18.en_khattab: You ˹O Prophet˺ can only warn those who stand in awe of their Lord without seeing Him and establish prayer.

35:18.qpc_hafs: وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
35:18.en_khattab: Whoever purifies themselves, they only do so for their own good. And to Allah is the final return.

35:22.en_khattab: Nor are the dead and the living equal.
Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ makes whoever He wills hear,

35:22.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسۡمِعٖ مَّن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ
35:22.en_khattab: but you ˹O Prophet˺ can never make those in the graves hear ˹your call˺.

35:24.en_khattab: We have surely sent you with the truth
as a deliverer of good news and a warner
that has not had a warner

35:25.en_khattab: Their messengers came to them with clear proofs,

35:26.en_khattab: Then I seized those who persisted in disbelief.

35:27.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ
35:27.en_khattab: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky
with which We bring forth fruits of different colours

35:27.qpc_hafs: وَمِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ جُدَدُۢ بِيضٞ وَحُمۡرٞ مُّخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهَا
35:27.en_khattab: And in the mountains are streaks of varying shades of white, red

35:28.qpc_hafs: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱلدَّوَآبِّ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مُخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥ كَذَٰلِكَۗ
35:28.en_khattab: just as people, living beings, and cattle are of various colours as well.

35:28.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا يَخۡشَى ٱللَّهَ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡعُلَمَٰٓؤُاْۗ
35:28.en_khattab: Of all of Allah’s servants, only the knowledgeable ˹of His might˺ are ˹truly˺ in awe of Him.

35:29.en_khattab: Surely those who recite the Book of Allah,
and donate from what We have provided for them— secretly and
openly—˹can˺ hope for an exchange that will never fail,

35:30.en_khattab: so that He will reward them in full
and increase them out of His grace.

35:31.en_khattab: The Book We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺

35:31.qpc_hafs: هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ
35:31.en_khattab: is the truth, confirming what came before it.
Surely Allah is All-Aware, All-Seeing of His servants.

35:32.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ أَوۡرَثۡنَا ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَيۡنَا مِنۡ عِبَادِنَاۖ
35:32.en_khattab: Then We granted the Book to those We have chosen from Our servants.

35:32.qpc_hafs: فَمِنۡهُمۡ ظَالِمٞ لِّنَفۡسِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مُّقۡتَصِدٞ وَمِنۡهُمۡ سَابِقُۢ بِٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ
35:32.en_khattab: Some of them wrong themselves, some follow a middle course, and some are foremost in good deeds by Allah’s Will.

35:33.en_khattab: They will enter the Gardens of Eternity,

35:33.qpc_hafs: يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٖ وَلُؤۡلُؤٗاۖ
35:33.en_khattab: be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls,
and their clothing will be silk.

35:34.en_khattab: And they will say, “Praise be to Allah,
Who has kept away from us all ˹causes of˺ sorrow.
Our Lord is indeed All-Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

35:35.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ ٱلۡمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ
35:35.en_khattab: ˹He is the One˺ Who— out of His grace— has settled us in the Home of Everlasting Stay
where we will be touched by neither fatigue

35:36.en_khattab: they will have the Fire of Hell,
where they will not be ˹allowed to be˺ finished by death,
nor will its torment be lightened for them.
This is how We reward every ˹stubborn˺ disbeliever.

35:37.en_khattab: “Our Lord! Take us out ˹and send us back˺.

35:37.qpc_hafs: نَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي كُنَّا نَعۡمَلُۚ
35:37.en_khattab: We will do good, unlike what we used to do.” ˹They will be told,˺

35:37.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ نُعَمِّرۡكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ
35:37.en_khattab: “Did We not give you lives long enough so that whoever wanted to be mindful could have done so?
And the warner came to you.
So taste ˹the punishment˺, for the wrongdoers have no helper.”

35:38.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah is the Knower of the unseen of the heavens
He surely knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

35:39.qpc_hafs: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَكُمۡ خَلَٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ
35:39.en_khattab: He is the One Who has placed you as successors on earth.
So whoever disbelieves will bear ˹the burden of˺ their own disbelief.

35:39.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا مَقۡتٗاۖ
35:39.en_khattab: The disbelievers’ denial only increases them in contempt in the sight of their Lord.

35:39.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
35:39.en_khattab: and it will only contribute to their loss.

35:40.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ شُرَكَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
35:40.en_khattab: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Have you considered your associate-gods which you invoke besides Allah?
Show me what they have created on earth!
Or do they have a share in ˹the creation of˺ the heavens?

35:40.qpc_hafs: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٖ مِّنۡهُۚ
35:40.en_khattab: Or have We given the polytheists a Book, which serves as a clear proof for them?

35:40.qpc_hafs: بَلۡ إِن يَعِدُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ بَعۡضُهُم بَعۡضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
35:40.en_khattab: In fact, the wrongdoers promise each other nothing but delusion.

35:41.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ keeps the heavens and the earth
If they were to fall apart,

35:41.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَهُمَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓۚ
35:41.en_khattab: none but Him could hold them up.
He is truly Most Forbearing, All-Forgiving.

35:42.en_khattab: They swore by Allah their most solemn oaths
that if a warner were to come to them
they would certainly be better guided than any other community
Yet when a warner did come to them
it only drove them farther away—

35:43.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَحِيقُ ٱلۡمَكۡرُ ٱلسَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهۡلِهِۦۚ
35:43.en_khattab: But evil plotting only backfires on those who plot.
Are they awaiting anything but the fate of those ˹destroyed˺ before?
You will find no change in the way of Allah,
nor will you find it diverted ˹to someone else˺.

35:44.en_khattab: Have they not travelled throughout the land

35:44.qpc_hafs: فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ
35:44.en_khattab: to see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before them
They were far superior in might

35:44.qpc_hafs: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعۡجِزَهُۥ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ
35:44.en_khattab: But there is nothing that can escape Allah in the heavens or the earth
He is certainly All-Knowing, Most Capable

35:45.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ
35:45.en_khattab: If Allah were to punish people ˹immediately˺ for what they have committed,

35:45.qpc_hafs: مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهۡرِهَا مِن دَآبَّةٖ
35:45.en_khattab: He would not have left a single living being on earth.
But He delays them for an appointed term.
then surely Allah is All-Seeing of His servants.

36:3.en_khattab: You ˹O Prophet˺ are truly one of the messengers

36:6.en_khattab: so that you may warn a people

36:7.en_khattab: ˹of torment˺ has already been justified against most of them,

36:8.en_khattab: ˹It is as if˺ We have put shackles around their necks
so their heads are forced up,

36:9.en_khattab: and have placed a barrier before them
up, so they fail to see ˹the truth˺.

36:11.en_khattab: and are in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing Him
of forgiveness and an honourable reward

36:12.en_khattab: It is certainly We Who resurrect the dead,
and write what they send forth and what they leave behind.

36:13.en_khattab: of the residents of a town,
when the messengers came to them.

36:14.en_khattab: So We reinforced ˹the two˺ with a third,
and they declared, “We have indeed been sent to you ˹as messengers˺.”

36:15.en_khattab: and the Most Compassionate has not revealed anything.

36:16.en_khattab: “Our Lord knows that we have truly been sent to you.

36:18.en_khattab: The people replied, “We definitely see you as a bad omen for us.
we will certainly stone you ˹to death˺
and you will be touched with a painful punishment from us.

36:19.en_khattab: Your bad omen lies within yourselves.
Are you saying this because you are reminded ˹of the truth˺? In fact, you are a transgressing people.

36:20.qpc_hafs: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ
36:20.en_khattab: Then from the farthest end of the city a man came, rushing.

36:22.qpc_hafs: وَمَا لِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي
36:22.en_khattab: And why should I not worship the One Who has originated me
and to Whom you will be returned.

36:23.en_khattab: How could I take besides Him other gods
if the Most Compassionate intended to harm me?
whose intercession would not be of any benefit to me,

36:24.en_khattab: I would then be clearly astray.

36:25.en_khattab: I do believe in your Lord

36:26.en_khattab: they killed him, then˺ he was told ˹by the angels˺, “Enter Paradise!”
He said, “If only my people knew

36:27.en_khattab: of how my Lord has forgiven me
and made me one of the honourable

36:28.en_khattab: We did not send any soldiers from the heavens against his people

36:28.qpc_hafs: مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ
36:28.en_khattab: after his death, nor did We need to.

36:29.en_khattab: All it took was one ˹mighty˺ blast
and they were extinguished at once.

36:30.en_khattab: No messenger ever came to them without

36:31.en_khattab: how many peoples We destroyed before them
who never came back to life again?

36:33.en_khattab: There is a sign for them in the dead earth:

36:34.en_khattab: And We have placed in it gardens of palm trees
and caused springs to gush forth in it

36:35.en_khattab: so that they may eat from its fruit,
which they had no hand in making.
Will they not then give thanks?

36:36.en_khattab: Glory be to the One Who
pairs—˹be it˺ what the earth produces,
or what they do not know!

36:37.en_khattab: There is also a sign for them in the night:

36:38.en_khattab: The sun travels for its fixed term.
That is the design of the Almighty, All-Knowing.

36:39.en_khattab: As for the moon, We have ordained
it ends up like an old, curved palm stalk.

36:40.en_khattab: It is not for the sun
to catch up with the moon,
nor does the night outrun the day.
Each is travelling in an orbit of their own.

36:41.en_khattab: that We carried their ancestors ˹with Noah˺

36:43.en_khattab: If We willed, We could drown them:
then no one would respond to their cries,

36:45.en_khattab: Still they turn away when it is said to them
Beware of what is ahead of you in the Hereafter and what is behind you of destroyed nations
so you may be shown mercy.

36:46.en_khattab: Whenever a sign comes to them

36:47.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ
36:47.en_khattab: And when it is said to them, “Donate from what Allah has provided for you,”

36:47.qpc_hafs: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنُطۡعِمُ مَن لَّوۡ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ
36:47.en_khattab: the disbelievers say to the believers, “Why should we feed those whom Allah could have fed if He wanted to?

36:47.qpc_hafs: أَطۡعَمَهُۥٓ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

36:48.en_khattab: When will this threat come to pass
if what you say is true?

36:50.en_khattab: Then they will not be able to make a last will
nor can they return to their own people

36:51.en_khattab: then— behold!—they will rush from the graves to their Lord.

36:52.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ
36:52.en_khattab: They will cry, “Woe to us! Who has raised us up from our place of rest?
This must be what the Most Compassionate warned us of;

36:53.en_khattab: It will only take one Blast,
then at once they will all be brought before Us.

36:54.en_khattab: no soul will be wronged in the least
except for what you used to do.

36:55.en_khattab: Indeed, on that Day the residents of Paradise

36:59.en_khattab: disbelievers will be told,˺ “Step away ˹from the believers˺ this Day,

36:60.en_khattab: Did I not command you, O Children of Adam,
for he is truly your sworn enemy,

36:62.en_khattab: Yet he already misled great multitudes of you.
Did you not have any sense?

36:65.en_khattab: On this Day We will seal their mouths,
their hands will speak to Us,
and their feet will testify to what they used to commit.

36:66.en_khattab: We could have easily blinded their eyes,
so they would struggle to find their way.

36:67.en_khattab: We could have transfigured them on the spot,
so they could neither progress forward

36:68.en_khattab: And whoever We grant a long life,

36:69.en_khattab: We have not taught him poetry,
nor is it fitting for him.

36:70.en_khattab: and fulfil the decree ˹of torment˺ against the disbelievers.

36:71.qpc_hafs: أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتۡ أَيۡدِينَآ أَنۡعَٰمٗا
36:71.en_khattab: that We singlehandedly created for them, among other things, cattle

36:72.en_khattab: And We have subjected these ˹animals˺ to them,

36:73.en_khattab: And they derive from them other benefits and drinks.
Will they not then give thanks?

36:74.en_khattab: Still they have taken other gods besides Allah

36:76.en_khattab: So do not let their words grieve you ˹O Prophet˺.
Indeed, We ˹fully˺ know what they conceal

36:77.en_khattab: that We have created them from a sperm-drop

36:78.en_khattab: And they argue with Us— forgetting they were created—

36:78.qpc_hafs: قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ
36:78.en_khattab: saying, “Who will give life to decayed bones?”

36:79.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet,˺ “They will be revived by the One Who produced them the first time,
for He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of every created being.

36:80.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلۡأَخۡضَرِ نَارٗا
36:80.en_khattab: ˹He is the One˺ Who gives you fire from green trees

36:81.en_khattab: Can the One Who created the heavens and the earth
Yes ˹He can˺! For He is the Master Creator, All-Knowing.

36:82.en_khattab: is simply to say to it: 'Be!'

36:83.en_khattab: So glory be to the One
in Whose Hands is the authority over all things
and to Whom ˹alone˺ you will ˹all˺ be returned.

37:5.en_khattab: He is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between
and the Lord of all points of sunrise

37:6.en_khattab: Indeed, We have adorned the lowest heaven

37:10.en_khattab: But whoever manages to stealthily eavesdrop
is ˹instantly˺ pursued by a piercing flare.

37:11.qpc_hafs: أَهُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَم مَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآۚ
37:11.en_khattab: which is harder to create: them or other marvels of Our creation?
Indeed, We created them from a sticky clay.

37:12.en_khattab: In fact, you are astonished ˹by their denial˺,

37:14.en_khattab: And whenever they see a sign

37:16.en_khattab: and reduced to dust and bones

37:18.en_khattab: And you will be fully humbled.

37:19.en_khattab: It will only take one Blast,
then at once they will see ˹it all˺.

37:20.en_khattab: “Oh, woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!”

37:21.en_khattab: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision

39:21.en_khattab: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky
channelling it through streams in the earth

39:21.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ يُخۡرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرۡعٗا مُّخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥ
39:21.en_khattab: then produces with it crops of various colours
then they dry up and you see them wither
and then He reduces them to chaff

39:21.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
39:21.en_khattab: Surely in this is a reminder for people of reason

39:22.en_khattab: Can ˹the misguided be like˺ those whose hearts Allah has opened to Islam
so they are enlightened by their Lord?

39:22.qpc_hafs: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡقَٰسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مِّن ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ
39:22.en_khattab: So woe to those whose hearts are hardened at the remembrance of Allah!
It is they who are clearly astray.

39:23.en_khattab: ˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ has sent down the best message—

39:23.qpc_hafs: مَّثَانِيَ تَقۡشَعِرُّ مِنۡهُ جُلُودُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ
39:23.en_khattab: and repeated lessons— which causes the skin ˹and hearts˺ of those who fear their Lord to tremble,

39:23.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمۡ وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ
39:23.en_khattab: then their skin and hearts soften at the mention of ˹the mercy of˺ Allah.
That is the guidance of Allah,
through which He guides whoever He wills.

39:23.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٍ
39:23.en_khattab: But whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

39:24.qpc_hafs: أَفَمَن يَتَّقِي بِوَجۡهِهِۦ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ
39:24.en_khattab: Are those who will only have their ˹bare˺ faces to shield themselves from the awful torment on Judgment Day ˹better than those in Paradise˺?

39:24.qpc_hafs: وَقِيلَ لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ ذُوقُواْ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ
39:24.en_khattab: It will ˹then˺ be said to the wrongdoers: “Reap what you sowed!”

39:25.en_khattab: then the torment came upon them

39:26.en_khattab: So Allah made them taste humiliation
but far worse is the punishment of the Hereafter,

39:27.en_khattab: We have certainly set forth every ˹kind
of˺ lesson for people in this Quran,
so perhaps they will be mindful.

39:28.en_khattab: so perhaps they will be conscious ˹of Allah˺.

39:29.en_khattab: of a slave owned by several quarrelsome masters
and a slave owned by only one master
In fact, most of them do not know.

39:31.en_khattab: on the Day of Judgment you will

39:32.qpc_hafs: مِمَّن كَذَبَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ إِذۡ جَآءَهُۥٓۚ
39:32.en_khattab: than those who lie about Allah and reject the truth after it has reached them?
Is Hell not a ˹fitting˺ home for the disbelievers?

39:33.en_khattab: And the one who has brought the truth
it is they who are the righteous.

39:34.en_khattab: They will have whatever they desire

39:35.qpc_hafs: لِيُكَفِّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ أَسۡوَأَ ٱلَّذِي عَمِلُواْ
39:35.en_khattab: As such, Allah will absolve them of ˹even˺ the worst of what they did
according to the best of what they used to do.

39:36.en_khattab: Is Allah not sufficient for His servant?
Yet they threaten you with other ˹powerless˺ gods besides Him!

39:36.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ
39:36.en_khattab: Whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

39:38.qpc_hafs: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ
39:38.en_khattab: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created the heavens and the earth, they will certainly say, “Allah!”

39:38.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ أَفَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلۡ هُنَّ كَٰشِفَٰتُ ضُرِّهِۦٓ
39:38.en_khattab: Ask ˹them˺, “Consider then whatever ˹idols˺ you invoke besides Allah: if it was Allah’s Will to harm me, could they undo that harm?

39:38.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ أَرَادَنِي بِرَحۡمَةٍ هَلۡ هُنَّ مُمۡسِكَٰتُ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ
39:38.en_khattab: Or if He willed ˹some˺ mercy for me, could they withhold His mercy?

39:38.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ حَسۡبِيَ ٱللَّهُۖ عَلَيۡهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
39:38.en_khattab: Say, “Allah is sufficient for me. In Him ˹alone˺ the faithful put their trust.”

39:39.en_khattab: O my people! Persist in your ways
for I ˹too˺ will persist in mine
You will soon come to know

39:40.en_khattab: who will be visited by a humiliating torment
this life˺ and overwhelmed by an everlasting punishment

39:41.en_khattab: Surely We have revealed to you the Book ˹O Prophet˺
So whoever chooses to be guided, it is for their own good.
And whoever chooses to stray, it is only to their own loss.
You are not a keeper over them.

39:42.en_khattab: ˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ calls back the souls ˹of people˺ upon their death
as well as ˹the souls˺ of the living during their sleep.

39:42.qpc_hafs: فَيُمۡسِكُ ٱلَّتِي قَضَىٰ عَلَيۡهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَيُرۡسِلُ ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ
39:42.en_khattab: Then He keeps those for whom He has ordained death, and releases the others until ˹their˺ appointed time.

39:42.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
39:42.en_khattab: Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

39:43.qpc_hafs: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ
39:43.en_khattab: Or have they taken others besides Allah as intercessors?

39:43.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
39:43.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “˹Would they do so,˺ even though those ˹idols˺ have neither authority nor intelligence?

39:44.en_khattab: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
Then to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.

39:45.en_khattab: Yet when Allah alone is mentioned

39:45.qpc_hafs: ٱشۡمَأَزَّتۡ قُلُوبُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ
39:45.en_khattab: the hearts of those who disbelieve in the Hereafter are filled with disgust
But as soon as those ˹gods˺ other than Him are mentioned

39:46.en_khattab: O Allah— Originator of the heavens and the earth,
Knower of the seen and unseen!
You will judge between Your servants

39:47.qpc_hafs: مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا وَمِثۡلَهُۥ مَعَهُۥ
39:47.en_khattab: were to possess everything in the world twice over

39:47.qpc_hafs: لَٱفۡتَدَوۡاْ بِهِۦ مِن سُوٓءِ ٱلۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ
39:47.en_khattab: they would certainly offer it to ransom themselves from the horrible punishment on Judgment Day

39:47.qpc_hafs: وَبَدَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يَكُونُواْ يَحۡتَسِبُونَ
39:47.en_khattab: for they will see from Allah what they had never expected

39:48.en_khattab: And the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds will unfold before them

39:48.qpc_hafs: وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
39:48.en_khattab: and they will be overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule

39:49.en_khattab: When one is touched with hardship
Then when We shower Our blessings upon them
they say, “I have been granted all this only because of ˹my˺ knowledge.”
Not at all! It is ˹no more than˺ a test.
But most of them do not know.

39:50.en_khattab: The same had already been said by those ˹destroyed˺ before them,
but their ˹worldly˺ gains were of no benefit to them.

39:51.en_khattab: So the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds overtook them.

39:51.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ
39:51.en_khattab: And the wrongdoers among these ˹pagans˺ will be overtaken by the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds.
And they will have no escape.

39:52.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ
39:52.en_khattab: that Allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills?

39:53.en_khattab: O My servants who have exceeded the limits against their souls!
Do not lose hope in Allah’s mercy,
for Allah certainly forgives all sins.
He is indeed the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

39:54.en_khattab: for then you will not be helped.

39:55.en_khattab: Follow ˹the Quran,˺ the best of what has been revealed to you

39:55.qpc_hafs: مِّن رَّبِّكُم مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بَغۡتَةٗ
39:55.en_khattab: from your Lord, before the punishment takes you by surprise

39:56.en_khattab: so that no ˹sinful˺ soul will say ˹on Judgment Day˺,

39:57.en_khattab: I would have certainly been one of the righteous.’

39:58.en_khattab: Or say, upon seeing the torment,
‘If only I had a second chance,
I would have been one of the good-doers.’

39:59.en_khattab: Not at all! My revelations had already come to you,
and were one of the disbelievers.

39:60.en_khattab: you will see those who lied about Allah
Is Hell not a ˹fitting˺ home for the arrogant?

39:61.en_khattab: And Allah will deliver those who were mindful ˹of Him˺

39:62.en_khattab: Allah is the Creator of all things,
and He is the Maintainer of everything.

39:63.en_khattab: To Him belong the keys ˹of the treasuries˺ of the heavens and the earth.
As for those who rejected the signs of Allah,
it is they who will be the ˹true˺ losers.

39:64.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet,˺ “Are you urging me to worship ˹anyone˺ other than Allah,

39:65.en_khattab: It has already been revealed to you
others ˹with Allah˺, your deeds will certainly be void
and you will truly be one of the losers

39:67.en_khattab: They have not shown Allah His proper reverence
when on the Day of Judgment the ˹whole˺ earth will be in His Grip
and the heavens will be rolled up in His Right Hand

39:68.qpc_hafs: فَصَعِقَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۖ
39:68.en_khattab: and all those in the heavens and all those on the earth will fall dead, except those Allah wills ˹to spare˺.
Then it will be blown again
and they will rise up at once, looking on ˹in anticipation˺.

39:69.en_khattab: The earth will shine with the light of its Lord
the record ˹of deeds˺ will be laid ˹open˺
the prophets and the witnesses will be brought forward

39:69.qpc_hafs: وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
39:69.en_khattab: and judgment will be passed on all with fairness. None will be wronged.

39:70.en_khattab: Every soul will be paid in full
for Allah knows best what they have done.

39:71.qpc_hafs: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ زُمَرًاۖ
39:71.en_khattab: Those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in ˹successive˺ groups.

39:71.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا فُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ
39:71.en_khattab: When they arrive there, its gates will be opened and its keepers will ask them:

39:71.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ رُسُلٞ مِّنكُمۡ يَتۡلُونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَيُنذِرُونَكُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَاۚ
39:71.en_khattab: "Did messengers not come to you from among yourselves, reciting to you the revelations of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this Day of yours?"

39:71.qpc_hafs: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنۡ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
39:71.en_khattab: The disbelievers will cry, “Yes ˹indeed˺! But the decree of torment has come to pass against the disbelievers."

39:72.en_khattab: It will be said to them, “Enter the gates of Hell,
What an evil home for the arrogant!

39:73.qpc_hafs: وَسِيقَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ رَبَّهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡجَنَّةِ زُمَرًاۖ
39:73.en_khattab: And those who were mindful of their Lord will be led to Paradise in ˹successive˺ groups.

39:73.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ طِبۡتُمۡ
39:73.en_khattab: When they arrive at its ˹already˺ open gates, its keepers will say, “Peace be upon you! You have done well,
so come in, to stay forever.

39:74.en_khattab: The righteous will say, “Praise be to Allah
Who has fulfilled His promise to us, and made us inherit the ˹everlasting˺ land
to settle in Paradise wherever we please.
How excellent is the reward of those who work ˹righteousness˺!

39:75.qpc_hafs: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ
39:75.en_khattab: You will see the angels all around the Throne
glorifying the praises of their Lord
for judgment will have been passed on all with fairness
And it will be said, “Praise be to Allah— Lord of all worlds!”

40:3.en_khattab: There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him
To Him ˹alone˺ is the final return

40:4.en_khattab: None disputes the signs of Allah
so do not be deceived by their prosperity throughout the land.

40:5.en_khattab: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺
Every community plotted against its prophet to seize him,
and argued in falsehood, ˹hoping˺ to discredit the truth with it.
So I seized them. And how ˹horrible˺ was My punishment!

40:6.en_khattab: has been proven true against the disbelievers—
that they will be the inmates of the Fire.

40:7.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحۡمِلُونَ ٱلۡعَرۡشَ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهُۥ يُسَبِّحُونَ
40:7.en_khattab: Those ˹angels˺ who carry the Throne and those around it glorify

40:7.qpc_hafs: بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۖ
40:7.en_khattab: the praises of their Lord, have faith in Him, and seek forgiveness for the believers ˹praying:˺

40:7.qpc_hafs: رَبَّنَا وَسِعۡتَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖ رَّحۡمَةٗ وَعِلۡمٗا
40:7.en_khattab: Our Lord! You encompass everything in ˹Your˺ mercy and knowledge.

40:7.qpc_hafs: فَٱغۡفِرۡ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمۡ
40:7.en_khattab: So forgive those who repent and follow Your Way, and protect them
from the torment of the Hellfire.

40:8.qpc_hafs: رَبَّنَا وَأَدۡخِلۡهُمۡ جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدتَّهُمۡ
40:8.en_khattab: Our Lord! Admit them into the Gardens of Eternity which You have promised them

40:8.qpc_hafs: وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡۚ
40:8.en_khattab: along with the righteous among their parents, spouses, and descendants
You ˹alone˺ are truly the Almighty, All-Wise

40:9.en_khattab: And protect them from ˹the consequences of their˺ evil deeds.

40:9.qpc_hafs: وَمَن تَقِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمۡتَهُۥۚ
40:9.en_khattab: For whoever You protect from the evil of their deeds on that Day will have been shown Your mercy.

40:10.en_khattab: Indeed, it will be announced to the disbelievers,
when invited to belief— was far worse than your contempt for one another

40:11.en_khattab: So is there any way out?

40:12.en_khattab: This is because when Allah alone was invoked, you ˹staunchly˺ disbelieved.
But when others were associated with Him ˹in worship˺, you ˹readily˺ believed.
So ˹Today˺ judgment belongs to Allah ˹alone˺—the Most High, All-Great.

40:13.en_khattab: He is the One Who shows you His signs
and sends down ˹rain as˺ a provision for you from the sky ˹But˺
none will be mindful except those who turn ˹to Him˺

40:14.en_khattab: even to the dismay of the disbelievers.

40:15.en_khattab: He sends down the revelation by His command
to whoever He wills of His servants
to warn ˹all˺ of the Day of Meeting—

40:16.en_khattab: the Day all will appear ˹before Allah˺.

40:16.qpc_hafs: لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ
40:16.en_khattab: Nothing about them will be hidden from Him.
˹He will ask,˺ 'Who does all authority belong to this Day?
To Allah— the One, the Supreme!

40:17.en_khattab: every soul will be rewarded for what it has done
Surely Allah is swift in reckoning.

40:19.en_khattab: Allah ˹even˺ knows the sly glances of the eyes

40:20.en_khattab: And Allah judges with the truth,

40:20.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ لَا يَقۡضُونَ بِشَيۡءٍۗ
40:20.en_khattab: while those ˹idols˺ they invoke besides Him cannot judge at all.
Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

40:21.en_khattab: Have they not travelled throughout the land

40:21.qpc_hafs: فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ
40:21.en_khattab: to see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before them?

they will never be allowed to.

41:25.en_khattab: We placed at their disposal ˹evil˺ associates

41:25.qpc_hafs: فَزَيَّنُواْ لَهُم مَّا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ
41:25.en_khattab: who made their past and future ˹misdeeds˺ appealing to them.

41:25.qpc_hafs: فِيٓ أُمَمٖ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِۖ
41:25.en_khattab: of earlier communities of jinn and humans
has been justified against them ˹as well˺, ˹for˺ they were truly losers.

41:26.en_khattab: Do not listen to this Quran

41:27.en_khattab: So We will certainly make the disbelievers taste a severe punishment
and We will surely repay them according to the worst of their deeds

41:28.en_khattab: That is the reward of Allah’s enemies: the Fire,
which will be their eternal home
a ˹fitting˺ reward for their denial of Our revelations.

41:29.qpc_hafs: رَبَّنَآ أَرِنَا ٱلَّذَيۡنِ أَضَلَّانَا مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ
41:29.en_khattab: cry, “Our Lord! Show us those jinn and humans who led us astray
we will put them under our feet
so that they will be among the lowest ˹in Hell˺.

41:30.en_khattab: Surely those who say, “Our Lord is Allah,”
Rather, rejoice in the good news of Paradise, which you have been promised.

41:31.en_khattab: in this worldly life and in the Hereafter.
There you will have whatever your souls desire,
and there you will have whatever you ask for:

41:33.en_khattab: than someone who calls ˹others˺ to Allah
and says, “I am truly one of those who submit.”

41:34.en_khattab: Good and evil cannot be equal.
then the one you are in a feud with
will be like a close friend.

41:35.en_khattab: But this cannot be attained except

41:36.en_khattab: And if you are tempted by Satan
Indeed, He ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

41:37.en_khattab: Among His signs are the day and the night,

41:37.qpc_hafs: لَا تَسۡجُدُواْ لِلشَّمۡسِ وَلَا لِلۡقَمَرِ وَٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِۤ
41:37.en_khattab: Do not prostrate to the sun or the moon, but prostrate to Allah,

41:38.en_khattab: But if the pagans are too proud,
then ˹let them know that˺ those ˹angels˺ nearest to your Lord glorify Him

41:39.en_khattab: that you see the earth devoid of life,
but as soon as We send down rain upon it,
it begins to stir ˹to life˺ and swell.
Indeed, the One Who revives it can easily revive the dead.
He is certainly Most Capable of everything.

41:40.en_khattab: Indeed, those who abuse Our revelations

41:40.qpc_hafs: أَفَمَن يُلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَيۡرٌ أَم مَّن يَأۡتِيٓ ءَامِنٗا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ
41:40.en_khattab: Who is better: the one who will be cast into the Fire or the one who will be secure on Judgment Day
He is certainly All-Seeing of what you do

41:41.en_khattab: Indeed, those who deny the Reminder
after it has come to them ˹are doomed˺,
for it is truly a mighty Book.

41:42.en_khattab: a revelation from the ˹One Who is˺ All-Wise, Praiseworthy

41:43.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet!˺ Nothing is said to you ˹by the deniers˺

41:43.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا مَا قَدۡ قِيلَ لِلرُّسُلِ مِن قَبۡلِكَۚ
41:43.en_khattab: except what was already said to the messengers before you.
Surely your Lord is ˹the Lord˺ of forgiveness

41:44.en_khattab: Had We revealed it as a non-Arabic Quran,
they would have certainly argued, “If only its verses were made clear ˹in our language˺.
What! A non-Arabic revelation for an Arab audience!”

41:44.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ هُوَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ هُدٗى وَشِفَآءٞۚ
41:44.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “It is a guide and a healing to the believers.

41:44.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَقۡرٞ
41:44.en_khattab: As for those who disbelieve, there is deafness in their ears
and blindness to it ˹in their hearts˺.
It is as if they are being called from a faraway place.”

41:45.en_khattab: Indeed, We had given Moses the Scripture,
Had it not been for a prior decree from your Lord,
their differences would have been settled ˹at once˺.
They are truly in alarming doubt about it.

41:46.en_khattab: it is to their own benefit
it is to their own loss

41:47.en_khattab: With Him ˹alone˺ is the knowledge of the Hour.

41:47.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تَخۡرُجُ مِن ثَمَرَٰتٖ مِّنۡ أَكۡمَامِهَا
41:47.en_khattab: No fruit comes out of its husk,

41:47.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تَحۡمِلُ مِنۡ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلۡمِهِۦۚ
41:47.en_khattab: nor does a female conceive or deliver without His knowledge.
And ˹consider˺ the Day He will call to them, “Where are My ˹so-called˺ associate-gods?”

41:47.qpc_hafs: قَالُوٓاْ ءَاذَنَّٰكَ مَا مِنَّا مِن شَهِيدٖ
41:47.en_khattab: They will cry, “We declare before you that none of us testifies to that ˹any longer˺.”

41:48.en_khattab: Whatever ˹idols˺ they used to invoke besides Allah

41:49.qpc_hafs: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ
41:49.en_khattab: One never tires of praying for good.

41:50.qpc_hafs: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَٰهُ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتۡهُ
41:50.en_khattab: And if We let them taste a mercy from Us after being touched with adversity

41:50.qpc_hafs: لَيَقُولَنَّ هَٰذَا لِي وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةٗ وَلَئِن رُّجِعۡتُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّيٓ
41:50.en_khattab: they will certainly say, “This is what I deserve. I do not think the Hour will ˹ever˺ come. And if in fact I am returned to my Lord
the finest reward with Him will definitely be mine
But We will surely inform the disbelievers of what they used to do
And We will certainly make them taste a harsh torment

41:51.en_khattab: When We show favour to someone

41:52.qpc_hafs: أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ
41:52.en_khattab: ˹them, O Prophet˺, “Imagine if this ˹Quran˺ is ˹truly˺ from Allah

41:52.qpc_hafs: مَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنۡ هُوَ فِي شِقَاقِۭ
41:52.en_khattab: who can be more astray than those who have gone too far in opposition

41:53.en_khattab: We will show them Our signs in the universe
until it becomes clear to them

41:53.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِ بِرَبِّكَ أَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
41:53.en_khattab: Is it not enough that your Lord is a Witness over all things?

41:54.qpc_hafs: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡۗ
41:54.en_khattab: They are truly in doubt of the meeting with their Lord!
But He is indeed Fully Aware of everything.

42:4.en_khattab: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens
and whatever is on the earth
And He is the Most High, the Greatest.

42:5.en_khattab: The heavens nearly burst, one above the other, ˹in awe of Him˺.
And the angels glorify the praises of their Lord,
and seek forgiveness for those on earth.

42:5.qpc_hafs: أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
42:5.en_khattab: Surely Allah alone is the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

42:6.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهُ
42:6.en_khattab: As for those who take other protectors besides Him,
And you ˹O Prophet˺ are not a keeper over them.

42:7.en_khattab: And so We have revealed to you a Quran in Arabic,
so you may warn the Mother of Cities and everyone around it,

42:7.qpc_hafs: وَتُنذِرَ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡجَمۡعِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ
42:7.en_khattab: and warn of the Day of Gathering— about which there is no

42:7.qpc_hafs: فَرِيقٞ فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَفَرِيقٞ فِي ٱلسَّعِيرِ
42:7.en_khattab: doubt—˹when˺ a group will be in Paradise and another in the Blaze.

42:8.en_khattab: He could have easily made all ˹humanity˺ into a single community ˹of believers˺.

42:8.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِن يُدۡخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ
42:8.en_khattab: But He admits into His mercy whoever He wills.

42:8.qpc_hafs: وَٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ مَا لَهُم مِّن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
42:8.en_khattab: And the wrongdoers will have no protector or helper.

42:9.en_khattab: How can they take protectors besides Him?
He ˹alone˺ gives life to the dead.
And He ˹alone˺ is Most Capable of everything.

42:10.en_khattab: the believers, O Prophet,˺ “Whatever you may differ about,
In Him I put my trust,

42:11.en_khattab: ˹He is˺ the Originator of the heavens and the earth.
He has made for you spouses from among yourselves,
and ˹made˺ mates for cattle ˹as well˺—multiplying you ˹both˺.
for He ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

42:12.en_khattab: To Him belong the keys ˹of the treasuries˺ of the heavens and the earth.
He gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills.
Indeed, He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

42:13.qpc_hafs: شَرَعَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلدِّينِ مَا وَصَّىٰ بِهِۦ نُوحٗا
42:13.en_khattab: He has ordained for you ˹believers˺ the Way which He decreed for Noah,
and what We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺

42:13.qpc_hafs: وَمَا وَصَّيۡنَا بِهِۦٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰٓۖ
42:13.en_khattab: and what We decreed for Abraham, Moses, and Jesus,

42:13.qpc_hafs: أَنۡ أَقِيمُواْ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَا تَتَفَرَّقُواْ فِيهِۚ
42:13.en_khattab: commanding: “Uphold the faith, and make no divisions in it.”

42:13.qpc_hafs: كَبُرَ عَلَى ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مَا تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِۚ
42:13.en_khattab: What you call the polytheists to is unbearable for them.

42:13.qpc_hafs: ٱللَّهُ يَجۡتَبِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ مَن يُنِيبُ
42:13.en_khattab: Allah chooses for Himself whoever He wills, and guides to Himself whoever turns ˹to Him˺.

42:14.qpc_hafs: وَمَا تَفَرَّقُوٓاْ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعِلۡمُ بَغۡيَۢا بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ
42:14.en_khattab: They did not split ˹into sects˺ out of mutual envy until knowledge came to them.

42:14.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى لَّقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ
42:14.en_khattab: Had it not been for a prior decree from your Lord for an appointed term, the matter would have certainly been settled between them ˹at once˺.

42:14.qpc_hafs: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُورِثُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ لَفِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهُ مُرِيبٖ
42:14.en_khattab: And surely those who were made to inherit the Scripture after them are truly in alarming doubt about this ˹Quran˺.

42:15.en_khattab: Because of that, you ˹O Prophet˺ will invite ˹all˺.
Be steadfast as you are commanded,
and do not follow their desires.

42:15.qpc_hafs: وَقُلۡ ءَامَنتُ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن كِتَٰبٖۖ
42:15.en_khattab: And say, “I believe in every Scripture Allah has revealed.
And I am commanded to judge fairly among you.
Allah is our Lord and your Lord.
We will be accountable for our deeds and you for yours.
There is no ˹need for˺ contention between us.
Allah will gather us together ˹for judgment˺.
And to Him is the final return.

42:16.qpc_hafs: فِي ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا ٱسۡتُجِيبَ لَهُۥ
42:16.en_khattab: about Allah after He is ˹already˺ acknowledged ˹by many˺
their argument is futile in the sight of their Lord
and they will suffer a severe punishment.

42:17.en_khattab: has revealed the Book with the truth and the balance ˹of justice˺.

42:18.qpc_hafs: يَسۡتَعۡجِلُ بِهَا ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهَاۖ
42:18.en_khattab: Those who disbelieve in it ˹ask to˺ hasten it ˹mockingly˺.

42:18.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مُشۡفِقُونَ مِنۡهَا وَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّهَا ٱلۡحَقُّۗ
42:18.en_khattab: But the believers are fearful of it, knowing that it is the truth.

42:18.qpc_hafs: أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُمَارُونَ فِي ٱلسَّاعَةِ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٍ
42:18.en_khattab: Surely those who dispute about the Hour have gone far astray.

42:19.en_khattab: Allah is Ever Kind to His servants.
He provides ˹abundantly˺ to whoever He wills.
And He is the All-Powerful, Almighty.

42:20.en_khattab: Whoever desires the harvest of the Hereafter
And whoever desires ˹only˺ the harvest of this world

42:20.qpc_hafs: نُؤۡتِهِۦ مِنۡهَا وَمَا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مِن نَّصِيبٍ
42:20.en_khattab: We will give them some of it, but they will have no share in the Hereafter.

42:21.qpc_hafs: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَٰٓؤُاْ شَرَعُواْ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱلدِّينِ
42:21.en_khattab: Or do they have associate-gods who have ordained for them some ˹polytheistic˺ beliefs
Had it not been for ˹prior˺ decree on Judgment
the matter would have certainly been settled between them ˹at once˺
And surely the wrongdoers will suffer a painful punishment

42:22.en_khattab: You will see the wrongdoers fearful
of the punishment for what they committed but it will be inevitable for them
whereas those who believe and do good
will be in the lush Gardens of Paradise
They will have whatever they desire from their Lord

42:23.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِي يُبَشِّرُ ٱللَّهُ عِبَادَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِۗ
42:23.en_khattab: That ˹reward˺ is the good news which Allah gives to His servants who believe and do good.

42:23.qpc_hafs: قُل لَّآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَجۡرًا إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوَدَّةَ فِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰۗ
42:23.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I do not ask you for a reward for this ˹message˺—only honour for ˹our˺ kinship.

42:23.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَقۡتَرِفۡ حَسَنَةٗ نَّزِدۡ لَهُۥ فِيهَا حُسۡنًاۚ
42:23.en_khattab: Whoever earns a good deed, We will increase it in goodness for them.
Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

42:24.qpc_hafs: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗاۖ
42:24.en_khattab: Or do they say, “He has fabricated a lie about Allah!”?

42:24.qpc_hafs: فَإِن يَشَإِ ٱللَّهُ يَخۡتِمۡ عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِكَۗ
42:24.en_khattab: If you had, Allah would have sealed your heart, if He willed.

42:24.qpc_hafs: وَيَمۡحُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَيُحِقُّ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦٓۚ
42:24.en_khattab: And Allah wipes out falsehood and establishes the truth by His Words.
He certainly knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

42:25.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ
42:25.en_khattab: He is the One Who accepts repentance from His servants
And He knows whatever you do

42:26.en_khattab: He responds to those who believe
and increases their reward out of His grace
they will suffer a severe punishment

42:27.en_khattab: Had Allah given abundant provisions to ˹all˺ His servants
they would have certainly transgressed throughout the land
But He sends down whatever He wills in perfect measure
He is truly All-Aware, All-Seeing of His servants

42:28.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡغَيۡثَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا قَنَطُواْ
42:28.en_khattab: He is the One Who sends down rain after people have given up hope
He is the Guardian, the Praiseworthy

42:29.en_khattab: And among His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth
and all living beings He dispersed throughout both

42:29.qpc_hafs: وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ جَمۡعِهِمۡ إِذَا يَشَآءُ قَدِيرٞ
42:29.en_khattab: And He is Most Capable of bringing all together whenever He wills

42:30.en_khattab: is because of what your own hands have committed

42:31.en_khattab: You can never escape ˹Him˺ on earth,

42:31.qpc_hafs: وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا
42:31.en_khattab: nor do you have any protector

42:32.en_khattab: And among His signs are the ships

42:33.en_khattab: If He wills, He can calm the wind
leaving the ships motionless on the water

42:34.en_khattab: Or He can wreck the ships
for what the people have committed

42:35.en_khattab: may know that they have no refuge.

42:36.en_khattab: is ˹no more than a fleeting˺ enjoyment of this worldly life.
But what is with Allah is far better and more lasting
for those who believe and put their trust in their Lord;

42:38.en_khattab: conduct their affairs by mutual consultation,
and donate from what We have provided for them;

42:40.en_khattab: The reward of an evil deed is its equivalent.
But whoever pardons and seeks reconciliation,
then their reward is with Allah.
He certainly does not like the wrongdoers.

42:41.en_khattab: There is no blame on those who enforce
There is no blame on them at all.

42:42.qpc_hafs: يَظۡلِمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ وَيَبۡغُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ
42:42.en_khattab: who wrong people and transgress in the land unjustly.
It is they who will suffer a painful punishment.

42:43.en_khattab: is a resolve to aspire to.

42:44.en_khattab: And whoever Allah leaves to stray

42:44.qpc_hafs: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن وَلِيّٖ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦۗ
42:44.en_khattab: will have no guide after Him.

as if they did not hear them.
So give them good news of a painful punishment.

45:9.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا عَلِمَ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا شَيۡـًٔا ٱتَّخَذَهَا هُزُوًاۚ
45:9.en_khattab: And whenever they learn anything of Our revelations, they make a mockery of it.
It is they who will suffer a humiliating punishment.

45:10.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُم مَّا كَسَبُواْ شَيۡـٔٗا
45:10.en_khattab: Their ˹worldly˺ gains will not be of any benefit to them whatsoever,

45:10.qpc_hafs: وَلَا مَا ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَۖ
45:10.en_khattab: nor will those protectors they have taken besides Allah.
And they will suffer a tremendous punishment.

45:11.en_khattab: And those who deny their Lord’s revelations
will suffer the ˹worst˺ torment of agonizing pain.

45:12.qpc_hafs: سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ لِتَجۡرِيَ ٱلۡفُلۡكُ فِيهِ بِأَمۡرِهِۦ
45:12.en_khattab: has subjected the sea for you so that ships may sail upon it by His command
and that you may seek His bounty
and that perhaps you will be grateful

45:13.qpc_hafs: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مِّنۡهُۚ
45:13.en_khattab: He ˹also˺ subjected for you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth— all by His grace.

45:13.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
45:13.en_khattab: Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

45:14.qpc_hafs: يَغۡفِرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ أَيَّامَ ٱللَّهِ
45:14.en_khattab: to forgive those who do not fear Allah’s days ˹of torment˺,
so that He will reward each group for what they used to commit.

45:15.en_khattab: it is to their own benefit
it is to their own loss
Then to your Lord you will ˹all˺ be returned

45:16.qpc_hafs: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحُكۡمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ
45:16.en_khattab: Indeed, We gave the Children of Israel the Scripture, wisdom, and prophethood
and favoured them above the others

45:17.en_khattab: We ˹also˺ gave them clear commandments regarding ˹their˺ faith.

45:17.qpc_hafs: فَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفُوٓاْ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعِلۡمُ بَغۡيَۢا بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ
45:17.en_khattab: But it was not until knowledge came to them that they differed out of mutual envy.

45:17.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقۡضِي بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
45:17.en_khattab: Surely your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment regarding their differences.

45:18.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَىٰ شَرِيعَةٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ
45:18.en_khattab: Now We have set you ˹O Prophet˺ on the ˹clear˺ Way of faith.

45:18.qpc_hafs: وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
45:18.en_khattab: and do not follow the desires of those who do not know ˹the truth˺.

45:19.qpc_hafs: إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يُغۡنُواْ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ
45:19.en_khattab: They certainly can be of no benefit to you against Allah whatsoever.
Surely the wrongdoers are patrons of each other,
whereas Allah is the Patron of the righteous.

45:20.en_khattab: This ˹Quran˺ is an insight for humanity—

45:21.en_khattab: Or do those who commit evil deeds ˹simply˺

45:21.qpc_hafs: أَن نَّجۡعَلَهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَوَآءٗ مَّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡۚ
45:21.en_khattab: think that We will make them equal— in their life and after their death— to those who believe and do good?

45:22.en_khattab: For Allah created the heavens and the earth for a purpose
so that every soul may be paid back for what it has committed

45:23.en_khattab: Have you seen ˹O Prophet˺ those who have taken their own desires as their god?
˹And so˺ Allah left them to stray knowingly,
and placed a cover on their sight.
Who then can guide them after Allah?
Will you ˹all˺ not then be mindful?

45:24.qpc_hafs: وَقَالُواْ مَا هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا
45:24.en_khattab: And they argue, “There is nothing beyond our worldly life.
And nothing destroys us but ˹the passage of˺ time.
Yet they have no knowledge ˹in support˺ of this ˹claim˺.

45:25.en_khattab: And whenever Our clear revelations are recited to them

45:25.qpc_hafs: مَّا كَانَ حُجَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ
45:25.en_khattab: their only argument is to say
Bring our forefathers back, if what you say is true!

45:26.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ gives you life,
then will gather you ˹all˺ on the Day of Judgment,

45:26.qpc_hafs: لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
45:26.en_khattab: about which there is no doubt. But most people do not know.

45:27.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
On the Day the Hour will be established,
the people of falsehood will then be in ˹total˺ loss.

45:28.en_khattab: And you will see every faith-community on its knees.
Every community will be summoned to its record ˹of deeds˺.
˹They all will be told,˺ “This Day you will be rewarded for what you used to do.

45:30.en_khattab: As for those who believed and did good
their Lord will admit them into His mercy

45:31.en_khattab: And as for those who disbelieved,
˹they will be told,˺ “Were My revelations not recited to you,
yet you acted arrogantly and were a wicked people?

45:32.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا قِيلَ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ
45:32.en_khattab: And whenever it was said ˹to you˺, ‘Surely Allah’s promise ˹of judgment˺ is true
and there is no doubt about the Hour,
you said ˹mockingly˺, ‘We do not know what the Hour is!
We think it is no more than speculation,
and we are not convinced ˹that it will ever come˺.’

45:33.en_khattab: And the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds will unfold before them

45:33.qpc_hafs: وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
45:33.en_khattab: and they will be overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule

45:34.qpc_hafs: نَنسَىٰكُمۡ كَمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَا
45:34.en_khattab: This Day We will neglect you as you neglected the meeting of this Day of yours!
Your home will be the Fire,
and you will have no helpers.

45:35.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوٗا
45:35.en_khattab: This is because you made a mockery of Allah’s revelations,
and were deluded by ˹your˺ worldly life.

45:35.qpc_hafs: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡرَجُونَ مِنۡهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَبُونَ
45:35.en_khattab: So ˹from˺ that Day ˹on˺ they will not be taken out of the Fire, nor will they be allowed to appease ˹their Lord˺.

45:36.en_khattab: So all praise is for Allah

45:37.en_khattab: To Him belongs ˹all˺ Majesty in the heavens and the earth.

46:3.en_khattab: and the earth and everything in between
for a purpose and an appointed term.
Yet the disbelievers are turning away from what they have been warned about.

46:4.qpc_hafs: أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
46:4.en_khattab: “Have you considered whatever ˹idols˺ you invoke besides Allah?
Show me what they have created on earth!
Or do they have a share in ˹the creation of˺ the heavens?
Bring me a scripture ˹revealed˺ before this ˹Quran˺

46:4.qpc_hafs: أَوۡ أَثَٰرَةٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
46:4.en_khattab: or a shred of knowledge, if what you say is true.”

46:5.qpc_hafs: وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّن يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
46:5.en_khattab: And who could be more astray than those who call upon others besides

46:5.qpc_hafs: مَن لَّا يَسۡتَجِيبُ لَهُۥٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
46:5.en_khattab: Allah—˹others˺ that cannot respond to them until the Day of Judgment,
and are ˹even˺ unaware of their calls?

46:6.en_khattab: And when ˹such˺ people will be gathered together

46:7.en_khattab: Whenever Our clear revelations are recited to them
the disbelievers say of the truth
when it has come to them, “This is pure magic.”

46:8.en_khattab: Or do they say, “He has fabricated this ˹Quran˺!”?

46:8.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ إِنِ ٱفۡتَرَيۡتُهُۥ فَلَا تَمۡلِكُونَ لِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۖ
46:8.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “If I have done so, then there is nothing whatsoever you can do to save me from Allah.
He knows best what ˹slurs˺ you indulge about it.
Sufficient is He as a Witness between you and me.
And He is the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

46:9.en_khattab: I am not the first messenger ever sent,

46:9.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أَدۡرِي مَا يُفۡعَلُ بِي وَلَا بِكُمۡۖ
46:9.en_khattab: nor do I know what will happen to me or you.

46:9.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ
46:9.en_khattab: I only follow what is revealed to me.
And I am only sent with a clear warning.

46:10.en_khattab: Consider if this ˹Quran˺ is ˹truly˺ from Allah

46:10.qpc_hafs: وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۢ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ مِثۡلِهِۦ
46:10.en_khattab: and a witness from the Children of Israel attests to it

46:10.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
46:10.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

46:11.en_khattab: The disbelievers say of the believers,

46:11.qpc_hafs: لَوۡ كَانَ خَيۡرٗا مَّا سَبَقُونَآ إِلَيۡهِۚ
46:11.en_khattab: Had it been ˹something˺ good, they would not have beaten us to it.
Now since they reject its guidance, they will say,

46:12.qpc_hafs: وَمِن قَبۡلِهِۦ كِتَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِمَامٗا وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ
46:12.en_khattab: And before this ˹Quran˺ the Book of Moses was ˹revealed as˺ a guide and mercy.
And this Book is a confirmation, in the Arabic tongue,
to warn those who do wrong, and as good news to those who do good.

46:13.en_khattab: Surely those who say, “Our Lord is Allah,”

46:13.qpc_hafs: فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
46:13.en_khattab: there will be no fear for them, nor will they grieve.

46:14.en_khattab: It is they who will be the residents of Paradise
as a reward for what they used to do

46:15.en_khattab: We have commanded people to honour their parents.
Their mothers bore them in hardship and delivered them in hardship.
Their ˹period of˺ bearing and weaning is thirty months.

46:15.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ
46:15.en_khattab: In time, when the child reaches their prime at the age of forty.

46:15.qpc_hafs: قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ
46:15.en_khattab: They pray, “My Lord! Inspire me to ˹always˺ be thankful for Your favours which You blessed me and my parents with.

46:15.qpc_hafs: وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ
46:15.en_khattab: And to do good deeds that please You. And instil righteousness in my offspring.

46:15.qpc_hafs: إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
46:15.en_khattab: I truly repent to You, and I truly submit ˹to Your Will˺.

46:16.en_khattab: that We will accept the good they did
along with the residents of Paradise,
in fulfilment of the true promise they have been given.

46:17.qpc_hafs: أَتَعِدَانِنِيٓ أَنۡ أُخۡرَجَ وَقَدۡ خَلَتِ ٱلۡقُرُونُ مِن قَبۡلِي
46:17.en_khattab: “Enough with you! Are you warning me that I will be brought forth ˹from the grave˺, while many generations had already perished before me ˹for good˺?”
The parents cry to Allah for help, ˹and warn their child,˺ “Pity you.
Have faith! Surely Allah’s promise is true.”

46:17.qpc_hafs: فَيَقُولُ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
46:17.en_khattab: But the deniers insist, “This is nothing but ancient fables.”

46:18.en_khattab: of jinn and humans has been justified, ˹for˺

46:19.en_khattab: Each ˹of the two groups˺ will be ranked
according to what they have done
so He may fully reward all

46:20.qpc_hafs: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ
46:20.en_khattab: ˹Watch for˺ the Day ˹when˺ the disbelievers will be exposed to the Fire. ˹They will be told,˺

46:20.qpc_hafs: أَذۡهَبۡتُمۡ طَيِّبَٰتِكُمۡ فِي حَيَاتِكُمُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱسۡتَمۡتَعۡتُم بِهَا
46:20.en_khattab: “You ˹already˺ exhausted your ˹share of˺ pleasures during your worldly life, and ˹fully˺ enjoyed them.

46:20.qpc_hafs: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡهُونِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ
46:20.en_khattab: So Today you will be rewarded with the torment of disgrace for your arrogance

46:20.qpc_hafs: فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡسُقُونَ
46:20.en_khattab: throughout the land with no right, and for your rebelliousness.”

46:21.en_khattab: when he warned his people, who inhabited the sand-hills—

46:21.qpc_hafs: وَقَدۡ خَلَتِ ٱلنُّذُرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦٓ
46:21.en_khattab: there were certainly warners before and after

46:21.qpc_hafs: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
46:21.en_khattab: I truly fear for you the torment of a tremendous day.”

46:22.en_khattab: Have you come to turn us away from our gods?
Bring us then whatever you threaten us with,
if what you say is true.

46:23.en_khattab: He responded, “The knowledge ˹of its time˺ is only with Allah.
I only convey to you what I have been sent with.
But I can see that you are a people acting ignorantly.

46:24.en_khattab: Then when they saw the torment as a ˹dense˺ cloud
they said ˹happily˺, “This is a cloud bringing us rain.”
But Hûd replied,˺ “No, it is what you sought to hasten:
a ˹fierce˺ wind carrying a painful punishment!

46:25.en_khattab: It destroyed everything by the command of its Lord
leaving nothing visible except their ruins
This is how We reward the wicked people.

46:26.qpc_hafs: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّٰهُمۡ فِيمَآ إِن مَّكَّنَّٰكُمۡ فِيهِ
46:26.en_khattab: Indeed, We had established them in a way We have not established you ˹Meccans˺.
And We gave them hearing, sight, and intellect.

46:26.qpc_hafs: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَفۡـِٔدَتُهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍ
46:26.en_khattab: But neither their hearing, sight, nor intellect were of any benefit to them whatsoever,
since they persisted in denying Allah’s signs.

46:26.qpc_hafs: وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
46:26.en_khattab: And ˹so˺ they were overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.

46:27.qpc_hafs: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ
46:27.en_khattab: We certainly destroyed the societies around you
so perhaps they would return ˹to the Right Path˺

46:28.qpc_hafs: فَلَوۡلَا نَصَرَهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ
46:28.en_khattab: Why then did those ˹idols˺ they took as gods—
Him˺—not come to their aid? Instead, they failed them.
That is ˹the result of˺ their lies and their fabrications.

46:29.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ صَرَفۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ نَفَرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ
46:29.en_khattab: ˹Remember, O  Prophet,˺ when We sent a group of jinn your way
they returned to their fellow jinn as warners.

46:30.qpc_hafs: إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا كِتَٰبًا أُنزِلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مُوسَىٰ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ
46:30.en_khattab: O our fellow jinn! We have truly heard a scripture revealed after Moses, confirming what came before it.

46:30.qpc_hafs: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِلَىٰ طَرِيقٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
46:30.en_khattab: It guides to the truth and the Straight Way.

46:31.en_khattab: Respond to the caller of Allah
and protect you from a painful punishment.

46:32.en_khattab: And whoever does not respond to the caller of Allah
will have no escape on earth,
nor will they have any protectors against Him.
It is they who are clearly astray.

46:33.qpc_hafs: أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَمۡ يَعۡيَ بِخَلۡقِهِنَّ
46:33.en_khattab: that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth and did not tire in creating them,
is able to give life to the dead?
He is certainly Most Capable of everything.

46:34.qpc_hafs: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ
46:34.en_khattab: And on the Day the disbelievers will be exposed to the Fire,
˹they will be asked,˺ “Is this ˹Hereafter˺ not the truth?”
They will cry, “Absolutely, by our Lord!”

46:34.qpc_hafs: قَالَ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ
46:34.en_khattab: It will be said, “Then taste the punishment for your disbelief.”

46:35.en_khattab: So endure patiently, as did the Messengers of Firm Resolve.
And do not ˹seek to˺ hasten ˹the torment˺ for the deniers.
On the Day they see what they have been threatened with, it will be as if they had only stayed ˹in this world˺ for an hour of a day.

46:35.qpc_hafs: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا سَاعَةٗ مِّن نَّهَارِۭۚ
بَلَٰغٞۚ فَهَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
46:35.en_khattab: Then, will anyone be destroyed except the rebellious people?

47:1.en_khattab: and hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah
He will render their deeds void

47:2.en_khattab: As for those who believe, do good,

47:2.qpc_hafs: وَءَامَنُواْ بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمۡ
47:2.en_khattab: and have faith in what has been revealed to Muḥammad— which is the truth from their Lord
He will absolve them of their sins and improve their condition.

47:3.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ
47:3.en_khattab: This is because the disbelievers follow falsehood,

47:3.qpc_hafs: وَأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ مِن رَّبِّهِمۡۚ
47:3.en_khattab: while the believers follow the truth from their Lord.
This is how Allah shows people their true state ˹of faith˺.

47:4.en_khattab: So when you meet the disbelievers
˹in battle˺, strike ˹their˺ necks until you have thoroughly subdued them

47:4.qpc_hafs: فَشُدُّواْ ٱلۡوَثَاقَ فَإِمَّا مَنَّۢا بَعۡدُ وَإِمَّا فِدَآءً
47:4.en_khattab: then bind them firmly. Later ˹free them either as˺ an act of grace or by ransom
until the war comes to an end

47:4.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَلَوۡ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ لَٱنتَصَرَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لِّيَبۡلُوَاْ بَعۡضَكُم بِبَعۡضٖۗ
47:4.en_khattab: So will it be. Had Allah willed, He ˹Himself˺ could have inflicted punishment on them. But He does ˹this only to˺ test some of you by means of others

47:4.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَن يُضِلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
47:4.en_khattab: And those who are martyred in the cause of Allah, He will never render their deeds void

47:5.en_khattab: He will guide them ˹to their reward˺,

47:6.en_khattab: having made it known to them.

47:7.en_khattab: If you stand up for Allah, He will help you

47:8.en_khattab: and may He render their deeds void.

47:9.en_khattab: so He has rendered their deeds void

47:10.en_khattab: Have they not travelled throughout the land

47:10.qpc_hafs: فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ
47:10.en_khattab: to see what was the end of those before them
and a similar fate awaits the disbelievers

47:11.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ
47:11.en_khattab: This is because Allah is the Patron of the believers
while the disbelievers have no patron

47:12.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدۡخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ
47:12.en_khattab: Surely Allah will admit those who believe and do good
into Gardens under which rivers flow

47:12.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأۡكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأۡكُلُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمُ
47:12.en_khattab: As for the disbelievers, they enjoy themselves and feed like cattle
But the Fire will be their home

47:13.qpc_hafs: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ هِيَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةٗ مِّن قَرۡيَتِكَ
47:13.en_khattab: Imagine, O  Prophet, how many societies We destroyed that were far superior in might than your society
there was none to help them!

47:14.qpc_hafs: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ
47:14.en_khattab: Can those ˹believers˺ who stand on clear proof from their Lord
be like those whose evil deeds are made appealing to them

47:15.en_khattab: The description of the Paradise promised to the righteous is

47:15.qpc_hafs: فِيهَآ أَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّن مَّآءٍ غَيۡرِ ءَاسِنٖ
47:15.en_khattab: that in it are rivers of fresh water

47:15.qpc_hafs: وَأَنۡهَٰرٞ مِّن لَّبَنٖ لَّمۡ يَتَغَيَّرۡ طَعۡمُهُۥ
47:15.en_khattab: rivers of milk that never changes in taste
rivers of wine delicious to drink
There they will ˹also˺ have all kinds of fruit
Can they be˺ like those who will stay in the Fire forever
left to drink boiling water that will tear apart their insides

47:16.en_khattab: There are some of them who listen to you ˹O Prophet˺

47:16.qpc_hafs: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا خَرَجُواْ مِنۡ عِندِكَ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ
47:16.en_khattab: but when they depart from you, they say ˹mockingly˺ to those ˹believers˺ gifted with knowledge

47:16.qpc_hafs: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ
47:16.en_khattab: These are the ones whose hearts Allah has sealed

47:17.en_khattab: As for those who are ˹rightly˺ guided,

47:18.en_khattab: for the Hour to take them by surprise
Yet ˹some of˺ its signs have already come
Once it actually befalls them, will it not be too late to be mindful

47:19.en_khattab: that there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Allah.
And seek forgiveness for your shortcomings and for ˹the sins of˺ the believing men and women.
For Allah ˹fully˺ knows your movements and places of rest ˹O people˺.

47:20.qpc_hafs: فَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةٞ مُّحۡكَمَةٞ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا ٱلۡقِتَالُ
47:20.en_khattab: ˹allowing self-defence˺!” Yet when a precise sûrah is revealed, in which fighting is ˹explicitly˺ mentioned,

47:20.qpc_hafs: رَأَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ نَظَرَ ٱلۡمَغۡشِيِّ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ
47:20.en_khattab: you see those with sickness in their hearts staring at you like someone in the throes of death.
It would have been better for them

47:21.qpc_hafs: فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ
47:21.en_khattab: it surely would have been better for them if they were true to Allah.

47:22.en_khattab: perhaps you would then spread corruption throughout the land
and sever your ties of kinship!

47:24.en_khattab: Do they not then reflect on the Quran?
Or are there locks upon their hearts?

47:25.qpc_hafs: عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَى
47:25.en_khattab: ˹into disbelief˺ after ˹true˺ guidance has become clear to them
˹it is˺ Satan ˹that˺ has tempted them, luring them with false hopes.

47:26.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ
47:26.en_khattab: That is because they said ˹privately˺ to those who ˹also˺ detest what Allah has revealed,
“We will obey you in some matters.”
But Allah ˹fully˺ knows what they are hiding.

47:27.en_khattab: will it be when the angels take their souls, beating their faces

47:28.en_khattab: so He has rendered their deeds void

47:29.qpc_hafs: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ
47:29.en_khattab: Or do those with sickness in their hearts
think that Allah will not ˹be able to˺ expose their malice?

47:30.en_khattab: Had We willed, We could have truly shown them to you ˹O Prophet˺
and you would have certainly recognized them by their appearance.
But you will surely recognize them by their tone of speech.
And Allah ˹fully˺ knows your doings ˹O people˺.

47:31.en_khattab: until We prove those of you who ˹truly˺ struggle ˹in Allah’s cause˺ and remain steadfast
and reveal how you conduct yourselves

47:32.en_khattab: hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah,

47:32.qpc_hafs: وَشَآقُّواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ
47:32.en_khattab: and defy the Messenger after ˹true˺ guidance has become clear to them;
they will not harm Allah in the least,
but He will render their deeds void.

47:33.en_khattab: Obey Allah and obey the Messenger,
and do not let your deeds be in vain.

47:34.en_khattab: hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah

47:35.en_khattab: for you will have the upper hand
And He will never let your deeds go to waste

47:36.en_khattab: is no more than play and amusement.
But if you are faithful and mindful ˹of Allah˺,
He will grant you your ˹full˺ reward,
and will not ask you ˹to donate all˺ your wealth.

47:37.en_khattab: If He were to do so
and He would bring out your resentment.

47:38.en_khattab: to donate ˹a little˺ in the cause of Allah.

47:38.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَبۡخَلۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَبۡخَلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ
47:38.en_khattab: And whoever does so, it is only to their own loss.
For Allah is the Self-Sufficient, whereas you stand in need ˹of Him˺.
He will replace you with another people.
And they will not be like you.

48:2.qpc_hafs: لِّيَغۡفِرَ لَكَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنۢبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ
48:2.en_khattab: so that Allah may forgive you for your past and future shortcomings
guide you along the Straight Path

48:3.en_khattab: and so that Allah will help you

48:4.en_khattab: sent down serenity upon the hearts of the believers
so that they may increase even more in their faith
To Allah ˹alone˺ belong the forces of the heavens and the earth

48:5.en_khattab: So He may admit believing men and women into Gardens
and absolve them of their sins

48:5.qpc_hafs: وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمٗا
48:5.en_khattab: And that is a supreme achievement in the sight of Allah

48:6.en_khattab: Also ˹so that˺ He may punish hypocrite men
and women, who harbour evil thoughts of Allah.

48:7.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belong the forces of the heavens and the earth.

48:9.en_khattab: so that you ˹believers˺ may have faith in Allah and His Messenger
and glorify Allah morning and evening.

48:10.en_khattab: Surely those who pledge allegiance to you ˹O Prophet˺
are actually pledging allegiance to Allah.

48:10.qpc_hafs: فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۖ
48:10.en_khattab: Whoever breaks their pledge, it will only be to their own loss.

48:10.qpc_hafs: وَمَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِمَا عَٰهَدَ عَلَيۡهُ ٱللَّهَ
48:10.en_khattab: And whoever fulfils their pledge to Allah,
He will grant them a great reward.

48:11.en_khattab: The nomadic Arabs, who stayed behind, will say to you ˹O Prophet˺,
We were preoccupied with our wealth and families,

48:11.qpc_hafs: فَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَاۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلۡسِنَتِهِم مَّا لَيۡسَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ
48:11.en_khattab: so ask for forgiveness for us. They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts.

48:11.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ فَمَن يَمۡلِكُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔا
48:11.en_khattab: Say, “Who then can stand between you and Allah in any way,

48:11.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ ضَرًّا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ نَفۡعَۢاۚ
48:11.en_khattab: if He intends harm or benefit for you?

48:11.qpc_hafs: بَلۡ كَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرَۢا
48:11.en_khattab: In fact, Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

48:12.qpc_hafs: أَن لَّن يَنقَلِبَ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِيهِمۡ أَبَدٗا
48:12.en_khattab: that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families again.
And that was made appealing in your hearts.

48:13.en_khattab: And whoever does not believe in Allah and His Messenger,
for the disbelievers a blazing Fire.

48:14.en_khattab: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

48:15.en_khattab: Those who stayed behind will say,
when you ˹believers˺ set out to take the spoils of war,
They wish to change Allah’s promise.

48:15.qpc_hafs: قُل لَّن تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَٰلِكُمۡ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ مِن قَبۡلُۖ
48:15.en_khattab: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You will not accompany us. This is what Allah has said before.”
They will then say, “In fact, you are driven by jealousy against us!”

48:15.qpc_hafs: بَلۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
48:15.en_khattab: The truth is: they can hardly comprehend.

48:16.en_khattab: Say to nomadic Arabs, who stayed behind,

48:16.qpc_hafs: سَتُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ أُوْلِي بَأۡسٖ شَدِيدٖ
48:16.en_khattab: You will be called ˹to fight˺ against a people of great might,
who you will fight unless they submit.

48:16.qpc_hafs: فَإِن تُطِيعُواْ يُؤۡتِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَجۡرًا حَسَنٗاۖ
48:16.en_khattab: If you then obey, Allah will grant you a fine reward.

48:16.qpc_hafs: وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ كَمَا تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّن قَبۡلُ
48:16.en_khattab: But if you turn away as you did before,
He will inflict upon you a painful punishment.

48:17.en_khattab: There is no blame on the blind,

48:17.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدۡخِلۡهُ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ
48:17.en_khattab: And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger will be admitted by Him into Gardens under which rivers flow.
But whoever turns away will be subjected by Him to a painful punishment.

48:18.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah was pleased with the believers
when they pledged allegiance to you ˹O Prophet˺ under the tree
He knew what was in their hearts
so He sent down serenity upon them
and rewarded them with a victory at hand

48:19.en_khattab: and many spoils of war they will gain.

48:20.en_khattab: Allah has promised you ˹believers˺ abundant spoils

48:20.qpc_hafs: تَأۡخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمۡ هَٰذِهِۦ وَكَفَّ أَيۡدِيَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنكُمۡ
48:20.en_khattab: which you will gain, so He hastened this ˹truce˺ for you. And He has held people’s hands back from ˹harming˺ you

48:20.qpc_hafs: وَلِتَكُونَ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَيَهۡدِيَكُمۡ صِرَٰطٗا مُّسۡتَقِيمٗا
48:20.en_khattab: so it may be a sign for the believers, and so He may guide you along the Straight Path

48:21.en_khattab: And ˹there are˺ other gains which are beyond your reach
that Allah is keeping in store ˹for you˺.

48:21.qpc_hafs: وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا
48:21.en_khattab: For Allah is Most Capable of everything.

48:22.en_khattab: If the disbelievers were to fight you,

48:22.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا
48:22.en_khattab: Then they would never find any protector or helper.

48:23.qpc_hafs: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُۖ
48:23.en_khattab: ˹This is˺ Allah’s way, already long established ˹in the past˺.
And you will find no change in Allah’s way.

48:24.en_khattab: held back their hands from you and your hands from them
in the valley of ˹Ḥudaibiyah, near˺ Mecca,
after giving you the upper hand over ˹a group of˺ them.
And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

48:25.qpc_hafs: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّوكُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ
48:25.en_khattab: They are the ones who persisted in disbelief and hindered you from the Sacred Mosque
preventing the sacrificial animals from reaching their destination
We would have let you march through Mecca
had there not been believing men and women
unknown to you. You might have trampled them underfoot
incurring guilt for ˹what you did to˺ them unknowingly

48:25.qpc_hafs: لِّيُدۡخِلَ ٱللَّهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ
48:25.en_khattab: That was so Allah may admit into His mercy whoever He wills

48:25.qpc_hafs: لَعَذَّبۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
48:25.en_khattab: We would have certainly inflicted a painful punishment on the disbelievers

48:26.en_khattab: had filled their hearts with pride— the pride of ˹pre-Islamic˺ ignorance
