57:23.en_khattab: For Allah does not like whoever is arrogant, boastful—

57:24.en_khattab: should know that Allah ˹alone˺ is truly the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

57:25.en_khattab: Indeed, We sent Our messengers with clear proofs,

57:25.qpc_hafs: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ
57:25.en_khattab: and with them We sent down the Scripture and the balance ˹of justice˺ so that people may administer justice.
And We sent down iron with its great might,

57:25.qpc_hafs: وَمَنَٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ
57:25.en_khattab: benefits for humanity, and means for Allah to prove who ˹is willing to˺ stand up for Him and His messengers without seeing Him.

57:26.en_khattab: and reserved prophethood and revelation for their descendants

57:27.en_khattab: Then in the footsteps of these ˹prophets˺, We sent Our messengers,

57:27.qpc_hafs: وَقَفَّيۡنَا بِعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلَۖ
57:27.en_khattab: and ˹after them˺ We sent Jesus, son of Mary, and granted him the Gospel,

57:27.qpc_hafs: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأۡفَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ
57:27.en_khattab: and instilled compassion and mercy into the hearts of his followers.
As for monasticism, they made it up— We never ordained it for them—

57:27.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ رِضۡوَٰنِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوۡهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَاۖ
57:27.en_khattab: only seeking to please Allah, yet they did not ˹even˺ observe it strictly.
So We rewarded those of them who were faithful.
But most of them are rebellious.

57:28.en_khattab: Fear Allah and believe in His Messenger. ˹And˺
He will grant you a double share of His mercy,
provide you with a light to walk in ˹on Judgment Day˺,
For Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

57:29.en_khattab: ˹This is so˺ that the People of the Book ˹who deny the Prophet˺

57:29.qpc_hafs: أَلَّا يَقۡدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ مِّن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ
57:29.en_khattab: may know that they do not have any control over Allah’s grace,
and that all grace is in Allah’s Hands.
He grants it to whoever He wills.
For Allah is the Lord of infinite bounty.

58:1.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّتِي تُجَٰدِلُكَ
58:1.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah has heard the argument of the woman who pleaded with you ˹O Prophet˺
concerning her husband, and appealed to Allah

58:2.en_khattab: Those of you who ˹sinfully˺ divorce their wives by comparing them
to their mothers ˹should know that˺ their wives are in no way their mothers.
None can be their mothers except those who gave birth to them.

58:2.qpc_hafs: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَقُولُونَ مُنكَرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَزُورٗاۚ
58:2.en_khattab: What they say is certainly detestable and false.
Yet Allah is truly Ever-Pardoning, All-Forgiving.

58:3.en_khattab: Those who divorce their wives in this manner,
then ˹wish to˺ retract what they said,

58:3.qpc_hafs: فَتَحۡرِيرُ رَقَبَةٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَتَمَآسَّاۚ
58:3.en_khattab: must free a slave before they touch each other.
This ˹penalty˺ is meant to deter you.
And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

58:4.en_khattab: But if the husband cannot afford this
let him then fast two consecutive months
before the couple touch each other
But if he is unable ˹to fast˺
then let him feed sixty poor people
This is to re-affirm your faith in Allah and His Messenger
These are the limits set by Allah
And the disbelievers will suffer a painful punishment

58:5.en_khattab: Indeed, those who defy Allah and His Messenger

58:5.qpc_hafs: كُبِتُواْ كَمَا كُبِتَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ
58:5.en_khattab: will be debased, just like those before them
We have certainly sent down clear revelations
And the disbelievers will suffer a humiliating punishment

58:6.en_khattab: On the Day Allah resurrects them all together
He will then inform them of what they have done
Allah has kept account of it all, while they have forgotten it
For Allah is a Witness over all things

58:7.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ
58:7.en_khattab: Do you not see that Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth?

58:7.qpc_hafs: مَا يَكُونُ مِن نَّجۡوَىٰ ثَلَٰثَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ رَابِعُهُمۡ
58:7.en_khattab: If three converse privately, He is their fourth.
If five, He is their sixth.

58:7.qpc_hafs: وَلَآ أَدۡنَىٰ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكۡثَرَ إِلَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كَانُواْۖ
58:7.en_khattab: Whether fewer or more, He is with them wherever they may be.

58:7.qpc_hafs: ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُواْ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ
58:7.en_khattab: Then, on the Day of Judgment, He will inform them of what they have done.
Surely Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

58:8.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نُهُواْ عَنِ ٱلنَّجۡوَىٰ
58:8.en_khattab: Have you not seen those who were forbidden from secret talks
yet they ˹always˺ return to what they were forbidden from
conspiring in sin, aggression, and disobedience to the Messenger

58:8.qpc_hafs: وَإِذَا جَآءُوكَ حَيَّوۡكَ بِمَا لَمۡ يُحَيِّكَ بِهِ ٱللَّهُ
58:8.en_khattab: And when they come to you ˹O Prophet˺, they greet you not as Allah greets you

58:8.qpc_hafs: وَيَقُولُونَ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ لَوۡلَا يُعَذِّبُنَا ٱللَّهُ بِمَا نَقُولُۚ
58:8.en_khattab: and say to one another, “Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?”
Hell is enough for them— they will burn in it

58:9.qpc_hafs: فَلَا تَتَنَٰجَوۡاْ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَٰنِ وَمَعۡصِيَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ
58:9.en_khattab: let it not be for sin, aggression, or disobedience to the Messenger,
but let it be for goodness and righteousness.
to Whom you will ˹all˺ be gathered.

58:10.en_khattab: Secret talks are only inspired by Satan
Yet he cannot harm them whatsoever
So in Allah let the believers put their trust

58:11.qpc_hafs: إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمۡ تَفَسَّحُواْ فِي ٱلۡمَجَٰلِسِ فَٱفۡسَحُواْ
58:11.en_khattab: When you are told to make room in gatherings, then do so.
Allah will make room for you ˹in His grace˺.
And if you are told to rise, then do so.
Allah will elevate those of you who are faithful,
and ˹raise˺ those gifted with knowledge in rank.
And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

58:12.en_khattab: privately, give something in charity before your consultation.
That is better and purer for you.
But if you lack the means,
then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

58:13.qpc_hafs: ءَأَشۡفَقۡتُمۡ أَن تُقَدِّمُواْ بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ نَجۡوَىٰكُمۡ صَدَقَٰتٖۚ
58:13.en_khattab: Are you afraid of spending in charity before your private consultations ˹with him˺?

58:13.qpc_hafs: فَإِذۡ لَمۡ تَفۡعَلُواْ وَتَابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ
58:13.en_khattab: Since you are unable to do so, and Allah has turned to you in mercy,

58:13.qpc_hafs: فَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ
58:13.en_khattab: then ˹continue to˺ establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and obey Allah and His Messenger.
And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

58:14.qpc_hafs: ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوۡاْ قَوۡمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم
58:14.en_khattab: those ˹hypocrites˺ who ally themselves with a people with whom Allah is displeased
They are neither with you nor with them
And they swear to lies knowingly

58:15.en_khattab: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment.
Evil indeed is what they do.

58:16.en_khattab: They have made their ˹false˺ oaths as a shield
hindering ˹others˺ from the cause of Allah
So they will suffer a humiliating punishment

58:17.qpc_hafs: لَّن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۚ
58:17.en_khattab: Neither their wealth nor children will be of any help to them against Allah whatsoever.
It is they who will be the residents of the Fire.

58:18.en_khattab: On the Day Allah resurrects them all
they will ˹falsely˺ swear to Him as they swear to you
thinking they have something to stand on
Indeed, it is they who are the ˹total˺ liars

58:19.en_khattab: Satan has taken hold of them
causing them to forget the remembrance of Allah
They are the party of Satan

58:19.qpc_hafs: أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
58:19.en_khattab: Surely Satan’s party is bound to lose

58:20.en_khattab: ˹As for˺ those who defy Allah and His Messenger
they will definitely be among the most debased.

58:21.en_khattab: “I and My messengers will certainly prevail.”

58:22.qpc_hafs: لَّا تَجِدُ قَوۡمٗا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ
58:22.en_khattab: You will never find a people who ˹truly˺ believe in Allah and the Last Day
loyal to those who defy Allah and His Messenger

58:22.qpc_hafs: وَلَوۡ كَانُوٓاْ ءَابَآءَهُمۡ أَوۡ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡ أَوۡ إِخۡوَٰنَهُمۡ أَوۡ عَشِيرَتَهُمۡۚ
58:22.en_khattab: even if they were their parents, children, siblings, or extended family
For those ˹believers˺, Allah has instilled faith in their hearts
and strengthened them with a spirit from Him

58:22.qpc_hafs: وَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ
58:22.en_khattab: He will admit them into Gardens under which rivers flow, to stay there forever
Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him
They are the party of Allah

58:22.qpc_hafs: أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
58:22.en_khattab: Indeed, Allah’s party is bound to succeed

59:1.en_khattab: is on the earth glorifies Allah.

59:1.qpc_hafs: مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ
59:1.en_khattab: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth

59:2.qpc_hafs: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلۡحَشۡرِۚ
59:2.en_khattab: He is the One Who expelled the disbelievers of the People of the Book from their homes for ˹their˺ first banishment ˹ever˺.
You never thought they would go.

59:2.qpc_hafs: وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمۡ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَمۡ يَحۡتَسِبُواْۖ
59:2.en_khattab: And they thought their strongholds would put them out of Allah’s reach. But ˹the decree of˺ Allah came upon them from where they never expected.
And He cast horror into their hearts
so they destroyed their houses with their own hands and the hands of the believers.
So take a lesson ˹from this˺, O people of insight!

59:3.en_khattab: He would have certainly punished them in this world
they will suffer the punishment of the Fire

59:4.en_khattab: This is because they defied Allah and His Messenger.

59:4.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُشَآقِّ ٱللَّهَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
59:4.en_khattab: And whoever defies Allah, then Allah is truly severe in punishment.

59:5.en_khattab: Whatever palm trees you ˹believers˺ cut down
so that He might disgrace the rebellious.

59:6.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡهُمۡ
59:6.en_khattab: As for the gains Allah has turned over to His Messenger from them

59:6.qpc_hafs: فَمَآ أَوۡجَفۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ خَيۡلٖ وَلَا رِكَابٖ
59:6.en_khattab: you did not ˹even˺ spur on any horse or camel for such gains

59:6.qpc_hafs: وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۚ
59:6.en_khattab: But Allah gives authority to His messengers over whoever He wills
For Allah is Most Capable of everything

59:7.qpc_hafs: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ
59:7.en_khattab: As for gains granted by Allah to His Messenger from the people of ˹other˺ lands

59:7.qpc_hafs: فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
59:7.en_khattab: they are for Allah and the Messenger, his close relatives, orphans, the poor, and ˹needy˺ travellers

59:7.qpc_hafs: كَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةَۢ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡأَغۡنِيَآءِ مِنكُمۡۚ
59:7.en_khattab: so that wealth may not merely circulate among your rich

59:7.qpc_hafs: وَمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَىٰكُمۡ عَنۡهُ فَٱنتَهُواْۚ
59:7.en_khattab: Whatever the Messenger gives you, take it. And whatever he forbids you from, leave it
Surely Allah is severe in punishment

59:8.en_khattab: ˹Some of the gains will be˺ for poor emigrants
who were driven out of their homes and wealth
and standing up for Allah and His Messenger
They are the ones true in faith

59:9.qpc_hafs: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ
59:9.en_khattab: As for those who had settled in the city and ˹embraced˺ the faith before ˹the arrival of˺ the emigrants,
they love whoever immigrates to them,

59:9.qpc_hafs: وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ حَاجَةٗ مِّمَّآ أُوتُواْ
59:9.en_khattab: never having a desire in their hearts for whatever ˹of the gains˺ is given to the emigrants.

59:9.qpc_hafs: وَيُؤۡثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَلَوۡ كَانَ بِهِمۡ خَصَاصَةٞۚ
59:9.en_khattab: They give ˹the emigrants˺ preference over themselves even though they may be in need.

59:9.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
59:9.en_khattab: And whoever is saved from the selfishness of their own souls, it is they who are ˹truly˺ successful.

59:10.en_khattab: And those who come after them

59:10.qpc_hafs: يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَلِإِخۡوَٰنِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ
59:10.en_khattab: will pray, “Our Lord! Forgive us and our fellow believers who preceded us in faith
and do not allow bitterness into our hearts
Our Lord! Indeed, You are Ever Gracious, Most Merciful.

59:11.en_khattab: Have you ˹O Prophet˺ not seen the hypocrites

59:11.qpc_hafs: يَقُولُونَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
59:11.en_khattab: who say to their fellow disbelievers from the People of the Book,

59:11.qpc_hafs: لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجۡتُمۡ لَنَخۡرُجَنَّ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمۡ أَحَدًا أَبَدٗا
59:11.en_khattab: If you are expelled, we will certainly leave with you, and We will never obey anyone against you.

59:11.qpc_hafs: وَإِن قُوتِلۡتُمۡ لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
59:11.en_khattab: And if you are fought against, we will surely help you.” But Allah bears witness that they are truly liars.

59:12.en_khattab: the hypocrites will never leave with them.
And if they are fought against,
the hypocrites will never help them.
And even if the hypocrites did so,
then the disbelievers would be left with no help.

59:13.qpc_hafs: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ
59:13.en_khattab: Indeed, there is more fear in their hearts for you ˹believers˺ than for Allah.
That is because they are a people who do not comprehend.

59:14.en_khattab: Even united, they would not ˹dare˺ fight against you

59:14.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا فِي قُرٗى مُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوۡ مِن وَرَآءِ جُدُرِۭۚ
59:14.en_khattab: except ˹from˺ within fortified strongholds or from behind walls
Their malice for each other is intense
you think they are united, yet their hearts are divided
That is because they are a people with no ˹real˺ understanding

59:15.en_khattab: They are ˹both just˺ like those who recently went down before them:
they tasted the evil consequences of their doings.
And they will suffer a painful punishment.

59:16.en_khattab: when he lures someone to disbelieve

59:16.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكَ
59:16.en_khattab: Then after they have done so, he will say ˹on Judgment Day˺, “I have absolutely nothing to do with you
I truly fear Allah— the Lord of all worlds.

59:17.en_khattab: So they will both end up
in the Fire, staying there forever
That is the reward of the wrongdoers.

59:18.en_khattab: and let every soul look to what ˹deeds˺ it has sent forth for tomorrow.
certainly Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

59:19.en_khattab: And do not be like those who forgot Allah,
so He made them forget themselves.
It is they who are ˹truly˺ rebellious.

59:20.en_khattab: The residents of the Fire cannot be equal
Only the residents of Paradise will be successful.

59:21.qpc_hafs: لَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ عَلَىٰ جَبَلٖ
59:21.en_khattab: Had We sent down this Quran upon a mountain

59:21.qpc_hafs: لَّرَأَيۡتَهُۥ خَٰشِعٗا مُّتَصَدِّعٗا مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ ٱللَّهِۚ
59:21.en_khattab: you would have certainly seen it humbled and torn apart in awe of Allah

59:21.qpc_hafs: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
59:21.en_khattab: We set forth such comparisons for people, ˹so˺ perhaps they may reflect

59:22.qpc_hafs: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ
59:22.en_khattab: He is Allah— there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him:
Knower of the seen and unseen.
He is the Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.

59:23.en_khattab: there is no god except Him:

59:23.qpc_hafs: ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡقُدُّوسُ ٱلسَّلَٰمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُ ٱلۡمُهَيۡمِنُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡجَبَّارُ ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرُۚ
59:23.en_khattab: the King, the Most Holy, the All-Perfect, the Source of Serenity, the Watcher ˹of all˺, the Almighty, the Supreme in Might,
the Majestic. Glorified is Allah far above what they associate with Him ˹in worship˺!

59:24.en_khattab: the Creator, the Inventor, the Shaper.
He ˹alone˺ has the Most Beautiful Names.

59:24.qpc_hafs: يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ
59:24.en_khattab: Whatever is in the heavens and the earth ˹constantly˺ glorifies Him.
And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

60:1.qpc_hafs: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَتَّخِذُواْ عَدُوِّي وَعَدُوَّكُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ
60:1.en_khattab: O believers! Do not take My enemies and yours as trusted allies,

60:1.qpc_hafs: تُلۡقُونَ إِلَيۡهِم بِٱلۡمَوَدَّةِ وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِمَا جَآءَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ
60:1.en_khattab: showing them affection even though they deny what has come to you of the truth.
They drove the Messenger and yourselves out ˹of Mecca˺,
simply for your belief in Allah, your Lord.

60:1.qpc_hafs: إِن كُنتُمۡ خَرَجۡتُمۡ جِهَٰدٗا فِي سَبِيلِي وَٱبۡتِغَآءَ مَرۡضَاتِيۚ
60:1.en_khattab: If you ˹truly˺ emigrated to struggle in My cause and seek My pleasure,
then do not take them as allies, disclosing secrets ˹of the believers˺ to the pagans out of affection for them,

60:1.qpc_hafs: وَأَنَا۠ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَآ أَخۡفَيۡتُمۡ وَمَآ أَعۡلَنتُمۡۚ
60:1.en_khattab: when I know best whatever you conceal and whatever you reveal.

60:1.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡهُ مِنكُمۡ فَقَدۡ ضَلَّ سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
60:1.en_khattab: And whoever of you does this has truly strayed from the Right Way.

60:2.en_khattab: If they gain the upper hand over you,
unleashing their hands and tongues to harm you,
and wishing that you would abandon faith.

60:3.en_khattab: Neither your relatives nor children will benefit you
on Judgment Day— He will decide between you ˹all˺.
For Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

60:4.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ كَانَتۡ لَكُمۡ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَةٞ فِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥٓ
60:4.en_khattab: You already have an excellent example in Abraham and those with him,

60:4.qpc_hafs: إِذۡ قَالُواْ لِقَوۡمِهِمۡ إِنَّا بُرَءَٰٓؤُاْ مِنكُمۡ
60:4.en_khattab: when they said to their people, “We totally dissociate ourselves from you

60:4.qpc_hafs: وَمِمَّا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَفَرۡنَا بِكُمۡ وَبَدَا بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡعَدَٰوَةُ وَٱلۡبَغۡضَآءُ أَبَدًا
60:4.en_khattab: and ˹shun˺ whatever ˹idols˺ you worship besides Allah. We reject you. The enmity and hatred that has arisen between us and you will last
until you believe in Allah alone.”

60:4.qpc_hafs: إِلَّا قَوۡلَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ لَأَسۡتَغۡفِرَنَّ لَكَ وَمَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖۖ
60:4.en_khattab: The only exception is when Abraham said to his father, “I will seek forgiveness for you,˹” adding, “but˺ I cannot protect you from Allah at all.” ˹The believers prayed,˺

60:4.qpc_hafs: رَّبَّنَا عَلَيۡكَ تَوَكَّلۡنَا وَإِلَيۡكَ أَنَبۡنَا وَإِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
60:4.en_khattab: “Our Lord! In You we trust. And to You we ˹always˺ turn. And to You is the final return.

60:5.qpc_hafs: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ
60:5.en_khattab: Our Lord! Do not subject us to the persecution of the disbelievers.
You ˹alone˺ are truly the Almighty, All-Wise.

60:6.qpc_hafs: لَقَدۡ كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِيهِمۡ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَةٞ
60:6.en_khattab: You certainly have an excellent example in them

60:6.qpc_hafs: لِّمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَۚ
60:6.en_khattab: for whoever has hope in Allah and the Last Day.
then surely Allah ˹alone˺ is the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

60:7.qpc_hafs: عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَجۡعَلَ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ عَادَيۡتُم مِّنۡهُم مَّوَدَّةٗۚ
60:7.en_khattab: ˹In time,˺ Allah may bring about goodwill between you and those of them you ˹now˺ hold as enemies.
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

60:8.en_khattab: Allah does not forbid you from

60:8.qpc_hafs: لَمۡ يُقَٰتِلُوكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِ وَلَمۡ يُخۡرِجُوكُم مِّن دِيَٰرِكُمۡ
60:8.en_khattab: kindly and fairly with those who have neither fought nor driven you out of your homes.
dealing kindly and fairly with them.
Surely Allah loves those who are fair.

60:9.qpc_hafs: إِنَّمَا يَنۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱللَّهُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ قَٰتَلُوكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِ
60:9.en_khattab: Allah only forbids you from befriending those who have fought you for ˹your˺ faith,
driven you out of your homes,
And whoever takes them as friends,
then it is they who are the ˹true˺ wrongdoers.

60:10.en_khattab: When the believing women come to you as emigrants,
test their intentions— their faith is best known to Allah—
and if you find them to be believers,
then do not send them back to the disbelievers.

60:10.qpc_hafs: لَا هُنَّ حِلّٞ لَّهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحِلُّونَ لَهُنَّۖ
60:10.en_khattab: These ˹women˺ are not lawful ˹wives˺ for the disbelievers, nor are the disbelievers lawful ˹husbands˺ for them. ˹But˺
repay the disbelievers whatever ˹dowries˺ they had paid.

60:10.qpc_hafs: وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَن تَنكِحُوهُنَّ إِذَآ ءَاتَيۡتُمُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّۚ
60:10.en_khattab: And there is no blame on you if you marry these ˹women˺ as long as you pay them their dowries.
And do not hold on to marriage with polytheistic women. ˹But˺

60:10.qpc_hafs: وَسۡـَٔلُواْ مَآ أَنفَقۡتُمۡ وَلۡيَسۡـَٔلُواْ مَآ أَنفَقُواْۚ
60:10.en_khattab: demand ˹repayment of˺ whatever ˹dowries˺ you had paid, and let the disbelievers do the same.
That is the judgment of Allah— He judges between you.

60:11.en_khattab: And if any of your wives desert you
and later you take spoils from them,
the equivalent of whatever ˹dowry˺ they had paid.

60:12.en_khattab: When the believing women come to you,

60:12.qpc_hafs: يُبَايِعۡنَكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن لَّا يُشۡرِكۡنَ بِٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَسۡرِقۡنَ وَلَا يَزۡنِينَ وَلَا يَقۡتُلۡنَ أَوۡلَٰدَهُنَّ وَلَا يَأۡتِينَ بِبُهۡتَٰنٖ يَفۡتَرِينَهُۥ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِنَّ وَأَرۡجُلِهِنَّ وَلَا يَعۡصِينَكَ فِي مَعۡرُوفٖ
60:12.en_khattab: pledging to you that they will neither associate anything with Allah ˹in worship˺, nor steal, nor fornicate, nor kill their children, nor falsely attribute ˹illegitimate˺ children to their husbands, nor disobey you in what is right,
then accept their pledge, and ask Allah to forgive them.
Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

60:13.qpc_hafs: لَا تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ قَوۡمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ
60:13.en_khattab: Do not ally yourselves with a people Allah is displeased with.
They already have no hope for the Hereafter,

61:1.en_khattab: and whatever is on the earth
glorifies Allah. For He ˹alone˺ is the Almighty,

61:3.en_khattab: How despicable it is in the sight of Allah
that you say what you do not do!

61:4.en_khattab: in solid ranks as if they were one concrete structure.

61:5.en_khattab: ˹Remember, O Prophet,˺ when Moses said to his people,

61:5.qpc_hafs: يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تُؤۡذُونَنِي وَقَد تَّعۡلَمُونَ أَنِّي رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَيۡكُمۡۖ
61:5.en_khattab: “O my people! Why do you hurt me when you already know I am Allah’s messenger to you?”
So when they ˹persistently˺ deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate.
For Allah does not guide the rebellious people.

61:6.en_khattab: And ˹remember˺ when Jesus, son of Mary,

61:6.qpc_hafs: إِنِّي رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَيۡكُم مُّصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيَّ مِنَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ
61:6.en_khattab: I am truly Allah’s messenger to you, confirming the Torah which came before me,

61:6.qpc_hafs: وَمُبَشِّرَۢا بِرَسُولٖ يَأۡتِي مِنۢ بَعۡدِي ٱسۡمُهُۥٓ أَحۡمَدُۖ
61:6.en_khattab: and giving good news of a messenger after me whose name will be Aḥmad.”
Yet when the Prophet came to them with clear proofs,

61:7.en_khattab: the one who fabricates lies about Allah
For Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

61:8.en_khattab: They wish to extinguish Allah’s light with their mouths
but Allah will ˹certainly˺ perfect His light
even to the dismay of the disbelievers

61:9.en_khattab: has sent His Messenger with ˹true˺ guidance and the religion of truth,
making it prevail over all others,
even to the dismay of the polytheists.

61:10.en_khattab: Shall I guide you to an exchange that will save you

61:11.en_khattab: ˹It is to˺ have faith in Allah and His Messenger,

61:11.qpc_hafs: وَتُجَٰهِدُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمۡوَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنفُسِكُمۡۚ
61:11.en_khattab: and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives.

61:11.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
61:11.en_khattab: That is best for you, if only you knew.

61:12.qpc_hafs: وَيُدۡخِلۡكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ
61:12.en_khattab: and admit you into Gardens under which rivers flow,
and ˹house you in˺ splendid homes in the Gardens of Eternity.

61:13.en_khattab: ˹He will also give you˺ another favour that you long for:
help from Allah and an imminent victory.
˹So˺ give good news ˹O Prophet˺ to the believers.

61:14.qpc_hafs: كَمَا قَالَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ لِلۡحَوَارِيِّـۧنَ
61:14.en_khattab: as Jesus, son of Mary, asked the disciples,
"Who will stand up with me for Allah?"
Then a group from the Children of Israel believed
We then supported the believers against their enemies

62:1.en_khattab: is on the earth ˹constantly˺ glorifies Allah—
and whatever is on the earth

62:2.en_khattab: raised for the illiterate ˹people˺ a messenger from among themselves

62:2.qpc_hafs: يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَيُزَكِّيهِمۡ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ
62:2.en_khattab: reciting to them His revelations, purifying them, and teaching them the Book and wisdom

62:2.qpc_hafs: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
62:2.en_khattab: for indeed they had previously been clearly astray—

62:3.en_khattab: who have not yet joined them ˹in faith˺.
For He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

62:4.en_khattab: This is the favour of Allah.
He grants it to whoever He wills.
And Allah is the Lord of infinite bounty.

62:5.en_khattab: The example of those who were entrusted with ˹observing˺ the Torah
is that of a donkey carrying books

62:5.qpc_hafs: بِئۡسَ مَثَلُ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ
62:5.en_khattab: How evil is the example of those who reject Allah’s signs
For Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

62:6.qpc_hafs: إِن زَعَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ لِلَّهِ مِن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ
62:6.en_khattab: “O Jews! If you claim to be Allah’s chosen ˹people˺ out of all humanity,
if what you say is true.”

62:7.en_khattab: But they will never wish for that
because of what their hands have done
And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of the wrongdoers

62:8.en_khattab: to the Knower of the seen and unseen,
and He will inform you of what you used to do.

62:9.qpc_hafs: إِذَا نُودِيَ لِلصَّلَوٰةِ مِن يَوۡمِ ٱلۡجُمُعَةِ
62:9.en_khattab: When the call to prayer is made on Friday,

62:9.qpc_hafs: فَٱسۡعَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَذَرُواْ ٱلۡبَيۡعَۚ
62:9.en_khattab: then proceed ˹diligently˺ to the remembrance of Allah and leave off ˹your˺ business.

62:9.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
62:9.en_khattab: That is best for you, if only you knew.

62:10.en_khattab: and seek the bounty of Allah

62:11.en_khattab: When they saw the fanfare along with the caravan
they ˹almost all˺ flocked to it, leaving you ˹O Prophet˺ standing ˹on the pulpit˺.

62:11.qpc_hafs: قُلۡ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهۡوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَٰرَةِۚ
62:11.en_khattab: Say, “What is with Allah is far better than amusement and merchandise.
And Allah is the Best Provider.

63:1.en_khattab: When the hypocrites come to you
˹O Prophet˺, they say, “We bear witness that you are certainly the Messenger of Allah”—and surely Allah
knows that you are His Messenger—
that the hypocrites are truly liars.

63:2.en_khattab: They have made their ˹false˺ oaths as a shield
hindering ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah
Evil indeed is what they do!

63:3.en_khattab: This is because they believed and then abandoned faith.
Therefore, their hearts have been sealed,

63:4.en_khattab: And when they speak, you listen to their ˹impressive˺ speech.
But they are ˹just˺ like ˹worthless˺ planks of wood leaned ˹against a wall˺.
They think every cry is against them.
They are the enemy, so beware of them.
How can they be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

63:5.en_khattab: When it is said to them, “Come!
The Messenger of Allah will pray for you to be forgiven,
they turn their heads ˹in disgust˺, and you see them ˹O Prophet˺ turn away

63:6.qpc_hafs: أَسۡتَغۡفَرۡتَ لَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ
63:6.en_khattab: whether you pray for their forgiveness or not

63:6.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
63:6.en_khattab: Surely Allah does not guide the rebellious people.

63:7.en_khattab: They are the ones who say ˹to one another˺,

63:7.qpc_hafs: لَا تُنفِقُواْ عَلَىٰ مَنۡ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَنفَضُّواْۗ
63:7.en_khattab: “Do not spend ˹anything˺ on those ˹emigrants˺ with the Messenger of Allah so that they will break away ˹from him˺.”
But to Allah ˹alone˺ belong the treasuries of the heavens and the earth,
yet the hypocrites do not comprehend.

63:8.en_khattab: They say, “If we return to Medina,
the honourable will definitely expel the inferior.
But all honour and power belongs to Allah, His Messenger, and the believers,
yet the hypocrites do not know.

63:9.qpc_hafs: لَا تُلۡهِكُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ
63:9.en_khattab: Do not let your wealth or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah.

63:9.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَفۡعَلۡ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
63:9.en_khattab: For whoever does so, it is they who are the ˹true˺ losers.

63:10.en_khattab: And donate from what We have provided for you

63:10.qpc_hafs: مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ
63:10.en_khattab: before death comes to one of you

63:10.qpc_hafs: فَيَقُولَ رَبِّ لَوۡلَآ أَخَّرۡتَنِيٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ قَرِيبٖ
63:10.en_khattab: and you cry, “My Lord! If only You delayed me for a short while
I would give in charity and be one of the righteous.

63:11.qpc_hafs: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ
63:11.en_khattab: But Allah never delays a soul when its appointed time comes.
And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

64:1.qpc_hafs: مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ
64:1.en_khattab: and whatever is on the earth ˹constantly˺
glorifies Allah. The kingdom is His,
and all praise is for Him.
For He is Most Capable of everything.

64:2.en_khattab: He is the One Who created you,
yet some of you are disbelievers
And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

64:3.en_khattab: He created the heavens and the earth for a purpose.
He shaped you ˹in the womb˺, perfecting your form.
And to Him is the final return.

64:4.en_khattab: He knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth.
And He knows whatever you conceal and whatever you reveal.
For Allah knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

64:5.qpc_hafs: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ
64:5.en_khattab: Have the stories of those who disbelieved before not reached you ˹pagans˺?
They tasted the evil consequences of their doings,
and they will suffer a painful punishment.

64:6.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُۥ كَانَت تَّأۡتِيهِمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ
64:6.en_khattab: That was because their messengers used to come to them with clear proofs,
but they said ˹mockingly˺, “How can humans be our guides?”
So they persisted in disbelief and turned away.
And Allah was not in need ˹of their faith˺.

64:7.en_khattab: you will surely be resurrected, then
you will certainly be informed of what you have done.
And that is easy for Allah.

64:8.en_khattab: and in the Light We have revealed
And Allah is All-Aware of what you do

64:9.en_khattab: ˹Consider˺ the Day He will gather you ˹all˺ for the Day of Gathering
that will be the Day of mutual loss and gain
So whoever believes in Allah and does good
He will absolve them of their sins

64:9.qpc_hafs: وَيُدۡخِلۡهُ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ
64:9.en_khattab: and admit them into Gardens under which rivers flow
to stay there for ever and ever

64:10.en_khattab: they will be the residents of the Fire, staying there forever

64:11.qpc_hafs: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۗ
64:11.en_khattab: No calamity befalls ˹anyone˺ except by Allah’s Will.
And whoever has faith in Allah, He will ˹rightly˺ guide their hearts ˹through adversity˺.
And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

64:12.en_khattab: then Our Messenger's duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly.

64:13.en_khattab: Allah— there is no god worthy of worship except Him.
let the believers put their trust.

64:14.qpc_hafs: إِنَّ مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدِكُمۡ عَدُوّٗا لَّكُمۡ فَٱحۡذَرُوهُمۡۚ
64:14.en_khattab: Indeed, some of your spouses and children are enemies to you, so beware of them.
But if you pardon, overlook, and forgive ˹their faults˺,
then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

64:15.en_khattab: Your wealth and children are only a test,
but Allah ˹alone˺ has a great reward.

64:16.en_khattab: So be mindful of Allah to the best of your ability
and spend in charity— that will be best for you
And whoever is saved from the selfishness of their own souls
it is they who are ˹truly˺ successful

64:17.en_khattab: If you lend to Allah a good loan
He will multiply it for you and forgive you
For Allah is Most Appreciative, Most Forbearing

64:18.en_khattab: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the seen and unseen

65:1.en_khattab: then divorce them with concern for their waiting period,

65:1.qpc_hafs: لَا تُخۡرِجُوهُنَّ مِنۢ بُيُوتِهِنَّ وَلَا يَخۡرُجۡنَ
65:1.en_khattab: Do not force them out of their homes, nor should they leave—
unless they commit a blatant misconduct.
These are the limits set by Allah.
has truly wronged his own soul.

65:1.qpc_hafs: لَا تَدۡرِي لَعَلَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحۡدِثُ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ أَمۡرٗا
65:1.en_khattab: You never know, perhaps Allah will bring about a change ˹of heart˺ later.

65:2.en_khattab: Then when they have ˹almost˺ reached the end of their waiting period,
And call two of your reliable men to witness ˹either
way˺—and ˹let the witnesses˺ bear true testimony for ˹the sake of˺ Allah.

65:2.qpc_hafs: ذَٰلِكُمۡ يُوعَظُ بِهِۦ مَن كَانَ يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِۚ
65:2.en_khattab: This is enjoined on whoever has faith in Allah and the Last Day.

65:2.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ مَخۡرَجٗا
65:2.en_khattab: And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will make a way out for them,

65:3.en_khattab: and provide for them from sources they could never imagine.

65:3.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسۡبُهُۥٓۚ
65:3.en_khattab: And whoever puts their trust in Allah, then He ˹alone˺ is sufficient for them.

65:3.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدۡرٗا
65:3.en_khattab: Allah has already set a destiny for everything.

65:4.en_khattab: As for your women past the age of menstruation,
in case you do not know,

65:4.qpc_hafs: فَعِدَّتُهُنَّ ثَلَٰثَةُ أَشۡهُرٖ وَٱلَّٰٓـِٔي لَمۡ يَحِضۡنَۚ
65:4.en_khattab: their waiting period is three months, and those who have not menstruated as well.

65:4.qpc_hafs: وَأُوْلَٰتُ ٱلۡأَحۡمَالِ أَجَلُهُنَّ أَن يَضَعۡنَ حَمۡلَهُنَّۚ
65:4.en_khattab: As for those who are pregnant, their waiting period ends with delivery.

65:4.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ مِنۡ أَمۡرِهِۦ يُسۡرٗا
65:4.en_khattab: And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will make their matters easy for them.

65:5.en_khattab: This is the commandment of Allah, which He has revealed to you.

65:5.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يُكَفِّرۡ عَنۡهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ
65:5.en_khattab: And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will absolve them of their sins.

65:6.qpc_hafs: أَسۡكِنُوهُنَّ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ سَكَنتُم مِّن وُجۡدِكُمۡ
65:6.en_khattab: Let them live where you live ˹during their waiting period˺, according to your means.
And do not harass them to make their stay unbearable.

65:6.qpc_hafs: وَإِن كُنَّ أُوْلَٰتِ حَمۡلٖ فَأَنفِقُواْ عَلَيۡهِنَّ حَتَّىٰ يَضَعۡنَ حَمۡلَهُنَّۚ
65:6.en_khattab: If they are pregnant, then maintain them until they deliver.

65:6.qpc_hafs: فَإِنۡ أَرۡضَعۡنَ لَكُمۡ فَـَٔاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ وَأۡتَمِرُواْ بَيۡنَكُم بِمَعۡرُوفٖۖ
65:6.en_khattab: And if they nurse your child, compensate them, and consult together courteously.
But if you fail to reach an agreement, then another woman will nurse ˹the child˺ for the father.

65:7.en_khattab: Let the man of wealth provide according to his means.

65:7.qpc_hafs: وَمَن قُدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقُهُۥ فَلۡيُنفِقۡ مِمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُۚ
65:7.en_khattab: As for the one with limited resources, let him provide according to whatever Allah has given him.

65:7.qpc_hafs: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا مَآ ءَاتَىٰهَاۚ
65:7.en_khattab: Allah does not require of any soul beyond what He has given it.
After hardship, Allah will bring about ease.

65:8.qpc_hafs: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ عَتَتۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِهِۦ
65:8.en_khattab: ˹Imagine˺ how many societies rebelled against the commandments of their Lord and His messengers

65:8.qpc_hafs: فَحَاسَبۡنَٰهَا حِسَابٗا شَدِيدٗا وَعَذَّبۡنَٰهَا عَذَابٗا نُّكۡرٗا
65:8.en_khattab: so We called each ˹society˺ to a severe account and subjected them to a horrible punishment

65:9.en_khattab: So they tasted the evil consequences of their doings
and the outcome of their doings was ˹total˺ loss

65:10.en_khattab: Allah has ˹also˺ prepared for them a severe punishment.
O  people of reason and faith.
Allah has indeed revealed to you a Reminder,

65:11.qpc_hafs: رَّسُولٗا يَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ مُبَيِّنَٰتٖ
65:11.en_khattab: and sent a messenger reciting to you Allah’s revelations, making things clear

65:11.qpc_hafs: لِّيُخۡرِجَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ
65:11.en_khattab: so that He may bring those who believe and do good out of darkness and into light

65:11.qpc_hafs: وَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَيَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحٗا يُدۡخِلۡهُ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ
65:11.en_khattab: And whoever believes in Allah and does good will be admitted by Him into Gardens under which rivers flow

65:11.qpc_hafs: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ قَدۡ أَحۡسَنَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُۥ رِزۡقًا
65:11.en_khattab: to stay there for ever and ever. Allah will have indeed granted them an excellent provision

65:12.en_khattab: Allah is the One Who created seven heavens ˹in layers˺,

65:12.qpc_hafs: لِتَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
65:12.en_khattab: so you may know that Allah is Most Capable of everything

65:12.qpc_hafs: وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَدۡ أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمَۢا
65:12.en_khattab: and that Allah certainly encompasses all things in ˹His˺ knowledge.

66:1.qpc_hafs: لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَۖ
66:1.en_khattab: Why do you prohibit ˹yourself˺ from what Allah has made lawful to you,
And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

66:2.qpc_hafs: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ
66:2.en_khattab: Allah has already ordained for you ˹believers˺ the way to absolve yourselves from your oaths.
And He is the All-Knowing, All-Wise.

66:3.qpc_hafs: وَإِذۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضِ أَزۡوَٰجِهِۦ حَدِيثٗا
66:3.en_khattab: ˹Remember˺ when the Prophet had ˹once˺ confided something to one of his wives,

66:3.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتۡ بِهِۦ وَأَظۡهَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ
66:3.en_khattab: then when she disclosed it ˹to another wife˺ and Allah made it known to him,
he presented ˹to her˺ part of what was disclosed and overlooked a part.

66:3.qpc_hafs: فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِۦ قَالَتۡ مَنۡ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَٰذَاۖ
66:3.en_khattab: So when he informed her of it, she exclaimed, “Who told you this?”
He replied, “I was informed by the All-Knowing, All-Aware.”

66:4.en_khattab: ˹It will be better˺ if you ˹wives˺ both turn to Allah in repentance,
for your hearts have certainly faltered.
But if you ˹continue to˺ collaborate against him,

66:4.qpc_hafs: فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰهُ وَجِبۡرِيلُ وَصَٰلِحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۖ
66:4.en_khattab: then ˹know that˺ Allah Himself is his Guardian. And Gabriel, the righteous believers,
and the angels are ˹all˺ his supporters as well.

66:5.en_khattab: if he were to divorce you ˹all˺,
his Lord would replace you with better wives

66:6.en_khattab: Protect yourselves and your families from a Fire
whose fuel is people and stones
overseen by formidable and severe angels
who never disobey whatever Allah orders

66:7.en_khattab: for what you used to do.”

66:8.en_khattab: Turn to Allah in sincere repentance

66:8.qpc_hafs: عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ
66:8.en_khattab: so your Lord may absolve you of your sins and admit you into Gardens, under which rivers flow

66:8.qpc_hafs: يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ
66:8.en_khattab: on the Day Allah will not disgrace the Prophet or the believers with him.
Their light will shine ahead of them

66:8.qpc_hafs: يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
66:8.en_khattab: They will say, “Our Lord! Perfect our light for us, and forgive us. ˹For˺ You are truly Most Capable of everything.

66:9.en_khattab: Struggle against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be firm with them.

66:10.en_khattab: Allah sets forth an example for the disbelievers:
the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot.

66:10.qpc_hafs: كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَٰلِحَيۡنِ
66:10.en_khattab: Each was married to one of Our righteous servants,

66:10.qpc_hafs: فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا
66:10.en_khattab: yet betrayed them. So their husbands were of no benefit to them against Allah whatsoever.
Both were told, “Enter the Fire, along with the others!”

66:11.en_khattab: And Allah sets forth an example for the believers:
the wife of Pharaoh, who prayed,

66:11.qpc_hafs: رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ
66:11.en_khattab: My Lord! Build me a house in Paradise near You,
deliver me from Pharaoh and his ˹evil˺ doing,
and save me from the wrongdoing people.

66:12.en_khattab: also ˹the example of˺ Mary, the daughter of ’Imrân,
so We breathed into her ˹womb˺ through Our angel ˹Gabriel˺.
She testified to the words of her Lord and His Scriptures,
and was one of the ˹sincerely˺ devout.

67:1.en_khattab: in Whose Hands rests all authority.
And He is Most Capable of everything.

67:2.en_khattab: ˹He is the One˺ Who created death and life
in order to test which of you is best in deeds.
And He is the Almighty, All-Forgiving.

67:3.en_khattab: He is the One Who created seven heavens

67:3.qpc_hafs: مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِن تَفَٰوُتٖۖ
67:3.en_khattab: You will never see any imperfection in the creation of the Most Compassionate.

67:5.en_khattab: And indeed, We adorned the lowest heaven with ˹stars like˺ lamps
and made them ˹as missiles˺ for stoning ˹eavesdropping˺ devils
for whom We have also prepared the torment of the Blaze.

67:6.en_khattab: Those who disbelieve in their Lord
will suffer the punishment of Hell

67:7.en_khattab: When they are tossed into it,

67:8.en_khattab: Every time a group is cast into it,
“Did a warner not come to you?”

67:9.en_khattab: a warner did come to us,

67:9.qpc_hafs: إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ

67:10.en_khattab: If only we had listened and reasoned,
we would not be among the residents of the Blaze!

67:11.en_khattab: And so they will confess their sins.
So away with the residents of the Blaze!

67:12.en_khattab: Indeed, those in awe of their Lord

67:13.en_khattab: He surely knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

67:14.en_khattab: How could He not know His Own creation?
For He ˹alone˺ is the Most Subtle, All-Aware.

67:15.en_khattab: smoothed out the earth for you
so move about in its regions
And to Him is the resurrection ˹of all˺

67:16.en_khattab: Do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven
will not cause the earth to swallow you up

67:17.en_khattab: Or do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven
will not unleash upon you a storm of stones.
Only then would you know how ˹serious˺ My warning was!

67:18.en_khattab: And certainly those before them denied
˹as well˺, then how severe was My response!

67:19.qpc_hafs: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَٰٓفَّٰتٖ
67:19.en_khattab: Have they not seen the birds above them, spreading
and folding their wings? None holds them up except the Most Compassionate.
Indeed, He is All-Seeing of everything.

67:20.en_khattab: to your help instead of the Most Compassionate?
Indeed, the disbelievers are only ˹lost˺ in delusion.

67:21.en_khattab: Or who is it that will provide for you
In fact, they persist in arrogance and aversion ˹to the truth˺

67:22.en_khattab: ˹rightly˺ guided: the one who crawls facedown

67:23.en_khattab: He is the One Who brought you into being
and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect.

67:24.en_khattab: ˹Also˺ say, “He is the One Who has dispersed you ˹all˺
over the earth, and to Him you will ˹all˺ be gathered.”

67:25.en_khattab: When will this threat come to pass
if what you say is true?

67:26.en_khattab: That knowledge is with Allah alone,
and I am only sent with a clear warning.

67:27.en_khattab: Then when they see the torment drawing near
the faces of the disbelievers will become gloomy

67:27.qpc_hafs: وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
67:27.en_khattab: and it will be said ˹to them˺, “This is what you claimed would never come.”

67:28.en_khattab: ˹O Prophet,˺ “Consider this: whether Allah causes me
